40019004	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Kaa tum i nai paṛha ki dunia jab racha gais, tab dunia banaay waala ek admi aur ek aurat banaais raha? Yahi kaaran admi aapan amma bappa se alag hoy ke aapan aurat se juṛ jaay hei, aur u duuno ek hoy jaay hei.”
40019006	Aur ab u dui nai lekin ek hei. Aur koi bhi ulog ke alag nai kari jon ke Parmeshwar joṛis hei.”
40019007	Tab Farisi log usse puuchhis, “Tab kaahe ke Maozas bolis ki ek admi ḍivos ke kaagaj likh ke aapan aurat ke alag kare sake hei?”
40019008	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum log ke lage dil nai hei! Wahi kaaran Maozas tumme aapan aurat ke ḍivos de ke raaji bhais. Suru se Parmeshwar i rakam nai chaahis raha.
40019009	Ham tum se bataata hei ki jon admi aapan aurat jon sekshual paap nai karis hei, uske ḍivos deke dusra se saadi kare hei, u faitful nai hei.”
40019010	Tab chela log bolin, “Agar eisehiyeñ sambandh ek aurat aur admi ke beech meñ hei, to saadi nai kare ke chaahi.”
40019011	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Khali wahi log jiske Parmeshwar akele rahe ke gifṭ dees hei, wahi log i seekhi.
40019012	Kaahe ke ek dusra kaaran hei ki ek admi saadi nai kare sake hei, kuchh to eisehiyeñ peida bhain hei, aur kuchh ke admi log eisan banaay deen hei, aur kuchh eisan bhi hei, jon swarag ke raaj ke khaatir saadi nai karin hei. Jon log i ṭeeching ke apnaay sake hei to apnaay leo.”
40019013	Kuchh log aapan laṛkan Yeeshu ke lage laain, ki jisse Yeeshu aapan haath ulog pe rakh ke aur preya kare. Uske chela log ulog ke rokin ki Yeeshu ke tang nai kare.
40019014	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Laṛkan ke hamaar lage aay deo, aur ilog ke nai roko! Jon log i laṛkan ke rakam hei, wahi log ke swarag ke raaj hei.”
40019015	Laṛkan pe haath rakkhe ke baad Yeeshu huañ se chala gais.
40019016	Ek admi aay ke Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Ṭeecha, kon achchha kaam ham kari ki hamme anant jeewan mile?”
40019017	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum ham se kaahe puuchhta hei ki kon achchha cheej hei? Khali Parmeshwar achchha hei. Agar tum anant jeewan mañgta hei, to uske aagya ke maano.”
40019018	U admi puuchhis, “Kon aagya?” Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Hatya nai karo, saadi meñ faitful raho, chori nai karo, jhuṭṭa gawaahi nai deo.
40019019	Aapan maiya aur bappa ke aadar karo, aur aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem rakkho.”
40019020	Naojawaan Yeeshu se bolis, “I sab ke to ham chhoṭa se maante aaya hei, isse aage hamme kon cheej kare ke hei?”
40019021	Yeeshu bolis, “Agar tum ekdam achchha hoy mañgta hei, to jaao, aapan sab dhan daulat bech deo! Sab peisa gareeb meñ baaṭ deo, tab tumme swarag meñ khajaana mili. Aur aay ke hamaar pichchhe chalo.”
40019022	Lekin jab naojawaan i baat sunis, to soch meñ paṛ gais, aur huañ se chala gais, kaahe ke u bahut dhani admi raha.
40019023	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham sachche bolta hei ki dhani log ke swarag ke raaj meñ jaay ke kaṛa hei.
40019024	I sahaj hei ki uuñṭ sui ke naake se nikre, lekin i mushkil hei ki ek dhani admi Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay.”
40019025	Jab chela log i sab sunin, to ulog bahut chakit bhain aur bole lagin, “To fir kon bache sake hei?”
40019026	Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Kuchh cheej hei jon admi nai kare sake hei, lekin Parmeshwar sab kuchh kare sake hei.”
40019027	Ispe Peeṭa bolis, “Dekho, ham to sab kuchh chhoṛ ke tumhaar pichchhe chal paṛa hei. Hamme kaa mili?”
40019028	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ham tum se bataata hei, ki tum jon hamaar pichchhe chala aaya hei, to jab nyaay ke roj jab Manush ke laṛka aapan mahima meñ gaddi pe beiṭhi, to tum baarah gaddi pe beiṭh ke Israayel ke baarah ṭraaib ke nyaay karega.
40019029	Sab koi jon aapan ghar, ya bhaiya-bahini, ya amma-bappa, ya laṛkan bachchan, ya khet ke chhoṛ dees hei, u isse kahiñ sao guna jaada paai.
40019030	Lekin jon jon pichchhe hei, ulog aage hoy jaai, aur jon aage hei, ulog pichchhe hoy jaai.”
40020001	Yeeshu bataat raha ki swarag ke raaj i rakam hei, Ek roj sabere ek admi aapan añguur ke khet meñ kaam kare ke khaatir majduur ke lagaais.
40020002	U ek ek majduur ke ek roj ke majduuri pe, añguur ke khet meñ bhejis.
40020003	Lagbhag nao baje sabere, u admi dekhis ki kuchh aur majduur log bajaar meñ bekaar khaṛa hei.
40020004	Ulog se u bolis, “Tum bhi khet meñ jaao. Ham tum log ke bhi talab dega.”
40020005	Ulog chala gais. Fir baarah baje aur teen baje bhi u weisaiyeñ karis. Ulog se bhi u wahi bolis, jon aur baaki log se bolis raha.
40020006	Paañch baje ke ṭaaim jab u fir bajaar gais, to kuchh aur admi log ke bekaar meñ khaṛa paais. Aur ulog se bolis, “Tum log kaahe hiañ din bhar se bekaar khaṛa hei?”
40020007	Ulog usse bolin, “Kaahe ki koi ham log ke majduuri pe nai rakkhis hei.” Tab u ulog se bolis ki uske khet meñ jaay ke kaam kare.
40020008	Sanjha jab bhais, tab khet ke maalik sardaar ke bolaay ke bolis, “Majduur log ke bolaay ke sab ke talab de deo. Aur usse suru karna jon laasṭ meñ aain raha, aur jon pahile aais raha ulog ke sab se laasṭ meñ dena.”
40020009	Jon log paañch baje aay rahin ulog ke din bhar ke talab mila.
40020010	Jon log sab se pahile kaam suru karin raha, sochin ki ulog ke jaada talab mili, lekin ulog ke bhi otne mila jetna baaki log ke mila raha.
40020011	Ulog khet ke maalik se komplain karin.
40020012	Ulog bolin, “I log jon laasṭ aain, khali ek ghañṭa kaam karin raha. Ham log to din bhar ghaam meñ kaam kara. Aur tum ulog ke hamlog ke baraabar talab dia.”
40020013	Khet ke maalik usman se ek ke jawaab dees, “Dost, ham tumhaar sañghe kuchh kharaab nai kara. Ham to tumme wahi dia jon tum se promis kara raha.
40020014	Jon cheej tumhaar hei u le leo aur chala jaao. Ham jetna maañgi otna de sakta hei tumme iske kaa waasta?
40020015	Kaa ham aapan peisa se u nai kare sakta jon ham mañgta hei? Tumme jaran kaahe hoy hei, agar ham ilog pe daya kari?”
40020016	Yeeshu bolis, “Yahi rakam jon laasṭ hei u aage hoi. Aur jon aage hei, u laasṭ hoi.”
40020017	Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam jaat raha, tab rasta meñ aapan baarah chela log ke akele meñ le jaay ke ulog se bolis.
40020018	“Ham log Yarushalam jaata hei. Huañ pe Manush ke laṛka ke paadri aur paṛha likha log ke haath meñ de dewa jaai, aur ulog uske maut ke saja sunaai.
40020019	Aur ulog uske geir Yahuudi log ke haath meñ de dei, jon uske hasi uṛaai, chaabuk maari, aur kros pe chaṛhaai, lekin tisra roj u jinda hoy jaai.”
40020020	Tab Zabdi ke aurat aapan laṛkan ke sañghe Yeeshu ke lage aais aur namaste karke binti karis.
40020021	Yeeshu usse puuchhis ki u kon cheej maañge hei, tab u bolis, “Jab tum aapan raaj meñ aayga, tab hamaar i duuno laṛkan meñ se ek ke aapan raaiṭ saaiḍ aur dusra ke aapan lefṭ saaiḍ beiṭhe ke mauka dena.”
40020022	Lekin Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum nai janta ki tum kaa mañgta hei. Kaa tum u pyaala piye sakta hei jon ke hamme piye ke hei?” Jeims aur Yuhanna bolin, “Ham piye sakta hei.”
40020023	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Hamaar pyaala to tum jaruur peena, lekin hamaar raaiṭ aur lefṭ meñ beiṭhe ke khaatir ham nai kuchh kare sakta. I to hamaar Pita hee tumme bataay sake hei.”
40020024	I sun ke u das chela log duuno bhaiya pe bahut gussa bhain.
40020025	Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke aapan lage bolaay ke bolis, “Tum janta hei ki geir ruula log, ulog pe raaj kare hei, aur ulog ke baṛa jan uspe hukum kare hei?
40020026	Lekin ilog ke rakam kaam nai karo. Agar tum baṛa bane maañgta hei, tab tum sab ke naukar bano.
40020027	Aur agar tum sab se aage rahe mañgta hei, tab tum sab ke naukar ban ke raho.
40020028	Jeise Manush ke laṛka aapan sewa nai karaay, lekin sab ke sewa kare aur bahut log ke chhuṭkaara ke khaatir aapan jaan de dees.”
40020029	Jab ulog Jeriko se jaat rahin, tab ek baṛa bheeṛ uske pichchhe chale lagin.
40020030	Wahi ṭaaim, dui añdha admi jon rasta ke kinaare beiṭha rahin, sunin ki Yeeshu jaay hei, to jor jor se chillaay lagin, “E Prabhu, Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
40020031	Bheeṛ ke log ulog ke chuppe rahe ke bolin, lekin ulog aur jor jor se chillaay lagin, “E Prabhu, Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
40020032	Tab Yeeshu ruk ke ulog ke bolaais, aur bolis, “Tum kaa mañgta hei ki ham tum log ke waaste kari?”
40020033	Ulog Yeeshu se bolis, “E Prabhu, ham dekhe mañgta hei.”
40020034	Yeeshu daya karke ulog ke aañkhi chhuis, aur ulog wahi ṭaaim dekhe lagin, aur uske pichchhe hoy leen.
40021001	Jab Yeeshu aur uske chela log Yarushalam ke paas aain, tab u Jaituun pahaaṛ pe Beitfage meñ gain aur Yeeshu dui chela log ke aage bhej dees.
40021002	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Saamne waala gaaoñ meñ jaao, huañ tumme ek gadha aur uske bachcha bañdha mili. Uske khol ke hamaar lage laao.
40021003	Agar koi tum se kuchh puuchhi to bolna, ‘Prabhu ke iske jaruurat hei,’ aur u wahi lage tumme de dei.”
40021004	I sab i kaaran bhais ki jon vachan nabi log bolin raha, u puura hoi.
40021005	“Yarushalam ke log se bolo, Tumhaar raaja tumhaar lage aay hei! U dayaalu hei, aur ek gadha pe beiṭha hei. Aur u gadha ke bachcha pe aay hei.”
40021006	Chela log jaay ke weise karin jeise Yeeshu hukum dees raha.
40021007	Ulog gadha aur uske bachcha ke laay ke uspe aapan kapṛa bichhaain. Yeeshu uspe beiṭh gais.
40021008	Bheeṛ meñ se ketna log aapan kapṛa rasta pe bichhaay deen aur kuchh log peṛ se ḍaar tuuṛ ke rasta pe bichhaain.
40021009	Kuchh log uske aage aage jaat rahin aur kuchh log uske pichchhe. Sab chillaay ke bolat rahin, “Ḍeiviḍ ke Santaan! ‘Hosaana!’ Dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei. Swarag meñ Hosaana!”
40021010	Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam meñ aais, to ṭaaun meñ halchal mach gais, aur sab bole lagin, “I kon hei?”
40021011	Bheeṛ ke log bolin, “I Yeeshu hei, Galeel ke Naasrat ke nabi.”
40021012	Yeeshu Mandir meñ aay ke, u sab jon huañ len-den karat rahin, ulog ke bahire khader dees. Aur jon kabuttar bechat rahin, ulog ke bench aur peisa badle waala log ke ṭaibal ulṭaay dees.
40021013	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Hamaar ghar preya ke ghar bola jaai,’ lekin tum log to iske chor ke aḍḍa banaay dia!”
40021014	Tab añdha aur langṛa log uske lage Mandir meñ aain aur u ulog ke achchha kar dees.
40021015	Lekin baṛa paadri aur paṛha likha log u sab chamatkaar kaam ke baare meñ sun ke, aur jab dekhin ki laṛkan uske baṛaai kare hei, tab ulog bahut gussa bhain.
40021016	Ulog Yeeshu se bolin, “Kaa tum sunta hei ki i laṛkan kaa bole hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Haañ! Lekin kaa tum log nai paṛha, ‘Chhoṭa laṛkan aur janma bachcha log stuti kari.”‘
40021017	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke chhoṛ ke ṭaaun ke bahire Beitniyaah chala gais aur wahiñ raat bitaais.
40021018	Sabere ṭaaun se lauṭte ṭaaim Yeeshu ke bhuuk laga.
40021019	Rasta ke kinaare u ek anjeer ke peṛ dekh ke uske lage gais, lekin uspe patti ke alaawa aur kuchh nai raha. Tab u bolis, “Ab se tum meñ koi fal nai lagi!” Wahi lage u anjeer ke peṛ jhuraay gais.
40021020	I dekh ke chela log chakit hoy gain aur bolin, “Anjeer ke peṛ jurte keise sukhaay gais?”
40021021	Lekin Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki agar tum biswaas rakkho aur sandeh nai karo to tum i kare sakta hei jon ham anjeer ke peṛ ke sañghe kara hei. Aur isse jaada bhi kare sakta hei. Tum i pahaaṛ se bole sakta hei ki uṭho aur samundar meñ kuudo, aur wahi hoi.
40021022	Agar tum biswaas karega, to tum preya meñ jon kuchh maañgega, u sab tumme mili.”
40021023	Jab u chech meñ aay ke parchaar karat raha, to baṛa paadri aur huañ ke baṛkue uske lage aay ke bolin, “Kon adhikaar se tum i kaam karta hei, aur kon tumme i adhikaar dees hei?”
40021024	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tum se ek baat puuchhega. Agar tum hamme iske jawaab dega, to ham bhi bataayga ki ham kis ke adhikaar se i kaam karta hei.
40021025	Yuhanna baptisma de waala kis ke bagal se aais raha, swarag se, ki admi log ke bagal se?” U sab aapas meñ baat cheet kare lagin, “Agar ham bolega, ‘Swarag ke bagal se,’ to u boli, ‘Tab fir tum uske biswaas kaahe nai kara?’
40021026	Lekin agar ham log bolega, ‘Admi ke bagal se,’ to hamme bheeṛ ke ḍar hei, kaahe ke u sab Yuhanna ke nabi maanat rahin.”
40021027	Tab ulog Yeeshu se bolin, “Ham log nai janta.” Yeeshu bolis, “Ham bhi tumme i nai bataayga ki ham kis ke adhikaar se i kaam karta hei.”
40021028	Yeeshu ek kahaani sunaais, “Ek admi raha, uske dui laṛkan rahin. Tum hamme bataana ki tum kaa sochta hei. U baṛa laṛka ke lage jaay ke bolis, “Beṭa. jaao aur khet meñ kaam karo!”
40021029	U bolis, ‘Ham nai jaayga,’ Lekin u baad meñ pastaais aur chala gais.
40021030	Tab u dusra laṛka ke lage gais aur khet meñ jaay ke waaste bolis, aur u jawaab dees, ‘Achchha, ham jaayga,’ lekin u nai gais.
40021031	I duuno meñ se kon aapan bappa ke ichchha puura karis?” Ulog bolis, “Baṛa laṛka.” Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bataata hei ki tum se pahile, ṭeks le waala log aur veshya log Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaai.
40021032	Kaahe ke tumhaar lage dharam ke rasta dekhaay Yuhanna aais raha, lekin tum log uske biswaas nai kara, lekin ṭeks lewaala aur veshya log biswaas karin. Aur i dekh ke bhi tum baad meñ nai pastaaya aur naa biswaas kara.”
40021033	Yeeshu baṛa paadri aur agua log ke ek aur kahaani sunaais, “Ek jameendaar raha, jiske añguur ke khet raha, aur u chaaro bagal gher dees. U khod ke ras ke waaste kunḍ banaais. Aur pahra de ke khaatir ek ṭaawa bhi banaais. Tab u khet ke renṭ pe de ke ghuume chala gais.
40021034	Jab añguur tuuṛe ke ṭaaim aais, tab maalik ek naukar ke bhejis ki uske hissa ke añguur laawe.
40021035	Lekin ulog naukar log ke pakaṛ ke khuub maarin, ek to mar gais aur dusra ke patthar se maar deen.
40021036	Ab u kisaan pahile se bhi jaada naukar ke bhejis. Lekin bharaita log ulog ke bhi weisaiyeñ karin jeise pahile kare rahin.
40021037	Aakhri meñ u aapan laṛka ke ulog ke lage bhejis, kaahe ke u sochis ki ulog uske laṛka ke aadar kari.
40021038	Lekin jab ulog kisaan ke laṛka ke dekhis, to aapas meñ baat karin, “Ek roj i jameen iske hoy jaai. Aao ham iske jaan se maar dei. Tab iske jaaydaad ham log ke hoy jaai.”
40021039	Ulog uske pakṛin aur khet ke bahire nikaar ke jaan se maar deen.
40021040	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Ab jab khet ke maalik aai tab u bharaita ke sañghe kaa kari?”
40021041	Ulog usse bolis, “U ulog ke bahut kharaab se maari, aur khet dusra bharaita ke de dei, jon, ṭaaim se uske añguur dei.”
40021042	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tumme jaane ke chaahi ki Baaibal meñ kaa bataay hei, ‘Jon patthar ke kaapenṭa log bagal meñ feñk deen raha, wahi kona ke sab se sundar patthar ban gais hei. I Prabhu karis hei aur dekhe meñ hamme bahut achchha lage hei.”’
40021043	Ham tumme bataata hei ki Parmeshwar ke raaj tum se le lewa jaai aur ulog ke de dewa jaai, jon wahi kare hei jon u maañge hei.
40021044	Jon bhi koi i patthar pe giri, u chuur chuur hoy jaai, lekin jispe i giri, u pisaay jaai.”
40021045	Jab baṛa paadri aur Farisi uske kahaani sunin to samajh gain ki u wahi log ke baare meñ bole hei.
40021046	Lekin jab uske ulog aresṭ kare maañgin, tab ulog bheeṛ se ḍar gain, kaahe ke ulog Yeeshu ke nabi maanat rahin.
40022001	Ek dafe fir Yeeshu ek kahaani sunaais.
40022002	“Swarag ke raaj i rakam hei jahañ ek raaja raha jon aapan laṛkan ke saadi ke bhoj dees.
40022003	Raaja aapan naukar log ke bhejis ki jaay ke sab log jiske neota mila raha, bolaay laay, lekin ulog nai aain.
40022004	Fir u, aur naukar ke i bol ke bhejis, ‘Khaana taiyaar hei! Hamaar beil aur paaltu jaanwar kaṭaay gain hei, aur sab kuchh taiyaar hoi gais hei. Saadi ke paaṭi meñ aao!’
40022005	Lekin mehmaan log kuchh dhyaan nai deen aur aapan kaam pe chal deen, ek aapan khet meñ to dusra aapan biznes dekhe.
40022006	Aur baaki mehmaan u naukar log ke pakaṛ ke khuub peeṭin aur maar ḍaalin.
40022007	Ab raaja gussa meñ aay ke aapan saulja log ke bhejis ki u hatyaara log ke maar de aur puura ṭaaun meñ aagi lagaay de.
40022008	Tab u naukar log se bolis, 'Saadi ke khaana to taiyaar hei, bolaay gay mehmaan ke aay ke kismat meñ nai hei.
40022009	Yahi khaatir rasta pe jaao, aur chaaro bagal jetna admi dekhaay, ulog ke saadi ke khaana pe bolaao.’
40022010	Tab naukar log gali gali jaay ke aur jon bhi bhala bura ulog ke milin, sab ke le aain, aur saadi ke ghar mehmaan se bhar gais.
40022011	“Jab raaja aapan mehmaan se mile aais, to huañ ek admi ke dekhis jon saadi ke kapṛa nai pahinis raha.
40022012	Raaja usse bolis, 'Dost, kaahe nai tum saadi ke achchha kapṛa pahin ke aaya?’ Lekin mehmaan ke lage koi jawaab nai raha.
40022013	Tab raaja aapan naukar log se bolis, 'Uske haath aur goṛ baañdh ke bahire añdhiyaar meñ feñk deo. Huañ u roi aur aapan daañt peesi.’ ”
40022014	Yeeshu aakhri meñ bolis, “Bahut ke bolaaya jaay hei lekin thoṛa ke chuna jaay hei.”
40022015	Tab Farisi log ek sañghe mil ke plen banaain ki keise ulog Yeeshu ke baat meñ fañsaai.
40022016	Ulog Heraḍ ke log ke, Yeeshu ke lage ek baat puuchhe ke bhejis, “E guru, ham log janta hei ki tum sachcha hei aur Parmeshwar ke rasta sachchaai se dekhaata hei, aur sab ke ekke rakam dekhta hei, chaahe u koi hoy.
40022017	Hamme bataao ki tum kaa sochta hei, ‘Caesar ke ṭeks dewa jaay ki nai?”‘
40022018	Yeeshu ulog ke kharaab bichaar jaan gais aur bolis, “E kapṭi log, tum hamme kaahe ke ṭesṭ karta hei?
40022019	Hamme u peisa dekhaao jisse ṭeks bhara jaay hei.” Ulog uske lage ek chaañdi ke peisa laain.
40022020	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Kiske chhaapa aur naam ispe hei?”
40022021	“Caesar ke.” Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jon Caesar ke hei u Caesar ke deo aur jon Parmeshwar ke hei, u Parmeshwar ke deo.”
40022022	I sab sun ke ulog chakit bhain aur ulog Yeeshu ke chhoṛ ke chala gain.
40022023	Saduuki log biswaas nai karat rahin ki mare ke baad meñ laaif hei. To kuchh Saduuki log wahi roj Yeeshu ke lage aay ke puuchhin, “E guru, Maozas likhis raha ki, agar koi admi ke aurat hei, aur bina laṛkan ke mar jaai, to uske bhaiya u aurat se saadi kar le ki jisse u aapan bhaiya ke khaatir laṛka peida kare sake.”
40022025	Ek dafe saat bhaiya rahin. Pahila saadi kar ke, bina laṛkan ke mar gais. Uske aurat uske bhaiya ke hoy gais.
40022026	Yahi rakam dusra bhaiya ke sañghe bhi bhais, aur tisra aur hiañ tak ki saato ke sañghe wahi bhais.
40022027	Aakhri meñ u aurat bhi mar gais.
40022028	Ab jon roj sab jinda hoi to u saato meñ se u kis ke aurat hoi. Kaahe ke u sab ke aurat rahis.”
40022029	Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Tum ketna roñg hei! Tum nai janta ki Baaibal kon cheej sikhaay hei. Aur tum Parmeshwar ke sakti nai janta hei.
40022030	Jab Parmeshwar log ke jiaay hei, tab ulog saadi nai kari. Ulog to ainjals ke rakam hoiyeñ.
40022031	Aur mar ke jinda hoy ke baare meñ, tum vachan nai paṛha jon Parmeshwar tum se bataais raha,
40022032	“Ham Abraham ke Parmeshwar aur Aayzak ke Parmeshwar aur Jaykab ke Parmeshwar hei. Aur u mara log ke nai, lekin jon jinda hei uske Parmeshwar hei.”
40022033	Jab log i baat sunin, tab chakit rahe gain.
40022034	Jab Farisi log sunin ki Yeeshu Saduuki log ke muh band kar dees hei, tab ulog ek sañghe hoy gain.
40022035	Usman se ek jon kaanuun jaanat raha, ṭesṭ kare ke waaste ek queschan karis.
40022036	“E guru, kaanuun meñ kon se hukum sab se khaas hei?”
40022037	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum Prabhu aapan Parmeshwar se aapan man se aur aapan praan se, aur aapan saara buddhi se prem karo.
40022038	Yahi sab se pahila aur sab se khaas hukum hei.
40022039	Aur dusra khaas hukum i hei ki, “Tum aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem karo.”
40022040	I dui hukum, sab nabi log ke buk pe baisḍ hei.”
40022041	Jab Farisi ek sañghe rahin, tab Yeeshu ulog se ek queschan karis,
40022042	“Maseeh ke baare meñ tum log kaa sochta hei? U kiske laṛka hei?” Ulog bolin, “U Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka hei.”
40022043	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tab Ḍeiviḍ Aatma meñ hoy ke kaahe uske ‘Prabhu’ bole hei?”
40022044	Ḍeiviḍ bolis, “Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis raha, Hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho, jab tak ham dusman ke tumhaar goṛ ke nichche nai rakh dei.”
40022045	Agar Ḍeiviḍ uske ‘Prabhu’ bole hei tab uske laṛka keise hoi?
40022046	Koi bhi uske jawaab nai de sakis. Aur u roj se koi bhi usse ekko queschan nai puuchhis.
40023001	Tab Yeeshu bheeṛ aur chela log se bolis,
40023002	“Kaanuun aur Guru aur Farisi log, Maozas ke kaanuun samjhaay ke waaste chuna gain hei.
40023003	Yahi kaaran ulog jon kuchh bhi boli, uske karna aur maanna, lekin ulog ke rakam nai karna, kaahe ke ulog jon bole hei, kare nai hei.
40023004	Ulog baṛa bojha admi ke kañdha pe laad de hei lekin ulog ke madat ke waaste ek uñgri bhi nai uṭhaay hei.
40023005	Ulog jon sab kare hei admi ke dekhaay ke waaste kare hei. Ulog aapan tabeej ke baṛa kare hei aur aapan kapṛa ke jhaalar lamba kare hei.
40023006	Aur paaṭi meñ achchha jagha, chech meñ khaas kursi, bajaar meñ aadar, aur jab log ulog ke ‘Guru’ bole hei to ulog ke achchha lage hei.
40023008	Lekin tum ‘Guru’ nai bolwaana, kaahe ke tumhaar ekke guru hei, aur tum sab bhaiya aur bahini hei.
40023009	Dharti pe koi ke aapan Pita nai bolna, kaahe ke tum sab ke ekke Pita hei jon swarag meñ hei.
40023010	Tum ‘Agua’ bhi nai bolwaana, kaahe ke tumhaar ekke agua hei aur u hei Maseeh.
40023011	Lekin tum meñ se jon sab se baṛa hei, u tumhaar sewak hoi.
40023012	Jon koi apne aap ke baṛa banaai, u chhoṭa kara jaai, aur jon apne aap ke chhoṭa banaai, u baṛa bani.”
40023013	“E pakhanḍi Farisi aur Shaastri log, tum pe haay hei! Kaahe ke tum admi log ke waaste swarag ke raaj ke palla band kar deta hei. Tum naa to apne bhittar jaata hei aur naa dusra log ke bhittar jaay deta hei.”
40023015	“E pakhanḍi, Farisi aur Shaastri log, tum pe haay hei! Tum admi log ke aapan bagal ghumaay ke khaatir, jameen aur paani ek kar deta hei, aur jab u aay jaay hei, tab uske aapan se bhi jaada narak jaay laayk banaay deta hei!
40023016	“E añdha agua log, tum pe bhi haay hei! Tumme to dusra ke rasta dekhaay ke hei, lekin tum sab to añdha hei. Tum bolta hei, ‘Agar koi Mandir ke kasam khaay, to u kuchh nai, lekin agar koi Mandir ke sona ke kasam khaay to u sab kuchh hei.’
40023017	E muurakh aur añdha log! Kon cheej baṛa hei, sona ki u Mandir jon sona ke pawitr kar de hei?
40023018	Tum fir bolta hei, ‘Agar koi bedi ke kasam khaay to kuchh nai, lekin jon bheñṭ uspe hei, agar koi uske kasam khaay to sab kuchh hei.’
40023019	E añdha log! Kon jaada baṛa hei, bheñṭ ki u bedi jon bheñṭ ke pawitr banaay hei?
40023020	Yahi kaaran jon koi bedi ke kasam khaay hei, u bedi aur uspe rakhaan bheñṭ duuno ke kasam khaay hei,
40023021	aur jon Mandir ke kasam khaay hei, u Mandir aur usman rahe waala Parmeshwar ke bhi kasam khaay hei.
40023022	Aur jon swarag ke kasam khaay hei, u Parmeshwar ke siñghaasan aur uspe beiṭhe waala duuno ke kasam khaay hei.”
40023023	“E pakhanḍi Farisi aur Shaastri log, tum pe bhi haay hei! Tum pudeena, sauf aur jeera ke daswa hissa to deta hei, lekin kaanuun ke jaruuri baat jeise ki nyaay, daya aur biswaas ke nai maanta hei, tumme to chaahat raha ki sab karte raho, aur uske bhi nai chhoṛo.
40023024	E añdha agua log, tum chhoṭa makkhi ke to chhaan deta hei, lekin uuñṭ ke leel leta hei!”
40023025	“E pakhanḍi Farisi aur Shaastri log, tum pe museebat aai! Tum thariya aur pyaala ke bahire se to safa karta hei, lekin bhittar to sab rakam ke laalach aur swaarth bhara paṛa hei.
40023026	E añdha Farisi log, pahile pyaala ke bhittar to safa karo, tab bahire bhi safa hoy jaai.
40023027	E pakhanḍi Farisi aur Shaastri log, tum pe haay! Tum chuuna se dhowaan kabar ke rakam hei, jon bahire se sundar dekhaay hei, lekin bhittar to haḍḍi aur saṛa murda se bhara paṛa hei.
40023028	Yahi rakam bahire se tum bhi admi log ke saamne achchha dekhaata hei, lekin bhittar se to tum buraai se bhara paṛa hei.”
40023029	“E pakhanḍi Shaastri aur Farisi log, tum pe haay! Tum nabi log ke sundar kabar to banaata hei aur jon achchha jeewan bitaais hei uske kabar sajaata hei.
40023030	Aur tum bolta hei, ‘Agar ham aapan baap daada ke jamaane meñ rahta to, nabi log ke hatya meñ bhaag nai leta.’
40023031	I to tum safa bataata hei ki tum nabi log ke hatyaara log ke laṛkan hei!
40023032	To jaao aur jon tumhaar baap daada suru karin hei, uske tum puura karo!
40023033	E saañp aur saañp ke bachcha log, tum narak ke saja se keise bachega?
40023034	Yahi kaaran ham tum se bolta hei ki ham tum log ke waaste nabi, aur samajhdaar log, aur guru log ke bhejta hei. Tum usman se kuchh ke maar dega, aur kuchh ke kros pe chaṛhaay dega, aur kuchh ke aapan chech meñ chaabuk se maar ke ek ṭaaun se dusra ṭaaun khaderte rahega.
40023035	Isse jetna hatya bhais hei u sab ke saja tum pe paṛi. Hiañ tak ki Aibal se leke Birikyaah ke laṛka Zakaryaah tak, jon ke tum Mandir aur bedi ke beech meñ maar dia raha.
40023036	Ham tum se sachche bataata hei ki i sab baat i ṭaaim ke log pe paṛi.”
40023037	“E Yarushalam, E Yarushalam! Tum nabi log ke maar deta hei, aur jon tumhaar lage bheja jaay hei, ulog ke patthar se maar deta hei! Ham ketna dafe maañgta raha ki jeise murgi aapan bachcha ke aapan pañkha ke nichche baṭor ke rakkhe hei, weisaiyeñ ham bhi tumhaar bachchan ke aapan sharan meñ le lei, lekin tum i nai chaaha.
40023038	Yahi kaaran tumhaar Mandir ujaṛ jaai.
40023039	Tum hamme tab tak nai dekhega jab tak tum nai bolega, ‘Dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei,”’
40024001	Jab Yeeshu Mandir se nikar ke bahire jaat raha, tab uske chela log uske lage aay ke bolin, “I sab bilḍiñgs ke dekho!”
40024002	Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tum i bilḍiñgs ke dekhta hei? Ham tum se bataata hei, hiañ ek patthar bhi nai bachi, sab giraay dewa jaai.”
40024003	Baad meñ jab Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe akelle beiṭha raha, tab uske chela log uske lage aay ke bolin, “Hamme bataao, i sab baat kab hoi? Aur tumhaar aawe ke aur dunia ke ant ke kaa saain hoi?”
40024004	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Dekhna, koi tumme dhoka nai de.
40024005	Kaahe ke bahut log hamaar naam se aai aur boli, ‘Ham Maseeh hei’ aur bahut log dhoka dehiyeñ.
40024006	Tum laṛaai ke baare meñ aur laṛaai ke dhamki sunega, lekin ḍarna nai. I sab to suru meñ hoi, lekin i ṭaaim ant nai hoi.
40024007	Kaahe ke sab jaati aur raaj ek dusra se laṛi. Log bhukke mari, aur koi koi jagha pe erthquaik bhi aai.
40024008	I sab baat to ṭrabal ke suruaat hei.”
40024009	“Tab tumme dukh dewaay ke waaste pakaṛwaawa jaai, aur marwaawa jaai, aur hamaar naam ke khaatir tumme sab koi haiṭ kari.
40024010	U ṭaaim bahut log biswaas se haṭ jaai aur ek dusra ke dhoka dei, aur ek dusra se haiṭ kari.
40024011	Tab bahut se jhuuṭa nabi aai aur bahut log ke dhoka dei.
40024012	Buraai baṛh jaai aur sab log ek dusra se prem kare ke chhoṛ dehiyeñ.
40024013	Lekin agar tum ant tak faitful rahega to jaruur bach jaayga.
40024014	Raaj ke achchha khabar puura jagat meñ parchaar kara jaai, aur sab jaati ke log ke bataawa jaai, aur tab kahiñ jaay ke enḍ hoi.”
40024015	“Ek roj tum u ‘Bhayaanak cheej’, jiske Ḍenial nabi bataais raha, pawitr jagha pe khaṛa dekhega.” (Sab jon i paṛhe hei ulog ke samjhe ke hei ki i kaa hei.)
40024016	“Agar tum Juḍia meñ rahta hei, to pahaaṛ pe bhaag jaao.
40024017	Agar koi chhat pe hei, to ghar meñ kuchh lewe ke waaste nai utro.
40024018	Jon koi khet meñ hei, u aapan kapṛa lewe ke waaste pichchhe nai lauṭe.
40024019	U aurat log ke museebat ke ṭaaim hoi, jon koi maañ bane waali hoi ya jon bachcha ke duudh piyaat hoi!
40024020	Preya karo ki tumme ṭhanḍa ke mausam ya sabat ke roj bhaage ke nai paṛe!
40024021	Kaahe ke etna bhaari dukh hoi jeisa ki dunia ke suru se aur abhi tak kabhi nai bhais aur naa hoi.
40024022	Agar Parmeshwar u roj ke chhoṭa nai kare hota, to koi bhi nai bachta, lekin kuchh log jon chuna gais hei, ulog ke waaste Parmeshwar i roj chhoṭa karis hei!
40024023	Tum se agar koi bole, ‘Maseeh hiañ hei’ ya ‘Maseeh huañ hei’, to biswaas nai karna.
40024024	Kaahe ke jhuuṭa Maseeha aur nabi uṭh khaṛa hoiyeñ aur baṛa baṛa saain aur chamatkaari kaam dekhaiyeñ, hiañ tak ki ulog agar hoy saki to chuna log ke bhi bharmaay dehiyeñ.
40024025	Lekin ham to tumme pahile se sab kuchh bataay dia hei.
40024026	Yahi kaaran agar koi tum se bole, ‘U ḍezaṭ meñ hei,’ to bahire nai nikar jaana! Aur agar koi bole, ‘U huañ luka hei,’ to biswaas nai karna.
40024027	Kaahe ke jeise bijli eesṭ se wesṭ tak chamke hei, weisaiyeñ Manush ke laṛka bhi aai.
40024028	Jahañ laash hoi huañ geedaṛ bhi hoi.”
40024029	“Dukh waala roj ke jurte baad meñ, ‘Suuraj añdhiyaar hoy jaai, aur chaañd aapan, laaiṭ nai dei, aur asmaan se taara giri, aur asmaan ke taagat hilaawa jaai.”‘
40024030	Tab Manush ke laṛka ke saain asmaan meñ dekhaai, aur dharti ke sab jaati roi, aur log Manush ke laṛka ke baṛa shaan aur mahima se asmaan se aate dekhiyeñ.
40024031	Aur u bigul ke awaaj ke sañghe aapan ainjals ke bheji, aur ulog chaaro bagal asmaan ke i bagal se u bagal tak, uske chuna log ke baṭori.”
40024032	“Anjeer ke peṛ se i seekho. Jab uske ḍaari naram rahe hei aur usman patti nikre lage hei, to tum jaan leta hei ki garmi ke mausam aay waala hei.
40024033	Wahi rakam jab tum i sab cheej hote dekhna, to jaan lena ki Yeeshu ke aawe ke ṭaaim nagichche hei, hiañ tak ki ekdam aay gais hei.
40024034	Ham tum se promis karta hei ki jab tak i sab baat puura nai hoi jaai, tab tak i ṭaaim ke log ke ant nai hoi.
40024035	Asmaan aur dharti hardam ke waaste miṭ jaai, lekin hamaar vachan kabhi nai miṭi.
40024036	Din aur ghañṭa kab aai, koi nai jaane hei, swarag ke ainjals bhi nai jaane hei aur naa to Putr. Khali Pita u ṭaaim jaane hei.
40024037	Manush ke Putr ke aay ke ṭaaim wahi rakam rahi, jeise Noa ke ṭaaim raha.
40024038	Sab log khaate peete rahin, aur saadi biaah karte rahin, ṭheek u roj tak, jab baaṛh aais, aur Noa baṛa bauṭ meñ chala gais.
40024039	Ulog kuchh nai jaanat rahin ki kaa hoy hei, u ṭaaim tak jab baaṛh aais aur u sab ke bahaay nai le gais. Yahi rakam hoi jab Manush ke laṛka aai.
40024040	U ṭaaim dui admi khet meñ kaam karat rahi, khali ek ke lewa jaai aur dusra ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
40024041	Dui aurat chakki peesat hoiyeñ, lekin khali ek ke lewa jaai aur dusri ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
40024042	Yahi khaatir husiaar raho! Tum nai janta kab Prabhu aay jaai.
40024043	Agar ghar ke maalik ke pata rahta ki kab chor aai, to ulog husiaar hoy jaai aur ghar ke luuṭe nai dei.
40024044	Yahi khaatir tum bhi taiyaar raho! Tum nai janta kab Manush ke laṛka aay jaai.”
40024045	“Eisan kon faitful aur samajhdaar naukar hei? Kon ke maalik aapan naukar log ke inchaaj meñ rakkhi, jon ṭheek ṭaaim pe ulog ke khaana dei?
40024046	U naukar log khush kismat hei, jon ke maalik lauṭ ke aay hei to dekhe hei ki naukar kaam kare hei.
40024047	Ham sachche bolta hei ki maalik aapan sab dhan daulat u naukar ke uppar chhoṛ dei.
40024048	Lekin agar ek kharaab naukar sochi ki uske maalik deri se lauṭi, aur aapan sañghe ke dusra naukar ke maari peeṭi aur naseṛi log ke sañghe khaay pee ke nasa meñ chuur hoy jaai,
40024050	to u naukar ke maalik, eisehiyeñ ek roj jaldi lauṭ aai jab ki naukar sochi bhi nai ki u aay jaai.
40024051	Tab u naukar ke kaṛa saja mili aur ḍhoñgi log ke sañghe bahire feñk dewa jaai. Huañ u roi aur daañt peesi.”
40025001	“Swarag ke raaj i rakam hoi, jeise ek dafe das laṛki log ke sañghe bhais raha, jab ulog aapan tel ke batti le ke saadi meñ dulha se mile gain.
40025002	Ulog meñ se paañch muurakh rahin aur paañch husiaar rahin.
40025003	Jon muurakh laṛki log rahin, ulog batti to leen lekin uske sañghe aur tel nai leen.
40025004	U paañch laṛki log jon husiaar rahin, ulog aapan batti ke sañghe aur tel bhi leen.
40025005	Jab dulha ke aay meñ deri bhais, tab ulog uñghaay lagin aur soy gain.
40025006	Achaanak aadha raat meñ koi chillaay ke bolis, ‘Dulha aay gais! Aao aur usse milo!’
40025007	Tab u laṛki log uṭhin aur aapan aapan batti taiyaar karin.
40025008	U muurakh laṛki log husiaar laṛki log se bolin, ‘Hamme aapan tel meñ se kuchh tel deo, kaahe ke hamaar batti bute waala hei.’
40025009	Lekin u samajhdaar laṛki log bolin, ‘Nai, i hamaar aur tumhaar waaste puura nai hoi. Jaao aur aapan waaste tel khareedo.’
40025010	Jab ulog tel khareede ke waaste chala gain, tab dulha aay gais, aur jon taiyaar rahin, saadi meñ chala gain, aur palla band hoi gais.
40025011	Baad meñ u muurakh laṛki log tel leke lauṭin aur jor jor se bolaain, ‘E guru, E guru hamaar waaste palla kholo!’
40025012	Dulha bolis, ‘Ham tumme nai janta!”‘
40025013	Yeeshu bolis, “Yahi khaatir hardam taiyaar raho! Tum nai janta kon ṭaaim aur kon roj i sab hoi.”
40025014	“Swarag ke raaj i rakam bhi hei jab ek admi ghuume gais aur aapan sab sampati teen naukar ke haath meñ chhoṛ dees.
40025015	U admi jaanat raha ki u teeno kon kon cheej kare sake hei. Pahila ke u paañch hajaar sona ke sikka dees, dusra ke dui hajaar aur tisra ke ek hajaar. Aur u ghuume chala gais.
40025016	Jiske paañch hajaar mila raha, u jurte jaay ke biznes meñ lagaay dees aur paañch hajaar aur kamaais.
40025017	Yahi rakam jiske dui hajaar mila raha, u bhi dui hajaar aur kamaais.
40025018	Lekin jiske ek hajaar mila raha, u jaay ke jameen khod ke usman aapan maalik ke peisa lukaay dees.
40025019	Bahut din ke baad u naukar log ke maalik lauṭis aur aapan hisaab maañgis.
40025020	Tab jiske paañch hajaar mila raha, u paañch hajaar jon u kamaais raha, laay ke bolis, ‘Swaami, tum hamme paañch hajaar peisa dia raha. Dekho ham isse paañch hajaar aur kamaaya.’
40025021	Uske maalik usse bolis, ‘Shaabaash! Tum achchha aur biswaas kare laayk naukar hei! Tumme ham thoṛa dia raha, lekin ab ham tumme baṛa jimmewaari dega. Aao aur hamaar khusi meñ bhaag leo.’
40025022	Jiske dui hajaar mila raha, u aay ke bolis, ‘Swaami, tum hamme dui hajaar dia raha. Dekho ham dui hajaar aur kamaay lia.’
40025023	Swaami usse bolis, ‘Shaabaash! Tum achchha aur samajhdaar naukar hei, ham tumme bahut baṛa kaam ke jimmewaari dega. Aao aur hamaar khusi meñ sañghe hoy leo!’
40025024	Tab jon naukar ke ek hajaar mila raha, u aay ke bolis, ‘E maalik, ham janta hei ki tum ketna kharaab hei, jahañ nai bota hei, huañ se kaaṭta hei aur jahañ nai bota hei huañ se baṭorta hei.
40025025	Yahi khaatir ham ḍar gaya aur jaay ke peisa ke maṭṭi meñ lukaay dia. Leo, i jon tumhaar hei, le leo.’
40025026	Uske maalik usse bolis, ‘Tum laizi aur koi kaam ke nai hei! Tum janta hei ki jahañ ham nai bota hei, huañ se kaaṭta hei, aur jahañ nai bota hei, huañ se baṭorta hei.
40025027	Tumme chaahat raha ki hamaar peisa benk meñ rakh de ke, aur ham aay ke aapan peisa ke biyaaj uṭhaay leta.’
40025028	Tab maalik bolis, ‘Ab isse u peisa bhi le leo, aur jis ke lage das hajaar hei, uske de deo!’
40025029	Kaahe ke jiske lage hei, uske aur bhi dewa jaai, aur uske lage aur hoy jaai. Lekin jiske lage nai hei, usse u bhi le lewa jaai, jon uske lage hei.
40025030	I bekaar naukar ke bahire añdhiyaar meñ feñk deo, jahañ pe rowe aur daañt peese ke hei.”
40025031	“Jab Manush ke laṛka aapan mahima meñ aai aur sab ainjals uske sañghe aiheñ, to u aapan raajsi (royal) siñghaasan pe beiṭhi.
40025032	Sab jaati ke log uske saamne laawa jaai, aur u ulog ke alag kari, jeise ek shepaḍ, bheṛa aur bakri ke alge kare hei.
40025033	U bheṛa ke aapan raaiṭ saaiḍ aur bakri ke aapan lefṭ saaiḍ kari.
40025034	Tab raaja aapan raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭha log se boli, ‘E hamaar Pita ke achchha log, aao, u raaj ke apnaao jon dunia ke banaay se pahile tumhaar waaste taiyaar kara gais raha.
40025035	Kaahe ke jab ham bhuuka raha, tum hamme kuchh khaay ke dia raha. Ham pyaasa raha, aur tum hamme paani piaaya. Ham hiañ ke nai raha, lekin tum hamme welkam kara.
40025036	Ham nañge raha, tum hamme kapṛa pahinaaya, bimaar raha, tum hamaar dekh bhaal kara, jel meñ raha, tum hamme mile aaya.
40025037	Tab ulog jon Prabhu ke khusi karin raha puuchhi, ‘Prabhu, ham tumme kab bhuuka dekha aur khaana dia, ya pyaasa dekha aur paani piaaya?
40025038	Aur ham kab anjaan admi ke dekha aur welkam kara, nañga ke dekh ke kapṛa pahinaaya?
40025039	Ham kab tumme bimaar dekha ya jel meñ dekh ke tumme mile aaya?’
40025040	Is pe raaja ulog ke jawaab dei, ‘Ham tumme bataata hei ki jon kuchh tum hamaar chhoṭa se chhoṭa bhaiya log meñ se koi ke sañghe kara, u hamaar sañghe kara!’
40025041	Tab raaja ulog jon lefṭ meñ rahin usse boli, ‘Ham se duur hoy jaao! Tumme Parmeshwar ke saraap hei. Huañ jaao jahañ kabhi nai bute waala aagi hei, jon saitaan aur uske duut ke waaste taiyaar kara gais hei!
40025042	Ham bhuuka raha, tum hamme kuchh khaay ke nai dia, pyaasa raha, tum hamme paani nai piaaya.
40025043	Anjaan admi raha, tum hamme aapan ghar meñ jagha nai dia, nañge raha, tum hamme kapṛa nai pahinaaya, bimaar raha aur jel meñ raha, tum hamme dekhe nai aaya.’
40025044	Ispe ulog usse puuchhi, ‘Prabhu, ham kab tumme bhuuka ya pyaasa, ya anjaan admi ya nañge ya bimaar, ya jel meñ dekha aur sewa nai kara?’
40025045	Tab raaja ulog ke jawaab dei, ‘Ham tumme bataata hei ki tum hamaar log ke madat nai kara chaahe u ketna chhoṭa naa hoiyeñ, tab tum hamaar sañghe bhi nai kara.”‘
40025046	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ulog ke umar bhar ke saja mili. Lekin jon Parmeshwar ke khusi karis hei, ulog ke anant jeewan mili.”
40026001	Jab Yeeshu i sab baat bataay dees, tab u aapan chela log se bolis,
40026002	“Tum janta hei ki dui roj baad fasah ke teohaar aay waala hei, aur Manush ke laṛka kros pe chaṛhaawe ke waaste pakarwaawa jaai!”
40026003	Tab baṛa paadri aur des ke agua log, Kaaifa naam ke baṛa paadri ke añgna meñ jama bhain.
40026004	Aur ulog plen banaain ki Yeeshu ke chuppe se pakaṛ ke maar ḍaale ke chaahi.
40026005	Lekin ulog i bhi bolin, “Ham log ke i kaam teohaar ke ṭaaim nai kare ke hei, kaahe ke admi log dañga fasaad kari.”
40026006	Jab Yeeshu Bethani meñ Saayman koṛhi ke ghare khaana khaay beiṭhis,
40026007	tab ek aurat ek botal mahañga pefeum leke uske lage aais, aur uske muuṛ pe chhoṛ dees.
40026008	Chela log i sab dekh ke bahut gussa bhain aur bole lagin, “I barbaadi kaahe ke?
40026009	I pefeum ke jaada daam meñ bech ke jon peisa mili uske gareeb meñ baaṭa jaay sakat raha.”
40026010	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ulog kaa soche hei aur bolis, “Tum log i aurat ke kaahe sataata hei? I to hamaar sañghe bhalaai karis hei.
40026011	Gareeb to tumhaar sañghe hardam rahiyeñ, lekin ham to tum log ke sañghe hardam nai rahega.
40026012	I to hamaar deñhi pe pefeum chhoṛis hei ki i hamaar maṭṭi dewe ke khaatir taiyaari kare.
40026013	Ham tum log ke sachche bataata hei ki sab dunia meñ jahañ kahiñ bhi susamaachaar ke parchaar kara jaai, huañ sab koi yaad kari ki i aurat kaa karis raha, aur ulog sab ke bataai.”
40026014	Tab u baarah chela log meñ se ek, jiske naam Juḍas Iskariyoti raha, baṛa paadri log ke lage gais.
40026015	Aur usse bolis, “Agar ham Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay dei, to tum hamme ketna dega?” Ulog tees (30) chaañdi ke peisa Juḍas ke de deen.
40026016	Aur wahi ṭaaim se u Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay ke mauka khoje laga.
40026017	Akhmeeri roṭi (bina yeesṭ ke roṭi) ke teohaar ke pahila roj, Yeeshu ke chela log uske lage aay ke puuchhin, “Tum kahañ mañgta hei ki ham log tumhaar khaatir fasah ke khaana taiyaar kari?”
40026018	Yeeshu bolis, “Ṭaaun meñ ek khaas admi ke lage jaay ke bolo, ‘Guru bole hei, ‘Hamaar ṭaaim nagichche hei. Hame aapan chela log ke sañghe tumhaar ghare fasah ke teohaar manaay ke hei.”‘
40026019	Tab Yeeshu ke bole ke mutaabik, chela log fasah ke taiyaari karin.
40026020	Sanjha ke ṭaaim, Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke sañghe khaana khaay beiṭhis.
40026021	Jab ulog khaana khaat rahin, tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum log ke bataata hei, ki tum meñ se ek hamme pakaṛwaai.”
40026022	Is pe chela log bahut udaas bhain aur ek ek karke Yeeshu se puuchhe lagin, “Prabhu, kaa u ham hei?”
40026023	Yeeshu bolis, “Jon hamaar sañghe thariya meñ roṭi ḍubaais hei, wahi hamme pakaṛwaai.
40026024	Manush ke laṛka to weisaiyeñ mari, jeise uske baare meñ likhaan hei, lekin uspe kaa beeti jon uske pakaṛwaai! U admi ke to peida nai hoy ke chaahat raha!”
40026025	Tab Juḍas, jon uske pakaṛwaay waala raha bolis, “Rabbi, kaa u ham hei?” Yeeshu bolis, “I to tumahi bolta hei.”
40026026	Jab ulog khaana khaat rahin, tab Yeeshu roṭi leke aur aasheesh maañg ke uske tuuṛis, aur chela log ke deke bolis, “Leo, khaao, i hamaar deñhi hei.”
40026027	Fir u pyaala lees, dhanbaad deke ulog ke dees aur bolis, “Tum sab isman se pio.
40026028	I hamaar khuun hei, aur yahi se Parmeshwar tumhaar sañghe promis karis hei. I dewa jaai ki jisse bahut log ke paap ke maafi hoi.
40026029	Aaj se ham waain nai piyega, u roj tak jab tak Pita ke raaj meñ tum log ke sañghe nawa waain nai pee.”
40026030	Tab ulog bhajan gaain aur Jaituun pahaaṛ pe chala gain.
40026031	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Aaj raat ke tum sab hamme chhoṛ ke bhaag jaayga, kaahe ke likhaan hei, ‘Parmeshwar, shepaḍ log ke maari aur jon jhunḍ meñ bheṛa rahi u sab idhar udhar chhitraay jaai.’
40026032	Lekin mare se jinda hoy ke baad ham tum se pahile Galeel chala jaayga.”
40026033	Ispe Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “Chaahe sab koi tumme chhoṛ ke chala jaay, lekin ham to tumme kabhi nai chhoṛega!”
40026034	Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tumme sachche bataata hei ki aaj ke raat, murga bole se pahile, tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
40026035	Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “Agar hamme tumhaar sañghe mare ke paṛe, tab bhi ham nai bolega ki ham tumme nai janta!” Sab chela log bhi yahi bolin.
40026036	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe Getsamni naam ke ek jagha pe gais, aur ulog se bolis, “Jab tak ham huañ jaay ke preya karta hei, tum log yahiñ beiṭhna.”
40026037	U aapan sañghe Peeṭa aur Jabdi ke dui laṛkan ke le gais. U udaas aur soch meñ paṛ gais,
40026038	aur u ulog se bolis, “Hamaar man bahut udaas hei, hiañ tak ki ham i bojha ke nichche daba hei aur hamaar maut aay waala hei. Hiañ ruko aur hamaar sañghe jagte rahna.”
40026039	Fir Yeeshu ulog se thoṛa aage jaay ke aur muh ke bagal gir ke preya kare lagis, “E hamaar Pita, agar hoy sake to i pyaala ham se le leo. Fir bhi hamaar nai, lekin tumhaar ichchha puura hoi.”
40026040	Tab Yeeshu chela log ke lage aais, aur ulog ke sote dekh ke Peeṭa se bolis, “Kaa tum log hamaar sañghe ek ghañṭa bhi nai jaage sakta hei?
40026041	Jagte rahna aur preya karte raho ki tum ṭesṭ meñ nai paṛo. Aatma to taiyaar hei, lekin deñhi kamjor hei”
40026042	Fir Yeeshu jaay ke dusra dafe preya karis, “E hamaar Pita, agar i kaam hamaar bina nai hoi paai to tumhaar ichchha puura hoy.”
40026043	Jab Yeeshu lauṭ ke aais to fir chela log ke sote paais, kaahe ke ulog aapan aañkhi khula nai rakkhe sakat rahin.
40026044	Yeeshu ulog ke fir se chhoṛ ke chala gais aur wahi rakam se fir se preya kare lagis.
40026045	Yeeshu lauṭ ke aay ke chela log se bolis, “Kaa tum log abhi tak araam karta hei? Dekho ṭaaim aay gais hei, aur Manush ke laṛka, paapi log ke haath pakaṛwaaya jaai.
40026046	Uṭho, chalo! Dekho, hamaar pakaṛwaay waala nagichche aay gais hei.”
40026047	Yeeshu abhi i sab bolat raha ki Juḍas jon baarah meñ se ek raha, aay gais. Uske sañghe ek baṛa bheeṛ bhi raha aur ulog ke haath meñ talwaar aur laaṭhi raha. I log ke baṛa paadri aur agua log bhejin raha.
40026048	Juḍas i saain dees raha, “Jiske ham jaay ke chumma lega, wahi hei. Uske pakaṛ lena.”
40026049	Juḍas seedha Yeeshu ke lage gais aur bolis, “Tumhaar sañghe saanti rahe!” Aur uske chuum lees.
40026050	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Dost, jon cheej kare ke hei jaldi karo.” Admi log aay ke Yeeshu ke kas ke pakaṛ leen aur aresṭ kar leen.
40026051	Tab Yeeshu ke ek saathi, aapan talwaar nikaar ke baṛa paadri ke naukar ke kaan kaaṭ dees.
40026052	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Aapan talwaar bhittar rakkho, kaahe ke jon koi talwaar uṭhaay hei u sab talwaar se naas kar dewa jaai.
40026053	Kaa tum i nai janta ki ham aapan Pita se binti kare sakta hei? U yahi lage baarah aami se jaada ainjals hamme de dei.
40026054	Lekin tab jon cheej Baaibal meñ likhaan hei u keise puura hoi, jon bole hei ki eise hoy ke chaahi.”
40026055	Tab Yeeshu bheeṛ se bolis, “Kaa tum talwaar aur laaṭhi leke hamme pakṛe aaya hei jeise ki ham koi chor hei? Ham to chech meñ roj roj beiṭh ke updes deta raha aur tab tum log hamme nai pakṛa.
40026056	Lekin i sab i khaatir bhais ki jon cheej nabi log likhin raha u puura hoy.” Tab Yeeshu ke sab chela log uske chhoṛ ke bhaag gain.
40026057	Jon log Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaain raha, ulog uske baṛa paadri Kaaifa ke lage le gain, jahañ pe agua log waiṭ karat rahin.
40026058	Peeṭa bhi thoṛa duur se ulog ke peechha karat raha, aur baṛa paadri ke añgna meñ aay ke dekhe maañgat raha ki aage kon cheej hoi, aur gaaḍ log ke sañghe beiṭh gais.
40026059	Baṛa paadri aur sab kaaunsal Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ meñ jhuuṭa gawaahi khoje ke kosis karat rahin, ki jisse ulog uske maare sake.
40026060	Lekin bahut jhuuṭa gawaahi se bhi kuchh nai bhais. Aakhri meñ dui admi aage aay ke bolin,
40026061	“I admi bolis raha, ‘Ham Parmeshwar ke Mandir giraay ke teen roj meñ fir banaay de sakta hei.”‘
40026062	Tab baṛa paadri khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu se bolis, “Tum aapan bachaao meñ kaahe nai kuchh bolta hei? I sab log to tumhaar agaiñsṭ meñ gawaahi de hei.”
40026063	Lekin Yeeshu chuppe raha. Is pe baṛa paadri usse bolis, “Ham jinda Parmeshwar ke kasam khaay ke bolta hei, ki agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka Maseeh hei, to ham se bataay deo.”
40026064	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Tum to apne bolta hei, ‘Bahut jaldi tum dekhega ki Manush ke laṛka sab se Shaktimaan ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭha hei aur swarag ke baadar pe aay hei!”‘
40026065	Ispe baṛa paadri aapan kapṛa faaṛ ke bole lagis, “I to Parmeshwar ke ninda karis hei. Ab hamme aur gawaahi ke jaruurat nai hei! Tum sab suna hei ki i kaa bolis hei!
40026066	Ab tum log ke bichaar kaa hei?” Ulog bolin, “Iske to mare ke saja hoy ke chaahi.”
40026067	Tab ulog uske muh pe thuukin, aur ghuusa se maarin, aur kuchh log thappaṛ maarin aur bolin, “Tum sochta hei ki tum Maseeh hei! Bataao ki tumme kon maaris hei!”
40026069	Peeṭa bahire añgna meñ beiṭhis raha, ki ek naukraani uske lage aay ke bolis, “Tum bhi to Galeel ke Yeeshu ke sañghe raha!”
40026070	Lekin Peeṭa safa jhuuṭ bol dees, “Ham nai janta ki tum kaa bolti hei.”
40026071	U bahire chala gais aur huañ bhi ek naukraani uske dekh ke huañ jon log rahin ulog se bolis, “I Naasrat ke Yeeshu ke sañghe raha.”
40026072	Ek dafe fir Peeṭa bolis, “Ham kasam khaata hei ki ham i admi ke nai janta hei.”
40026073	Thoṛa deri meñ huañ pe khaṛa ek admi aay ke Peeṭa se bolis, “Ham log janta hei ki tum ulog meñ se ek hei. Ham bataay sakta hei kaahe ke tum Galeel log ke rakam baat karta hei.”
40026074	Tab Peeṭa kasam khaay laga, “Ham sachche bolta hei ki ham uske nai janta hei. Parmeshwar hamme saja dei agar ham jhuṭṭe bolta hei.” Aur wahi lage murga bolis.
40026075	Tab Peeṭa ke u baat yaad aais, jon Yeeshu usse bolis raha, “Murga ke bole se pahile tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.” Aur u bahire jaay ke fuuṭ fuuṭ ke roy laga.
40027001	Sabere sab baṛa paadri aur agua log Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ feisla karin, ki uske jaan se maare ke chaahi.
40027002	Tab ulog uske baañdh ke, aur le jaay ke Romi gavna, Paaylaṭ ke haath meñ de deen.
40027003	Jab Juḍas, jon Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaais raha dekhis ki uske maut ke saja hoi, tab u bahut pastaais, aur chaañdi ke tees sikka, mukhia aur agua log ke lauṭaay ke bolis,
40027004	“Ham paap kara hei. Ham ek nirdos admi ke dhoka se maut ke hawaale kara hei.” Lekin ulog jawaab deen, “Isse ham log ke kaa? I tumhaar maamla hei.”
40027005	Juḍas u chaañdi ke sikka ke Mandir meñ feñk dees aur jaay ke faañsi lagaay lees.
40027006	Tab baṛa paadri u chaañdi ke peisa leke bolis, “Iske Mandir ke khajaana meñ nai rakkhe ke chaahi kaahe ke isman khuun laga hei.”
40027007	Ulog aapas meñ sallaah karke, u peisa se ek jameen khareed leen, jahañ pe pardesi log ke maṭṭi dewa jaay sake.
40027008	Yahi kaaran u jagha ke “Khuun ke khet” naam dewa gais.
40027009	Aur tab u vachan jon Jeremaayah nabi bataais raha, puura bhais. “Ulog chaañdi ke tees sikka leen, jeise ki Israayel ke log, uske daam lagaain raha.
40027010	Ulog wahi peisa se kumhaar ke khet khareed leen, jeise Prabhu hamme hukum dees raha.”
40027011	Tab Yeeshu ke, gavna Paaylaṭ ke aage laawa gais, aur u puuchhis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi log ke raaja hei?” Yeeshu uske jawaab dees, “Tumahi to bolta hei.”
40027012	Jab aur baṛa paadri aur agua log uspe iljaam lagaay lagin, tab u koi jawaab nai dees.
40027013	Tab Paaylaṭ usse bolis, “Kaa tum i sab nai sunta hei, ki ilog tumhaar agaiñsṭ gawaahi de hei?”
40027014	Lekin Yeeshu kuchh nai bolis, aur gavna hairaan hoy gais.
40027015	Gavna ke reeti raha ki i teohaar ke ṭaaim koi ek jehli ke, jon ke log maañge, uske chhoṛ det raha.
40027016	Aur u ṭaaim uske jel meñ ek keidi raha jon ke naam Barabba raha.
40027017	Jab bheeṛ baṭurin, tab gavna ulog se bolis, “Tum log kon ke mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar khaatir chhoṛi? Barabba ke, ki Yeeshu ke jon Maseeh kahaay hei?”
40027018	Kaahe ke u jaanat raha ki sab log Yeeshu se jaran kare hei, aur wahi khaatir uske pakaṛwaain hei.
40027019	Aur jab u nyaay ke kursi pe beiṭha tab uske aurat uske khabar bhejwaais, “I nirdos admi ke maamla meñ kuchh nai karna. Ham sapna meñ uske kaaran bahut dukh uṭhaaya.”
40027020	Lekin baṛa paadri aur agua log, bheeṛ ke bhaṛkaay deen ki ulog Yeeshu ke maut ke saja aur Barabba ke chhoṛe ke waaste maañg kare.
40027021	Tab gavna puuchhis, “I duuno meñ se tum kon ke mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar waaste chhoṛi?” Ulog bolin, “Barabba ke.”
40027022	Paaylaṭ ulog se puuchhis, “Tab ham Yeeshu ke, jon Maseeh kahaay hei, uske kaa kari?” U sab chillaain, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaay deo.”
40027023	U bolis, “Kaahe ke? U kon kharaab kaam karis hei?” Aur tab ulog aur jor se chillaay ke bole lagin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaao.”
40027024	Jab Paaylaṭ dekhis ki kaam bigṛe hei aur u kuchh nai kare saki, aur saait laṛaai jhagṛa hoy jaai, tab u paani leke bheeṛ ke aage aapan haath dhoy lees aur bolis, “Ham i admi ke khuun ke jimmewaar nai hei. Tum log jaano.”
40027025	Sab koi jawaab deen, “Iske maut ke jimmewaari ham log pe aur hamaar laṛkan pe chhoṛ deo!”
40027026	Gavna, Barabba ke chhoṛ dees aur aapan saulja log ke hukum dees ki Yeeshu ke chaabuk maar ke kros pe chaṛhaay de.
40027027	Tab gavna ke saulja log, Yeeshu ke gavna ke peles meñ le gain, aur huañ, aur baaki dal ke wahiñ baṭorin.
40027028	Fir uske kapṛa utaar ke ulog uske laal rang ke raub pahinaain.
40027029	Tab ulog ek kaaṭa ke taaj banaain aur uske muuṛ pe rakh deen aur uske raaiṭ haath meñ ek laaṭhi de deen. Fir uske aage jhuk ke uske hasi uṛaay lagin, aur chillaay lagin, “E Yahuudi log ke raaja, tumhaar jay hoy!”
40027030	Ulog uspe thuukin, aur laaṭhi leke uske muuṛ pe maarin.
40027031	Hasi uṛaay ke baad ulog uske raub utaar ke fir uske aapan kapṛa pahinaay deen, aur kros pe chaṛhaay ke waaste chal deen.
40027032	Jeise ulog bahire nikarat rahin, weise Saayman naam ke ek Kureni admi ulog ke mila. Saulja uske jabarjasti se Yeeshu ke kros uṭhaay ke chale ke bolis.
40027033	Jab ulog u jagha pe aain jahañ ke naam Gulgutha raha, jon ‘Khopṛi ke jagha hei’,
40027034	tab añguur ke ras meñ kuchh kaṛua cheej milaay ke Yeeshu ke deen, lekin cheekhe ke baad Yeeshu uske nai piye maañgis.
40027035	Aur jab ulog Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaay deen, tab uske kapṛa ke daaoñ pe lagaay ke apne meñ baaṭ leen.
40027036	Aur u sab huañ beiṭh ke, uske gaaḍ kare lagin.
40027037	Ulog uske muuṛ ke uppar ek noṭis lagaain jis pe likhaan raha, “I Yahuudi log ke raaja Yeeshu hei.”
40027038	Ulog uske sañghe dui aur ḍaaku ke bhi kros pe chaṛhaain, ek ke uske raaiṭ meñ aur dusra ke uske lefṭ meñ.
40027039	Huañ se aay jaay waala log uske kharaab kharaab baat bolin aur muuṛ hilaay hilaay ke bolat rahin,
40027040	“To tum hei jon bole raha ki Mandir ke tuuṛ ke tum teen roj meñ fir se banaay dega, apne aap ke bachaao! Agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei, to kros se nichche utro.”
40027041	Yahi rakam, baṛa paadri aur agua log sab uske hasi uṛaat rahin aur bolat rahin,
40027042	“I dusra log ke bachaais, lekin apne aap ke nai bachaay sake. I Israayel ke raaja hei, agar kros pe se utar aai tab ham iske biswaas karega.
40027043	I Parmeshwar pe bharosa rakkhe hei, kaahe ke i bolis raha, ‘Ham Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.’ Ham dekhe mañgta hei ki Parmeshwar keise iske bachaay hei!”
40027044	Jon dui ḍaaku uske sañghe kros pe chaṛhaawa gain raha, duuno bhi wahi rakam uske buraai karat rahin.
40027045	Baarah baje se le ke teen ghanṭa tak añdhiyaar hoy gais.
40027046	Teen baje ke lagbhag Yeeshu chillaay ke bolis, “Eli, Eli, lama shabaktani!” iske matlab hei, “E hamaar Parmeshwar, E hamaar Parmeshwar, tum hamme kaahe chhoṛ dia.”
40027047	Huañ pe jon log khaṛa rahin ulog meñ se kuchh i sun ke bolin, “I Ilaayja ke bolaay hei.”
40027048	Usman se ek jurte dauṛ ke spanj ke sirka meñ bhijaay ke, ek lakṛi pe rakh ke uske piye ke dees.
40027049	Lekin aur log bolin, “Dekhi Ilaayja iske bachaay aay hei ki nai.”
40027050	Ek dafe Yeeshu fir se jor se chillaay ke aapan praan tyaag dees.
40027051	Ṭheek wahi lage Mandir ke parda uppar se nichche tak faṭ ke dui ṭukṛa hoy gais. Jameen hil gais, aur chaṭṭaan bhi faṭ gais.
40027052	Kabar khul gain, aur mara meñ se bahut achchha admi log ke laash jinda hoy gais.
40027053	Aur Yeeshu ke jinda hoy pe, ulog huañ se nikar ke pawitr ṭaaun meñ gain aur bahut log ke dekhaay deen.
40027054	Tab aami ofisa aur saulja log jon Yeeshu ke gaaḍ karat rahin, jab erthquaik ke dhakka aur baaki sab cheej dekhin to ḍar gain aur bolin, “Sachche ke i Parmeshwar ke laṛka raha!”
40027055	Huañ pe ketna aurat rahin jon Yeeshu ke sewa karte, Galeel se uske pichchhe aay rahin, duur se i sab dekhat rahin.
40027056	Ulog meñ Meri Magdalini, Jeims ke amma Meri, aur Jabdi ke laṛkan ke amma rahin.
40027057	Sanjha hoy pe Armathia ke Josaf naam ke ek dhani admi aais. U bhi Yeeshu ke chela raha.
40027058	U Paaylaṭ ke lage gais aur Yeeshu ke laash maañgis. Paaylaṭ hukum dees ki laash uske de dewa jaay.
40027059	Tab Josaf laash ke leke ek ujjar linan ke kapṛa meñ lapeṭis.
40027060	Aur uske aapan nawa kabar meñ rakkhis, jon chaṭṭaan meñ khodaan raha. Fir ek baṛa patthar kabar ke duaari pe ḍhakel ke chala gais.
40027061	Meri Magdalini aur dusri Meri kabar ke aage beiṭha rahin.
40027062	Dusra din, sabat ke roj, baṛa paadri aur Farisi log Paaylaṭ ke lage jaay ke bolin,
40027063	“Sir, Hamme yaad hei ki u dhokebaaj aapan jeete jee bolis raha, ‘Teen roj ke baad ham fir jinda hoy jaayga.’
40027064	Yahi khaatir hukum karo ki teen roj tak kabar ke gaaḍ kara jaay, kahiñ eise nai hoy ki uske chela log aay ke uske laash choraay le jaai aur sab log se boliheñ, ‘U mara meñ se jinda hoy gais hei.’ Tab pichhla dhoka, pahile se bhi kharaab hoi.”
40027065	Paaylaṭ ulog se bolis, “Gaaḍ log ke le jaao, jeise uske rakkhe sako weise rakkho.”
40027066	Tab ulog jaay ke kabar ke gaaḍ kare lagin aur sañghe kabar ke muh seel kar deen.
40028001	Sabat ke baad, hapta ke pahila roj, sabere jeise bhais, tab Meri Magdalini aur dusri Meri kabar dekhe aain.
40028002	Achaanak ek bahut baṛa erthquaik aais aur Prabhu ke ainjal swarag se utar ke aais aur patthar ke bagal haṭaay ke us pe beiṭh gais.
40028003	U ainjal bijli ke rakam chamkat raha aur uske kapṛa snao ke rakam ujjar raha.
40028004	Huañ pe jon gaaḍ log rahin, ulog ḍar ke maare kaape lagin aur adhmara hoy gain.
40028005	U ainjal aurat log se bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Ham janta hei ki tum Yeeshu ke, jiske kros pe chaṛhaawa gay raha, uske khojta hei.
40028006	U hiañ nai hei! Parmeshwar uske mara meñ se jinda kar dees, jeise Yeeshu bolis raha ki hoi. Aao, u jagha ke dekho jahañ u rakkha gais raha.
40028007	Jaldi jaay ke uske chela log ke bataao ki u mara meñ se jinda hoy gais hei, aur dekho, u tum se pahile Galeel pahuñch jaai, aur huañ tum log uske dekhega. Jon ham tumme bataaya hei uske yaad rakhna.”
40028008	Is pe ulog ḍar ke maare lekin khusi hoy ke jaldi se kabar se lauṭin aur chela log ke sab baat bataay ke waaste dauṛ paṛin.
40028009	Achaanak Yeeshu ulog se milis aur bolis, “Tumme saanti hoy!” Ulog uske nagichche gain aur goṛ pakaṛ ke uske weship karin.
40028010	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Jaao aur hamaar pichchhe chale waala log se bolo ki ulog Galeel chala jaay, aur ulog wahiñ hamme dekhi.”
40028011	U aurat log rasta meñ rahin jab gaaḍ log meñ se kuchh ṭaaun aain aur baṛa paadri se jaay ke sab baat bataain.
40028012	Tab ulog sab agua log ke sañghe mil ke ek meeṭing karin, aur saulja log ke bahut peisa deke bolin,
40028013	“Sab log ke bataana, ‘Raat ke jab ham sab sowat raha, tab Yeeshu ke chela log aay ke uske choraay le gain.’
40028014	Aur agar gavna ke kaan tak i baat pahuñchis to ham uske samjhaay dega aur tum log bach jaayga.”
40028015	Gaaḍ log peisa leke, jeise bataawa gay raha, weisaiyeñ karin. I baat Yahuudi log meñ aur duur duur gaaoñ meñ feil gais aur sab log iske maane lagin.
40028016	Gyaara chela log Galeel meñ wahi pahaaṛ pe gain jahañ ulog ke Yeeshu jaay ke waaste bataais raha.
40028017	Jab ulog huañ Yeeshu ke dekhin to namaste karin, lekin kuchh to abhi bhi biswaas nai karin.
40028018	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke lage aay ke bolis, “Swarag aur jameen ke sab adhikaar hamme dewa gais hei.
40028019	Yahi kaaran jaao aur sab jaati ke log ke chela banaao ki jisse ulog ke Pita, Putr aur Pawitr Aatma ke naam se baptisma de sako.
40028020	Aur ulog ke jon sab ham bataaya raha, u sab ke paalan kare ke sikhaao. Aur dekho, ham i janam ke ant tak hardam tumhaar sañghe rahega.
41001001	Parmeshwar ke laṛka, Yeeshu Maseeh ke baare meñ achchha achchha baat, jiske suru meñ weisaiyeñ bhais jeise,
41001002	Aayzaaya nabi ke buk meñ likhaan raha, ki Parmeshwar eise bolis, “Tum se pahile ham aapan ek duut bhejta hei, u tumhaar waaste rasta taiyaar kari.”
41001003	Ḍezaṭ meñ koi jor se chillaay ke bole hei ‘Prabhu ke waaste rasta taiyaar karo. Uske waaste rasta seedha karo!”’
41001004	Yuhanna, jon sab ke baptisma det raha, ḍezaṭ meñ aay ke sab ke bataais, “Kharaab kaam chhoṛ deo aur baptisma le leo. Tab tumhaar sab paap maaf hoy jaai.”
41001005	Juḍia pardes aur Yarushalam siṭi ke bahut log Yuhanna ke lage gain. U log aapan aapan paap maan leen aur Yuhanna sab ke Joḍan nadi meñ baptisma dees.
41001006	Yuhanna uuñṭ ke baar ke kapṛa pahinat raha aur kamar meñ chamṛa ke peṭi baañdhat raha. Tiḍḍi aur madh uske khaana raha.
41001007	Yuhanna sab log se bolis, “Hamaar baad meñ koi bahut baṛa aawe hei. Ham to uske juuta ke bandhan bhi khole laayk nai hei.
41001008	Ham to tumme paani se baptisma deta hei lekin u to tumme Pawitr Aatma se baptisma dei.”
41001009	Thoṛa roj ke baad Yeeshu Galeel pardes ke Naasrat ṭaaun meñ aais aur Yuhanna se Joḍan nadi meñ baptisma lees.
41001010	Jeise Yeeshu paani meñ se nikris, u dekhis ki asmaan khula aur Pawitr Aatma kabuttar ke rakam uske uppar aais.
41001011	Aur asmaan se i awaaj aais, “Tum hamaar pyaara beṭa hei, ham tum se bahut khusi hei.”
41001012	Parmeshwar ke Aatma, Yeeshu ke jurte ḍezaṭ meñ bhej dees.
41001013	U huañ chaalis (40) roj tak rahis, jahañ saitaan uske laalach dekhaay ke fasaay ke kosis karis. Yeeshu jañgli jaanwar ke beech meñ raha, lekin ainjals uske bachaay ke rakkhis raha.
41001014	Yuhanna jab jel meñ raha, tab Yeeshu Galeel meñ jaay ke Parmeshwar ke baare meñ achchha achchha baat sunaawat raha.
41001015	U bolis, “Ab ṭaaim aay gais hei, Parmeshwar ke raaj ekdam nagichche hei. Parmeshwar ke dil se maan leo aur uske baat pe biswaas karo.”
41001016	Yeeshu Galeel ke laik ke kinaare ghuumat raha jab u dekhis ki Saayman aur uske bhaiya Enḍru laik meñ jaal feke hei. Ulog machhua rahin.
41001017	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Aao hamaar pichchhe chalo. Ham tumme sikhaayga ki keise machhri ke jagha admi pakṛa jaai.”
41001018	Duuno bhaiya jurte jaal feñk ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe chal paṛin.
41001019	Yeeshu aage aage chalte gais, aur thoṛa deri meñ dekhis ki Jabdi ke laṛkan, Jeims aur Yuhanna bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke aapan jaal banaawe hei.
41001020	Yeeshu duuno ke bolaais aur ulog aapan bappa Jabdi ke naukar log ke sañghe bauṭ meñ chhoṛ ke Yeeshu ke sañghe hoy leen.
41001021	Yeeshu aur uske chela log Kafarnahuum ṭaaun gain. Aawe waala sabat ke roj Yeeshu Yahuudi log ke Mandir meñ jaay ke parchaar kare laga.
41001022	Sab log uske parchaar sunke ghabraay gain aur bolin ki i to shaastri log ke rakam nai lekin adhikaar se bole hei.
41001023	Thoṛa deri meñ ek admi aais jiske bhuut pakṛis raha. U jor se chillaais,
41001024	“Naasrat ke rahe waala Yeeshu, ham se tumhaar kaa kaam hei? Kaa tum mañgta hei ki ham log barbaad hoy jaai? Ham janta hei tum kon hei! Tum Parmeshwar ke bagal se koi Pawitr jan hei.”
41001025	Yeeshu ḍaaṭ ke bolis, “Chuppe raho aur i admi meñ se nikar jaao.”
41001026	Dushṭ Aatma u admi ke baṛa jor se hilaais aur chillaay ke usman se nikar ke bhaag gais.
41001027	I sab dekh ke sab log ghabraay gain. U log apne meñ batiaay lagin, “I kon cheej hei? I to baṛa jor tor se nawa rakam ke parchaar suru kar dees hei. Dushṭ aatma bhi iske baat sune hei.”
41001028	Galeel meñ chaaro taraf Yeeshu ke naam feile lagis.
41001029	Yeeshu aapan chela log, Jeims aur Yuhanna ke sañghe leke Mandir se nikris, aur seedha Saayman aur Enḍru ke ghare gais.
41001030	Saayman ke saas ke bukhaar lagat raha. Yeeshu jeise huañ pañhuchis, log uske i baat bataais.
41001031	Yeeshu nagichche gais, aur haath pakaṛ ke uske uṭhaais, uske bukhaar utar gais aur u sab ke sewa kare lagis.
41001032	Suuraj ḍuub gais raha, aur sanjha hoy gais raha, to admi log bimaria log ke aur jis ke bhuut pakṛis raha, Yeeshu ke lage laain.
41001033	Ṭaaun bhar ke log ghar ke duaari pe jama hoy gain.
41001034	Ulog ke paas rakam rakam ke bimaari raha aur Yeeshu sab ke achchha kar dees. Ketna log ke to bhuut pakṛis raha, aur Yeeshu u bhuut log ke khader ke bahire nikaaris aur bhuut log kuchh bole nai paain kaahe ke ulog Yeeshu ke jaanat rahin.
41001035	Ekdam sabere Yeeshu uṭh ke ṭaaun se duur akele jagha meñ preya kare ke waaste ghar se chala gais.
41001036	Saayman aur uske saathi log Yeeshu ke khoje nikrin.
41001037	Jab ulog Yeeshu se milin, tab bolin, “Sab log tumme khoje hei.”
41001038	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Aao ham nagichche ke aur gaaoñ meñ parchaar kari kaahe ke ham yahi ke waaste aaya hei.”
41001039	Yeeshu Galeel meñ ghuum ghuum ke Yahuudi ke Mandir meñ parchaar karis aur bhuut ke bhagaais.
41001040	Ek admi jiske paas koṛhi ke bimaari raha, Yeeshu ke lage aais, aur ghuṭna ṭek ke chirauri karis, “Agar tum maañgo, to hamme achchha kare sakta hei.”
41001041	Yeeshu ke uspe daya aay gais aur aapan haath uṭhaay ke uske uppar rakkhis aur bolis, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum achchha hoy jaao.”
41001042	Jurte bimaari bhaag gais aur u admi achchha hoy gais.
41001043	Tab Yeeshu uske ek kaṛa chetaaoni deke bhejis, “Dekho, i baat koi se nai bataana.
41001044	Aapan paadri ke lage jaao aur dekhaao, aur fir jeise Maozas bataais hei weise Mandir meñ bheñṭ chaṛhaao jisse sab koi jaane sake ki tum achchha hoy gaya hei.”
41001045	U bahire jaay ke chuppe nai rahe paais aur sab log se i baat bataay dees. Yahi kaaran se Yeeshu bahut ghuume nai paais aur ṭaaun se duur chala gais, fir bhi log chaaro taraf se uske lage aate rahin.
41002001	Kuchh roj ke baad jab Yeeshu Kafarnahuum lauṭis tab ṭaaun meñ sab log ke pata lag gais ki u aapan ghare hei.
41002002	Huañ etna log aay gain ki duaari pe khaṛa hoy ke jagha nai raha. Yeeshu Parmeshwar ke vachan parchaar karat raha,
41002003	jab chaar admi ek rogi jiske lakwa maar dees raha, uske uṭhaay ke Yeeshu ke lage laain.
41002004	Lekin bheeṛ ke kaaran Yeeshu ke lage nai pahuñch paain, aur tab ulog ruuf khol ke u lakwa ke rogi ke nichche utaarin.
41002005	Yeeshu ulog ke biswaas dekh ke, lakwa ke rogi se bolis, “Beṭa, tumhaar sab paap maaf hoy gais.”
41002006	Huañ kuchh shaastri log beiṭha rahin. Ulog soche lagin,
41002007	“Kaahe Yeeshu eise bolis? I to Parmeshwar ke buraai kare hei. Khali Parmeshwar paap ke maaf kare sake hei.”
41002008	Yeeshu jaan gais ki ulog aapan man meñ kaa soche hei aur bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke eise socho hei?
41002009	Lakwa ke rogi se kon cheej bole meñ sahaj hei? ‘Tumhaar sab paap maaf bhais, ya uṭho aur aapan chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chalo firo?’
41002010	Lekin tum log i baat achchha se jaan leo ki Parmeshwar ke laṛka ke dharti pe paap maaf kare ke adhikaar hei,” Tab Yeeshu lakwa ke rogi se bolis,
41002011	“Uṭho, aapan chaṭaai baṭoro aur ghare jaao!”
41002012	U uṭhis aur jurte aapan chaṭaai baṭoris aur sab ke saamne se nikar ke bahire chala gais. I sab dekh ke sab log ghabraay gain aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagin, aur bolin, “Eisan cheej to ham kabhi nai dekha raha.”
41002013	Yeeshu bahire nikar ke fir laik ke kinaare chala gais. Ek baṛa bheeṛ uske lage aawe lagin aur u ulog ke updes de laga.
41002014	Yeeshu jab huañ se jaawat raha tab Halfai ke laṛka, Levi ṭeks baṭorewaala ke dekhis, jon aapan ofis meñ beiṭha raha aur Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe hoy leo.” Levi uṭhis aur Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees.
41002015	Ek roj Levi ke ghare Yeeshu khaana khaay ke waaste beiṭha. Yeeshu ke chela log, aur bahut se ṭeks baṭorewaala log aur dusra paapi log bhi Yeeshu ke sañghe khaana khaay beiṭh gain.
41002016	Farisi log ke wakeel log jab dekhin ki Yeeshu ṭeks baṭorewaala aur paapi log ke sañghe khaana khaawe hei, tab ulog chela log se puuchhin, “U kaahe eisan log ke sañghe khaay piye hei?”
41002017	Yeeshu ulog ke i baat sunke bolis, “Jon achchha hei, bimaar nai hei, ulog ke ḍokṭa ke jaruurat nai hei, lekin jon bimaar hei, uske jaruurat hei. Ham dharmi log ke khaatir nai, lekin paapi log ke bachaay aaya hei.”
41002018	Ek ṭaaim Yuhanna Baptisma de waala ke chela log aur Farisi log upwaas karat rahin. Kuchh log Yeeshu ke lage jaay ke puuchhin, “Yuhanna ke chela log aur Farisi ke chela log upwaas kare hei, fir tumhaar chela log eise kaahe nai kare hei?”
41002019	Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Jab tak dulha sañghe hei, kaa koi baraati log upwaas kare sake hei? Jab tak dulha ulog ke sañghe hei, tab tak upwaas nai kara jaay hei.
41002020	Lekin ṭaaim aawe hei jab dulha ulog se le lewa jaai, tab u ṭaaim ulog upwaas kari.
41002021	Koi bhi nawa kapṛa se puraana koṭ meñ chakti nai lagaai kaahe ke jab nawa kapṛa sukṛi, tab puraana koṭ pahile se jaada faṭ jaai.
41002022	Yahi rakam nawa añguur ke ras ke puraana chamṛa ke jholi meñ nai bhara jaay hei, kaahe ke añguur ke ras chamṛa ke faaṛ dei aur añguur ke ras ke sañghe jholi bhi barbaad hoy jaai. Yahi kaaran hei ki nawa añguur ke ras ke nawa jholi meñ rakkhe ke chaahi.”
41002023	Sabat ke roj, Yeeshu khet meñ se jaawat raha. Uske chela log anaaj ke baali tuuṛe lagin.
41002024	Farisi log Yeeshu se bolin, “Dekho, ilog eisan kaam kaahe kare hei jon kaam sabat ke roj nai kare ke chaahi.”
41002025	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kaa tum nai paṛha ki jab Ḍeiviḍ aur uske saathi log ke bhuuk laga aur khaawe ke jaruurat paṛa, to Ḍeiviḍ kaa karis raha?
41002026	Paadri Abiyatar ke ṭaaim ulog Parmeshwar ke ghar ke bhittar gain aur bheñṭ ke roṭi khaain aur aapan saathi log ke bhi khawaain, jon roṭi khali paadri khaay sakat raha.”
41002027	Yeeshu bolis, “Sabat admi log ke waaste banaawa gais hei, naa ki admi sabat ke khaatir.
41002028	Yahi kaaran Manush ke laṛka, sabat ke roj ke bhi maalik hei.”
41003001	Yeeshu fir chech meñ gais. Huañ ek admi raha jiske haath luñj hoy gais raha.
41003002	Kuchh log agorat rahin ki Yeeshu uske sabat ke roj achchha kare aur ulog uspe dos lagaay sake.
41003003	Yeeshu u luñj haath waala admi se bolis, “Aao, aur hiañ beech meñ khaṛa ho.”
41003004	Tab Yeeshu sab log se puuchhis, “Hamaar kaanuun kaa bataawe hei, sabat ke roj bhalaai karo achchha hei ki buraai karo, koi ke jaan bachaao achchha hei ki naas karo achchha hei?” Sab log chuppe rahin.
41003005	Yeeshu gussa meñ chaaro taraf dekhis, lekin sab ke kaṛa dil dekh ke uske bahut dukh bhais. Yeeshu u admi se bolis, “Aapan haath aage baṛhaao.” U haath baṛhaais aur uske haath achchha hoy gais.
41003006	Tab Farisi log chech se bahire nikris aur Heraḍ ke saathi log se milin aur Yeeshu ke maare ke plen banaawe lagin.
41003007	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe laik ke bagal chala gais aur uske pichchhe ek baṛa bheeṛ lag gais. Ulog Galeel aur Juḍia ke rahin.
41003008	Yarushalam ṭaaun, Idumea des, Joḍan nadi ke u paar Taaya (Tyre) aur Sidon ke agal bagal ke jagha ke log Yeeshu se mile aain, kaahe ke ulog Yeeshu ke achchha achchha kaam ke baare meñ sun leen raha.
41003009	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke bataais, “Ek bauṭ hamaar khaatir taiyaar karo ki ham bheeṛ meñ dab nai jaai.”
41003010	Yeeshu kaafi bimaar log ke ṭheek kar dees raha aur yahi kaaran se log ek dusra ke dhakka maarte aur ḍhakelte Yeeshu ke chhue maañgat rahin.
41003011	Jon log ke bhuut pakṛis raha ulog jeise Yeeshu ke dekhin, uske saamne gir paṛin aur chillaay ke bolin, “Tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.”
41003012	Aur Yeeshu bhuut log ke ḍaaṭis aur hukum dees, “Koi se kuchh nai bataana.”
41003013	Yeeshu pahaaṛ pe chala gais aur jiske u bolaay maañgat raha, u sab ke bolaay lees, aur ulog uske lage aais.
41003014	Yeeshu baarah chela ke chunis aur bataais ulog uske sañghe rahe, aur ulog ke parchaar kare ke bhejis
41003015	aur bhuut nikaare ke khaatir hak dees aur bimaar log ke achchha kare ke bhejis.
41003016	Baarah chela ke naam eise hei, Saayman jiske naam Yeeshu Peeṭa rakkhis raha.
41003017	Jabdi ke laṛkan, ek Jeims aur dusra Yuhanna. U duuno bhaiya log ke naam Buanargis rakkhis jiske matlab ‘Garjan’ hoy hei.
41003018	Enḍru, Filip, Bartimaais, Methiu, Thomas, Halfai ke laṛka Jeims, Taḍḍi, Saayman Kanaani,
41003019	aur Juḍas Iskariyoti jon Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaais raha.
41003020	Yeeshu ghare gais lekin huañ bhi log aay ke uske gher leen, aur u khaana bhi nai khaay paais.
41003021	Jab Yeeshu ke palwaar i baat sunin tab uske dekh bhaal kare lagin kaahe ke log bolat rahin ki u pagla hoy gais hei.
41003022	Yarushalam se jon paṛha likha log aain raha, ulog bhi bolin, “Usman Baalazbul hei, jon saitaan ke sardaar hei, aur wahi ke madat se bhuut nikaare hei.”
41003023	Yeeshu ulog ke nagichche bolaais aur riḍals sunaay ke samjhaawe ke kosis karis. “Keise ek saitaan dusra saitaan ke nikaare sake hei?”
41003024	Agar ek des meñ laṛaai hoy jaay aur apne meñ laṛe lage hei to u des bahut roj nai bachi.
41003025	Wahi rakam agar ek palwaar laṛe hei to u palwaar bahut roj nai rahi.
41003026	Ṭheek wahi rakam agar saitaan ke raaj meñ fuuṭ hoy jaay aur ek dusra ke birudh kaam kare lage to u raaj ke chale ke mushkil hei, aur uske ant jaruur hoy jaai.
41003027	Koi bhi ek tagṛa admi ke ghar ke bhittar jaay ke uske cheej nai chori kare sake jab tak pahile u tagṛa admi ke baañdh nai de. Uske baad meñ u admi sab cheej chori kare sake hei.
41003028	Ham tum se sachche bataata hei ki ek admi ke sab paap hiañ tak ki muñh se nikra sab buraai ke bhi maafi mili.
41003029	Lekin Pawitr Aatma ke buraai karewaala log ke maafi nai mili. U eisan paap hei jiske kabhi maaf nai kara jaay sake, aur u hardam paap ke apraadhi rahi.
41003030	Yeeshu i baat i khaatir bataais kaahe ke kuchh log bolat rahin ki Yeeshu meñ saitaan hei.
41003031	Tab Yeeshu ke amma aur uske bhaiya aain. Ulog ghar ke bahire se uske bolaain.
41003032	Yeeshu ke chaaro bagal jon beiṭha rahin, usse bolin, “Dekho, tumhaar amma aur bhaiya tum se mile aain hei.”
41003033	Yeeshu bolis, “Kon hei hamaar amma, aur kon hei hamaar bhaiya?”
41003034	Agal bagal jon log beiṭhin raha uske dekh ke bolis, “Dekho, i hei hamaar amma, aur i hei hamaar bhaiya.
41003035	Jon admi Parmeshwar ke ichchha ke mutaabik kaam kare hei, wahi hamaar bhaiya, bahini aur hamaar amma hei.”
41004001	Yeeshu fir laik ke kinaare sab log ke sikhaay laga aur tamaam log sune ke waaste aain. Bheeṛ ke kaaran uske bauṭ meñ beiṭhe ke paṛa. Aur log laik ke kinaare khaṛa hoy ke sunat rahin.
41004002	Yeeshu kahaani bataay ke log ke sikhaat raha, aur log ke shikhaay waala ṭaaim eise bolis,
41004003	“Suno, ek kisaan bia bowe nikra.
41004004	Bowe ke ṭaaim kuchh bia rasta ke kinaare gira, aur chiṛia log aay ke uske khaay leen.
41004005	Kuchh bia patthar waala jameen meñ gira, jahañ bahut maṭṭi nai raha, aur i kaaran se jaldi se jam gais.
41004006	Lekin jab ghaam nikra tab sab sukhaay gais kaahe ke uske jaṛ khali uppar raha.
41004007	Kuchh bia kaaṭa waala jañgal meñ gira, u jañgal jab baṛa bhais, tab sab peṛ dab gais aur kuchh fal nai laay sakis.
41004008	Kuchh bia achchha jameen meñ gira. U jamis, baṛa bhais aur koi tees (30) guna, koi saaṭh (60) guna aur koi sao guna fal laais.
41004009	Yeeshu bolis, “Jiske ke lage kaan hei, ulog sun lo.”
41004010	Jab Yeeshu akele raha, tab kuchh log baarah chela ke sañghe aay ke perabal ke matlab puuchhe lagin.
41004011	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj ke gahira baat ke samajh tumme dewa gay hei, lekin jon bahire ke hei ulog ke perabal meñ bataawe ke jaruuri hei.
41004012	Kaahe ke ulog dekhi lekin dekhe nai paai, aur suni lekin samajh nai paai, ki kahiñ eise nai hoy ki ulog ke dil badal jaay aur Parmeshwar ulog ke maafi de dei.”
41004013	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Agar tum log i kahaani ke nai samajh paaya to aur kahaani keise samjhega?”
41004014	Bowewaala, Parmeshwar ke vachan bowe hei.
41004015	Rasta ke kinaare girewaala bia u vachan hei jiske log sune hei lekin saitaan aay ke uske uṭhaay le jaay hei.
41004016	Patthar waala maṭṭi meñ bowaan bia eisan log hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sune hei aur jaldi se uske maan le hei.
41004017	Lekin uske jaṛ uppar hoy ke kaaran bahut roj tak jinda nai rahe. Jeise laaif meñ koi dukh aay aur Parmeshwar ke vachan ke kaaran koi takleef paṛa to ulog haar maan lewe hei.
41004018	Jañgal meñ jon bia gira ulog ke rakam hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sun le hei.
41004019	Lekin dunia ke wari, peisa ke laalach, aur rakam rakam ke kharaab bichaar aay se vachan ke dabaay de hei aur fal nai lage dewe hei.
41004020	Aur jon bia achchha maṭṭi meñ gira u bia u admi log ke rakam hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sun ke maan lewe hei aur tamaam fal laawe hei, koi tees guna, koi saaṭh guna aur koi sao guna.
41004021	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kaa tum log batti baar ke koi bartan ke nichche lukwaata hei ya khaṭia ke nichche rakhta hei? Kaa tum batti baar ke uppar nai rakhta hei?
41004022	Koi eisan cheej chhipaan nai hei jon saamne nai aawe, aur jon kuchh chhipaan hei, u saamne aai.
41004023	Agar tumhaar lage kaan hei to achchha se sun leo.
41004024	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jon kuchh tum sunta hei, uske khuub dhyaan se suno. Jeise tum dusra ke sañghe karta hei, weise tumhaar sañghe bhi hoi, aur usse bhi kharaab hoy sake hei.
41004025	Jiske paas kuchh hei, uske aur dewa jaai, aur jon ke paas nai hei, usse to jon uske paas hei, u bhi le lewa jaai.”
41004026	Yeeshu fir bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj eisan hei jeise koi kisaan khet meñ bia chheeṭe hei.
41004027	U raat ke soy jaay hei aur din meñ jaga rahe hei. Udhar bia jam ke baṛa hote jaay hei, lekin u nai samajh paawe hei ki i keise hois hei.
41004028	Maṭṭi ke kaaran se bia jame hei, fuul patti lage hei aur fir daana lage hei.
41004029	Aur jeise daana pak jaay hei, kaaṭe ke ṭaaim aay jaay hei, tab u jurte hasua se kaaṭ lewe hei.
41004030	Yeeshu fir bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj kon cheej ke rakam hei, kon aur kahaani se ham iske baare meñ samjhaai?
41004031	Parmeshwar ke raaj sarso ke daana ke rakam hei. Sarso ke daana bahut chhoṭa howe hei jab uske maṭṭi meñ bowa jaay hei.
41004032	Lekin jab u jam jaay hei to sab se baṛa peṛ hoy jaay hei. Peṛ ke ḍaali etna baṛa hoy jaay hei ki uske chhaaiñ meñ chiṛia log rahe ke waaste aapan ghar banaay lewe hei.”
41004033	Yahi rakam Yeeshu bahut kahaani bataay ke log ke samajh ke mutaabik vachan sunaawat raha.
41004034	U kahaani ke bina kuchh nai bataawat raha. Lekin pichchhe se akele meñ aapan chela log ke sab kahaani ke matlab samjhaay dewat raha.
41004035	Wahi roj jab sanjha bhais, tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Aao, ham log laik ke u paar chali.”
41004036	Aur ulog bheeṛ ke chhoṛ ke uske weisaiyeñ jeise u raha, bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke chal deen. Ulog ke sañghe aur bauṭ bhi gais.
41004037	Tab hawa jor se chale laga. Waivs uṭhe lagis, aur bauṭ meñ dhakka maare lagis, aur bauṭ ḍuube waala raha.
41004038	Yeeshu bauṭ ke pichchhe takiya leke sowat raha. Chela log uske jagaay ke bolin, “E Guru, kaa tumme ham log ke koi parwaah nai hei? Ham log to ḍuube waala hei.”
41004039	Yeeshu uṭh ke hawa ke ḍaaṭis aur paani se bolis, “Saanti hoy jaao!” Hawa ruk gais aur sab kuchh saanti hoy gais.
41004040	Tab Yeeshu chela log se bolis, “Tum log kaahe ḍarta hei? Kaa tum log ke lage biswaas nai hei?”
41004041	Ulog bahut ḍar gain aur apne meñ bole lagin, “I kon hei? Hawa aur paani bhi iske hukum maane hei!”
41005001	Yeeshu aur uske saathi Galeel laik ke paar Garasinio ke des meñ pahuñchin.
41005002	Yeeshu jeise bauṭ meñ se utris, weisaiyeñ ek admi jiske bhuut pakṛis raha, kabrastaan se nikar ke uske saamne aais.
41005003	U kabrastaan meñ rahat raha aur koi uske chain se bhi baañdh ke nai rakkhe sakat raha.
41005004	Ketna dafe uske hatkaṛi lagaay ke aur uske goṛ ke chain se baañdh ke rakkhat rahin, lekin u chain aur hatkaṛi duuno ṭukṛa ṭukṛa kar det raha aur koi ke lage etna himmat nai raha ki uske samhaare.
41005005	Raat din u kabrastaan ya pahaaṛ pe chillaat raha aur patthar se apne aap ke choṭ pahuñchaat raha.
41005006	U Yeeshu ke duur se dekhis aur dauṛ ke uske namaste karis.
41005007	Aur jor se chillaay ke bolis, “E Yeeshu, Parmeshwar ke laṛka. Tumme ham se kon kaam hei? Parmeshwar ke naam se ham chirauri karta hei ki hamme nai sataao.”
41005008	Yeeshu bhuut se bolis ki i admi meñ se nikar jaao.
41005009	Yeeshu usse puuchhis, “Tumhaar naam kon cheej hei?” Tab u bolis, “Hamaar naam ‘Sena’ hei kaahe ke ham ḍher jan hei.”
41005010	Aur u bahut chirauri karis ki uske bahire nai bheje.
41005011	Huañ pahaaṛ ke uppar suar ke ek baṛa jhunḍ charat raha.
41005012	Bhuut log usse chirauri karin ki ulog ke suar meñ bhej de, ki ulog uske bhittar chala jaay.
41005013	Yeeshu ulog ke hukum dees aur bhuut log nikar ke suar meñ chala gain, aur dui hajaar (2000) suar ke jhunḍ laik ke bagal jhapṭin aur usman ḍuub marin.
41005014	Jon log suar ke charaawat rahin, bhaag ke ṭaaun aur gaaoñ meñ i baat bataain, aur log dekhe ke waaste aain ki kaa baat hei.
41005015	Ulog Yeeshu ke paas aain aur dekhin ki u admi jisman bhuut raha, kapṛa pahin ke saanti se beiṭha hei. U log ḍar gain.
41005016	Sab log jon dekhin ki kaa bhay raha, ulog bataain ki keise ek admi jiske bhuut pakṛis raha, achchha hoy gay aur suar keise ḍuub gain.
41005017	Tab huañ ke log Yeeshu se chirauri kare lagin ki u, ulog u jagha se chala jaay.
41005018	Jab Yeeshu bauṭ meñ beiṭhe laga, tab u admi jiske bhuut pakṛis raha, chirauri kare laga ki uske aapan sañghe rakkhe.
41005019	Lekin Yeeshu uske baat nai maanis. U usse bolis, “Tum aapan ghare jaao, aur aapan log se bataao ki Prabhu tumhaar khaatir ketna baṛa kaam karis aur tumpe ketna daya dekhaais.”
41005020	U huañ se chala gais aur das ṭaaun meñ jiske Dikpulis ke naam se jaane hei, sab ke bataawe laga ki Yeeshu uske khaatir ketna baṛa kaam karis raha. Aur jon log i baat sunin, chakit rahe gain.
41005021	Jab Yeeshu bauṭ se laik ke i paar aais tab ek baṛa bheeṛ uske lage baṭur gais. U laik ke kinaare raha.
41005022	Tab Jaayras naam ke ek admi aais, jon chech ke ek sardaar raha. Yeeshu ke jeise u dekhis, u uske goṛ pe gir paṛis.
41005023	U Yeeshu se bahut chirauri kar ke bolis, “Hamaar beṭi mare waali hei, tum aay ke uske uppar aapan haath rakh deo taaki u achchha hoy jaay, aur jinda rahe.”
41005024	Tab Yeeshu Jaayras ke sañghe gais aur pichchhe pichchhe ek baṛa bheeṛ bhi gais, hiañ tak ki bheeṛ Yeeshu ke uppar girat rahin.
41005025	Ek aurat baarah saal se khuun ke bahe ke bimaari se dukhi rahi.
41005026	U bahut ḍokṭa log ke lage gais. Bahut peisa kharcha karis, fir bhi kuchh faayda nai bhais, aur uske aur bhi haalat kharaab hote gais.
41005027	Yeeshu ke baare meñ u sunis raha aur u bheeṛ meñ pichchhe se aay ke uske kapṛa chhui lees.
41005028	U bolat rahi, “Agar ham uske kapṛa chhui lega, to ham achchha hoy jaayga.”
41005029	Jurte uske khuun bahe ke band hoy gais. Uske aapan deñhi meñ pata laga ki u bimaari se achchha hoy gais hei.
41005030	Wahi ṭaaim Yeeshu ke bhi pata chala ki uske deñhi se sakti nikris hei. Yeeshu pichchhe ghuum ke puuchhis, “Kon hamaar kapṛa chhuis?”
41005031	Uske chela log usse bolin, “Tum dekhta hei ki bheeṛ tumhaar chaaro taraf laga hei! Kaahe tum puchhta hei ki kon hamme chhuis hei?”
41005032	Yeeshu jaane ke waaste ki kon uske chhuis hei, chaaro taraf dekhis.
41005033	Jab u aurat jaan gais ki u achchhi hoy gais hei, to ḍarte aur kaapte saamne aais aur Yeeshu ke goṛ pe gir paṛis, aur sab kuchh sachche sachche bataay dees.
41005034	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Beṭi, tumhaar biswaas tumme achchha kar dees hei. Saanti se jaao aur i bimaari se bache rahna.”
41005035	Jab Yeeshu i sab baat bolat raha, tab Jaayras ke ghar se kuchh log aain aur bolin, “Tumhaar beṭi mar gais hei, ab Guru ke tang nai karo.”
41005036	Yeeshu uske baat pe kuchh dhyaan nai dees aur chech ke sardaar se bolis, “Ḍaro nai, khali biswaas karo.”
41005037	Aur u Peeṭa aur Jeims ke bhaiya Yuhanna ke chhoṛ ke, aur koi ke aapan sañghe aawe nai dees
41005038	Jab ulog Jaayras ke ghare pahuñchin, tab ulog dekhin ki sab log meñ halchal macha hei, aur log rowe aur chillaawe hei.
41005039	Yeeshu bhittar jaay ke bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke rota aur halla machaata hei? Laṛki maris nai hei, khali sute hei.”
41005040	Log uske hasi kare lagin. Tab Yeeshu sab ke bahire nikaaris. Khali laṛki ke amma bappa aur aapan teen chela ke leke ruum meñ gais jahañ baarah saal ke laṛki rahis.
