41005041	U laṛki ke haath pakaṛ ke bolis, “Talitha kumi,” jiske matlab hei, “E chhoṭi laṛki, uṭho.”
41005042	Laṛki jurte uṭhis aur chale fire lagis. Sab log dekh ke hairaan rahe gain.
41005043	Yeeshu ulog ke hukum dees, “Koi i baat nai jaane paawe. Iske kuchh khaay ke deo.”
41006001	Huañ se nikar ke Yeeshu aapan ṭaaun meñ aais, aur chela log uske sañghe hoy leen.
41006002	Sabat ke din u chech meñ sikhaay laga. Bahut log sunke hairaan hoy gain aur bole lagin, “Iske i sab baat kahañ se mila hei? Kahañ se iske i buddhi aur taagat mila ki i sab chamatkaari kaam kare sake hei?
41006003	Kaa i wahi kaapenṭa nai hei, jon Meri ke laṛka hei? Kaa i Josaf, Jeims aur Saayman ke bhaiya nai hei? Aur kaa uske bahini log, ham log ke beech meñ nai rahe hei? Yahi kaaran sab log uske kaam se khusi nai hei.
41006004	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Aapan des, aapan palwaar, aur aapan ghar ke chhoṛ ke aur kahiñ nabi ke apmaan nai howe hei.”
41006005	Huañ pe u koi chamatkaari kaam nai dekhaay sakis, khali kuchh bimaar log pe haath rakh ke achchha kar dees.
41006006	Yeeshu ulog ke abiswaas dekh ke hairaan bhais. U vachan sikhaay ke khaatir bagal ke gaaoñ meñ chala gais.
41006007	Yeeshu baarah chela log ke bolaais aur dushṭ aatma ke uppar adhikaar deke dui dui karke bhej dees.
41006008	Aur Yeeshu ulog ke hukum dees, “Rasta ke waaste laaṭhi chhoṛ ke aur kuchh nai lena, nai roṭi, nai jholi, aur pes meñ peisa bhi nai.
41006009	Juuta pahin lena, lekin ek se jaada kapṛa nai le jaana.”
41006010	Aage aur bhi samjhaais, “Koi jagha jaao, koi ghar pe, to ṭaaun chhoṛe tak wahi ghar pe rahna.
41006011	Agar koi jagha ke log tumme welkam nai kare aur tumhaar baat nai sune, to jaay ke ṭaaim aapan goṛ ke garda wahiñ jhaaṛ dena, kaahe ke eise ulog ke chetaaoni mili.”
41006012	Chela log jaay ke sab log meñ man firaay ke baare meñ updes deen.
41006013	Aur ulog bahut dushṭ aatma ke nikaarin aur bimaar log ke tel lagaay ke achchha karin.
41006014	Raaja Heraḍ i sab baat sunis kaahe ke Yeeshu ke naam feil gais raha. Kuchh log bolat rahin, “Yuhanna baptisma de waala mar ke fir jinda hoy gay hei, aur wahi ke sakti se i kaam kare hei.”
41006015	Kuchh log bolat rahin, “I Ilaayja hei,” lekin aur log bolat rahin, “I puraana nabi meñ se ek hei.”
41006016	Jab Heraḍ sunis tab bolis, “I Yuhanna hei, jiske muuṛ ham kaṭwaay raha. Wahi jinda hoy gais hei.”
41006017	Raaja Heraḍ saulja bhej ke Yuhanna ke pakaṛwaay ke jel meñ band kar dees raha, aur Heraḍiaas ke sañghe saadi kar lees raha.
41006018	Yuhanna, Heraḍ se bataais raha, “Tumme aapan bhaiya ke aurat ke nai rakkhe ke chaahi, kaahe ke i kaanuun ke agaiñsṭ hei.”
41006019	Yahi kaaran se Heraḍiaas, Yuhanna se jaran karat rahi, aur maañgat rahi ki uske marwaay de, lekin u kuchh kare nai sakat rahi.
41006020	Heraḍ, Yuhanna ke ek achchha aur pawitr admi jaan ke usse ḍarat raha, aur uske praan ke rakchha karat raha. U Yuhanna ke baat ke bahut prem se sunat raha, lekin baat sun ke ghabraay jaat raha.
41006021	Ek achchha ṭaaim pe Heraḍ aapan janam din pe darbaari, senapati aur Galeel ke baṛa log ke bhoj meñ neota dees.
41006022	Heraḍiaas ke laṛki bhittar aais aur naach ke Heraḍ aur uske mehmaan log ke khusi kar dees. Raaja laṛki se bolis, “Jon cheej tum maañgta hei, ham tumme dega.”
41006023	U kasam khaay ke bolis, “Jon bhi kuchh tum maañgegi, ham tumme dega, chaahe u hamaar aadha raaj kaahe nai hoy.”
41006024	Laṛki bahire jaay ke aapan amma se puuchhis, “Ham kon cheej maañgi?” Uske amma bolis, “Yuhanna ke muuṛ.”
41006025	U dauṛ ke bhittar gais aur bolis, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum hamme ek thariya meñ Yuhanna ke muuṛ abhi deo.”
41006026	Raaja bahut pastaais, lekin mehmaan ke saamne jon vachan dees raha, u uske tuuṛe nai sakis.
41006027	Tab raaja jurte ek saulja ke bhejis aur hukum dees ki Yuhanna ke muuṛ kaaṭ ke huañ laawe.
41006028	U jel meñ jaay ke Yuhanna ke muuṛ kaaṭis, aur ek thariya meñ rakh ke laais aur laṛki ke dees, aur laṛki aapan amma ke dees.
41006029	Jab Yuhanna ke chela log i sunin, tab ulog aay ke uske boḍi le gain aur kabar meñ gaaṛ deen.
41006030	Chela log Yeeshu ke paas aay ke, jon kuchh ulog kare rahin ya sikhaay rahin, sab bataain.
41006031	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Aao, hamaar sañghe alge jagha chalo aur kuchh araam karo.” Kaahe ki bahut log aate jaate rahin aur ulog ke khaana khaay ke bhi mauka nai milat raha.
41006032	Yeeshu aur uske chela log bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke ek suunsaan jagha meñ chala gain.
41006033	Lekin sab log ulog ke jaate dekhin aur cheenh gain. Ulog ṭaaun ke rasta se dauṛ ke Yeeshu se pahile huañ pahuñch gain.
41006034	Yeeshu bauṭ se utar ke u bhaari bheeṛ ke dekhis aur uske daya aay gais, kaahe ke ulog bheṛa ke rakam rahin, jiske koi shepaḍ nai hei. Yeeshu ulog ke bahut rakam ke baat sikhaay lagis.
41006035	Bahut deri hoy gais raha. Chela log Yeeshu ke paas aay ke bolin, “I ek suunsaan jagha hei aur ṭaaim bahut hoy gais hei.
41006036	Sab log ke jaay deo, taaki ulog gaaoñ aur basti meñ jaay ke aapan waaste kuchh khaana khareede saki.
41006037	Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Tumahi log ilog ke kuchh khaay ke deo.” Ulog bolin, “Kaa ham jaada peisa kharcha karke khaana laai, aur ilog ke khaawe ke dei?”
41006038	Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Tum log ke lage ketna roṭi hei? Jaay ke pata lagaao.” Ulog jaay ke pata lagaain aur Yeeshu ke bataain ki huañ paañch roṭi aur dui machhri hei.
41006039	Tab Yeeshu bolis ki sab log ke graas pe ek ek jhunḍ meñ beiṭhaay deo.
41006040	Log pachaas pachaas (50) aur sao sao ke jhunḍ meñ beiṭh gain.
41006041	Tab Yeeshu paañch roṭi aur dui machhri leke uupar asmaan ke bagal dekh ke aasheesh maañgis. Yeeshu roṭi tuuṛ ke chela log ke dees ki sab log ke baaṭ de. Yahi rakam Yeeshu dui machhri ke bhi sab log meñ baaṭ dees.
41006042	Sab log jetna maañgin otna khaain.
41006043	Chela log bacha kucha roṭi aur machhri ke tukṛa baarah baaskeṭ bhar ke baṭorin.
41006044	Khaana khaay waala paañch hajaar log rahin.
41006045	Wahi lage Yeeshu chela log ke bauṭ meñ beiṭhe ke bataais, taaki chela log Yeeshu se pahile laik ke u paar Beithseida pahuñch jaay aur Yeeshu apne bheeṛ ke bheje ke waaste ruk gais.
41006046	Jab sab log ke bhej dees tab preya kare ke waaste pahaaṛ pe chala gais.
41006047	Aur jab sanjha bhais, tab bauṭ laik ke beech meñ raha aur Yeeshu akele kinaare pe raha.
41006048	Jab u dekhis ki chela log hawa ke agaiñsṭ bauṭ khewe meñ takleef uṭhaay hei, tab Yeeshu ulog ke taraf laik pe chal ke aais. Sabere teen se chhe baje ke beech ke ṭaaim raha. Yeeshu ulog se aage nikar jaay maañgat raha.
41006049	Lekin ulog Yeeshu ke paani pe chalte dekh ke samjhin ki bhuut hei, aur chillaay lagin.
41006050	Kaahe ke sab log uske dekh ke ghabraay gain. Lekin Yeeshu jurte ulog se bolis, “Himmat rakkho! Ham hei, ḍaro nai.”
41006051	Aur Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe bauṭ meñ beiṭh gais aur hawa ruk gais. Ulog hairaan hoy gain.
41006052	U log abhi bhi u roṭi ke baare meñ nai samajh paain kaahe ke ulog ke dil kaṛa hoy gais raha.
41006053	Yeeshu aur uske chela log, laik paar karke Ganesarat pahuñchin aur bauṭ kinaare lagaain.
41006054	Aur jab ulog bauṭ se utrin, to huañ ke log Yeeshu ke cheenh gain.
41006055	Agal bagal ke gaaoñ aur basti ke log dauṛ paṛin aur jahañ jahañ log sunin ki Yeeshu aawe hei, wahiñ pe bimaar log ke laawe lagin.
41006056	Aur jahañ kahiñ Yeeshu gaaoñ, ṭaaun ya basti meñ jaawat raha, log bimaar log ke bajaar meñ le jaay ke binti karat rahin ki Yeeshu ulog ke aapan kapṛa ke koi bhaag chhue ke mauka de. Jon koi uske chhuwat rahin, u sab achchha hoy jaawat rahin.
41007001	Farisi aur Yarushalam se jon aain raha, usman se kuchh Shaastri, Yeeshu ke lage baṭurin.
41007002	U log dekhin ki Yeeshu ke kuchh chela log bina haath dhoy khaana khaay hei.
41007003	Kaahe ke Farisi aur Yahuudi puraana riwaaj ke rakam haath dhoy bina khaana nai khaay hei.
41007004	U log bajaar se aay ke jab tak u sab cheej ke dhoy nai lewe, tab tak uske nai khaay. Aur bhi bahut reeti riwaaj ke maanat rahin, jeise ki pyaala, loṭa aur taamba ke bartan ke dhoy maajo.
41007005	Farisi aur Shaastri log Yeeshu se puuchhin, “Kaa kaaran hei, ki tumhaar chela log aapan baap daada ke reeti riwaaj ke nai maane hei aur meila haath se khaana khaay lewe hei?”
41007006	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Aayzaaya nabi tumhaar rakam paakhanḍi ke baare meñ ṭheek profasi karis raha, jeise Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, “I log muñh se hamaar baṛaai kare hei. Lekin ilog ke dil ham se duur hei.
41007007	I log bekaar hamaar puuja kare hei, kaahe ke i admi ke banaawal ruuls eise sikhaay hei ki jeise janaay hei ki i Parmeshwar ke dewal ruuls hei.”
41007008	“Tum Parmeshwar ke ruuls ke chhoṛ ke admi ke reeti riwaaj ke pakṛe rahta hei.”
41007009	Yeeshu ulog se i bhi bolis, “Tum aapan reeti riwaaj paalan kare ke waaste, chalaaki se Parmeshwar ke hukum ke tuuṛ deta hei.
41007010	Maozas bataawe hei, ‘Aapan amma bappa ke aadar karo, aur jon aapan amma bappa ke buraai kari uske maut ke saja mili.’
41007011	Lekin tum log bolta hei ki agar koi admi aapan bappa ke ya to aapan amma se bole, ‘Jon kuchh ham se tumme mile ke raha u sab Parmeshwar ke de deta hei.’
41007012	To u roj se fir uske aapan amma ya to bappa ke waaste kuchh nai kare deta.
41007013	Yahi rakam tum aapan reeti riwaaj sikhaay ke Parmeshwar ke vachan ke haṭaay deta hei. Aur tum eisane kaam karte rahta hei.”
41007014	Yeeshu bheeṛ ke fir aapan lage bolaais aur bolis, “Tum sab hamme suno aur samjho.
41007015	Eisan koi cheej nai hei jon bahire se admi ke bhittar jaay ke uske meila kar dewe hei. Lekin jon cheej admi ke bhittar se bahire nikre hei, wahi uske meila kare hei.”
41007016	Koi ke paas agar sune ke khaatir kaan hei to suno.
41007017	Jab Yeeshu bheeṛ ke chhoṛ ke ghar ke bhittar aais, tab uske chela log usse u kahaawat ke matlab puuchhin jon sab u bolis raha.
41007018	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kaa tum log bhi nai samajhta hei? Kaa tumhaar samajh meñ nai aais ki koi cheej jon bahire se admi ke bhittar jaay hei, uske meila nai kare sake?
41007019	Kaahe ke u uske man meñ nai lekin peṭ meñ jaay hei aur bahire nikar jaay hei.” Eise bol ke Yeeshu sab khaay piye ke cheej ke safa bataais hei.
41007020	Aur u aage bolis, “Jon admi ke bhittar se nikre hei, wahi uske meila kare hei.
41007021	Kaahe ke admi ke bhittar se, yaane man se kharaab kharaab bichaar nikre hei jeise ki luchpan, chori, hatya.
41007022	Aḍalṭri, laalach, jaran, chhal kapaṭ, ninda, dushṭta, ghamanḍ aur paglaapan.
41007023	I sab buraai man se nikre hei aur admi ke meila kar dewe hei.”
41007024	Fir u huañ se uṭh ke Taaya (Tyre) siṭi ke lage aais aur ek ghar meñ gais. U maañgat raha ki koi nai jaane ki u huañ hei, lekin u luke nai sakis.
41007025	Aur wahi lage ek aurat jiske chhoṭi beṭi meñ saitaan raha, uske charcha sunke aais, aur uske goṛ pe gir paṛis.
41007026	I aurat Greek aur Suurufiniki jaat ke rahi. U Yeeshu se binti karis ki u uske beṭi meñ se bhuut nikaar de.
41007027	Yeeshu bolis, “Pahile laṛkan ke khaawan deo, kaahe ki i ṭheek nai hei ki laṛkan ke roṭi leke kutta log ke aage feka jaay.”
41007028	Aurat jawaab dees, “Sachche hei Prabhu ji, lekin kuttan ke bhi bacha kucha tukṛa ṭaibal ke nichche khaay ke mil jaay hei.”
41007029	Yeeshu bolis, “Aapan jawaab ke kaaran tum jaay sakta hei. Tumhaar beṭi se bhuut nikar gais hei.”
41007030	Jab u ghare aais tab u dekhis ki laṛki khaṭia pe leṭis hei aur usman se bhuut nikar gais hei.
41007031	Fir Yeeshu Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida ke des se nikar ke Dikpulis des se hoy ke Galeel ke laik pe pahuñchis.
41007032	Huañ log uske lage ek admi ke laain jon bahira raha aur tutlaat raha. U Yeeshu se binti karis ki u aapan haath uspe rakh de.
41007033	Tab u uske bheeṛ se alge le gais, aur aapan uñgri uske kaan meñ ḍaaris, aur thuuk ke uske jeebh chhuis.
41007034	Fir u asmaan ke bagal dekh ke lamba saas lees aur u admi se bolis, “Efatha” jis ke matlab hei “Khul jaao.”
41007035	U wahi lage sune laga, aur safa safa baat kare laga.
41007036	Yeeshu sab log ke hukum dees ki i sab baat ulog koi se nai bataay, lekin jetna Yeeshu rokis raha, otna sab log uske parchaar kare lagin.
41007037	U log bahut chakit rahin, aur bolat rahin, “I jon kaam kare hei, achchha hee kare hei. U bahira log ke sune ke aur guuñga log ke bole ke taagat dewe hei.
41008001	U ṭaaim ke baat hei, jab fir baṛa bheeṛ jama hoy gais, aur ulog ke paas kuchh khaawe ke nai raha, to Yeeshu aapan chela log ke aapan paas bolaay ke bolis,
41008002	“Hamme i bheeṛ pe daya aawe hei, kaahe ke ilog teen din se baraabar hamaar sañghe hei, aur ulog ke lage khaawe ke kuchh bhi nai hei.
41008003	Agar ham ilog ke ghare bhuuka bhej dei, to ilog rasta meñ behosh hoy jahiyeñ, kaahe ke ilog meñ se kuchh log to duur se aain hei.”
41008004	Chela log jawaab deen, “I suunsaan jagha meñ etna log ke waaste etna khaana kahañ se aai?”
41008005	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tumhaar lage ketna roṭi hei? U log bolin, “Saat.”
41008006	Yeeshu sab log ke jameen pe beiṭh jaay ke bolis. U saat roṭi leke, dhanbaad dees aur uske tuuṛ ke baaṭe ke waaste chela log ke dees.
41008007	Ulog ke paas kuchh chhoṭa machhri bhi raha. Yeeshu aasheesh maañg ke uske bhi baaṭe ke waaste dees.
41008008	Sab peṭ bhar ke khaana khaain. Chela log bacha kucha tukṛa se saat baaskeṭ bharin.
41008009	Khaana khaay waala log kul milaay ke chaar hajaar rahin. Yeeshu sab log ke bhej dees.
41008010	Aur Yeeshu jurte aapan chela log ke sañghe bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke Daalmanuuta chala gais.
41008011	Farisi log aain aur Yeeshu se baad-bibaad kare lagin aur uske ṭesṭ kare ke waaste usse swarag ke koi saain maañgin.
41008012	Yeeshu gahira saas leke bolis, “I ṭaaim ke log kaahe saain khoje hei? Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki koi saain nai dewa jaai.”
41008013	Yeeshu sab log ke chhoṛ ke bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke u paar chala gais.
41008014	Chela log khaana laawe ke bhuul gain aur bauṭ meñ ulog ke lage khali ek roṭi raha.
41008015	Yeeshu ulog ke chetaaoni dees, “Dekho, Farisi log ke yeesṭ aur Heraḍ ke yeesṭ se bach ke rahna.”
41008016	U log apne meñ baat karat rahin ki ulog ke lage roṭi nai hei, aur yahi kaaran Yeeshu eise bole hei.
41008017	Yeeshu jaan gais aur puuchhis, “Tum i baat meñ kaahe paṛa hei ki tumhaar lage khaay ke kuchh nai hei? Kaa tum log abhi bhi nai jaana? Kaa abhi bhi tumhaar samajh meñ nai aais?
41008018	Aañkhi rakh ke, tum dekhta nai, aur kaan rakh ke bhi, tum sunta nai. Kaa tumme kuchh yaad nai hei?
41008019	Jab ham paañch hajaar log ke beech paañch roṭi tuuṛa raha, to tum log tukṛa se bhara ketna baaskeṭ uṭhaay raha?” U log jawaab deen, “Baarah.”
41008020	Yeeshu fir puuchhis, “Aur jab ham chaar hajaar log ke beech saat roṭi tuuṛa raha, to tukṛa se bhara ketna baaskeṭ uṭhaay raha?” U log bolin, “Saat.”
41008021	Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tumme abhi bhi samajh meñ nai aais?”
41008022	Yeeshu Beitseida meñ aais. Kuchh log Yeeshu ke lage ek añdha admi ke laain aur Yeeshu se binti karin, ki u admi ke chhue.
41008023	Yeeshu añdha admi ke haath pakṛis aur uske gaaoñ se bahire le gais, aur uske aañkhi meñ thuuk ke aapan haath rakkhis aur usse puuchhis, “Kaa tumme kuchh dekhaay hei?”
41008024	U uppar dekh ke bolis, “Ham admi log ke dekhe sakta hei, lekin eise janaay hei ki ulog chalat firat peṛ hei.”
41008025	Tab Yeeshu fir aapan haath uske aañkhi pe rakkhis. Añdha dhyaan se dekhis. Uske aañkhi ṭheek hoy gais raha, aur u sab kuchh safa safa dekhe laga.
41008026	Yeeshu usse bolis, “I gaaoñ meñ goṛ nai rakhna,” aur uske ghare bhej dees.
41008027	Yeeshu aur uske chela log Kaisaria Filippi ke gaaoñ meñ chala gain. Rasta meñ Yeeshu aapan chela log se puuchhis, “Log hamme kaa bole hei?”
41008028	Ulog jawaab deen, “Koi koi bole ki tum Yuhanna baptisma de waala hei, aur koi koi bole hei ki tum Ilaayja hei, lekin koi koi bole hei ki tum koi naa koi nabi hei.”
41008029	Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “Lekin tum kaa bolta ki ham kon hei?” Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Tum Maseeha hei.”
41008030	Is pe Yeeshu chela log ke chetaaoni dees ki uske baare meñ koi se kuchh nai bataana.
41008031	Yeeshu chela log se bataais ki i bahut jaruuri hei ki Manush ke laṛka dukh uṭhaawe. U elḍa log, baṛa paadri aur Shaastri log ke najar meñ kharaab samjha jaai, maar dewa jaai, aur teen din baad jinda hoy jaai.
41008032	Yeeshu i sab baat ulog se safa safa bataay dees. Is pe Peeṭa Yeeshu ke alge le jaay ke bolis ki u chuppe rahe.
41008033	Yeeshu ghuum ke aapan chela log ke dekhis aur Peeṭa ke ḍaaṭ ke bolis, “Saitaan, hamaar lage se chala jaao! Tum bhi dusra log ke rakam sochta hei, Parmeshwar ke rakam nai.”
41008034	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe aur sab log ke bolaais aur bolis, “Jon koi hamaar pichchhe aawe maañge hei, to apne aap ke bhulaay ke, aapan kros uṭhaay ke, hamaar pichchhe aay jaao.
41008035	Jon koi aapan jaan bachaawe maañgi, to uske khoy dei, lekin jon koi aapan jaan hamaar waaste aur Parmeshwar ke vachan ke waaste dewe maañgi, uske jaan bach jaai.
41008036	Agar koi admi dunia meñ sab cheej paay lewe hei, lekin aapan jaan khoy de hei to uske kaa faayda?
41008037	Admi aapan jaan ke badle meñ kon cheej de saki?
41008038	Agar koi bhi admi i beimaan aur paapi log ke beech meñ hamaar aur hamaar vachan se sarmaai to Manush ke laṛka bhi ulog se sarmaai, jab u aapan Pita ke mahima meñ pawitr ainjals ke sañghe aai.”
41009001	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, ki jon hiañ khaṛa hei, ulog meñ se kuchh log eisan hei, ki jab talak Parmeshwar ke raaj ke saamarth sahit nai dekh le hei, tab tak ulog nai mari.
41009002	Chhe roj baad Yeeshu, Peeṭa, Jeims aur Yuhanna ke aapan sañghe lees aur ulog ek uucha pahaaṛ pe akele meñ le gais. Huañ ulog ke saamne Yeeshu ke ruup badal gais.
41009003	Yeeshu ke kapṛa chamke laga, ekdam ujjar hoy gais, ki dunia meñ koi bhi dhobi etna ujjar nai kare sake.
41009004	Aur huañ ulog Ilaayja aur Maozas ke dekhin jon Yeeshu se baat karat rahin.
41009005	Tab Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru ji, ketna achchha baat hei ki ham sab hiañ hei. Aao ham log teen tambu banaai, ek tumhaar waaste, ek Maozas ke waaste, aur ek Ilaayja ke waaste.
41009006	Peeṭa nai jaanat raha ki u kaa bole hei, kaahe ke ulog bahut ḍar gain raha.
41009007	Tab baadar aay ke ulog ke gher lees aur usman se awaaj aais, “I hamaar pyaara laṛka hei, iske baat suno.”
41009008	Tab chela log dekhin ki Yeeshu ke chhoṛ ke, sab koi gaayab hoy gais hei.
41009009	Pahaaṛ se utre ke ṭaaim Yeeshu hukum dees, “Jab tak Manush ke laṛka mare ke baad jinda nai hoy jaai, tab tak i jon tum log dekha hei, koi se nai bataana.”
41009010	I baat ulog apne meñ rakh ke baad bibaad kare lagin, “Mare ke baad fir jinda hoy ke matlab kaa hei?”
41009011	Chela log Yeeshu se puuchhin, “Shaastri log kaahe bole hei ki pahile Ilaayja ke aawe ke jaruuri hei?”
41009012	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ṭheek hei, Ilaayja pahile aay ke sab kuchh taiyaar kari, lekin Manush ke laṛka ke baare meñ Baaibal meñ eise kaahe likhin hei ki, “U bahut dukh uṭhaai aur ṭhukraawa jaai?
41009013	Ham tumme sachche bataata hei, ki Ilaayja aay gay hei, aur jeise uske baare meñ Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, log uske sañghe manmaani kaam kari.”
41009014	Jab Yeeshu aur uske teen chela log aur chela log ke lage aais, tab dekhis ki chaaro taraf bheeṛ laga hei aur shaastri log ulog se baad bibaad kare hei.
41009015	Yeeshu ke dekh ke sab log chakit hoy gain aur dauṛ ke uske welkam karin.
41009016	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tum log ilog se kaa baad bibaad karta hei?”
41009017	Bheeṛ meñ se ek admi bolis, “Guru ji, ham tumhaar lage aapan laṛka ke laaya hei jisman guuñga bhuut hei.
41009018	Jahañ kahiñ bhuut uske pakṛe hei, wahiñ uske paṭak dewe hei. U muh meñ se fena nikaare hei, daañt peese lage hei aur aapan deñhi kaṛa kar lewe hei. Ham tumhaar chela log se bola ki ulog uske nikaar dewe, lekin ulog nai nikaare sakin.
41009019	Yeeshu bolis, “E abiswaasi log, ham kab tak tumhaar sañghe rahega, aur kab tak i sab sahte rahega? U laṛka ke hamaar lage laao.”
41009020	Log laṛka ke Yeeshu ke paas laain. Yeeshu ke jeise dekhis weise bhuut laṛka ke eiñṭhis. Laṛka jameen pe gir paṛis, muh se fena nikre laga aur u loṭe laga.
41009021	Yeeshu uske bappa se puuchhis, “Iske i haalat kab se hei?” U jawaab dees, “Chhoṭa pe se.
41009022	Uske maare ke waaste bhuut kabhi aagi meñ to kabhi paani meñ giraais. Agar tum kuchh kare sako to hamaar uppar daya karo aur hamaar madat karo.”
41009023	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Eise kaahe bolta hei, ‘Agar ham kuchh kare sakta hei.’ Jon log biswaas kare hei, ulog ke khaatir sab kuchh hoy sake hei.”
41009024	Wahi lage laṛka ke bappa roy ke bolis, “Ham biswaas karta hei. Hamaar abiswaas duur kare meñ hamme madat karo.”
41009025	Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki log bheeṛ lagaay hei, tab u bhuut ke ḍaaṭis, “E guuñga aur bahira aatma, ham tumme hukum deta hei ki isman se nikar jaao aur fir kabhi lauṭ ke isman nai aana.”
41009026	Guuñga aatma chillaais, laṛka ke eiñṭhis aur usman se nikar gais. Laṛka dekhe meñ laga jeise mar gais hei, aur bahut log bolin ki u mar gais hei.
41009027	Lekin Yeeshu uske haath pakaṛ ke uṭhaais, aur u khaṛa hoy gais.
41009028	Jab Yeeshu ghar meñ aais, to uske chela log akele meñ usse puuchhis, “Ham log kaahe nai u bhuut ke nikaare saka?”
41009029	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I rakam ke aatma preya ke bina aur koi rasta se nai nikre hei.”
41009030	Yeeshu aur uske chela log aage baṛhin aur Galeel se hoy ke nikar gain. U nai maañgat raha ki koi jaane ki u kahañ hei.
41009031	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sikhaat raha, aur ulog se bolat raha, “Manush ke laṛka ke admi log ke haath meñ de dewa jaai, aur ulog uske maar ḍaliyeñ, lekin mare ke teen roj baad u jinda hoy jaai.”
41009032	I baat ulog ke samajh meñ nai aais, lekin ulog puuchhe ke khaatir ḍarat rahin.
41009033	Yeeshu aur uske chela log Kafarnahuum meñ aain. Ghar meñ aay ke Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Rasta meñ tum log kon baat pe baad-bibaad karat raha?”
41009034	U log chup rahin, kaahe ke rasta meñ ulog aapas meñ i baat pe bahas karat rahin ki ulog meñ se kon sab se baṛa hei?
41009035	Tab Yeeshu baarah chela log ke bulaais aur ulog ke bataais, “Agar tum meñ se koi baṛa hoy maañge to u sab se chhoṭa aur sab ke sewa kare.”
41009036	Aur u ek chhoṭa laṛka ke laay ke ulog ke beech meñ khaṛa kar dees, aur uske godi meñ leke ulog se bolis,
41009037	“Jon koi hamaar naam se eisan laṛka ke apnaay hei, u hamme bhi apnaay hei, aur jon koi hamme apnaay hei, u khali hamme nai, lekin hamme bhejewaala ke bhi apnaay hei.”
41009038	Yuhanna Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru ji, ham log ek admi ke tumhaar naam se bhuut nikaarte dekha, to ham log uske roka kaahe ke u hamlog meñ se ek nai raha.”
41009039	Yeeshu bolis, “Uske nai roko, kaahe ke eisan koi nai jon hamaar naam se chamatkaar kare aur thoṛa deri ke baad hamaar buraai kare.
41009040	Jon hamaar agaiñsṭ nai hei, u hamaar sañghe hei.
41009041	Agar koi tum log ke hamaar naam se ek pyaala paani piaay kaahe ke tum Maseehi hei, to ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki u aapan inaam paai.
41009042	Ulog ke khaatir achchha nai hoi, jon hamaar pichchhe chalewaala chhoṭa log meñ se, ekko ke bhi paap ke jaal meñ fasaawe hei. Ulog ke khaatir achchha hei ki ulog ke gaṭai meñ ek baṛa patthar laṭkaay ke samundar meñ feñk dewa jaay.
41009043	Agar tumhaar haath tumme paap meñ fasaay to uske kaaṭ dewe ke chaahi. Luula hoy ke, mukti ke jeewan paay lena kahiñ achchha hei ki dui haath rahte tum narak meñ chala jaao, jahañ nai butewaala aagi meñ feka jaay.
41009044	Agar tumhaar goṛ tumme paap meñ fasaay, to uske kaaṭ ḍaalo. Langṛa hoy ke mukti ke jeewan paay lena isse kahiñ achchha hei ki dui goṛ rahe pe bhi tum narak meñ feka jaao.
41009046	Aur agar tumhaar aañkhi tumme paap meñ fasaay to uske nikaar deo. Kaana hoy ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke paay lena to isse kahiñ achchha hei ki aañkhi rahte tumme narak meñ feñk dewa jaay.
41009048	Huañ ke kirwa kabhi nai mare aur aagi kabhi nai bute hei.
41009049	Kaahe ke sab log ke aagi se namkeen kara jaai.
41009050	Neemak achchha hei, lekin agar neemak ke sawaad chala jaay to sawaad kahañ se laayga? Apne aap meñ neemak rakkho, aur aapas meñ mil ke saanti se raho.”
41010001	Huañ se uṭh ke Yeeshu Joḍan nadi ke paar Juḍia ke gaaoñ meñ aais. Ek baṛa bheeṛ fir uske nagichche aay gain aur u aapan reeti riwaaj ke rakam ulog ke fir sikhaay laga.
41010002	Tab kuchh Farisi Yeeshu ke lage aain aur uske ṭesṭ kare ke waaste sawaal puuchhin, “Kaa i ṭheek hei ki admi aapan aurat ke ḍivos de?”
41010003	Jawaab meñ Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Maozas ke kaanuun tumme kaa kare ke bataawe hei?”
41010004	Ulog bolin, “Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, noṭis likhe ke baad ḍivos dewa jaay sake hei.”
41010005	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tumhaar kaṛa man ke kaaran Maozas i ruuls tumme dees hei.
41010006	Lekin jab se dunia bana hei, Parmeshwar admi aur aurat ke banaais hei.
41010007	Yahi kaaran admi aapan maañ-baap se alge hoy ke aapan aurat ke sañghe rahi, aur ulog ek hoy jahiyeñ.
41010008	Ab ulog dui nai lekin ek deñhi hei.
41010009	Yahi ke waaste jiske Parmeshwar joṛis hei, uske koi admi alag nai kare.”
41010010	Ghar meñ chela log iske baare meñ Yeeshu se fir puuchhin.
41010011	Yeeshu ulog se bataais, “Jon aapan aurat ke chhoṛ ke dusra aurat se saadi kare hei, u aapan aurat ke sañghe aḍalṭri kare hei.
41010012	Aur agar aurat aapan admi ke chhoṛ ke dusra admi se saadi kare hei, to u bhi aḍalṭri hei.
41010013	Kuchh log chhoṭa laṛkan ke Yeeshu ke lage laain, ki Yeeshu ulog ke uppar haath rakkhe, lekin chela log ulog ke ḍaaṭis.
41010014	Yeeshu jab i dekhis to gussaay ke ulog se bolis, “Laṛkan ke hamaar lage aawe deo aur ulog ke roko nai, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj eisane log ke hei.
41010015	Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, agar koi admi Parmeshwar ke raaj ke chhoṭa bachcha ke rakam apnaay nai hei, to u raaj ke u nai paay saki.”
41010016	Tab Yeeshu laṛkan ke godi meñ lees, ulog ke muuṛ pe haath rakkhis, aur aasheesh dees.
41010017	Jab Yeeshu rasta pe jaawat raha, tab ek admi dauṛ ke aais aur ghuṭna ṭek ke usse puuchhis, “He achchha guru, anant jeewan paay ke waaste ham kaa kari?”
41010018	“Tum hamme achchha guru kaahe ke bolta hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees. “Parmeshwar ke chhoṛ ke aur koi achchha nai hei.
41010019	Tum to sab ruuls janta hei. ‘Koi ke jaan nai lena, byabhichaar nai karna, chori nai karna, jhuuṭ ke gawaahi nai dena, chhal nai karna, aapan amma aur bappa ke aadar karna.”’
41010020	“He guru,” u admi bolis, “I sab ruuls to ham chhoṭa se maante aaya hei.”
41010021	Tab Yeeshu uske bagal dekhis, aur pyaar se bolis, “Tum meñ khali ekke kami hei. Jaao jon kuchh tumhaar lage hei, u sab ke bech ke gareeb log ke de deo, aur tumme swarag meñ dhan mili, tab aay ke hamaar pichchhe hoy leo.”
41010022	Jab u i baat sunis, tab uske chehra ekdam udaas hoy gais, aur u dukhi hoy ke chala gais, kaahe ke u ek bahut dhani admi raha.
41010023	Yeeshu sab taraf dekh ke aapan chela log se bolis, “Dhani log ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke waaste ketna kaṛa hei!”
41010024	Chela log i baat ke sun ke hairaan hoy gain, ispe Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Hamaar bachcha log, jon peisa pe bharosa rakkhe hei, ulog ke khaatir Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke waaste bahut kaṛa hei!
41010025	Sui ke naake meñ se ek uuñṭ ke nikar jaay ke sahaj hei, lekin ek dhani admi ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke bahut kaṛa paṛi.”
41010026	Ispe chela log bahut hairaan bhain, aur aapas meñ baat cheet kare lagin, “To fir kon bache sake hei?”
41010027	Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Admi log se to i hoy nai sake hei, lekin Parmeshwar se sab kuchh hoy sake hei.”
41010028	Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Dekho, ham sab kuchh chhoṛ ke tumhaar pichchhe aay gaya hei.”
41010029	Yeeshu bolis. “Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, jon koi hamaar waaste aur susamaachaar ke waaste ghar, bhaiya, bahini, maañ, baap, laṛkan bachchan ya khet chhoṛis hei,
41010030	ulog ke i janam meñ bahut mili. Ulog ke i dunia meñ sao guna jaada ghar, bhaiya, bahini, maañ-baap, laṛkan bachchan aur khet mili, lekin dukh bhi mili. Ṭaaim aay pe ulog ke anant jeewan mili.
41010031	Bahut log jon abhi aage hei, pichchhe hoy jahiyeñ aur jon pichchhe hei, aage hoy jahiyeñ.”
41010032	Yeeshu aur uske chela log Yarushalam jaawat rahin. Yeeshu ulog ke aage raha. U sab log hairaan rahin aur ḍarat bhi rahin. Ek dafe fir Yeeshu aapan chela log ke alge le jaay ke bataawe laga, ki kon cheej uske uppar hoy waala hei.
41010033	Yeeshu bataais, “Dekho, ham log Yarushalam jaata hei jahañ pe Manush ke laṛka baṛa paadri aur shaastri log ke haath pakaṛwaaya jaai. Ulog uske jaan se maare ke hukum dei aur dusra jaati ke haath meñ de dehiyeñ.
41010034	Ulog uske hasi uṛaai, us pe thuuki, chaabuk maari, aur maar ḍaari, lekin teen roj ke baad u jinda hoy jaai.”
41010035	Tab Zabdi ke laṛkan Jeims aur Yuhanna, Yeeshu ke lage aain. Ulog bolin, “He guru, ham tumse mañgta hei ki jon kuchh ham maañgi, tum hamaar waaste wahi karo.”
41010036	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tum log kaa mañgta hei?”
41010037	Ulog bolin, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum jab aapan raaj ke mahima meñ aao, tab ham log meñ se ek tumhaar raaiṭ aur dusra tumhaar lefṭ saaiḍ beiṭhi.
41010038	Yeeshu ulog ke bataais, “Tum nai janta ki tum kaa mañgta hei. Kaa tum u dukh ke pyaala piye sakega jon ham piye jaata hei? Kaa tum u baptisma le sakta hei jon ham lewe jaata hei?”
41010039	“Haañ, ham le sakta hei,” ulog bolin. Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jaruur tum u pyaala piega jon ham piye jaata hei, aur jon baptisma ham lewe jaata hei, u bhi tum log lega.
41010040	Lekin hamme i hak nai hei ki ham chune saki ki kon hamaar raaiṭ ya lefṭ saaiḍ beiṭhe. Khali Parmeshwar u jagha uske dei jiske waaste u taiyaar kara gais hei.”
41010041	Jab das aur chela log i baat sunin, to ulog Jeims aur Yuhanna pe gussaain.
41010042	Lekin Yeeshu, sab chela log ke ek sañghe bolaay ke bolis, “Tum janta hei ki aur jaati ke log meñ jon agua hoy hei, aur usman se jon baṛa hei, u dusra log pe hak jamaay hei.
41010043	Lekin tum log eise nai karna. Agar tum meñ se koi baṛa hoy maañge hei to u tumhaar naukar bani.
41010044	Aur agar tumme se koi agua bane maañgi, to u sab ke naukar bane.
41010045	Manush ke laṛka i waaste nai aais ki sab se aapan sewa karaawe, lekin i kaaran aais ki u dusra log ke sewa kare aur sab ke bachaawe ke waaste aapan jaan de dewe.”
41010046	Yeeshu aur uske chela log aur ek baṛa bheeṛ Jeriko aain. Ulog jab huañ se nikrin, tab Timaai ke laṛka Bartimaais, jon ek añdha bhikhaari raha, rasta ke kinaare beiṭha raha.
41010047	Jab u sunis ki Yeeshu Naasri aawe hei, to u jor se chillaay ke bole laga, “E Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
41010048	Bahut log uske bolin ki chuppe raho. Lekin u aur jor se chillaay laga, “Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
41010049	Yeeshu ruk gais aur bolis, “Uske hiañ bolaao.” Ulog añdha admi ke bolaain, “Ḍaro nai! Yeeshu tumme bolaay hei.”
41010050	U aapan koṭ feñk ke jaldi se uṭhis aur Yeeshu ke lage gais.
41010051	“Tum kon cheej mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar waaste kari?” Yeeshu usse puuchhis. “E guru, ham dekhe mañgta hei,” u añdha admi bolis.
41010052	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jaao, tumhaar biswaas tumme achchha kar dees hei.” Aur u jurte dekhe laga aur rasta meñ Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees.
41011001	Jab ulog Yarushalam ke nagichche, Jaituun pahaaṛ pe Beitfage aur Bethni ke lage aain, tab Yeeshu aapan dui chela ke i baat bataay ke aage bhejis.
41011002	“U aage waala gaaoñ meñ jaao. Jeise huañ tum log pahuñchega, huañ tumme ek gadha ke bachcha, jispe abhi tak koi nai beiṭhis hei, bañdha dekhaay dei, uske khol laao.
41011003	Agar koi tum se puuchhi ki i kaa karta hei, to bataana ki Prabhu ke is ke jaruurat hei, aur u jaldi lauṭaay dei.”
41011004	Ulog gain aur bachcha ke duaari pe bañdha paain, aur uske khole lagin.
41011005	Huañ jon log khaṛa rahin, ulog se puuchhin, “Kaa karta hei? Gadha ke bachcha ke kaahe kholta hei?”
41011006	Jeise Yeeshu bataais raha, weisaiyeñ ulog bol deen, aur ulog bachcha ke le jaay deen.
41011007	Ulog bachcha ke Yeeshu ke lage laain, uspe aapan aapan kapṛa bichhaain aur Yeeshu uspe beiṭh gais.
41011008	Bahut log rasta pe aapan aapan kapṛa bichhaain aur kuchh log khet se patti kaaṭ ke rasta pe bichhaain.
41011009	Aur jon uske aage aage jaawat rahin, aur jon uske pichchhe pichchhe chalat rahin, ulog jor jor se chillaay ke bolat rahin, “Hosaana, dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aawe hei!
41011010	Hamaar bappa Ḍeiviḍ ke raaj aawe hei, uspe Parmeshwar ke aasheesh hoi! Aur Prabhu ke baṛaai hoi!”
41011011	Yeeshu Yarushalam pahuñch ke chech meñ aais, aur chaaro taraf sab cheej ke dekhe laga. Lekin kaafi sanjha hoy gais raha, u aapan baarah chela log ke sañghe Bethani chala gais.
41011012	Dusra roj sabere jab ulog Bethani se chalin, tab Yeeshu ke bhuuk laga.
41011013	Duur pe u ek anjeer ke hariyar peṛ dekh ke uske nagichche aais, i soch ke ki huañ uske kuchh khaay ke mili. Lekin jab u nagichche aais, to patti ke chhoṛ ke u kuchh nai paais, kaahe ke anjeer ke fare ke ṭaaim nai raha.
41011014	Yeeshu anjeer ke peṛ se bolis, “Ab se koi i peṛ ke fal nai khaai!” Aur uske chela log i sunat rahin.
41011015	Jab ulog Yarushalam meñ aain, tab u Mandir meñ jaay ke huañ len den kare waalan ke nikaare laga. U peisa badle waala log ke ṭaibal aur kabuttar beche waalan ke peeṛha ulaṭ dees.
41011016	Aur Yeeshu koi ke Mandir meñ se kuchh bhi laawe aur le jaay nai dees.
41011017	Tab u samjhaay ke bataais, “Kaa i Baaibal meñ nai likha hei ki, ‘Hamaar Mandir sab des ke log ke waaste preya kare waala ghar rahi, lekin tum log iske chor ke aḍḍa banaay dia hei!’ ”
41011018	I sunke baṛa paadri aur shaastri log uske jaan se maare ke mauka khoje lagin. Kaahe ke ulog usse ḍarat rahin. Sab log uske sikhaawe pe hairaan howat rahin.
41011019	Sanjha jeise bhay, Yeeshu aur uske chela log ṭaaun se bahire chala gain.
41011020	Dusra roj sabere, jab ulog wahi rasta se jaawat rahin, to dekhin ki anjeer ke peṛ jaṛ tak sukhaay gay hei.
41011021	Peeṭa ke yaad aais ki kal kaa bhais raha, aur u Yeeshu se bolis, “E guru, dekho, jon peṛ ke tum saraapa raha, u sukhaay gais hei.”
41011022	Tab Yeeshu chela log se bolis, “Parmeshwar pe biswaas karo!
41011023	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon koi i pahaaṛ se boli ki uṭh ke jaao, aur samundar meñ lag jaao, aur aapan man meñ sandeh nai kari, lekin biswaas kari ki u jon cheej bole hei ki hoi, to u jaruur hoy jaai
41011024	Yahi kaaran ham tum se bolta hei, ki jon kuchh tum preya karke maañgo, aur biswaas karo to u tumme mil jaai.
41011025	Aur jab tum preya kare ke waaste khaṛa hota hei, tab agar tumhaar man meñ koi ke waaste jaran hei to uske maafi de deo. Tab tumhaar Pita jon swarag meñ hei, u bhi tumhaar paap maaf kari.”
41011027	Ulog fir Yarushalam aain, aur jab Yeeshu Mandir meñ ghuumat raha, tab baṛa paadri aur shaastri log aur Mandir ke elḍas, uske lage aay ke puuchhe lagin, “Kon hak se tum i sab karta hei? Aur kon tumme i hak dees hei ki tum i kaam karo?”
41011029	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tum se ek sawaal puuchhega aur tum uske jawaab dena, tab ham tum se bataayga ki i kaam ham kiske bole pe karta hei.
41011030	I bataao, Yuhanna ke baptisma swarag ke taraf se ya admi ke taraf se raha?”
41011031	Ulog aapas meñ bichaar karin aur ek dusra se bolin, “Ham kaa boli? Agar ham bolta hei ki, ‘Parmeshwar ke taraf se,’ to u boli, ‘Tab kaahe ke tum log Yuhanna pe biswaas nai kara?’
41011032	Agar ham boli, ‘Admi ke taraf se,”’ (U log ḍarat rahin, kaahe ke sab log jaanat rahin ki Yuhanna sachche ek nabi raha.)
41011033	Ulog Yeeshu se bolin, “Ham nai jaanta hei.” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tumme nai bataayga ki i kaam ham kiske bole pe karta hei.”
41012001	Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais, “Ek dafe ek kisaan añguur ke kheti karis. U uske chaaro bagal se gher dees, ras ke kuñḍ khodis, aur pahra de waala ke ghar bhi banaais. Tab u añguur ke khet renṭ pe de dees, aur u apne bides ghuume chala gais.
41012002	Jab añguur tuuṛe ke ṭaaim aais, tab kisaan ek naukar ke renṭ pe rahe waala admi ke lage bhejis, ki u jaay ke uske hissa ke añguur laay.
41012003	Lekin renṭ waala log naukar ke pakaṛ ke peeṭin aur khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
41012004	Tab kisaan dusra naukar ke bhejis, uske bhi ulog muuṛ meñ maarin aur beijjati karin.
41012005	Kisaan fir ek dusra naukar bhejis, lekin ulog uske maar ḍaarin. Tab kisaan aur dusra naukar log ke bhejis, ulog meñ se kuchh ke peeṭin aur kuchh ke pahile ke rakam beijjati kar ke maar ḍaarin.
41012006	Ab bheje ke waaste khali kisaan ke pyaara laṛka baaki rahe gais. Haar maan ke kisaan sochis ki renṭ waala log uske laṛka ke ijjat kari, to u aapan laṛka ke ulog ke lage bhejis.
41012007	Lekin ulog aapas meñ bichaar karin, “I to maalik ke laṛka hei aur uske waaris bani. Aao ham log iske maar dei, tab iske sab cheej ham log ke hoy jaai.”
41012008	Aur ulog laṛka ke pakaṛ ke maar ḍaarin aur khet ke bahire feñk deen.
41012009	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Ab añguur ke khet ke maalik kaa kari? U aay ke renṭ waala log ke jaan se maar ke aapan khet ke dusra ke renṭ pe de dei.
41012010	Kaa tum log Baaibal meñ i baat nai paṛha? ‘Jon patthar ke kaapenṭa log bekaar samajh ke bagal kar dees raha, wahi kona ke waaste asli patthar banis.
41012011	I sab Prabhu ke taraf se bhais raha, aur hamaar dekhe meñ bahut chakit baat hei!”
41012012	Tab Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu ke pakṛe maañgat rahin, kaahe ke ulog samajh gay rahin ki Yeeshu ulog ke agaiñsṭ meñ kahaani bataais raha. Lekin u bheeṛ log ke ḍar se uske akele chhoṛ ke chala gain.
41012013	Tab ulog Yeeshu ke uske baat meñ fasaawe ke waaste kuchh Farisi aur Heraḍ ke admi log ke uske lage bhejis.
41012014	Ulog jaay ke usse bolin, “E guru, ham janta hei ki tum sachche bolta hei, aur koi ke parwaah nai karta hei, kaahe ki tum admi log ke muh dekh ke baat nai karta, lekin Parmeshwar ke rasta sachchaai se bataata hei. Ham log ke bataao ki Raaja ke ṭeks dewe ke ṭheek hei? Kaa hamme uske ṭeks dewe ke chaahi ki nai?
41012015	Yeeshu ulog ke chalaaki jaan gais aur jawaab dees, “Tum log kaahe hamme ṭesṭ karta hei? Ek chaañdi ke peisa hamaar lage laao, ki ham dekhe saki.”
41012016	Ulog ek chaañdi ke peisa Yeeshu ke lage laain. U puuchhis, “Is meñ kiske chehra hei aur kiske naam hei?” “Raaja ke,” ulog bolin.
41012017	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jon Raaja ke hei, u Raaja ke de deo, aur jon Parmeshwar ke hei, u Parmeshwar ke de deo.” Tab ulog uske i baat sunke bahut chakit bhain.
41012018	Tab Saduuki log bhi, jon bole hei ki koi mar ke jinda nai hoy sake, usman se kuchh Yeeshu ke lage aay ke bolin,
41012019	“E guru, Maozas ham log ke khaatir likhis hei, ‘Agar koi ke bhaiya mar jaay, aur uske aurat bina laṛkan ke rahe jaay, to uske bhaiya uske aurat se saadi kar le sake hei aur aapan bhaiya ke waaste laṛkan peida kare sake hei.’
41012020	Ek dafe ke baat hei, saat bhaiya rahin, sab se baṛa bhaiya bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
41012021	Tab uske dusra bhaiya u aurat se saadi kar lees, lekin u bhi bina laṛkan ke mar gais. Tisra ke sañghe bhi eisehiyeñ bhais.
41012022	Aur baaki bhaiya log ke sañghe bhi yahi bhais. Saat bhaiya log u aurat se saadi karin, aur bina laṛkan ke mar gain. Aakhri meñ u aurat bhi mar gais.
41012023	To jab mara log jinda hoi to ulog meñ se kiske aurat u hoi? Kaahe ke u saato bhaiya ke aurat rahi.’ ”
41012024	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum galti karta hei! Tum nai janta hei Baaibal kon cheej sikhaay hei. Aur tum Parmeshwar ke taagat bhi nai janta hei.
41012025	Log jab mare ke baad jinda hoi, tab ulog ainjals ke rakam rahiyeñ, tab ulog meñ saadi waadi nai hoi.
41012026	Mare ke baad fir se jinda hoy waala baat Maozas ke buk meñ kaa tum jhaaṛi ke kahaani meñ nai paṛha, jahañ Parmeshwar ulog se bolis raha, ‘Ham Abraham ke Parmeshwar hei, Aayzak ke Parmeshwar, aur Jeims ke Parmeshwar hei?’
41012027	Parmeshwar mara log ke nai lekin jinda log ke Parmeshwar hei. Tum log baṛa bhuul karta hei!”
41012028	Ek shaastri jon ulog ke baat sunat raha, wahiñ pe raha. U dekhis ki Yeeshu achchha se jawaab dees, to u aay ke usse ek sawaal karis, “Sab se khaas hukum kon hei?”
41012029	Yeeshu bolis, “Sab hukum meñ yahi sab se khaas hukum hei, ‘E Israayel suno! Prabhu ham log ke Parmeshwar, ekke Prabhu hei.
41012030	Aur tum Prabhu Parmeshwar se aapan puura man se, aur puura praan se, aur puura buddhi se, aur aapan puura taagat se prem rakhna.’
41012031	Aur dusra hukum i hei, ‘Tum aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem karna.’ Isse baṛa aur koi hukum nai hei.”
41012032	Shaastri, Yeeshu se bolis, “E guru, tum ṭheek bola hei, aur sachche bola hei ki u ekke hei aur uske chhoṛ ke koi dusra nai.
41012033	Aur usse puura man se, puura buddhi se, puura praan se aur puura taagat se prem karna aur aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem karna, i sab rakam ke bali aur balidaan se baṛh ke hei.”
41012034	Tab Yeeshu dekhis ki u samajhdaari se jawaab dees hei, to u bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke raaj se duur nai hei.” Aur fir koi ke Yeeshu se kuchh puuchhe ke himmat nai bhais.
41012035	Yeeshu Mandir meñ updes dewe ke ṭaaim sawaal puuchhis, “Shaastri kaahe bole hei ki Maseeh, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka hei?”
41012036	Ḍeiviḍ Pawitr Aatma se bhar ke bolis, ‘Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis, hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho, jab tak tumhaar dusman log ke tumhaar goṛ ke nichche nai kar dei.’
41012037	Raaja Ḍeiviḍ to apne aap uske Prabhu bole hei, fir u uske laṛka keise bhais?” Aur bheeṛ ke sab log khusi se i sab sunat rahin.
41012038	Tab Yeeshu sikhaay ke ṭaaim ulog se bolis, “Shaastri log se bach ke rahna, jon lamba lamba kapṛa pahin ke ghuume hei, aur jon bajaar meñ namaste aur chech meñ khaas jagha beiṭhe hei, aur neota meñ maan-sammaan ke khoj meñ rahe hei.
41012040	Yahi log hei jon bidhwa log ke ghar dhoka se le le hei. aur dekhaawe ke khaatir baṛa deri tak preya karte rahe hei. I log ke to bahut bhaari saja mili.”
41012041	Yeeshu Mandir meñ peisa baṭore waala jagha pe beiṭh ke dekhe laga ki log Mandir meñ keise daan dewe hei. Kaafi dhani log bahut peisa deen.
41012042	Etne meñ ek gareeb bidhwa aay ke dui taamba ke sikka, jon ek peisa ke baraabar hei, usman chhoṛis.
41012043	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke bolaay ke bolis, “Ham tumme sachche bataata hei ki Mandir meñ peisa dewe waalan meñ se i gareeb bidhwa sab se jaada daan dees.
41012044	Kaahe ke sab usman se deen jon ulog nai maañgat rahin, lekin i bidhwa to aapan sab kuchh de dees hei.”
41013001	Jab Yeeshu Mandir se nikrat raha, to uske ek chela bolis, “He guru, dekho, keisan keisan patthar aur keisan keisan ghar hei?”
41013002	Yeeshu bolis, “I baṛa baṛa ghar dekhta hei? Hiañ pe ek bhi patthar nai bachi, ek ek kar ke feñk dewa jaai.”
41013003	Jab Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe Mandir ke saamne beiṭha raha, to Peeṭa, Jeims, Yuhanna aur Enḍru alge jaay ke usse puuchhin.
41013004	“Ham log ke bataao ki i sab cheej kab hoi, aur jab hoi tab u ṭaaim ke saain kaa rahi?”
41013005	Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Bach ke raho ki koi tum log ke dhoka nai de sake.
41013006	Bahut log hamaar naam se aay ke kahiyeñ, ‘Ham wahi hei,’ aur bahut ke dhoka bhi dehiyeñ.
41013007	Aur jab tum laṛaai ke baare meñ suno, to ghabraana nai, kaahe ke i sab ke hoy ke jaruuri hei, lekin u ṭaaim ant nai hoi.
41013008	Ek jaati dusra jaati pe aur ek des dusra des pe chaṛhaai kari, aur erthquaik aai, akaal paṛi. I sab baat museebat ke suruaat hei.”
41013009	“Lekin tum aapan waaste bhi bach ke rahna, kaahe ke log tumme pakaṛ ke koṭ meñ le jahiyeñ. Tumme Mandir meñ maari, aur hamaar kaaran gavna aur raaja log ke aage khaṛa hoy ke paṛi, taaki tum ulog ke waaste gawaahi bano.
41013010	Aur susamaachaar sab se pahile sab jaati meñ parchaar kara jaai.
41013011	Aur jab ulog tumme pakṛi, to pahile se soch nai karna, ki tum kaa bolega, ṭaaim aawe pe wahi bolna jon tumme bataawa jaai. Kaahe ke jon tum bolega u tumhaar baat nai rahi, lekin Pawitr Aatma se aai.
41013012	Bhaiya aapan bhaiya ke maare ke waaste de dei, baap bhi aapan laṛkan ke khaatir yahi kari. Laṛkan bhi aapan maañ-baap ke dusman ban jaai aur marwaay dei.
41013013	Hamaar naam ke kaaran sab log tumhaar dusman ban jaai. Lekin jon log aakhri tak dheeraj rakhiyeñ, wahi log bach jaai.”
41013014	“Jab tum ‘Ek bhayaanak cheej’ huañ khaṛa dekhega, jahañ uske nai hoy ke chaahi, (jon koi i paṛhe hei uske i samajh lewe ke hei.) “Tab jon Juḍia meñ hei, ulog ke pahaaṛ pe bhaag jaay deo.
41013015	Jon ruuf pe hei, ulog huañ se nai utre, aur aapan ghar meñ kuchh lewe ke waaste bhittar nai jaay.
41013016	Aur jon admi khet meñ hei, u aapan kapṛa lewe ke waaste pichchhe nai lauṭe.
41013017	Jon aurat maañ bane waali hei, aur jon bachcha ke duudh piaawe hei, ulog ke waaste i din bahut ḍar waala hoi!
41013018	Parmeshwar se preya karo ki i sab ṭhanḍa ke mausam meñ nai hoy!
41013019	Kaahe ke i din eisan dukh ke din hoi ki jab se Parmeshwar dunia banaais hei, eisan dukh abhi tak dekhe ke nai mila hei, aur naa kabhi hoi.
41013020	Agar Prabhu din chhoṭa nai karta, to koi nai bachta. Lekin jon ke u chunis hei aur aapan khaas log ke khaatir, u din chhoṭa karis hei.”
41013021	“U ṭaaim koi tum se aay ke agar bole, ‘Dekho, Maseeh hiañ hei!’ ya ‘Dekho, huañ hei!’ to biswaas nai karna.
41013022	Banauṭi Maseeh aur banauṭi nabi nikar paṛi. Rakam rakam ke saain aur sundar kaam dekhaay ke hiañ tak ki Parmeshwar ke chuna log ke bhi bharmaay dehiyeñ.
41013023	Tum husiaar rahna. Dekho tum se sab baat ham pahile se bataay dia hei.”
41013024	“U ṭaaim dukh ke baad suuraj añdher hoy jaai, aur chaañd aapan ujera nai dekhaai.
41013025	Asmaan se taara gire lagi, aur huañ ke taagat aapan jagha se hile lagi.
41013026	Tab Manush ke laṛka saamne aai. U baṛa mahima aur taagat ke sañghe baadar meñ se aate dekhaai.
41013027	Tab u aapan ainjals ke bhej ke, dharti ke i kona se asmaan ke u kona tak sab bagal se aapan chuna gay log ke baṭori.”
41013028	Anjeer ke peṛ se i cheej seekho. Jab uske ḍaari naram hoy hei aur nawa patti nikre lage hei, tab tum jaan leta hei ki garmi ke mausam aay waala hei.
41013029	Wahi rakam jab tum i sab cheej hote dekho, to jaan jaao ki ṭaaim nagichche hei, ya duaari pe hei.
41013030	Yaad rakkho, ki jab tak i sab baat puura nai hoy jaai, tab tak ilog mari nai.
41013031	Asmaan aur dharti miṭ jaai, lekin hamaar baat kabhi nai miṭi.”
41013032	“U din aur u ṭaaim ke baare meñ koi nai jaane, etna tak ki naa swarag ke ainjals aur naa Laṛka, khali Pita jaane hei.
41013033	Husiaar raho! Jagte raho aur preya meñ laga raho, kaahe ke tum nai janta ki u ṭaaim kab aai.
41013034	I u rakam ke baat hei jeise ek admi aapan ghar chhoṛ ke dusra des jaay hei. Aapan sab naukar log ke kaam bataay ke aur wachmen ke jagte rahe ke hukum de hei.
41013035	Yahi rakam se jagte raho. Kaahe ke tum nai janta ki ghar ke maalik kab lauṭi, sanjha ke ya aadha raat ke, ya murga bole ke ṭaaim ya sabere.
41013036	Kahiñ eise nai hoy ki u achaanak aay jaay aur tumme sowat paay.
41013037	Aur jon cheej ham tum se bolta hei, u ham sab se bataata hei, ‘Jagte raho!”’
41014001	Dui din ke baad fasah aur bina yeesṭ ke roṭi ke teohaar aay waala raha. Baṛa paadri aur shaastri log i baat ke khoj meñ rahin ki Yeeshu ke kon rakam se pakaṛ ke maare sake.
41014002	Lekin ulog sochin ki teohaar ke roj nai kaahe ke sab log meñ upadrao hoy sake hei.
41014003	Jab Yeeshu Bethani meñ Saayman (jis ke koṛhi ke bimaari raha), ke ghare khaana khaay beiṭha raha, tab ek aurat ek botal meñ sundar mahke waala mahañga pefeum laais. U botal ke khol ke pefeum Yeeshu ke goṛ pe giraais.
41014004	Lekin kuchh log jon huañ rahin, gussaay gain aur bolin, “Kaahe ke i pefeum ke barbaad kara jaay hei.
41014005	Iske to teen sao ḍola se jaada meñ bech ke gareeb log ke madat kara jaay sakat raha.” Aur ulog aurat ke ḍaaṭe lagin.
41014006	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Uske chhoṛ deo. Uske tum log kaahe ke tang karta hei? U to hamaar sañghe bhalaai karis hei.
41014007	Gareeb log tumhaar sañghe hardam rahiyeñ, aur jab maañgo tab ulog ke madat kare sako hei, lekin ham to tumhaar sañghe hardam nai rahega.
41014008	Jon kuchh u kare sakat rahi, karis, u hamme maṭṭi dewe ke taiyaari meñ pahile se pefeum lagaay dees hei.
41014009	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki dunia bhar meñ jahañ kahiñ susamaachaar ke parchaar kara jaai, huañ iske i kaam ke baare meñ yaad kara jaai.”
41014010	Tab Juḍas Iskariyoti jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha, u baṛa paadri ke lage gais, ki u Yeeshu ke ulog ke haath pakaṛwaay dei.
41014011	Ulog i sun ke khusi bhain aur peisa dewe ke promis karin. Juḍas Iskariyoti ab eisan mauka khojat raha ki koi rakam u Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay de.
41014012	Bina yeesṭ ke roṭi waala teohaar ke pahila roj, fasah ke khaana ke khaatir bheṛa ke bachcha maara jaat raha. Yeeshu ke chela log usse puuchhin, “Tum kahañ mañgta hei ki ham log jaay ke tumhaar waaste fasah ke khaana ke taiyaari kari?”
41014013	Tab Yeeshu aapan dui chela log ke bataay ke bhejis, “Ṭaaun meñ jaao, huañ ek admi paani ke ghaṛa uṭhaay dekhaai. Wahi ke pichchhe hoy lena.
41014014	Aur u jon ghar meñ jaai, wahi ghar ke maalik se bolna, “Guru puuchhe hei ki u ruum kahañ hei jisman ham aur hamaar chela log fasah ke khaana khaai?”
41014015	Tab u tumme ek saja sajaawal aur taiyaar karal baṛa waala uppar ke ruum dekhaai. Wahiñ pe khaana ke taiyaari karna.”
41014016	Tab chela log nikar ke ṭaaun meñ aain aur weisaiyeñ dekhin jeise Yeeshu bataais raha. Wahiñ ulog fasah ke khaana taiyaar karin.
41014017	Jab sanjha bhais, tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke sañghe huañ aais.
41014018	Jab ulog beiṭh ke khaana khaat rahin, tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tum meñ se ek jon hamaar sañghe khaana khaay hei, wahi hamme pakaṛwaai.”
41014019	Chela log meñ udaasi chhaay gais, aur ulog ek ek karke usse puuchhe lagin, “Kaa u ham hei?”
41014020	Yeeshu bolis, “U tum baarah meñ se ek hei jon hamaar sañghe thariya meñ haath ḍaaris hei.
41014021	Manush ke laṛka to weisaiyeñ mari, jeise uske baare meñ Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, lekin uspe haay lagi jon Manush ke laṛka ke pakaṛwaai. Achchha hota ki u janam nai leta!”
41014022	Khaana khaay ke ṭaaim Yeeshu roṭi lees aur aasheesh maañg ke uske tuuṛis, aur ulog ke de ke bolis, “Leo, i hamaar deñhi hei” ’
41014023	Fir u pyaala lees, Prabhu ke dhanbaad deke ulog ke dees, aur u sab usman se peen.
41014024	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “I hamaar khuun hei jon bahut log ke khaatir bahaawa gais hei, aur yahi khuun Prabhu ke promis hei.
41014025	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki ab se ham waain nai piega jab tak ham Parmeshwar ke raaj ke nawa waain nai pee lei.”
41014026	Tab ulog ek bhajan gaain aur Jaituun pahaaṛ pe chala gain.
41014027	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum sab hamme chhoṛ ke bhaag jahio, jeise ki Baaibal meñ likha hei, ‘Ham charwaaha ke maarega, aur bheṛa idhar udhar bhaag jahiyeñ.’
41014028	Lekin ham jinda hoy ke baad tum se pahile Galeel chala jaayga.”
41014029	Peeṭa bolis, “Chaahe tumme sab chhoṛ dehiyeñ, lekin ham tumme kabhi nai chhoṛega!”
41014030	Yeeshu Peeṭa se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki aaj hee ke raat, murga ke dui dafe bole se pahile, tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
41014031	Peeṭa jor deke bolis, “Agar hamme tumhaar sañghe mare ke bhi paṛa to bhi tumme ham kabhi naa nai karega!” Yahi rakam aur sab chela log bhi bolin.
41014032	Fir ulog Getsamni naam ke ek jagha pe aain, aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Jab tak ham preya karta hei, tum sab yahiñ beiṭho.”
41014033	U Peeṭa, Jeims aur Yuhanna ke aapan sañghe le gais. U bahut udaas aur dukhi hoy lagis.
41014034	Aur u bolis, “Hamaar man bahut udaas hei, aur jaan paṛe hei ki ham mare waala hei. Tum hiañ ruko aur jagte raho.”
41014035	U thoṛa aage gais aur jameen pe gir ke preya kare laga ki agar hoy sake to i dukh ke ghaṛi usse le lewa jaay.
41014036	Fir Yeeshu bolis, “Abba, E Pita, tum sab kuchh kare sakta hei. I dukh ke pyaala ham se le leo, hamaar ichchha nai, lekin tumhaar ichchha puura hoy.
41014037	Jab u lauṭ ke aais tab teeno chela log ke sote paais aur Saayman Peeṭa se bolis, “Kaa tum soy gaya hei? Kaa tum ek ghañṭa bhi jaga nai rahe sakta raha?”
41014038	“Jagte raho, aur preya karo ki tumhaar ṭesṭ nai hoy, kaahe ke aatma taiyaar hei lekin deñhi kamjor hei.”
41014039	Yeeshu fir chala gais, aur wahi baat bol ke preya kare lagis.
41014040	Jab u lauṭis tab chela log ke fir sote paais. Kaahe ki neeñd ke kaaran ulog aañkhi nai khole paawat rahin, aur nai jaanat rahin ki Yeeshu ke kaa jawaab dewa jaay.
41014041	Tab u tisra dafe lauṭ ke aais aur bolis, “Kaa tum abhi bhi sota hei aur sustaata hei? Bas! Ṭaaim aay gais hei ki Manush ke laṛka paapi log ke haath meñ de dewa jaai.
41014042	Uṭho, aao ab ham sab chali. Dekho, hamme dhoka de waala nagichche pahuñch aais hei.”
41014043	Yeeshu baat karte raha ki Juḍas jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha, aapan sañghe baṛa paadri, shaastri aur elḍas log ke bagal se ek baṛa bheeṛ jiske lage talwaar aur laaṭhi raha, leke huañ pahuñchis.
41014044	Juḍas aage se bheeṛ ke bataay dees raha, “Jiske ham chumma lega, wahi ke pakaṛ ke le jaana.”
41014045	Jeise Juḍas huañ pahuñchis, u seedha Yeeshu ke lage gais aur bolis, “E Rabbi!” aur uske chumma le lees.
41014046	Ulog Yeeshu ke kas ke pakaṛ leen.
41014047	Huañ jon log khaṛa rahin, us meñ se ek admi talwaar nikaar ke baṛa paadri ke naukar ke kaan kaaṭ dees.
41014048	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kaa tum ḍaaku samajh ke hamme pakṛe ke khaatir laaṭhi aur talwaar leke aaya hei?
41014049	Ham to hardam Mandir meñ tumhaar sañghe updes deta raha, tab tum hamme nai pakṛa. I sab i khaatir hoy hei ki Baaibal meñ likha baat puura hoy.”
41014050	Is pe sab chela log uske chhoṛ ke bhaag gain.
41014051	Lekin ek naojawaan jon aapan nañga deñhi pe khali ek chaddar lapeṭe raha, Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees. Ulog uske pakṛe maañgat rahin, lekin u aapan chaddar chhoṛ ke nañge bhaag gais.
41014053	Tab ulog Yeeshu ke baṛa paadri ke lage laain, huañ sab baṛa paadri aur shaastri baṭur gain.
41014054	Peeṭa duur se uske pichchhe pichchhe baṛa paadri ke añgna tak gais, aur gaaḍ ke sañghe beiṭh ke aagi taape laga.
41014055	Baṛa paadri aur puura maha sabha Yeeshu ke maut ke saja dewe ke waaste sabuut khojat rahin, lekin kuchh nai mila.
41014056	Ketna log Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ meñ jhuuṭa gawaahi dewat rahin lekin ulog ke gawaahi ekke rakam nai raha.
41014057	Fir se kuchh log khaṛa hoy ke jhuuṭṭe ke gawaahi deen.
41014058	“Ham log iske bolte suna hei, ‘Ham admi ke banaawal Mandir ke tuuṛ dega aur teen roj meñ dusra banaay dega, jon admi ke haath se nai banaawa gais hei.”’
41014059	Ispe bhi ulog ke gawaahi ekke rakam nai raha.
41014060	Tab baṛa paadri beech meñ khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tumhaar lage i baat ke koi jawaab nai hei, jon ilog tumhaar uppar lagaawe hei?”
41014061	Is pe bhi Yeeshu chuppe raha aur kuchh bhi nai bolis. Baṛa paadri usse fir puuchhis, “Kaa tum mahaan Parmeshwar ke laṛka Maseeh hei?”
41014062	Yeeshu bolis, “Haañ, ham hei, aur tum Manush ke laṛka ke sab se Shaktimaan Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭhe aur swarag ke baadar ke sañghe aate dekhega!”
41014063	Tab baṛa paadri aapan raub faaṛ ke bolis, “Ab ham log ke koi gawaahi ke jaruurat nai hei!
41014064	Tum sab log Parmeshwar ke ninda sun lia hei, aur ab tumhaar kaa bichaar hei? Sab log uske maut ke saja dewe ke bolin.
41014065	Kuchh log Yeeshu pe thuuke lagin, aur aañkhi pe paṭṭi baañdh ke ghuusa maar ke puuchhe lagin, “Bataao tumme kon maaris?” Gaaḍ log bhi uske thappaṛ maarin.
41014066	Peeṭa abhi añgna meñ raha, aur baṛa paadri ke ek naukraani huañ aais.
41014067	U dekhis ki Peeṭa aagi taape hei, to u ghuur ke uske bagal dekhis aur bolis, “Tum bhi to u Naasri Yeeshu ke sañghe raha.”
41014068	Lekin Peeṭa nai kar dees aur bolis, “Ham to uske nai janta hei aur nai samajhta ki tum kaa bola hei,” aur u bahire baranḍa meñ chala gais aur tabhi murga bolis.
41014069	U naukraani Peeṭa ke dekh ke, huañ agal bagal khaṛa log se bole lagis, “I bhi ulog meñ se ek hei.”
41014070	Lekin Peeṭa fir se nai kar dees. Thoṛa deri baad huañ ke log jon khaṛa rahin Peeṭa se bolin, “Ekdam sachcha baat hei ki tum ulog meñ se ek hei, kaahe ke tum bhi Galeeli hei.”
41014071	Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Ham kasam khaata hei, aur sachche bolta hei. Prabhu hamme saja dei agar ham jhuuṭ bolega! Ham u admi ke jiske baare meñ tum bolta hei, nai janta hei!”
41014072	Wahi lage murga dusra dafe bolis aur Peeṭa ke u baat jon Yeeshu bataais raha, yaad aay gais, “Murga ke dui dafe bole se pahile tum teen dafe hamme inkaar karega.” Aur u i baat soch soch ke rowe laga.
41015001	Sabere hote baṛa paadri, shaastri aur elḍas log puura maha sabha se sallaah kar ke Yeeshu ke chain se bandhwaay ke Paaylaṭ ke haath meñ de dees.
41015002	Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi log ke raaja hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I to tumahi bolta hei.”
41015003	Aur baṛa paadri log us pe bahut rakam ke dos lagaain.
41015004	Paaylaṭ usse fir puuchhis, “Kaa tum kuchh nai bolega? Dekho, i sab log tum pe bahut dos lagaawe hei.”
41015005	Yeeshu fir bhi kuchh nai bolis, aur Paaylaṭ hairaan rahe gais.
41015006	Jab jab fasah ke teohaar aate raha, tab tab Paaylaṭ koi ek keidi ke, jiske u maañge hei, uske chhoṛ dewat raha.
41015007	Wahi ṭaaim Barabba naam ke ek admi raaj ke agaiñsṭ kaam kare waala log ke sañghe jel meñ raha, u dañga fasaad (riot) meñ hatya bhi karis raha.
41015008	Aur bheeṛ ke log Paaylaṭ se binti kare lagin ki jeise u hardam karat raha, weise abhi bhi kare.
41015009	Paaylaṭ puuchhis, “Kaa tum log mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar waaste Yahuudi ke raaja ke chhoṛ dei?”
41015010	U jaanat raha ki baṛa paadri log Yeeshu se jaran kare hei aur yahi khaatir uske lage laain hei.
41015011	Baṛa paadri log sab ke sikhaain ki ulog Paaylaṭ se bole ki u Barabba ke chhoṛ de.
41015012	Paaylaṭ ulog se puuchhis, “Jiske tum log Yahuudi ke raaja bolta hei, uske ham kaa kari?”
41015013	Ulog fir chillaain, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaay deo!”
41015014	Paaylaṭ ulog se puuchhis, “I kon kharaab kaam karis hei?” Sab log aur jor se chillaay ke bolin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaay deo!”
41015015	Paaylaṭ sab ke khusi kare maañgat raha aur u Barabba ke chhoṛ dees aur Yeeshu ke chaabuk lagwaay ke kros pe chaṛhwaay ke khaatir de dees.
41015016	Saulja log Yeeshu ke raajpaal ke bhawan ke bhittar ke añgna meñ le gais aur Romi saulja log ke ek jagha bolaawa gay.
41015017	Aur ulog uske pepal (beijani) kapṛa pahinaay ke uske muuṛ pe kaaṭa ke taaj rakh deen.
41015018	Tab ulog Yeeshu ke salaam kare lagin aur bolin, “E Yahuudi ke raaja, tumhaar lamba umar hoi!”
41015019	Aur ulog uske muuṛ pe ḍanḍa maare lagin, aur uspe thuuke lagin aur ghuṭna ṭek ke uske namaste kare lagin.
41015020	Jab ulog Yeeshu ke khilli uṛaay leen, tab pepal kapṛa utaar ke wahi ke kapṛa pahinaain, aur uske kros pe chaṛhaay ke waaste bahire le gain.
41015021	Rasta meñ ulog ke Saayman naam ke admi mila, jon gaaoñ se ṭaaun aat raha. Saayman ek Kureni raha jon Elekszenḍa aur Rufus ke bappa raha. Saulja log usse jabran Yeeshu ke kros ḍhowaain.
41015022	Ulog Yeeshu ke Gulgutha naam ke ek jagha (jiske matlab khopṛi hei) huañ pe le gain.
41015023	Ulog uske huañ añguur ke ras meñ dawaai milaay ke dewe maañgat rahin, lekin Yeeshu nai pees.
41015024	Tab ulog uske kros pe chaṛhaay deen aur uske kapṛa apne meñ baaṭ leen, aur baaji lagaay ke dekhin ki kon kapra kiske mili.
41015025	Sabere nao baje ke ṭaaim ulog Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaain.
41015026	Aur ek noṭis likh ke uske uppar lagaay deen. Usman likhaan raha, “Yahuudi log ke Raaja.”
41015027	Yeeshu ke sañghe dui aur chor ke kros pe chaṛhaawa gais raha. Ek ke raaiṭ meñ aur dusra ke lefṭ meñ.
41015028	Tab Baaibal meñ likha baat puura bhais, jahañ likhaan raha, “Uske apraadhi log meñ gina jaai.”
41015029	Rasta pe jaay waala log muuṛ hilaay hilaay ke uske buraai karat rahin, “E Mandir ke giraay ke teen roj meñ banaay waala! Kros pe se utro aur apne aap ke bachaao!”
41015031	Yahi rakam baṛa paadri aur shaastri log bhi khilli uṛaawat rahin aur ek dusra se bolat rahin, “I aur log ke bachaawat raha lekin apne aap ke nai bachaay sake hei.”
41015032	Aao ham log Maseeh ke dekhi jon kros pe se utar aai ki ham uske dekh ke uspe biswaas kari.” U duuno chor bhi jon ke Yeeshu ke sañghe kros pe chaṛhaawa gay raha, uske khilli uṛaat rahin.
41015033	Baarah baje din se teen baje tak puura des meñ añdhera chhaay gais raha.
41015034	Teen baje Yeeshu chillaay ke bolis, “Eloyi, Eloyi, Lama shabaktani!” Jiske matlab raha, “E hamaar Parmeshwar, E hamaar Parmeshwar, kaahe tum hamme chhoṛ dia hei?”
41015035	Jon log huañ nagichche meñ khaṛa rahin, ulog sunke bolin, “Dekho, i Ilaayja ke bolaawe hei.”
41015036	Aur ek saulja dauṛ ke spanj ke sirka meñ bhijaay ke, ek lakṛi pe rakh ke Yeeshu ke piye ke waaste dees aur bolis, “Ruko, ham dekhi Ilaayja iske utaare ke khaatir aay hei ki nai.”
41015037	Tab Yeeshu baṛa jor se chillaay ke aapan praan chhoṛ dees.
41015038	Aur Mandir ke parda uppar se nichche tak faṭ ke dui ṭukṛa hoy gais.
41015039	Jon Romi ofisa uske saamne khaṛa raha, jab u Yeeshu ke chillaay ke praan chhoṛte dekhis to u bolis, “Sachche ke i admi Parmeshwar ke laṛka raha!”
41015040	Bahut aurat log bhi duur se dekhat rahin. Ulog meñ Meri Magdalini, aur chhoṭa Jeims aur Josaf ke amma Meri, aur Shalomi bhi rahi.
41015041	I sab log Yeeshu ke pichchhe Galeel se aay rahin, aur uske sewa karat rahin. Ulog ke sañghe aur bahut aurat log bhi rahin jon Yarushalam se sañghe aay rahin.
41015042	Sabat se pahile sanjha ke ṭaaim raha aur log uske taiyaari meñ lage rahin, jab Armathia ke rahewaala Josaf huañ aais. I admi sabha ke ek memba raha aur log uske ijjat karat rahin. U Parmeshwar ke raaj ke agorat raha. U baṛa himmat kar ke Paaylaṭ ke lage jaay ke Yeeshu ke boḍi maañgis.
41015044	Paaylaṭ hairaan bhais ki Yeeshu etna jaldi keise mar gais, aur aami ofisa ke bolaay ke puuchhis, ki Yeeshu ke mare ketna deri bhais?
41015045	Ofisa se pata lagaawe ke baad ki u mar gais hei, Paaylaṭ Yeeshu ke boḍi Josaf ke de dees.
41015046	Tab Josaf ek chaddar khareedis, aur boḍi ke utaar ke chaddar meñ lapeṭis, aur ek kabar meñ jon chaṭṭaan meñ khoda gay raha, usman rakh dees.
41015047	Meri Magdalini aur Josaf ke amma Meri dekhat rahin ki boḍi kahañ rakha jaay hei.
41016001	Jab sabat ke din beet gais, tab Meri Magdalini aur Jeims ke amma Meri aur Shalomi mahke waala cheej khareedin, ki jisse ulog Yeeshu ke boḍi pe lagaay saki.
41016002	Etwaar, jon hapta ke pahila din raha, ekdam sabere, suuraj nikre se pahile, ulog kabar pe chala gain.
41016003	Rasta pe aawe ke ṭaaim ulog baat karat rahin, “Ham log ke waaste duaari pe se patthar kon haṭaai?” (U bahut baṛa patthar raha) Lekin jab ulog uppar dekhin to patthar haṭa raha!
41016005	Ulog kabar ke bhittar gain, huañ ulog ek jawaan admi ke ujjar kapṛa pahine, raaiṭ taraf beiṭha dekhin, aur ulog hairaan rahe gain.
41016006	“Hairaan nai ho!” u admi ulog se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki tum Yeeshu Naasri, jiske kros pe chaṛhaawa gais raha, uske khojta hei! U jinda hoy gay hei, hiañ nai hei, dekho i wahi jagha hei, jahañ pe uske rakkhe rahin.
41016007	Lekin tum log jaao, uske chela log se aur Peeṭa se bataay deo, ‘Ulog se pahile Galeel chala jaai. Tum log uske wahiñ dekhega, jeise u tum log se bataais raha.”’
41016008	Aur ulog kabar se nikar ke bhaag gain, kaahe ke ulog bahut ghabraay gain raha. Ulog ḍar ke maare koi se kuchh nai bolin.
41016009	Hapta ke pahila roj, ekdam sabere Yeeshu ke jinda hoy pe, sab se pahile Meri Magdalini, jisman se u saat dushṭaatma ke nikaaris raha, uske dekhaay dees.
41016010	U jaay ke aapan saathi log ke jon dukh meñ ḍuuba rahin, aur rowat rahin, i niuz dees.
41016011	Jab ulog sunin ki Yeeshu jinda hoy gais hei aur Meri Magdalini uske dekhis hei, to ulog ke biswaas nai bhais.
41016012	Iske baad Yeeshu dusra ruup meñ aapan dui chela log ke dekhaai dees, jon gaaoñ jaat rahin.
41016013	I log bhi i baat aur sab se bataain lekin koi biswaas nai karin.
41016014	Aakhri meñ Yeeshu u gyaara chela log ke saamne aais, jab ulog khaana khaat rahin. Yeeshu ulog ke jon uspe biswaas nai karin raha, uspe gussa bhais, kaahe ke ulog uske jinda hoy pe dekhin raha, lekin biswaas nai karin.
41016015	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum dunia meñ sab bagal jaao aur sab jaat ke log ke i susamaachaar sunaao.
41016016	Jon biswaas kari aur baptisma lei, wahi bache saki, lekin jon biswaas nai kari, u dosi maana jaai.
41016017	Aur biswaas kare waalan ke saain rahi ki ulog hamaar naam se dushṭaatma ke nikaari. Ulog nawa nawa bhaasha boli.
41016018	Ulog saañp ke uṭhaay lei ya jahar pee jaai to bhi ulog ke kuchh nai hoi, aur agar rogi pe haath rakkhi to rogi achchha hoy jaai.”
41016019	Ulog se baat kare ke baad, Prabhu Yeeshu ke swarag meñ uṭhaay lewa gay, aur Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ meñ beiṭha hei.
41016020	Aur uske chela log jaay ke sab jagha parchaar karat rahin, aur Prabhu madat karat raha, aur jon chamatkaar ilog karat rahin, usse uske vachan ke majbuut karte gain.
42001001	Pyaare Thiufilus Kaafi log hisṭri likhe ke kosis karin hei jon hamaar beech meñ bhais raha.
42001002	Ulog wahi baat likhin hei jon ham log tak aais hei, i wahi log hei jon sab baat ke suru se jaanin aur parchaar karin hei.
42001003	Yahi kaaran Onrabal Thiufilus ham u sab baat ke achchha se chhaan been kar lia hei aur ab raaiṭ ṭaaim hei ki ham tumhaar khaatir u sab ke weisaiyeñ likhi jeise u sab bhais raha.
42001004	Hamme yahi kare ke hei kaahe ki tum sab jaan jaao ki jon sab ham seekha hei, u sab sachcha hei.
42001005	Jon ṭaaim Heraḍ, Juḍia ke raaja raha wahi ṭaaim Abiyaah ke grup meñ Zekraaya naam ke ek admi raha, aur uske aurat ke naam Elizabeth raha, aur ulog Eran ke palwaar ke rahin.
42001006	U duuno Parmeshwar ke aage dharmi rahin, aur Prabhu ke sab baat aur ruuls ke maanat rahin aur uspe chalat rahin.
42001007	U duuno ke koi laṛkan nai rahin kaahe ke Elizabeth baañjh rahi aur u duuno buḍḍha bhi hoy gay rahin.
42001008	Ek roj Zekraaya aapan paari pe Parmeshwar ke aage kaam karat raha.
42001009	Paadri ke mutaabik huañ ke reeti riwaaj raha ki ek admi ke chuna jaay jon aay ke Mandir meñ roj dhuup jaraay aur yahi kaaran u Mandir meñ gais.
42001010	Aur dhuup jaraay ke ṭaaim sab log bahire khaṛa hoy ke preya karat rahin.
42001011	Wahi ṭaaim Prabhu ke ek ainjal huañ jahañ batti jaraawa jaay hei, uske raaiṭ saaiḍ aay ke khaṛa hoy gais.
42001012	Jab Zekraaya uske dekhis, to ghabraay gay aur ḍare lagis.
42001013	Lekin ainjal usse bolis, “He Zekraaya, ḍaro nai kaahe ke Prabhu tumhaar preya sun lees hei aur tumhaar aurat ek bachcha ke peida kari aur tum uske naam Yuhanna rakkhega.”
42001014	Uske peida hoy se tumme bahut jaada khusi hoi, aur bhi bahut log iske kaaran khusi hoy jaai.
42001015	Prabhu ke aañkhi meñ Yuhanna mahaan hoi, u waain aur daaru nai pee, aur aapan amma ke peṭ meñ se hee Pawitr Aatma se bhar jaai.
42001016	Aur Israayel ke log meñ se bahut se log ke u Prabhu Parmeshwar ke taraf lauṭaay laai.
42001017	U Ilaayja nabi ke aatma aur taagat se Prabhu se bhi aage chala jaai. U laṛkan aur bappa ke milaai aur jon Parmeshwar ke nai maane hei, u sab ke sachcha rasta pe bhi laai aur Prabhu ke waaste uske laayk log ke taiyaar kari.
42001018	Zekraaya ainjal se bolis, “I ham keise jaane sakta hei? Ham to buḍḍha hoy gaya hei, aur hamaar aurat bhi buṛhia hoy gais hei.”
42001019	Ainjal uske jawaab dees, “Ham Gaibrial hei, jon Prabhu ke jagha meñ tumhaar saamne khaṛa hei, aur tum se baat karta hei, aur ham achchha khabar yaane ke susamaachaar sunaay ke waaste bheja gaya hei.
42001020	Lekin tum i sandes pe biswaas nai kara jon raaiṭ ṭaaim pe aai aur sachche hoi. Kaahe ki tum is pe biswaas nai kara, yahi kaaran tum bole nai sakega, aur u roj tak nai bolega jon roj i promis jon ham kara hei, puura nai hoy jaai.”
42001021	I beech jon log bahire khaṛa rahin, u sab Zekraaya ke waiṭ karat rahin aur sochat rahin ki kaahe ke u Mandir meñ etna deri lagaay hei.
42001022	Jab u bahire aais tab bole nai sakis. Ulog jon bahire khaṛa rahin jaan gain ki, Mandir meñ u koi ke darshan paais hei. U sab ke aapan haath se ishaara karat raha, lekin bole nai sakis, kaahe ke u guuñga hoy gais raha.
42001023	Jab Mandir ke kaam khalaas hoy gais, tab Zekraaya ghare lauṭ gais.
42001024	Wahi ṭaaim Elizabeth amma bane waali rahi, aur paañch mahina tak ghar ke bhittar luk ke rahis aur bolat rahi,
42001025	“Prabhu ham pe daya karis hei ki jisse sab log hamaar apmaan nai kare saki.”
42001026	Ek mahina ke baad Parmeshwar ke bagal se Gaibrial ainjal, fir se Galeel ke Naasrat meñ ek sandes le ke kuaari Meri ke lage bheja gais.
42001027	Meri ke mangni Josaf se bhais raha jon Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke raha.
42001028	Ainjal, Meri ke namaste karis aur uske paas aay ke bolis, “Tumme aanand aur jay hoy. Prabhu tumhaar sañghe hei.”
42001029	I baat sun ke Meri ghabraay gais aur soche lagis ki i baat ke matlab kon cheej hei.
42001030	Tab ainjal Meri se bolis, “Ḍaro nai, Prabhu tumse khusi hei.
42001031	Tum maañ bane waali hei aur tumhaar ek laṛka peida hoi. Uske naam tum Yeeshu rakhna.
42001032	U bahut mahaan hoi aur Prabhu Parmeshwar uske bappa Ḍeiviḍ ke raaj gaddi uske dei.
42001033	Aur u Jaykab ke gharaane pe raaj kari. Aur uske raaj ke ant kabhi nai hoi.
42001034	Tab Meri bolis, “I keise hoi? Ham to abhi kuaari hei, aur hamaar abhi saadi bhi nai bhais hei.”
42001035	Tab ainjal bolis, “Pawitr Aatma tum pe aai aur Prabhu ke sakti tumpe hardam rahi aur tumhaar laṛka, Parmeshwar ke laṛka kahaai.
42001036	Aur kaa tumme yaad hei ki tumhaar ek palwaar bhi hei, Elizabeth, jon buṛhia hoy gais hei aur uske ekko laṛkan bhi nai hei? Uske bhi ek laṛka hoi.
42001037	Prabhu sab kuchh kare sake hei, kaahe ki uske khaatir koi kaam kaṛa nai hei.
42001038	“Ham to Prabhu ke daasi hei,” Meri bolis “Weisaiyeñ hoi jeise tum bola hei.” Aur ainjal uske lage se chala gais.
42001039	Thoṛa deri ke baad Meri taiyaar bhais, aur pahaaṛi jagha pe Juḍia ke ek ṭaaun meñ gais.
42001040	U Zekraaya ke ghare jaay ke Elizabeth ke namaste karis.
42001041	Jeise Elizabeth Meri ke namaste sunis weisaiyeñ uske peṭ meñ bachcha kuudis aur Elizabeth, Pawitr Aatma se bhar gais.
42001042	Aur tab u bahut jor se chillaay ke bolis, “Tum sab aurat meñ mahaan hei, aur tum jon bachcha ke peida karegi, u bhi bahut mahaan hoi!
42001043	Aur hamaar sañghe etna baṛa cheej kaahe bhais ki hamaar Prabhu ke amma apne hamaar paas aais hei.
42001044	Jeise hamaar kaan meñ tumhaar namaste sunaais, weisaiyeñ hamaar peṭ meñ bachcha khusi ke maare kuudis.
42001045	Tum dhann hei, jon biswaas karti hei ki Prabhu jon kuchh tum se bolis, u puura hoi.”
42001046	Meri bolis, “Ham aapan dil ke gahraai se Prabhu ke baṛaai karta hei.
42001047	Aur hamme bahut khusi hei ki Prabhu hamme bachaais hei.
42001048	Ham Parmeshwar ke maamuli daasi hei, aur wahi hamaar khayaal rakkhe hei. Abhi se janam janam ke log kahiyeñ ki Prabhu ke daya ham pe hei.
42001049	U bahut taagatwaala Parmeshwar hei, aur hamaar khaatir bahut baṛa baṛa kaam karis hei aur uske naam pawitr hei.
42001050	Jon bhi koi uske weship kare hei, u sab pe hardam aapan daya barsaay hei.
42001051	Aur u aapan etna jaada taagat se ulog ke jon apne aap ke baṛa samjhe hei idhar udhar chhitraay dees.
42001052	Aur jon bahut baṛa raaj chalaay hei, u sab ke nichche utaar ke, aur saadhaaran (humble) log ke ulog ke jagha pe beiṭhaay hei.
42001053	Prabhu bhuuka log ke khaay ke khaatir achchha achchha cheej dees hei. Aur dhani log ke bina kuchh dewe nikaar dees.
42001054	Israayel ke log jon Prabhu ke sewak hei, u sab ke hardam madat kare hei, aur aapan log pe hardam, daya ke najar rakkhe hei.
42001055	I promis Prabhu, hamaar baap-daada Abraham aur uske santaan pe hardam ke waaste karis raha.”
42001056	Elizabeth ke sañghe Meri lagbhag teen mahina tak rahi. Fir u aapan ghare lauṭ gais.
42001057	Jab Elizabeth ke laṛka peida bhais,
42001058	tab uske paṛosi aur palwaar i baat sun ke ki Prabhu uske sañghe daya karis hei, ulog bahut khusi bhain.
42001059	Jab chhoṭa bachcha aaṭh roj ke bhais, tab ulog laṛka ke khatna karaay laain, aur uske naam uske bappa ke naam pe Zekraaya rakkhe maañgis.
42001060	Lekin uske amma bolis, “Nai, iske naam Yuhanna rakkha jaai.”
42001061	Ulog usse bolin, “I keise hoy sake hei, kaahe ki tumhaar palwaar meñ i naam ke koi nai hei.”
42001062	Aur tab uske bappa se ulog ishaara karke puuchhin ki uske laṛka ke kaa naam hoy ke chaahi.
42001063	Tab Zekraaya ek kaagaj aur pen maañgis aur uspe likhis, “Iske naam Yuhanna hei.” Sab koi ghabraay gain.
42001064	Wahi ṭaaim Zekraaya bole laga aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare laga.
42001065	Agal bagal ke log ḍar gain, aur i niuz Juḍia ke sab pahaaṛ waala des meñ feil gais.
42001066	Jon koi bhi i khabar sunis, ulog i bichaar karke bolin, “I laṛka keisan hoi?” Kaahe ki jaruur Prabhu ke haath is pe hei.
42001067	Yuhanna ke bappa Zekraaya, Pawitr Aatma se bhara raha, aur u i bole lagis.
42001068	“Hamme Prabhu ke baṛaai kare ke hei, jon Israayel ke log ke Parmeshwar hei! U aapan log ke madat ke khaatir aur ulog ke chhoṛaay aais hei.
42001069	U hamaar waaste ek bahut baṛa bachaay waala ke dees hei, jon uske naukar Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke hei.
42001070	U aapan pawitr nabi ke madat se puraana jamaana meñ, bolis raha
42001071	ki u ham sab ke hamaar dusman se bachaai, jon ham se dusmani rakkhe hei.
42001072	Ki u hamaar baap daada pe daya karke aapan pawitr promis ke yaad karaai.
42001073	Aur u hamaar bappa Abraham se bhi bataais raha, ki u hamaar dusman se hamme chhoṛaay lei aur ham bina ḍar ke uske kaam meñ laga rahega,
42001075	ki jisse ham uske saamne pawitrta aur achchha se, jindagi bhar rahi.”
42001076	“Aur tum, he beṭa, sab se baṛa Parmeshwar ke nabi kahaayga. Tum Prabhu ke rasta taiyaar kare aaya hei aur uske aage aage chalega.
42001077	Aur sab log ke bataayga ki jab ulog ke paap se maafi mili, ulog aapan aapan paap se bache saki.
42001078	Hamaar Parmeshwar to bahut dayaalu aur meharbaan hei. Wahi ke kaaran hamaar uupar sabere ke suuraj ke rakam roshni hoi
42001079	ki añdhiyaar aur maut ke saaya meñ beiṭhe waala log ke roshni de saki, aur hamaar goṛ saanti ke rasta pe seedha chalaai.”
42001080	U laṛka dekhe meñ aur aatma se bahut taagatwaala hote gais. Aur Israayel ke saamne aay waala roj tak ḍezaṭ meñ raha.
42002001	U ṭaaim Maharaaja Ogastas sab ke noṭis bhejis ki des ke sab log gina jaay.
42002002	Is se pahile log tab gina gain raha, jab Quirinius, Siria ke gavna raha.
42002003	Aur sab log naam likhaay ke waaste aapan aapan ṭaaun chala gain.
42002004	Josaf, jon Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke raha, aur jon Naasrat jon Galeel meñ hei, huañ se aapan gaaoñ Bethlaham gais.
42002005	Uske sañghe uske mañgetar, Meri jon maañ banewaali rahi bhi naam likhaay ke waaste gais.
42002006	Aur jab ulog Bethlaham meñ rahin, bachcha ke peida hoy ke ṭaaim hoy gais.
42002007	Aur u wahiñ pe aapan pahila bachcha peida karis, aur uske kapṛa meñ lapeṭ ke charni meñ jahañ jaanwar rahe hei, huañ rakkhis, kaahe ke huañ ke sab hoṭel bhar gais raha aur ekko jagha nai raha.
42002008	Wahi des meñ kuchh bheṛa charaay waala log rahin jon raat ke khet meñ rahe ke aapan bheṛa ke pahra det rahin.
42002009	Wahi ṭaaim Prabhu ke ek ainjal ulog ke lage aais aur ulog ke uppar Prabhu ke laaiṭ chamkis. Ulog ḍar gais rahin.
42002010	Lekin ainjal bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Ham hiañ achchha khabar leke aaya hei, jon tum sab log meñ khusi laai.
42002011	Aaj, Ḍeiviḍ ke ṭaaun meñ tumhaar waaste ek tumme bachaay waala ke janam bhais hei, aur yahi Prabhu Maseeh hei!
42002012	Aur ham tumme uske pata bataayga. Tum ek laṛka jon kapṛa meñ lapṭaan tumme charni (jon meñ jaanwar graas khaawe hei) meñ mili, wahi hei”
42002013	Wahi lage ainjal ke ek jhunḍ swarag se huañ aais aur Prabhu ke jayjaykaar kare lagis.
42002014	“Swarag pe Parmeshwar ke jay! Hiañ dharti pe u admi log ke jon log se u khusi hei, u sab ke saanti mile!”
42002015	Jab ainjals chala gais tab bheṛa ke charaay waala log bolin, “Aao chalo, Bethlaham chalo, aur jon baat ke baare meñ Prabhu hamme bataais hei, uske dekh ke aai.”
42002016	Wahi lage ulog chal paṛin, aur huañ pahuñch ke Meri, Josaf aur charni meñ leṭa baibi ke dekhin.
42002017	Jab bheṛa charaay waala log Yeeshu ke dekh leen to uske amma bappa ke u baat bataain jon baat ainjal bachcha ke baare meñ u sab se bataay rahin.
42002018	Sab koi u baat sunin, aur achambha karin.
42002019	Lekin Meri sab baat man meñ rakh ke soche lagis ki u sab ke kaa matlab hoy sake hei.
42002020	Aur bheṛa charaay waala log ke jeise bataawa gais raha, wahi rakam sab kuchh dekh ke aur sun ke, Parmeshwar ke jayjaykaar karte lauṭ gain.
42002021	Aṭhwa roj, bachcha ke khatna ke ṭaaim aais, aur uske naam Yeeshu rakkha gais, jeise ki ainjal uske peida hoy se pahile bataais raha.
42002022	Ab ṭaaim aay gais raha ki Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, Josaf aur Meri ke suddhi waala sanskaar karwaay ke raha. Ulog bachcha ke Yarushalam le gain aur Prabhu ke aage laain.
42002023	Jeise Prabhu ke vachan, bole hei, “Sab pahila laṛka Prabhu ke khaatir hoy hei.”
42002024	Prabhu ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, kabuttar ke ek joṛa, ya uske dui bachcha laay ke chaṛhaay ke rahe hei. Josaf aur Meri bhi wahi karin.
42002025	Wahi ṭaaim Yarushalam meñ Simion naam ke ek admi raha. U Prabhu ke bhakt aur dharmi admi raha, aur Israayel meñ log ke bache ke rasta dekhat raha. Prabhu ke Aatma uspe raha.
42002026	Aur uske bataawa gais raha ki jab tak u Prabhu Maseeh ke dekh nai lei, tab tak u nai mari.
42002027	Tab Pawitr Aatma ke aguaai meñ Simion Mandir meñ gais. Wahi ṭaaim baalak Yeeshu ke uske maañ baap Mandir meñ le ke aain kaahe ki huañ ke reeti ke mutaabik u sab kare ke raha.
42002028	Simion uske aapan godi meñ le lees aur Parmeshwar ke dhanbaad deke bolis,
42002029	“He Prabhu hamme saanti se mare deo kaahe ke ham to tumhaar naukar hei, aur tum aapan promis ham se puura kar dia hei.
42002030	Ham aapan aañkhi se dekha hei, ki tum aapan log ke bachaay ke waaste, kon kon cheej kara hei!
42002031	I sab tum sab des ke log ke saamne taiyaar kara hei, ki ulog bhi dekh le.
42002032	Ki jisse tumhaar i roshni, aur sab des ke khaatir, ujaala dei aur, tumhaar log Israayel pe mahima laai.”
42002033	Yeeshu ke amma bappa hairaan rahe gain ki Simion uske baare meñ kaa bolis raha.
42002034	Tab u uske aasheesh deke, Meri se bolis, “Dekho, i laṛka Israayel meñ bahut log ke khaatir chetaaoni hei ki keise ulog uṭhi aur giri, aur ulog iske pichchhe iske baare meñ bahut baat kari.
42002035	Aur Meri tumme to eise sahe ke paṛi jeise ki tumme koi talwaar se maare hei aur tumme bahut choṭ lage hei. Tumhaar dil to ekdam ṭuuṭ jaai, lekin wahi ṭaaim ilog ke dimaag meñ jon baat hei u sab bahire aai.”
42002036	Wahi ṭaaim Ena nabi bhi wahi Mandir meñ rahi. U Asher palwaar ke Fanuel ke laṛki rahi, aur buṛhia hoy gais raha. U khali saat saal tak saadi suda jeewan bitaais.
42002037	U ṭaaim u chauraasi (84) saal ke bidhwa rahis. Aur u hardam Mandir meñ hee rahat rahi, aur upwaas aur preya kar ke raat aur din Parmeshwar ke bhajan gaawat rahi.
42002038	Wahi ṭaaim u aay ke Prabhu ke dhanbaad dees aur jon log Prabhu se Yarushalam ke khaatir chhuṭkaara maañgat rahin, u sab se baalak Yeeshu ke baare meñ bataais.
42002039	Jab Josaf aur Meri Prabhu ke kaanuun ke mutaabik sab kaam kar leen, tab ulog Galeel meñ aapan ghare Naasrat lauṭ gain.
42002040	Baalak Yeeshu baṛa aur taagatwaala hote gais, aur u buddhi se baṛhte chala gais. Parmeshwar ke aasheesh uspe raha.
42002041	Yeeshu ke amma bappa har saal, Yarushalam meñ fasah ke, teohaar meñ jaawa karat rahin.
42002042	Jab Yeeshu baarah saal ke bhais, tab teohaar ke reeti ke mutaabik, ulog Yarushalam gain.
42002043	Jab teohaar khalaas hoy gais, tab ulog aapan ghare chal paṛin, lekin baalak Yeeshu wahiñ rahe gais, lekin uske amma bappa ke i baat ke pata nai raha.
42002044	Ulog to i samjhat rahin ke Yeeshu aur sab log ke sañghe hei. Din bhar chale ke baad ulog Yeeshu ke aapan palwaar aur dost meñ khoje lagin.
42002045	Lekin ulog jab uske nai paain tab uske khojte khojte Yarushalam lauṭ gain.
42002046	Teen roj baad ulog uske Mandir meñ parchaar kare waala log ke beech meñ beiṭha aur, sawaal puuchhte paain.
42002047	Aur jon jon log uske sawaal aur jawaab sunat rahin, ulog uske samajh se hairaan rahin.
42002048	Uske amma bappa bhi uske huañ dekh ke achambha kare lagin, aur uske amma usse bolis, “E beṭa, tum hamaar sañghe eise kaahe ke kara? Tumhaar bappa aur ham to bahut ghabraay gay raha aur tumme bahut khojat bhi raha.”
42002049	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum hamme kaahe ke khojat raha? Kaa tum i nai janta ki hamme hamaar Pita ke ghar meñ rahe ke jaruuri hei?”
42002050	Lekin ulog uske jawaab ke nai samjhin.
42002051	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe Naasrat lauṭ aais, aur ulog ke sab baat sune lagis. Uske amma i sab baat aapan man meñ rakkhis aur hardam uske baare meñ sochat rahi.
42002052	Aur Yeeshu waais aur taagatwaala hoy gais. Parmeshwar aur manush usse khusi raha.
42003001	Pandra (15) saal tak Raaja Tibiriyaas u jagha pe raaj karis, aur Pontias Paaylaṭ, Juḍia ke gavna raha, aur Galeel meñ Heraḍ raaja raha, aur uske bhaiya bhi, Filip, Ituria aur Trakhonitis meñ Lusiyaas, Abilene meñ raaj karat rahin,
42003002	Enas aur Keifa baṛa paadri rahin, aur u ṭaaim Parmeshwar ke vachan, ḍezaṭ meñ Zekraaya ke laṛka Yuhanna tak pahuñchis.
42003003	Joḍan ke agal bagal ke sab jagha pe aay ke, Yuhanna parchaar karis. U bolis, “Aapan paap se ghuum jaao, aur baptisma le leo, aur Prabhu tumhaar sab paap ke maaf kari.”
