42003004	Jeise Aayzaaya nabi ke buk meñ likhaan hei, “Ḍezaṭ meñ koi bolaay hei, ‘Prabhu ke rasta taiyaar karo, Uske khaatir sab rasta seedha banaao.
42003005	Sab gaḍḍha bhar deo, Sab pahaaṛ baraabar kar deo, Tirchha rasta ke bhi seedha kar deo, Ṭehṛa mehṛa rasta bhi chikkan kar deo.
42003006	Aur tab sab koi, Parmeshwar ke uddhaar dekhi.”‘
42003007	Aur fir bheeṛ pe bheeṛ uske lage baptisma le aay lagin, lekin Yuhanna u sab se bolis, “He saañp ke bachcha log. Kon tumme saaodhaan karis ki Prabhu ke krodh aay waala hei, usse duur bhaago?
42003008	Tum sab, kuchh eise karo ki dekhaai ki tum aapan paap se pachhtaata hei. Aur aapan log se i nai bolo ki Abraham tumhaar bappa hei. Kaahe ki ham tumme bataata hei, ki Parmeshwar i patthar meñ se Abraham ke waaste laṛkan peida kare sake hei.
42003009	Peṛ ke kaaṭe ke waaste ṭañgaari taiyaar hei. Koi peṛ jon achchha fal nai de hei, uske kaaṭ dewa jaai aur aagi meñ jhok dewa jaai.
42003010	Sab log usse puuchhin, “Tab ab ham kon cheej kari?”
42003011	Yuhanna jawaab dees, “Tum meñ se jiske paas dui sheṭ hei, usman se ek uske de deo jiske paas nai hei. Agar tumhaar lage khaana hei tab uske bhi usse baaṭ lo jiske paas khaay ke waaste kuchh bhi nai hei.”
42003012	Kuchh ṭeks baṭore waala log bhi baptisma lewe aais, aur puuchhin, “He guru, hamme kon cheej kare ke hei?”
42003013	U bolis, “Jetna tumhaar hei, khali otne leo, usse jaada nai.”
42003014	Kuchh saulja log bhi usse puuchhis, “Bataao, hamme kon cheej kare ke hei?” Tab u ulog se bolis, “Koi se jabarjasti, peisa nai lena, ya koi pe jhuuṭṭe ke dos nai lagaana. Jetna kamaata hei wahi se khusi rahna.”
42003015	Sab log ke man meñ aasra hoy lagis ki kahiñ Yuhanna to Maseeha nai hei.
42003016	Yuhanna u sab se tab bolis, “Ham to tum log ke khali paani se baptisma deta hei, lekin u jon aay waala hei, u ham se bahut taagatwaala hei. Ham to i laayk bhi nai hei ki uske juuta ke bañdhan ke kholi. U to tum sab ke Pawitr Aatma aur aagi se baptisma dei.
42003017	Uske suup uske haath meñ hei, jon se u fasal ke achchha se safa kari aur geñhu ke godaam meñ baṭori, lekin bhuusi ke u aagi meñ jaraay dei jon kabhi bhi bute nai saki.”
42003018	Bahut rakam se u sab koi ke paaṭh paṛhaay ke achchha khabar yaane ki susamaachaar sunaat raha aur kosis karat raha ki sab koi aapan aapan rasta badal lei.
42003019	Lekin Rula Heraḍ jon aapan bhaiya ke aurat Herodiaas se saadi kar lees raha, u bahut kharaab kharaab kaam bhi karis raha, uske Yuhanna ḍaaṭis.
42003020	Tab Heraḍ, ek aur usse bhi kharaab kaam karis. U Yuhanna ke jel meñ bhejwaay dees.
42003021	Jab sab koi baptisma le leen aur Yeeshu bhi baptisma leke preya karat raha, tab asmaan khul gais.
42003022	Aur kabuttar ke ruup meñ Pawitr Aatma Yeeshu pe utris. Asmaan se ek awaaj sunaay dees, “Tum hamaar pyaara laṛka hei, aur ham tum se khusi hei.”
42003023	Jab Yeeshu parchaar suru karis, tab u kareeban tees (30) saal ke raha. Sab ke samajh meñ raha ki u Josaf ke laṛka hei. Lekin uske palwaar to Eli se raha,
42003024	jon Mattaat ke, aur u jon Levi ke, aur u jon Malki ke, aur u Jannai ke, aur u Josaf ke,
42003025	aur u jon Matityaah ke, aur u Amos ke, aur u Nahum ke, aur u Esli ke, aur u Naggai ke,
42003026	aur u Maat ke, aur u Matityaah ke, aur u Semein ke, aur u Josekh ke, aur u Joda ke,
42003027	aur u Joanan ke, aur u Rhesa ke, aur u Zarubbabel ke, aur u Shaaltiyal ke, aur u Neri ke,
42003028	aur u Melki ke, aur u Addi ke, aur u Kosaam ke, aur u Elmadam ke, aur u Yer ke,
42003029	aur u Joshua ke, aur u Elieza ke, aur u Joreem ke, aur u Mattaat ke, aur u Levi ke,
42003030	aur u Simion ke, aur u Juḍa ke, aur u Josaf ke, aur u Jonam ke, aur u Ilyaakim ke,
42003031	aur u Melea ke, aur u Menna ke, aur u Mattaat ke, aur Nathan ke, aur u Ḍeiviḍ ke,
42003032	aur u Jesse ke, aur u Obed ke, aur u Boaz ke, aur u Salmon ke, aur u Nahshon ke,
42003033	aur u Ameenaadaab ke, Admin ke, aur Arni ke, aur u Hesron ke, aur u Perez ke, aur u Juḍa ke,
42003034	aur u Jaykab ke, aur u Aayzak ke, aur u Abraham ke, aur u Terah ke, aur u Nahor ke,
42003035	aur u Serug ke, aur u Reu ke, aur u Peleg ke, aur u Eber ke, aur u Shelah ke,
42003036	aur u Kenaan ke, aur u Arafyaad ke, aur u Shem ke, aur u Noa ke, aur u Limik ke,
42003037	aur u Mathushilah ke, aur u Enok ke, aur u Jared ke, aur u Mahallel ke, aur u Kenan ke,
42003038	aur u Enosh ke, aur u Shet ke. Yeeshu ke palwaar Eiḍam se leke, Parmeshwar tak ke raha.
42004001	Jab Yeeshu Pawitr Aatma se bhar ke, Joḍan nadi se lauṭis, tab Aatma uske ḍezaṭ meñ le gais.
42004002	Aur chaalis (40) roj tak saitaan uske ṭesṭ karte raha. Otna roj tak u kuchh bhi nai khaais aur chaalis roj ke baad uske bahut jor se bhuuk lagis.
42004003	Saitaan Yeeshu se bolis, “Agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei to i patthar se bolo ki roṭi ban jaay.”
42004004	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Admi khali khaana se jinda nai rahe sake.”‘
42004005	Tab saitaan uske uucha jagha le gais aur ek minaṭ meñ dunia dekhaay dees.
42004006	Aur tab u bolis, “Ham tumme raaj ke chamak dhamak aur raaj kare ke hak dega. I sab hamme dewa gais hei, aur ham jiske maañgega uske de dega.
42004007	Khali tum hamaar weship karo, i sab tumhaar hoy jaai.”
42004008	Yeeshu bolis, “Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Prabhu, aapan Parmeshwar ke weship karo, aur khali wahi ke sewa karo!”
42004009	Tab saitaan Yeeshu ke Yarushalam le gais aur Mandir ke sab se uucha jagha pe khaṛa kar dees, aur bolis, “Agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei to apne aap ke hiañ se nichche giraao.
42004010	Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Parmeshwar aapan ainjals ke bataai, ki u tumhaar dekh bhaal kare. Ulog tumme haato haath uṭhaay lei, ki jisse tumhaar goṛ ke bhi patthar se choṭ nai lage.’ ”
42004012	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ i bhi likhaan hei ki ‘Tum aapan Prabhu Parmeshwar ke ṭesṭ nai karo.’ ”
42004013	Jab saitaan Yeeshu ke sab ṭesṭ kar lees, tab thoṛa deri ke waaste uske chhoṛ dees.
42004014	Tab Yeeshu, Pawitr Aatma se bharke Galeel lauṭ gais. Sab jagha uske baare meñ niuz feil gais.
42004015	Aur u ulog ke chech meñ parchaar kare laga, aur sab log uske baṛaai kare lagin.
42004016	Ab Yeeshu, Naasrat lauṭis jahañ u baṛa bhais raha, aur aapan reeti ke mutaabik, sabat ke roj chech meñ gais. U Baaibal paṛhe ke waaste khaṛa bhais, aur uske Aayzaaya ke buk paṛhe ke bataawa gais. U buk ke khol ke, u paaṭh nikaaris jahañ likhaan raha,
42004018	“Prabhu ke Aatma ham pe hei, kaahe ke u hamme chunis hei, ki ham, sab gareeb tak achchha khabar sunaai. Aur hamme i kaaran bheja gais hei ki jon bañdi hei, ham u sab ke chhuṛaai, añdha log ke aañkhi dei, aur jon sab ke nichche dabaawa gais hei u sab ke chhoṛaay lei
42004019	aur sab ke i bataai ke ṭaaim aay gais hei jab Prabhu aapan log ke bachaai.”
42004020	Tab Yeeshu buk bañd kar ke ek kaam kare waala ke haath meñ de ke beiṭh gais. Mandir meñ sab log ke aañkhi wahi pe laga rahis.
42004021	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jeise tum sab hamme paṛhte suna hei, weisaiyeñ aaj Baaibal ke i paaṭh puura bhais hei.”
42004022	Sab log hairaan hoy gain, aur achambha kare lagin ki u keise etna achchha achchha baat kare hei. Ulog bolis, “Kaa i Josaf ke laṛka nai hei?”
42004023	Yeeshu tab ulog se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki tum i kahaawat ham se jaruur bolega, ‘E ḍokṭa pahile apne aap ke achchha karo.’ Aur i bhi bolega ki jon kaam tum Kafarnahuum meñ kara hei, aapan des meñ bhi karo.”
42004024	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, Ham tumme sachche bataata hei, “Koi nabi aapan des meñ aadar nai paay hei.
42004025	Hamaar suno, i baat sachche hei ki Ilaayja ke ṭaaim meñ, jab teen aur aadha saal tak des meñ paani nai barsa raha, aur bahut suukha paṛa raha tab Israayel meñ bahut bidhwa rahin.
42004026	Lekin Ilaayja ke usman se sab ke paas nai, khali Seida ke Saarfat meñ ekke bidhwa ke paas bheja gais raha.
42004027	Aur Israayel meñ bhi bhawish bataay waala Elisha ke ṭaaim bahut log ke koṛhi ke bimaari raha lekin Siria ke Naaman ke chhoṛ ke aur koi achchha nai bhais.”
42004028	I sab sune ke baad chech meñ jetna log rahin, ulog gussaay gain.
42004029	Ulog sab khaṛa hoy gais, aur Yeeshu ke ghaseeṭ ke ṭaaun se bahire jon pahaaṛ pe u ṭaaun raha, wahi ke choṭi pe uske le gain. Ulog wahiñ se uske nichche giraay maañgat rahin,
42004030	lekin Yeeshu ulog ke beech meñ se nikar gais.
42004031	Huañ se Yeeshu, Galeel ke Kafarnahuum ṭaaun meñ gais, aur sabat ke roj log ke sikhaay laga.
42004032	Uske sikhaay se sab log chakit hoy gain, kaahe ki u adhikaar se sikhaat raha.
42004033	Wahi Mandir meñ ek aur admi raha jisman dushṭ aatma raha, u jor se chillaay ke bolis,
42004034	“E Naasrat ke Yeeshu, tum ham se kaa mañgta hei? Kaa tum hamme naas kare ke waaste aaya hei? Ham janta hei ki tum kon hei! Tum Parmeshwar ke pawitr jan hei.”
42004035	Tab Yeeshu u aatma ke ḍaaṭis, “Chup hoy jaao, aur u admi se bahire nikar jaao!” Tab dushṭ aatma, bina kuchh bigaaṛe, u admi ke beech meñ paṭak ke chala gais.
42004036	I baat pe sab koi chakit rahe gain aur ek dusra se bole lagin, “I keisan vachan hei? Adhikaar se i admi dushṭ aatma ke hukum de hei aur u bhi nikar ke bhaag jaay hei!”
42004037	Aur puura des meñ Yeeshu ke i kaam ke niuz feil lagis.
42004038	U Mandir se uṭh ke Saayman ke ghare chala gais, jahañ pe uske saas bahut tej bukhaar se kaapat rahi, aur Saayman uske baare meñ Yeeshu se binti karis.
42004039	Yeeshu jaay ke uske lage khaṛa hoy gais aur bukhaar ke ḍaaṭis tab bukhaar utar gais aur u uṭh ke sab ke sewa kare lagis.
42004040	Suuraj ke ḍuube pe, bahut rakam ke rogi Yeeshu ke aage laawa gais, aur u ek ek pe haath rakh ke sab ke ṭheek kar dees.
42004041	Dushṭ aatma bhi chillaay ke bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei!” Aur u sab log meñ se nikar gais. Aur Yeeshu ulog ke ḍaaṭis, aur ulog ke bole ke mauka nai dees ki u Maseeha hei.
42004042	Sabere hote Yeeshu ṭaaun chhoṛ ke ek suunsaan jagha pe gais. Sab log uske khoje lagin, aur jab paain to uske jaay se roke lagin.
42004043	Lekin Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Hamme aur bhi jagha Parmeshwar ke raaj ke vachan sunaay ke hei, kaahe ke yahi khaatir hamme bheja gais hei.”
42004044	Aur tab u Galeel ke chech meñ parchaar kare lagis.
42005001	Ek roj Yeeshu Ganesarat laik ke kinaare khaṛa hoy ke, Parmeshwar ke vachan sunaat raha, jab bheeṛ uspe gir paṛis.
42005002	U dekhis ki laik ke kinaare dui bauṭ lagis hei, aur machhua log usman se utar ke jaal dhowat rahin.
42005003	Yeeshu, Saayman ke bauṭ pe chaṛh ke usse bolis ki uske laik ke kinaare se thoṛa duur pe le chale. Yeeshu bauṭ meñ beiṭh gais, aur sab ke sikhaay laga.
42005004	Jab Yeeshu baat kar lees, tab u Saayman se bolis, “Ab gahira paani meñ chalo, aur machhri pakṛe ke waaste jaal ḍaaro.”
42005005	Saayman bolis, “E Prabhu, ham sab to raat bhar mehnat kara, lekin kuchh nai pakṛa. Fir bhi jab tum bolta hei to ham jaal ḍaarega.”
42005006	Ulog weisaiyeñ karis aur etna jaada machhri jaal meñ aay gais ki jaal faṭe waala raha.
42005007	Ulog aapan saathi log ke jon dusra bauṭ meñ rahin, ishaara kar ke bolaain, ki aay ke ulog ke madat kare. Ulog aay ke duuno bauṭ meñ etna machhri bharin ki bauṭ ḍuube laga.
42005008	Jab Saayman Peeṭa i dekhis, to u Yeeshu ke goṛ pe gir paṛis aur bolis, “E Prabhu, hamaar lage se chala jaao, ham ek paapi admi hei!”
42005009	Peeṭa ke saathi jab dekhin ki ulog etna jaada machhri pakaṛ leen hei, tab ulog hairaan hoy gain.
42005010	Uske aur saathi, Zabdi ke laṛka Jeims aur Yuhanna bhi hairaan bhain. Tab Yeeshu, Saayman se bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Ab se tum machhri ke badle admi pakṛega.”
42005011	Ulog bauṭ ke kinaare le aain aur sab kuchh chhoṛ ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy leen.
42005012	Ek dafe Yeeshu ek ṭaaun meñ aais jahañ ek admi raha, jiske koṛhi ke bimaari raha. U Yeeshu ke jeise dekhis, weise jameen pe gir paṛis aur binti kare lagis, “E Prabhu, agar tum maañgo to hamme achchha kare sakta hei.”
42005013	Yeeshu haath aage baṛhaay ke uske chhuis, aur bolis, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum achchha hoy jaao.” Aur wahi lage u koṛhi achchha hoy gais.
42005014	Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Iske baare meñ koi se nai bataana, lekin seedha aapan paadri ke lage jaao, aur apne aap ke dekhaao. Tab gawaahi ke khaatir, ki tum achchha hoy gaya hei, Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, balidaan chaṛhraao.”
42005015	Lekin Yeeshu jon cheej karis raha, i khabar bahut jor se sab bagal feil gais, aur bheeṛ pe bheeṛ uske sune ke khaatir aur achchha hoy ke waaste aay lagin.
42005016	Lekin Yeeshu ek suunsaan jagha jaay ke akele meñ preya kare lagis.
42005017	Ek roj Yeeshu parchaar karat raha, aur kuchh Farisi log aur kaanuun ke agua log huañ beiṭha rahin. Ulog Galeel aur Juḍia ke kona kona se aur Yarushalam se aain raha. Changa kare ke waaste Yeeshu pe Parmeshwar ke sakti raha.
42005018	Kuchh log, ek admi ke jiske lakwa maaris raha, ek khaṭia pe uṭhaay ke Yeeshu ke saamne ghar ke bhittar laay maañgat rahin.
42005019	Lekin bahut bheeṛ ke kaaran, ulog uske Yeeshu ke lage nai laay paain. Aur tab, ulog uske khaṭia sahit ruuf pe le gain aur ruuf ukhaaṛ ke, ghar meñ bheeṛ ke beecho beech, Yeeshu ke saamne utaar deen.
42005020	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke biswaas dekh ke bolis, “E dost, tumhaar paap maaf hoy gais hei.”
42005021	Tab huañ ke baṛkue aur Farisi log ek dusra se baat biwaad kare lagin, “I kon hei jon Parmeshwar ke ninda kare hei! Khali Parmeshwar hamaar paap ke maaf kare sake hei.”
42005022	Yeeshu to u sab ke bichaar jaanat raha aur ulog se bolis, “I rakam ke baat kaahe sochta hei?
42005023	I bole ke sahaj hei, ‘Tumhaar paap ke maafi mil gais hei,’ ya i bole ke, ‘uṭho aur chalo firo!’
42005024	Lekin ab tum dekhega ki Manush ke laṛka ke lage bhi, dharti pe paap ke maafi dewe ke adhikaar hei.” Aur tab u jiske lakwa maaris raha, u admi se bolis, “Ham tum se bolta hei, aapan khaṭia uṭhaao aur ghare jaao!”
42005025	Wahi lage u admi sab ke aage uṭhis, aur aapan khaṭia uṭhaay ke Prabhu ke baṛaai karte aapan ghare chala gais.
42005026	Sab koi takte rahe gain aur Prabhu ke naam lete, ḍar se bole lagin, “I keisan chamatkaar hamme aaj dekhe ke mila hei!”
42005027	Iske baad Yeeshu bahire gais aur ṭeks baṭorewaala Levi ke dekhis, u aapan ofis meñ beiṭha raha. Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe aao.”
42005028	Levi sab kuchh chhoṛ ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees.
42005029	Tab Levi, Yeeshu ke khaatir aapan ghar pe ek baṛa paaṭi rakkhis. Mehmaan bahut rahin, jisman bahut ṭeks baṭorewaala bhi rahin.
42005030	Bahut Farisi aur paṛha likha log jon huañ rahin, Yeeshu ke chela log pe kurkuraain, “Tum sab kaahe ke ṭeks baṭorewaala log aur paapi log ke sañghe khaata peeta hei?”
42005031	Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Jon admi ke kuchh bimaari nai hei, uske ḍokṭa ke jaruurat nai hei, lekin ulog ke hei jon bimaar hei.
42005032	Ham dharam pe chalewaala log ke nai lekin paapi log ke bachaay ke waaste aaya hei.”
42005033	Kuchh log Yeeshu se bolis, “Yuhanna ke chela log hardam upwaas karat rahin aur preya bhi karat rahin, aur Farisi log ke chela bhi wahi kare hei, lekin tumhaar chela log khaay piye hei.”
42005034	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jab tak baraati log dulha ke sañghe rahe hei, bina khaay piye nai rahe hei.
42005035	Lekin jab ṭaaim aai aur u huañ se uṭhaay lewa jaai, tab ulog upwaas kari.”
42005036	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaawat sunaais, “Tum nawa kameez ke faaṛ ke puraana kameez pe chakti nai lagaata. Agar tum lagaayga to, tum nawa ke bhi faaṛ dega aur u puraana meñ bhi mil nai paai.
42005037	Aur koi nawa waain, puraana waain ke beg meñ nai bhari, kaahe ke nawa waain, puraana waain ke beg ke faaṛ ke bahe jaai, aur waain ke beg bhi naas hoy jaai.
42005038	Lekin nawa waain nawa beg meñ bhare ke chaahi!
42005039	Aur koi bhi puraana waain piye ke baad nawa waain nai piye maañgi. Ulog bole hei, ‘Puraana waain hee achchha hei!”‘
42006001	Ek sabat ke roj jab Yeeshu aur uske chela log geñhu ke khet se hoy ke jaawat rahin, tab chela log kuchh geñhu tuuṛ ke, haath se mal ke khaay lagin.
42006002	Kuchh Farisi log puuchhis, “Sabat ke roj kaahe ke geñhu tuuṛta hei? Tumme i nai kare ke chaahi.”
42006003	Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tum i nai paṛha ki Ḍeiviḍ aapan saathi ke khaatir, jab ulog bhuuka rahin, tab kon cheej karis raha?
42006004	U Prabhu ke ghar meñ jaay ke jon bheñṭ huañ chaṛhaawa gais raha, aur jon khali paadri khaay sakat raha, usman se kuchh uṭhaay ke apne khaais, aur aapan sab saathi log ke khawaais.”
42006005	Yeeshu bolis, “Manush ke laṛka, sabat ke roj ke bhi Prabhu hei.”
42006006	Ek dusra sabat ke roj, Yeeshu chech meñ parchaar karat raha, huañ pe ek apaahij admi bhi raha, jiske raaiṭ haath nai chalat raha.
42006007	Kuchh paṛha likha agua log aur Farisi log i taak meñ rahin ki kab Yeeshu u admi ke ṭheek kare. Ulog uspe dos lagaay ke mauka khojat rahin.
42006008	Yeeshu to ulog ke bichaar jaanat raha. Tab u admi se bolis ki u khaṛa hoy jaay ki jisse sab koi uske dekhe sake. Aur u admi khaṛa hoy gais.
42006009	Tab Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Sabat ke roj kon cheej achchha hei? Ham achchha kaam kari ki kharaab kaam? Kaa ham koi ke jaan bachaai ki naas kari?”
42006010	Aur u sab bagal dekh ke u admi se bolis, “Aapan haath baṛhaao.” U haath baṛhaais aur ekdam ṭheek hoy gais.
42006011	Paṛha likha agua log aur Farisi gussaay gain aur ek dusra se bole lagin, “Ham Yeeshu ke sañghe kon cheej kari?”
42006012	U ṭaaim Yeeshu pahaaṛ pe preya kare nikris, aur puura raat wahiñ bitaais.
42006013	Dusra roj sabere u aapan chela log ke aapan lage bolaais, aur usman se baarah ke aapan parchaar kare waala chunis.
42006014	Usman se ek Saayman raha, jiske naam Yeeshu, Peeṭa rakkhis. Dusra Peeṭa ke bhaiya, Enḍru raha. Aur ulog ke sañghe Jeims, Yuhanna, Filip, Bartimaais,
42006015	Methiu, Thomas aur Halfai ke laṛka Jeims rahin. Baaki parchaarak meñ Saayman, jon Jelotes kahaat raha,
42006016	aur Jeims ke laṛka Juḍ aur Juḍas Iskariyoti, jon dhoka se Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaais raha.
42006017	Jab Yeeshu aapan sab parchaarak log ke sañghe nichche aais, tab ek baraabar jagha khoj ke u aapan chela log ke beech meñ khaṛa hoy gais. Huañ pe bahut bheeṛ raha kaahe ke log puura Juḍia, Yarushalam, Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida ke samundar ke kinaare se aain raha.
42006018	Ulog Yeeshu ke parchaar sune ke waaste, aur aapan aapan bimaari se ṭheek hoy ke waaste huañ pe aain raha. Dushṭ aatma se jon log sataawa gain raha, u bhi ṭheek hoy gain.
42006019	Sab koi Yeeshu ke chhue maañgat rahin, kaahe ke usman se sakti nikar ke sab ke achchha karat raha.
42006020	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke taraf dekhis aur bolis, “Dhann hei tum jon gareeb hei, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar hei!
42006021	“Dhann hei tum log, jon bhuuka hei, kaahe ke tumhaar peṭ bhara jaai! “Dhann hei tum log, jon abhi rota hei, kaahe ke tum sab hasega!
42006022	“Tum log bhi dhann hei, jab Manush ke laṛka ke kaaran, log tumme haiṭ kari, aur tum sab se dusmani lei, tumme nikaar dei, aur tumhaar ninda kari, lekin Parmeshwar tumhaar bhala kari.
42006023	Khusi hona jab i sab hoi, khusi se kuudna, kaahe ke tumhaar waaste swarag meñ sab se baṛa inaam rakkha hei. Kaahe ki ulog ke baap daada log bhi nabi log ke sañghe yahi karin raha.
42006024	Tum pe taras hei, jon dhani hei, kaahe ke tumhaar saanti tumme mil gais hei!
42006025	Tum pe bhi taras khaata hei, jiske peṭ bhara hei, kaahe ke tum bhuuka rahega! Haay tum pe, jon abhi hase hei, kaahe ke tum royga!
42006026	Haay tum pe, jab sab log tumme achchha boli, kaahe ke ulog ke baap daada bhi jhuuṭa nabi log ke sañghe eisehiyeñ karis raha.
42006027	“Lekin tum, jon sune sake hei, ham usse bolta hei. Aapan dusman se prem karo, jon tum se dusmani kare hei, uske bhi bhala karo,
42006028	jon tumme saraapi, uske tum aasheesh dena, aur jon tumhaar buraai kari, uske khaatir preya karo.
42006029	Agar koi tumhaar ek gaal pe thappaṛ maari, to tum uske aapan dusra gaal bhi deo, agar koi tumhaar paijaama chheen le, to tum uske aapan kurta le se bhi nai rokna.
42006030	Jon koi tum se kuchh maañge, tum uske de deo aur agar tum se koi kuchh chheen le, to usse fir lauṭ ke nai mañgna.
42006031	Tum jeise mañgta hei, ki log tumhaar sañghe kare, weisaiyeñ tum ulog ke sañghe bhi karo.”
42006032	“Agar tum wahi se prem karega, jon tum se prem kare hei, to tum kon cheej baṛa kara? Kaahe ke paapi log bhi, jon usse prem kare hei, ulog se prem rakkhe hei!
42006033	Aur agar tum wahi ke bhalaai karo, jon tum se bhalaai kare hei, tab tum kon se baṛa kaam kara? Kaahe ke paapi bhi to yahi kare hei.
42006034	Aur agar tum koi ke karja deta hei, aur sochta hei ki u tumme lauṭaay dei, tab tumhaar keisan baṛaai? Kaahe ke paapi log bhi paapi ke karja dewe hei, ki jisse ulog se otna lauṭ ke mil jaai.
42006035	Lekin aapan dusman se prem karo aur dusra ke bhalaai karo. Jab karja deo to aasra nai rakkho ki lauṭ ke mili. Aur tab tumme bahut baṛa fal mili, aur tab tumme sab se baṛa Pradhaan ke laṛka bola jaai. Kaahe ke u kharaab log ke bhi daya kare hei, aur ulog ke bhi achchha kare hei jon kabhi dhanbaad nai de hei.
42006036	Dusra pe hardam daya karo, jon rakam tumhaar Pita ji, tum pe daya kare hei!”
42006037	Yeeshu bolis, “Dusra pe dos kabhi nai lagaana, tab tum pe bhi kabhi dos nai lagi, koi ke kharaab nai bolo, to tumme bhi koi kharaab nai boli, maaf karo tab tumme bhi maaf kara jaai.
42006038	Agar tum koi aur ke kuchh dega, to tumme bhi mili. Aur etna nai, log to tumme puura naap se dabaay ke, hilaay hilaay ke, puura muh tak bhar ke tumhaar godi meñ ḍaar dei, kaahe ke jon naap se tum naapat raha, wahi naap se tumhaar waaste bhi naapa jaai.”
42006039	Tab Yeeshu, sab log ke ek kahaawat sunaais. U bolis, “Kaa ek añdha dusra añdha ke rasta dekhaay sake? Kaa duuno gaḍḍha meñ nai gir jaai?
42006040	Chela aapan guru se baṛa nai hei? Lekin jab chela seekh lei, tab aapan guru ke rakam ban jaai.
42006041	Tum aapan bhaiya ke aañkhi ke meila ke kaahe dekhta hei? Kaa tumme aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha nai dekhaay hei?
42006042	Aapan bhaiya se keise tum bole sakta, “Bhaiya, laao ham tumhaar aañkhi se meila nikaar dei,” lekin aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha nai dekhe sakta? E muurakh! Pahile aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha to nikaaro, tab dusra ke aañkhi ke meila ke nikaare sakega.”
42006043	“Koi achchha peṛ kharaab fal nai de sake hei, aur naa hee ek kharaab peṛ achchha fal de saki.
42006044	Sab peṛ aapan aapan fal se pahichaana jaay hei, kaahe ke jhaaṛi se añguur ya anjeer nai tuuṛa jaay sake hei.
42006045	Ek achchha admi aapan man se achchha achchha baat nikaari, aur ek kharaab admi aapan man se kharaab kharaab baat nikaare hei, kaahe ke jon cheej man meñ rahe hei wahi muh se nikre hei.”
42006046	“Tum hamme, ‘E Prabhu, E Prabhu,’ kaahe ke bolaata hei, jab ki tum hamaar baat nai maanta hei?
42006047	Jon bhi koi hamaar lage aay hei aur hamaar baat sune hei, aur hamaar baat bhi maane hei, ham tumme bataayga ki u keisan hei.
42006048	U u admi ke rakam hei jon ghar ke banaay ke ṭaaim chaṭṭaan khod ke faaunḍeishan ḍaaris hei. I kaahe ke kare hei? Ki jisse jab baaṛh aai to uske hilaay nai saki, kaahe ke u majbuut ghar rahi.
42006049	Lekin jon koi sun ke bhi nai maane hei, u u admi ke rakam hei, jon maṭṭi pe bina faaunḍeishan khode aapan ghar banaay lees. Aur jab baaṛh aai, tab u wahi lage gir jaai aur naas hoy jaai.’.
42007001	Jab Yeeshu sab baat bataay dees, tab u Kafarnahuum chala gais.
42007002	Ek aami ofisa ke naukar jon uske bahut pyaara raha, bimaar paṛ gais, aur mare waala raha.
42007003	Jab aami ofisa Yeeshu ke baare meñ sunis, tab u chech ke baṛa jan ke uske lage bhejis ki ulog jaay ke Yeeshu ke bolaay laay ki jisse u naukar ke ṭheek kar de.
42007004	Chech ke baṛa jan Yeeshu ke lage jaay ke usse binti karin aur bolin, “I naukar ke aay ke dekh leo, kaahe ke i tumhaar madat ke laayk hei.
42007005	U ham log ke des se prem kare hei, aur ham log ke chech bhi banaais hei.”
42007006	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe bimaar admi ke ghare gais. Ulog abhi ghar se kuchh duur pe rahin, jab aami ofisa aapan kuchh dost se i bol ke Yeeshu ke lage bhejis, “E Prabhu dukh nai uṭhaao. Ham i laayk nai ki tum hamaar ghare aao.
42007007	Aur ham i laayk bhi nai ki tumhaar lage aai. Khali hukum karo, aur hamaar naukar ṭheek hoy jaai.
42007008	Ham bhi to aapan uppar ke baṛkuan se hukum leta hei, aur dusra bagal saulja hamaar hukum pe chale hei. Jab ham bolta hei ‘Jaao’ tab u jaay hei. Dusra se bolta hei ‘Aao’ tab u aay hei. Aur jab ham aapan naukar se bolta hei, ‘I karo’ tab u kare hei.”‘
42007009	I sun ke Yeeshu hairaan hoy gais, u ghuum ke u bheeṛ se jon uske pichchhe pichchhe aat raha, bolis, “Ham to puura Israayel meñ i rakam biswaasi nai dekha hei!”
42007010	Tab bheje waala log jab lauṭ ke aami ofisa ke ghare gais, to dekhis ki naukar ṭheek hoy gais hei.
42007011	Thoṛa roj baad Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe Nain ṭaaun gais, uske sañghe ek bahut baṛa bheeṛ bhi jaat raha.
42007012	Jeise ulog Nain ṭaaun ke gaiṭ pe pahuñchis, ulog dekhis ki kuchh log ek murda ke maṭṭi dewe le jaay hei. U laash, ek bidhwa ke eklauta laṛka ke raha. Aur ṭaaun ke bahut se log uske sañghe rahin.
42007013	Uske dekh ke Prabhu ke man meñ daya aais, aur u bolis, “Nai ro!”
42007014	Yeeshu jaay ke arthi ke chhuis, ulog jon arthi ke uṭhaain raha, ruk gain. Yeeshu bolis, “E naojawaan, uṭho!”
42007015	Aur wahi lage u laṛka uṭh ke beiṭh gais aur sab se baat kare lagis. Tab Yeeshu u laṛka ke uske maiya ke de dees.
42007016	Sab log ḍar gain aur Parmeshwar ke jayjaykaar kare lagin. Ulog bole lagin, “Ek baṛa nabi hiañ ham log ke beech meñ hei! Parmeshwar aapan log ke bachaay aay gais hei.”
42007017	Jon cheej Yeeshu karis raha, uske khabar chaaro bagal Juḍia aur agal bagal ke des meñ feil gais.
42007018	Jab Yuhanna ke chela log Yeeshu ke baare meñ sab baat bataay deen, tab u dui chela ke bolaay ke Yeeshu ke lage i puuchhe ke bhejis,
42007019	“Kaa tum wahi hei jon aay waala hei ki ham koi aur ke agori?”
42007020	Jab duuno Yeeshu ke lage pahuñchin, tab bolin, “Yuhanna hamme i puuchhe ke waaste bhejis hei, ki kaa tum wahi hei jon aay waala hei, ki ham koi aur ke waiṭ kari?”
42007021	U ṭaaim Yeeshu bahut log ke ṭheek karat raha, jon bimaar rahin, ya koi rakam ke peeṛa meñ rahin, ya dushṭ aatma se dukhi rahin, aur jon añdha rahin, uske aañkhi det raha.
42007022	Yeeshu, ulog se bolis, “Yuhanna se jaay ke bataao ki tum kon cheej dekha aur suna hei. Añdha ab dekhe sake hei, langṛa ab chale sake hei. Koṛhi log ab achchha hoy gain hei, bahra log ab sune sake hei, murda bhi jinda hoy gais hei, aur kangaal log vachan sune hei.
42007023	Dhann hei ulog jon hamaar kaaran, ṭhokar nai khaai.”
42007024	Jab Yuhanna ke duut log chala gain, tab Yeeshu sab log ke Yuhanna ke baare meñ bataay lagis, “Ḍezaṭ meñ tum Yuhanna ke lage kon cheej dekhe gay raha? Kaa u hawa meñ uṛte ek lamba graas ke rakam raha?
42007025	Tum huañ kaa dekhe gay raha? Ek admi jon mahañga kapṛa pahine raha? Jon koi mahañga kapṛa pahine hei aur sab sukh maañge hei, ulog raaja ke mahal meñ rahe waala hei.
42007026	Tab tum kon cheej dekhe gay raha? Koi nabi ke? Haañ, ham tumme bataata hei ki u ek nabi se bhi baṛa hei.
42007027	Baaibal meñ, Yuhanna ke baare meñ likhaan hei, “Ham aapan duut ke tum se aage bhejta hei, ki jisse u tumhaar khaatir sab cheej taiyaar kare.
42007028	Yuhanna se baṛa abhi tak i dharti pe koi nai peida bhais hei. Lekin jon Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ sab se chhoṭa hei, u Yuhanna se baṛa hei.”
42007029	Sab koi Yuhanna ke baat sunat rahin, aur ṭeks baṭore waala log bhi i sab sun ke Yuhanna se baptisma leen, aur Parmeshwar ke sachcha maan leen.
42007030	Lekin Farisi log aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log, Yuhanna se baptisma nai lees aur Parmeshwar ke ichchha ṭaal dees.
42007031	Yeeshu fir bolis, “Tum sab keisan log hei? Kon rakam ke log tum sab hei?
42007032	Tum sab to u laṛkan ke rakam hei jon maakeṭ meñ beiṭh ke ek dusra ke bolaay ke bole hei, ‘Ham tumhaar khaatir baañsuri bajaaya, lekin tum naacha nai! Ham tumhaar khaatir bilaap kara lekin tum nai roya!”
42007033	Yuhanna, Baptisma dewaala aais, naa roṭi khaais, aur naa waain pees, aur tum bolta hei, “Usman dushṭ aatma hei!”
42007034	Lekin Manush ke laṛka khaate, peete, aais, aur tum bola, “I admi ke dekho! I to peṭṭu aur piakkaṛ hei, i to ṭeks baṭore waala aur paapi log ke dost hei.”
42007035	Fir bhi Parmeshwar ke buddhi, uske khaatir sachcha hei jon uske maane hei.”
42007036	Ek Farisi Yeeshu ke aapan ghare khaana pe bolaais, aur Yeeshu huañ gais aur khaana khaay beiṭh gais.
42007037	Wahi ṭaaun meñ ek paapi aurat rahat rahi. Jab u sunis ki Yeeshu u Farisi ke ghare khaana khaay aais hei, tab u ek botal meñ mahañga pefeum laais.
42007038	Tab u aay ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe khaṛi hoy gais. U roy roy ke aapan aañsu se uske goṛ dhoy lagis aur aapan baar se pochhis. Tab u uske goṛ pe chumma le ke uspe pefeum lagaais.
42007039	Jab u Farisi jon uske bolaais raha, i sab dekhis to aapan man meñ sochis, “Agar i admi sachche ek nabi hei, to jaan leta ki i kon rakam ke aurat hei jon iske chhue hei! U jaan jaata ki i ek paapin hei.”
42007040	Yeeshu Farisi se bolis, “Saayman, hamme tum se kuchh bole ke hei.” “Guru, kon cheej hei?” Saayman bolis.
42007041	Yeeshu bolis, “Ek dafe dui admi ek mahaajan ke karja rahin. Ek paañch sao chaañdi ke sikka baaki raha, aur dusra pachaas baaki raha.
42007042	Duuno meñ se koi ek bhi uske peisa lauṭaay nai sakat raha, aur mahaajan u duuno ke maaf kar dees. Ab u duuno meñ se kon usse jaada prem kari?”
42007043	Saayman jawaab dees, “Ham sochta hei u, jiske jaada udhaar raha, aur lauṭaay nai sakat raha.” “Tum raaiṭ hei,” Yeeshu bolis.
42007044	Tab Yeeshu u aurat ke bagal ghuum ke Saayman se bolis, “Kaa tum i aurat ke dekha hei? Jab ham tumhaar ghare aaya, tab tum hamaar goṛ dhoy ke khaatir paani bhi nai dia, lekin i to aapan aañsu se hamaar goṛ dhois, aur aapan baar se pochhis.
42007045	Tum to hamme chumma leke welkam nai kara, lekin jab se ham hiañ aaya hei, tab se i aurat hamaar goṛ chuume nai band karis.
42007046	Tum to hamaar muuṛ pe tel bhi nai lagaaya, lekin i to hamaar goṛ pe pefeum malis.
42007047	Ham tumme bataata hei, ki iske jaada prem se iske sab paap ke maafi hoy jaai. Lekin jiske thoṛa maafi mile hei, uske prem bhi thoṛa rahe hei.”
42007048	Tab Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tumhaar paap maaf hoy gais.”
42007049	Kuchh mehmaan jon ṭaibal pe beiṭhe rahin, aapan aapan man meñ soche lagin, “I kon hei, jon paap ke bhi maaf kar de hei?”
42007050	Lekin Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tumhaar biswaas tumme bachaay lees hei, saanti se chali jaao.”
42008001	Iske baad, Yeeshu gaaoñ gaaoñ aur ṭaaun ṭaaun parchaar karte, aur Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baat sunaate raha. Uske sañghe uske baarah chela bhi rahin,
42008002	aur ulog ke sañghe u aurat log bhi rahin, jon sab dushṭ aatma se chhuṭkaara paay leen raha, aur bimaari se achchha hoy gain raha. Usman se ek, Meri jon Magdalini kahaawat rahi aur jisman saat dushṭ aatma rahis.
42008003	Joanna, jis ke admi Khoja raha aur jon Heraḍ ke meneja raha, aur Susanna, aur kaafi aur aurat log, jon aapan peisa se Yeeshu aur uske chela log ke madat karat rahin.
42008004	Jab ek baṛa bheeṛ dusra dusra ṭaaun se aay ke Yeeshu ke chaaro taraf jama hoy lagin, tab u ulog ke ek kahaani bataais,
42008005	“Ek ṭaaim ek admi khet meñ bia bowe gais raha. Jab u khet meñ bia chheeṭat raha, tab kuchh bia rasta ke kinaare gir gais, u sab ke goṛ se kachar dewa gais, aur chiṛia aay ke uske khaay lees.
42008006	Kuchh bia chaṭṭaan pe gira, aur jab u jamis, tab uske paani nai mile se sukhaay gais.
42008007	Kuchh bia jañgal jhaaṛi ke beech meñ gira, u sab jamis lekin jhaaṛi u sab ke dabaay dees.
42008008	Aur kuchh bia achchha jameen pe giris, peṛ jamis, aur baṛa hoy ke sao guna fal laais.” Jab Yeeshu kahaani sunaay dees, tab ulog se bolis, “Agar tum log ke lage kaan hei to suno!”
42008009	Yeeshu ke chela log kahaani ke matlab puuchhin.
42008010	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum sab ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke seekraṭ ke samajh dewa gais hei, dusra log ke kahaani sunaawa jaay hei, ki jisse ulog dekhi lekin dekhe nai paai, aur suni lekin samjhe nai paai.”
42008011	“I kahaani ke matlab i hei, bia Parmeshwar ke vachan hei.
42008012	Jon bia rasta ke kinaare giris raha, i ulog hei, jon sandes sune hei, lekin saitaan aay ke ulog ke dil se vachan leke chala jaay hei, ki kahiñ eise nai hoy ki log vachan pe biswaas kare aur bach jaay.
42008013	Jon bia chaṭṭaan pe gira, i ulog hei jon vachan ke to khusi se le lewe hei, lekin jaṛ nai pakṛe ke kaaran ilog khali thoṛa deri biswaas rakkhe hei, aur ṭesṭ ke ṭaaim gir jaay hei.
42008014	Jon bia jhaaṛi meñ giris, i ulog hei jon vachan sune hei, lekin chinta, aur peisa aur jeewan ke sukh dukh meñ fañs jaay hei, aur eisan log ke fal pake nai paay.
42008015	Jon bia achchha maṭṭi meñ giris, i ulog hei jon vachan ke sune hei, aur achchha bhala samjhe hei. Aur eisane log achchha fal laay hei.
42008016	Koi batti baar ke pyaala ke nichche nai rakkhe hei aur naa to khaṭia ke nichche rakkhe hei. Lekin batti hardam batti rakkhe waala jagha pe rakkha jaay hei, ki jisse jon koi bhi bhittar aai, uske ujera mili.
42008017	Koi eisan cheej lukaan nai hei, jon mile nai sake hei. Aur jon bhi chhipaan cheej hei u to saamne aai.
42008018	Yahi kaaran saaodhaan raho ki tum keise sunta hei! Jon koi ke lage kuchh hei, uske aur dewa jaai, lekin jon log ke lage kuchh bhi nai hei, ulog se to u bhi le lewa jaai jon ulog samjhe hei ki uske lage hei.
42008019	Yeeshu ke amma aur bhaiya log uske lage aain, lekin usse mile nai paain kaahe ke huañ bahut baṛa bheeṛ raha.
42008020	Koi Yeeshu se bolis, “Tumhaar amma aur bhaiya log bahire khaṛa hei aur tum se mile maañge hei.”
42008021	Yeeshu bolis, “Hamaar amma aur bhaiya log, ulog hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sune hei aur uske maane hei.”
42008022	Ek roj Yeeshu aur uske chela log bauṭ meñ gain, aur u ulog se bolis, “Aao ham sab laik ke u bagal chali.”
42008023	Aur jab ulog bauṭ meñ jaawat raha, tab Yeeshu soy gais. Achaanak laik pe tufaan aay gais, aur bauṭ ḍuube laga. Ulog museebat meñ paṛ gain.
42008024	Tab ulog jaay ke Yeeshu ke jagaain, “Swaami, Swaami! Ham log ḍuubta hei!” Yeeshu uṭh ke hawa aur halkora ke ḍaaṭis. Hawa aur halkora ruk gais, aur sab saanti hoy gais.
42008025	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Kaa tum log ke lage biswaas nai hei?” Lekin ulog to ḍar ke maare aur hairaan hoy ke ek dusra se bole lagin, “I kon hei? I to hawa aur halkora ke bhi hukum dewe hei aur u sab iske baat sune hei!”
42008026	Yeeshu aur uske chela log Galeel ke laik paar kar ke Gerasa ke des meñ pahuñchin.
42008027	Jeise Yeeshu bauṭ se utris, u ṭaaun ke ek admi ulog se milis. U admi meñ dushṭ aatma raha. U bahut roj se nañge ghuumat raha, aur ghar meñ nai lekin kabrastaan meñ rahat raha.
42008028	U Yeeshu ke dekhis aur chillaais, aur uske aage aay ke gir ke jor se bolis, “He Yeeshu, Parmeshwar ke laṛka, tumme ham se kaa kaam hei? Ham binti karta hei hamme nai sataao!”
42008029	U i baat bolis kaahe ke Yeeshu u dushṭ aatma ke hukum dees ki u admi se nikar jaay. U admi ke bhuut hardam hamla karat raha. Aur chaahe uske haath aur goṛ chain se bañdha rahe ya kaṛa pahra rahe, u sab ke tuuṛ dewat raha. Aur tab jon dushṭ aatma rahis, uske jañgal meñ suunsaan jagha pe le jaawat raha.
42008030	Yeeshu usse puuchhis, “Tumhaar naam kaa hei?” U jawaab dees, “Hamaar naam sena hei.” U i khaatir i bolis raha, kaahe ke uske bhittar bahut dushṭ aatma rahin.
42008031	U sab Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki ulog ke gahira gaddha meñ nai jaay de. (U jagha pe dushṭ aatma log ke saja mile hei, aur ilog ke bhi saja mili.)
42008032	Wahi log ke lage, ek suar ke baṛa jhunḍ charat rahin. Ulog Yeeshu se binti karin, ki u ulog ke suar meñ bhej de, aur Yeeshu wahi karis.
42008033	Tab dushṭ aatma, ulog se nikar ke aur suar meñ ghus gais. Aur u jhunḍ harharaay ke laik meñ kuud gain aur wahiñ ḍuub marin.
42008034	Jab suar charaay waala log i sab dekhin, tab ulog dauṛ ke ṭaaun aur gaaoñ meñ sab bagal i khabar feilaay deen.
42008035	Huañ ke log i dekhe ke waaste aain ki huañ kon cheej bhais raha, aur jab ulog Yeeshu ke lage aain, to dekhe hei ki jon admi meñ dushṭ aatma raha, u achchha hoy gais aur kapṛa pahin ke, Yeeshu ke goṛ ke lage beiṭhis hei. U sab log ḍar gain.
42008036	Tab u sab log jon dekhin raha ki u admi ṭheek hoy gais hei, sab ke jaay ke bataain.
42008037	Tab Gerasa ke agal bagal ke sab log Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki u huañ se chala jaay, kaahe ke ulog sab ḍar gain. Jab Yeeshu bauṭ meñ chaṛh ke jaay laga,
42008038	tab jon admi se dushṭ aatma nikra raha, u bhi Yeeshu se binti kare laga, “Hamme aapan sañghe le chalo.” Lekin Yeeshu usse bolis,
42008039	“Aapan ghare lauṭ jaao, aur sab log se bataao ki Parmeshwar tumhaar khaatir ketna baṛa baṛa kaam karis hei.” U admi jaay ke puura ṭaaun meñ parchaar kare laga, ki Yeeshu uske waaste ketna baṛa baṛa kaam karis raha.
42008040	Jab Yeeshu lauṭis, tab huañ ek baṛa bheeṛ uske welkam kare ke waaste waiṭ karat raha.
42008041	Tab Jaayras naam ke ek admi, jon huañ ke chech ke agua raha, aay ke Yeeshu ke aage ghuṭna ṭek dees, aur binti karis ki u uske ghare chale,
42008042	kaahe ke uske baarah saal ke eklauti laṛki mare waali rahi. Jab Yeeshu Jaayras ke sañghe jaat raha, tab bheeṛ uske uupar girat paṛat rahin.
42008043	Bheeṛ meñ ek aurat rahi jiske baarah saal se khuun bahe waala bimaari raha, aur u aapan etna peisa ḍokṭa pe kharcha kar dees raha, aur fir bhi u koi ke haath se achchha nai bhais.
42008044	Aur jeise u pichchhe se aay ke Yeeshu ke kapṛa chhuis, uske khuun bahe ke band hoy gais.
42008045	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Hamme kon chhuis?” Sab koi nai bol dees lekin Peeṭa aur uske saathi bolis, “E Swaami! Etna bheeṛ meñ tumhaar chaaro bagal se log tumme dabaay hei aur tumhaar uppar gire hei”
42008046	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Koi hamme chhuis hei, kaahe ke ham meñ se sakti nikris hei.”
42008047	U aurat dekhis ki u baat chhupaay nai saki, aur kaapte Yeeshu ke lage aay ke uske goṛ pe gir paṛis. Aur sab ke saamne bataais ki kaahe ke u Yeeshu ke chhuis raha, aur keise u wahi lage achchhi hoy gais hei.
42008048	Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tum aapan biswaas se ab achchhi hoy gayi hei. Ab saanti se chali jaao!”
42008049	Yeeshu baat karat raha, jab Jaayras ke ghar se khabar aais, “Tumhaar laṛki mar gais hei. Ab guru ke tang nai karo.”
42008050	Lekin i sun ke Yeeshu Jaayras se bolis, “Soch nai karo! Khali biswaas rakkho, tumhaar laṛki bach jaai.’.
42008051	Yeeshu uske ghare pahuñch ke, aur khali Peeṭa, Yuhanna, Jeims aur laṛki ke maiya aur bappa ke bhittar le gais.
42008052	Sab koi u laṛki ke mare pe rowat rahin. Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Ro nai, u laṛki maris nai hei. U to khali sowe hei.”
42008053	Sab log Yeeshu pe hase lagin, kaahe ke ulog jaanat rahin ki laṛki mar gais hei.
42008054	Yeeshu laṛki ke haath pakaṛ ke jor se bolis, “E laṛki uṭho!”
42008055	Uske saas lauṭ aais aur u uṭh ke beiṭh gais. Yeeshu bolis ki uske khaay ke waaste kuchh deo.
42008056	Laṛki ke maiya bappa hairaan rahin, lekin Yeeshu ulog ke rokis ki huañ jon cheej bhais raha, uske baare meñ koi se kuchh nai bataana.
42009001	Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke ek sañghe bolaais, aur ulog ke dushṭ aatma nikaare ke aur bimaari ṭheek kare ke sakti aur adhikaar dees.
42009002	Aur ulog ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke parchaar kare ke aur bimaari ṭheek kare ke khaatir bhejis.
42009003	Aur u bolis, “Rasta ke waaste kuchh nai lena, chale ke waaste naa laaṭhi, naa beg, naa khaana, ya peisa aur hiañ tak ki badle ke khaatir kapṛa bhi nai lena.
42009004	Jon ghar meñ welkam mili, wahiñ ruk jaana, aur fir wahiñ se bida hona.
42009005	Agar koi tumme welkam nai kari, to u ṭaaun se nikarte ṭaaim aapan goṛ ke garda wahiñ jhaaṛ dena. Yahi ulog ke waaste chetaaoni hoi.”
42009006	Tab chela log gaaoñ gaaoñ jaay ke susamaachaar sunaawat rahin aur sab jagha log ke achchha karte, jaat rahin.
42009007	Galeel ke raaja Heraḍ, jab i baat sunis tab u ghabraay gais, kaahe ke bahut log bolin ki Yuhanna, baptisma de waala jinda hoy gais hei.
42009008	Ketna log to i bhi bolin ki Ilaayja dekhaay dees hei, aur kaafi log bolat rahin ki puraana nabi log meñ se ek jinda hoy gais hei.
42009009	Heraḍ bolis, “Yuhanna ke muuṛ to hamahi kaṭwaaya raha, ab i kon hei jis ke baare meñ i sab baat sunaai de hei?” Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha.
42009010	Tab chela log lauṭ ke aay ke Yeeshu se sab bataain ki ulog kon kon cheej karin raha. Tab u ulog ke alag kar ke Bethseida naam, ek ṭaaun meñ le gais.
42009011	Lekin kaafi log jaan gain ki u kahañ hei, aur uske pichchhe aain. Yeeshu u sab ke welkam karis aur Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ baat cheet karis aur kaafi log jon achchha bhi hoy maañgat raha ulog ke achchha karis.
42009012	Sanjha ke ṭaaim, baarah chela log Yeeshu ke lage aay ke bolin, “I sab log ke ghare bhej deo ki ilog jaay ke khaana paani ke parband kare aur raat meñ soy ke khaatir jagha khoje, kaahe ke i suunsaan jagha hei.”
42009013	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Tumahi ilog ke khaay ke waaste parband karo.” Ulog bolin, “Hamaar lage to khali paañch roṭi aur dui machhri hei. Kaa tum mañgta hei ki ham jaay ke ilog ke waaste khaana khareedi?”
42009014	Huañ pe lagbhag paañch hajaar log rahin. Yeeshu chela log se bolis, “I sab ke laain meñ pachaas pachaas kar ke beiṭhaay deo.”
42009015	Ulog eisehiyeñ karin.
42009016	Tab Yeeshu paañch roṭi aur dui machhri leke, uppar swarag ke bagal dekh ke dhanbaad dees, aur uske tuuṛ tuuṛ ke chela log ke dete gais, ki sab ke baaṭ de.
42009017	Sab koi peṭ bhar ke khaain. Aur baarah baaskeṭ bhar ke bacha kucha ṭukṛa chela log bharin.
42009018	Jab Yeeshu akele preya karat raha, tab uske chela log uske lage rahin. Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Log hamaar baare meñ kon cheej bole hei?”
42009019	Ulog jawaab deen, “Koi bole hei tum Yuhanna, baptisma de waala hei, aur koi bole hei tum Ilaayja hei, aur kuchh log bole hei ki tum puraana nabi meñ se ek hei jon jinda hoy gais hei.”
42009020	“Lekin tum hamme kon cheej bolta hei?” Peeṭa bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke bheja Maseeha hei.”
42009021	Yeeshu ulog se bolis ki i baat koi aur se nai bataana.
42009022	Yeeshu i bhi bolis, “Manush ke laṛka ke khaatir dukh uṭhaay ke jaruuri hei, u des ke neta log, baṛa paadri, aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log, ke haath se dukh uṭhaai. Ulog uske ṭhukraai, aur maar ḍaari, lekin teen roj baad jinda hoy jaai.”
42009023	Tab Yeeshu sab se bolis, “Agar koi hamaar pichchhe aay maañge, to apne aap ke bhulaay de. Sab roj aapan kros uṭhaay ke hamaar pichchhe chale.
42009024	Kaahe ke agar koi aapan jaan bachaay maañge to uske khoy dei, lekin jon koi hamaar waaste aapan jaan khoi, u uske bachaai.
42009025	Tumme kon cheej mili, agar tum puura dunia apnaay lega lekin aapan jaan khoy dega?
42009026	Agar tumme hamaar baat se saram lage hei, tab Manush ke laṛka bhi jab u aapan aur aapan Pita ke aur ainjal ke mahima ke sañghe aai to tum se sarmaai.
42009027	Ham sachche bolta hei ki jon sab hiañ khaṛa hei, usman se kuchh log bina Parmeshwar ke raaj dekhe nai mari.
42009028	Lagbhag aaṭh roj ke baad Yeeshu, Peeṭa, Yuhanna, aur Jeims ke sañghe leke pahaaṛ pe preya kare chala gais.
42009029	Jab u preya karat raha, uske chehra ke ruup badal gais, aur uske kapra ekdam ujjar hoy ke chamke lagis.
42009030	Wahi lage Maozas aur Ilaayja huañ aay ke usse baat kare lagin.
42009031	I duuno swarag ke mahima meñ dekhaai deen, aur Yeeshu ke mare ke baare meñ baat cheet kare lagin, jon Yarushalam meñ hoy waala raha.
42009032	Peeṭa aur uske sañghe dui aur chela, neeñd meñ suta rahin. Achaanak ulog uṭhin aur mahima se bhara Yeeshu ke dekhin. Aur sañghe u duuno admi ke bhi dekhin.
42009033	Jab Maozas aur Ilaayja jaay lagin, tab Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “E Swaami, ketna achchha raha ki ham hiañ hei! Ham teen ṭenṭ banaayga, ek tumhaar waaste, ek Maozas ke waaste aur ek Ilaayja ke waaste.” Lekin Peeṭa nai jaanat raha ki u kaa bole hei.
42009034	Peeṭa baat karte raha, ki baadar ulog ke uppar chhaay gais aur ulog ḍar gain.
42009035	Baadar meñ se ek awaaj sunaais, “I hamaar chuna laṛka hei. Iske suno.”
42009036	U awaaj ke baad, ulog khali Yeeshu ke dekhin. Thoṛa deri tak ulog chuppe rahin, aur jon kuchh dekhin raha, uske baare meñ kuchh nai bolin.
42009037	Dusra roj jab ulog pahaaṛ se utrin, tab ek baṛa bheeṛ ulog se milis.
42009038	Ek admi bheeṛ meñ se chillaay ke bolis, “E guru, ham binti karta hei, hamaar eklauta laṛka pe daya karo!
42009039	Ek dushṭ aatma uske pakṛe hei aur u chillaay hei. U iske eise shaik kare hei ki iske muñh se fena nikar aay hei, aur tab tak nai chhoṛe hei jab tak i ekdam thak nai jaay.
42009040	Ham tumhaar chela log se binti kara ki ulog i bhuut ke nikaar de lekin ulog nikaar nai paain.”
42009041	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum jiddi aur thoṛa biswaas waala log! Ham kab tak tumhaar sañghe rahe paayga aur jon tum karta hei uske sahe paayga?” Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Aapan laṛka ke hamaar lage laao.”
42009042	Jab laṛka ke Yeeshu ke lage laawa jaat raha, tab bhuut uske pakaṛ ke puura shaik kar dees. Yeeshu u bhuut ke ḍaaṭis. Aur u laṛka ke achchha karke, uske bappa ke lauṭaay dees.
42009043	Sab koi Parmeshwar ke mahaan sakti se hairaan rahe gain.
42009044	Sab log u kaam se jon Yeeshu karat raha hairaan rahin, tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Yaad rakhna, jon baat ham tum se bataay waala hei! Manush ke laṛka ke, uske dusman ke hawaale kar dewa jaai.”
42009045	Lekin chela log nai jaane sakin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei. Uske matlab ulog se lukaan raha. Ulog samajh nai sakin, aur puuchhe se ḍarat rahin.
42009046	Chela ek dusra se laṛe lagin, ki ulog meñ se sab se baṛa kon hei.
42009047	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ulog kaa soche hei, aur u ek bachcha ke aapan bagal khaṛa kar ke,
42009048	tab u chela log se bolis, “Jab tum hamaar naam se ek bachcha ke welkam karega, tab tum hamme bhi welkam karta hei. Aur jab tum hamme welkam karta hei, tab tum uske bhi welkam karta hei, jon hamme bhejis hei. Kaahe ke tum log meñ se jon sab se chhoṭa hei, wahi sab se baṛa hei.”
42009049	Yuhanna bolis, “E guru, ham ek admi ke dekha, jon tumhaar naam se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarat raha. Ham uske roka, kaahe ke u ham log ke grup ke nai raha.”
42009050	Yeeshu bolis, “Uske nai roko, jon koi tumhaar agaiñsṭ nai hei, u tumhaar sañghe hei.”
42009051	Yeeshu ke swarag jaay ke ṭaaim nagichche raha, aur u Yarushalam jaay ke bichaar karis.
42009052	U aapan kuchh log ke aage bhej dees raha, ki jisse ulog jaay ke Saamri gaaoñ meñ sab taiyaari kari.
42009053	Lekin huañ ke log uske welkam nai karin, kaahe ke u Yarushalam jaat raha.
42009054	I dekh ke uske chela Jeims aur Yuhanna bolin, “E Swaami! Kaa tum mañgta hei ki ham hukum dei aur swarag se aagi gir ke i sab ke bhasam kar dei?”
42009055	Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke ḍaaṭis, “Tum nai janta ki tum kon aatma ke hei. Manush ke laṛka sab log ke naas kare nai aais hei, lekin ulog ke bachaay aais hei.”
42009056	Aur ulog dusra gaaoñ chala gain.
42009057	Jab ulog rasta pe jaat rahin, tab koi bolis, “Tum jahañ jaayga, ham tumhaar sañghe chalega.”
42009058	Yeeshu bolis, “Lomṛi ke gaḍḍha hei aur asmaan ke chiṛia ke ghosla hei, lekin Manush ke laṛka ke to sir rakkhe ke bhi jagha nai hei.”
42009059	Yeeshu ek dusra admi se bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe aao.” Lekin u admi bolis, “E Prabhu, pahile jaay ke ham aapan bappa ke maṭṭi de dei.”
42009060	Yeeshu bolis, “Jon mara hei, ulog ke aapan murda apne gaaṛe deo, lekin tum jaay ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ parchaar karo.”
42009061	Tab koi dusra Yeeshu se bolis, “E Prabhu, ham to tumhaar pichchhe chalega, lekin pahile jaay ke ham aapan ghar ke sab log se bida le lei.”
42009062	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jon koi aapan haath hal pe rakh ke aur pichchhe taake hei, u Parmeshwar ke raaj ke laayk nai hei.”
42010001	Baad meñ Prabhu bahattar (72) aur admi log ke chunis aur dui dui karke u sab ṭaaun meñ usse aage bhejis jahañ uske jaay ke raha.
42010002	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Khet meñ bahut jaada fasal hei, lekin bahut kamti majuur log hei. Yahi kaaran khet ke maalik se bolo, ki u kaaṭe ke waaste majuur bheje.
42010003	Ab jaao, lekin yaad rakhna, ham tumme bheṛiya log ke beech meñ bheṛa ke bachcha ke rakam bhejta hei.
42010004	Aapan sañghe naa to aapan pes, naa to juuta, aur naa beg leke jaana, aur rasta bhar koi ke namaste bhi nai karna.
42010005	Jab bhi koi ghar meñ jaana, to pahile bolna, “I ghar meñ saanti rahe.”
42010006	Agar huañ koi saanti se rahat hoi, to tumhaar saanti uspe rahi nai to u tumhaar lage lauṭ aai.
42010007	Wahi palwaar meñ rahna, wahiñ khaana aur peena jon ulog tumme dei, kaahe ke naukar ke talab to mile ke chaahi. Ek ghar se dusra ghar nai ghuumna.
42010008	Jab tum koi ṭaaun meñ jaayga, aur ulog tumhaar welkam kari, aur kuchh khaay ke dei to khaay lena.
42010009	Huañ ke bimaar log ke achchha karna aur bolna, “Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar nagichche aay gais.”
42010010	Lekin agar u ṭaaun ke log tumhaar welkam nai kari, to rasta pe jaay ke bolna,
42010011	“Ham sab tumhaar ṭaaun ke garda jon hamaar goṛ meñ lag gais hei, hiañ pe jhaaṛta hei. Lekin yaad rakkho Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar nagichche aay gais hei.”
42010012	Ham tumme bataata hei jon roj nyaay kara jaai, u roj Prabhu u ṭaaun ke dasa Sodom ke dasa se bhi kharaab kar dei.
42010013	E Khuraazin! Aur Bethseida ke log! Tum pe haay! Jon chamatkaari kaam tumhaar sañghe bhais hei, agar u sab Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida meñ kara jaata, to huañ ke log bahut pahile Parmeshwar se maafi maañg leta. Ulog basta ke kapṛa pahin ke aur raakhi pe beiṭh ke, i dekhaatin ki ulog paap se dukhi hei.
42010014	Lekin nyaay ke roj Parmeshwar, Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida ke log pe tum se jaada daya dehkaai.
42010015	E Kafarnahuum ke log, kaa tum sochta hei ki swarag meñ tumme aadar mili! Kabhi nai, tum to narak jaruur jaayga.
42010016	Jon koi bhi tumhaar sune hei, u hamaar bhi sune hei. Jon koi tumme ‘Nai’ apnaay hei, u hamme bhi “Nai’ apnaay. Aur jon bhi hamme ‘Nai’ apnaai, u jon hamme bhejis hei, uske bhi ‘Nai’ apnaai.
42010017	Jab u bahattar (72) log lauṭin, to ulog bahut khusi rahin. Ulog bolin, “E Prabhu, tumhaar naam se to dushṭ aatma bhi hamaar baat maanat rahin!”
42010018	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham saitaan ke, bijli ke rakam swarag se girte dekha hei.
42010019	Ham tum log ke saañp aur bichchhu ke kachre ke aur tumhaar dusman, saitaan ke taagat ke uppar hak dia hei. Tumme kuchh haani nai hoy sake hei.
42010020	Lekin isse khusi nai hona, ki dushṭ aatma tumhaar bas meñ hei. Lekin i kaaran khusi hona ki tumhaar naam swarag meñ likha gais hei!”
42010021	Wahi ṭaaim, Yeeshu u khusi jon Pawitr Aatma ke bagal se aais raha, usse bhar gais, aur bolis, “E Pita, swarag aur dharti ke Prabhu, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei, ki tum i sab baat paṛha likha aur samajhdaar log se chhipaay ke rakkha, aur saadhaaran log ke saamne laaya. Haañ Pita ji, yahi tumme achchha laga.
42010022	Hamaar Pita hamme sab kuchh de dees hei, aur wahi hei jon laṛka ke jaane hei. Aur Pita ke bhi khali laṛka jaane hei. Aur laṛka aapan baap ke baare meñ bataay maañge hei, ki jisse sab koi uske baare meñ jaane sake.”
42010023	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke bagal ghuum ke chuppe se bolis, “Tum pe aasheesh hei ki jon tum i sab dekhta hei!
42010024	Ketna raaja aur nabi log, i sab dekhe aur sune maañgat rahin, jon tum abhi dekha aur suna hei. Lekin ham tum se bataata hei, ki ulog naa to kuchh dekhin aur naa to kuchh sunin.”
42010025	Ek Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru uṭh ke Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Guru, ham kon cheej kari ki hamme anant jeewan mile?”
42010026	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ kon cheej likhaan hei? Tum uske keise samajhe sakta hei?”
42010027	U admi jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ likha hei, ‘Tum aapan Prabhu Parmeshwar se aapan puura man aur jaan se aur aapan puura taagat, aur aapan puura buddhi se prem karo. Aur aapan paṛosi se bhi apne rakam prem karo.’ ”
42010028	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamme raaiṭ jawaab dia hei. Agar eisehiyeñ karte rahega, tab anant jeewan mil jaai.”
42010029	Lekin u admi janaay maañgat raha ki u sab kuchh jaane hei, aur Yeeshu se ek aur sawaal puuchhis, “Hamaar paṛosi kon hei?”
42010030	Yeeshu bolis, “Ek admi raha, jon Yarushalam se Jeriko jaat raha, rasta meñ uske ḍaaku log gher leen, aur uspe hamla kar deen. Uske kapṛa utaar ke, aur maar peeṭ ke uske adhmara kar ke, wahiñ chhoṛ ke chala gain.
42010031	Ek paadri wahi rasta se jaat raha, lekin jab u choṭaan admi ke dekhis, tab u dusra bagal se chala gais.
42010032	Wahi rakam ek Levi bhi wahi rasta se aais, aur u choṭaan admi ke dekhis aur u bagal se chala gais.
42010033	Tab ek Saamri jon ghuume nikra raha, wahi rasta se aais, aur u choṭaan admi ke dekh ke daya karis.
42010034	Aur uske lage aay ke uske ghaao pe tel aur waain ḍaar ke uske marham paṭṭi karis, aur gadha pe beiṭhaay ke ek hoṭel le gais, aur wahiñ uske dekh bhaal karis.
42010035	Dusra roj sabere u hoṭel ke maalik ke dui chaañdi ke sikka deke bolis, “Iske dekh bhaal karna aur jab ham lauṭ ke aayga, tab jetna bacha kucha rahi ham sab bhar dega.”‘
42010036	Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “I teeno meñ se kon uske paṛosi hei, jon ke ḍaaku log maar ke choṭ pahuñchaain raha?”
42010037	U ṭeecha jawaab dees, “Wahi jon uspe taras khaais raha.” Yeeshu bolis, “Jaao, aur eisehiyeñ karo!”
42010038	Yeeshu aur uske chela log jaate jaate ek gaaoñ pahuñchin, aur huañ pe Maatha naam ke ek aurat ulog ke welkam karis aur ghare le gais.
42010039	Maatha ke ek bahini rahi, jiske naam Meri raha, aur jon Prabhu ke goṛ ke lage beiṭh ke uske updes sunat rahi.
42010040	Maatha kaam karte karte dukhi hoy gais aur u Yeeshu ke lage jaay ke bolis, “E Prabhu, kaa tumme koi parwaah nai, ki hamaar bahini sab kaam hamaar uppar chhoṛ dees hei? Usse bolo ki u aay ke hamaar madat kare!”
42010041	Prabhu jawaab dees, “Maatha, Maatha! Tum bahut baat ke waaste wari karti aur dukhi hoti hei,
42010042	lekin ek baat ke jaruuri hei. Meri wahi cheej chunis, jon sab se achchha hei, aur u usse nai chheena jaai.”
42011001	Ek roj ek jagha pe Yeeshu preya karat raha, tab uske ek chela usse bolis, “Prabhu, hamme preya kare ke sikhaao wahi rakam jeise Yuhanna aapan chela log ke sikhaais raha.”
42011002	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jab tum preya karo, to bolo, ‘E Pita, madat kar ki tumhaar naam pawitr maana jaay, aay ke aapan raaj banaao.
42011003	Hamaar din bhar ke roṭi, hardam hamme dena.
42011004	Hamaar paap ke maafi karna, Jeise ham u sab ke maaf karta hei jon hamaar sañghe kharaab karis hei. Aur hamme ṭesṭ meñ nai laana.’ ”
42011005	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, Maan lo tum meñ se ek aadha raat ke aapan dost ke lage gay aur bolis, ‘Dost, hamme teen roṭi deo.
42011006	Hamaar ek dost hamaar ghare ghuume aais hei, lekin uske khaatir hamaar lage kuchh khaana nai hei!’
42011007	Aur maan lo u dost ghar meñ se bole, ‘Hamme tang nai karo! Palla band hei, aur hamaar sab laṛkan aur ham sota hei. Aur ham uṭh ke tumme kuchh nai de sakta.’
42011008	U tumhaar dost hei, fir bhi u uṭh ke tumme roṭi nai de hei. Lekin agar tum sarmaayga nai aur fir se usse mañgte rahega, tab u jaruur uṭh ke tumme jetna tum maañgega, otna dei.
42011009	Yahi kaaran ham tum se bolta hei, maañgo to tumme mili, khojo to tum paayga, nok karo to tumhaar khaatir khola jaai.
42011010	Kaahe ki jon koi maañgi, uske mili, jon khoji, u paai, aur jon nok kari, uske khaatir khola jaai.
42011011	Tum meñ se kon eisan baap hei ki jab tumhaar laṛka roṭi maañgi, to tum uske patthar dega, ya machhri maañgi to tum uske saañp dega?
42011012	Tum meñ se kon aapan laṛka ke añḍa ke badle bichchhu dei?
42011013	Tum kharaab hoy ke bhi aapan laṛkan ke achchha achchha cheej deta hei. To tumhaar swarag ke Pita se, agar koi Pawitr Aatma maañgi to u dewe ke waaste hardam taiyaar rahi.”
42011014	Yeeshu ek dushṭ aatma, jon guuñgi rahi, ek admi ke bhittar se nikaaris. Aur jeisehiyeñ u guuñgi aatma nikar gais, u admi baat kare laga, aur huañ pe jon bheeṛ rahis, u sab ekdam hairaan hoy gais.
42011015	Lekin kuchh admi log bolin, “I Baalazbul jon dushṭ aatma log ke agua hei, wahi iske sakti de hei ki i dushṭ aatma ke bahire nikaare sake!”
42011016	Kuchh aur log bhi Yeeshu ke ṭesṭ kare maañgat rahin. Aur ulog asmaan se ek saain maañgin.
42011017	Lekin Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ulog kon cheej soche hei, aur u bolis, “Ek raaj meñ jahañ sab koi ek dusra se jhagaṛe hei, u raaj ke naas hoy jaai. Aur ek ghar meñ jahañ jhagṛa hoy hei, uske bhi naas hoi.
42011018	Agar saitaan apne meñ jhagṛa kare, to uske raaj keise chali? Tum log bolta hei ki ham Baalazbul ke sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei.
42011019	Agar ham Baalazbul ke sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei, tab jon sab tumhaar pichchhe chale hei, u sab kiske sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaare hei? Ulog bhi tum se yahi jaane maañgi.
42011020	Lekin agar ham Parmeshwar ke taagat se dushṭ aatma nikaarta hei, to Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar lage aay gais hei.
42011021	Agar ek tagṛa admi apne aap hatiaar leke aapan ghar ke rakhwaali kare, to uske ghar baar bacha rahi.
42011022	Lekin agar ek usse bhi tagṛa admi aay ke uske haraay de, tab u wahi hatiaar jon pe ghar waala ke bharosa raha, sab leke chala jaai. Aur fir u luuṭmaari ke sab cheej baaṭ dei.
42011023	Jon hamaar sañghe nai hei, u hamaar agaiñsṭ hei. Agar tum hamaar sañghe anaaj nai baṭorta, tab tum uske chhitraata hei.”
42011024	“Jab ek dushṭ aatma ek admi meñ se nikre hei, tab u araam kare ke waaste ek jagha khoje hei. Aur jab uske weisan jagha nai mile hei, tab u bole hei, ‘Ham wahiñ lauṭ jaayga jahañ se ham nikra hei.”‘
42011025	Jab u huañ lauṭe hei, tab u ghar ke safa aur sab kuchh ṭheek ṭhaak dekhe hei,
42011026	aur tab u jaay ke apne se kharaab saat aur dushṭ aatma ke bolaay le hei, aur ghar meñ ghus jaay hei aur wahiñ rahe lage hei. Ab to u ghar ke admi ke dasa to pahile se bhi aur kharaab hoy jaay hei.
42011027	Jab Yeeshu baat karat raha, to bheeṛ meñ se ek aurat bol paṛi, “Khus kismat hei u aurat jon tumme peida karke baṛa karis hei!”
42011028	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “I sach hei, lekin ulog khush kismat hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sune hei aur uspe chale hei!”
42011029	Jeise jeise bheeṛ jaada hote raha, Yeeshu aage bolte raha, “I jamaana ke log bahut kharaab hei, tum sab khali saain khojta hei, aur ilog ke to khali Jona ke saain ke chhoṛ ke aur koi saain nai mili.
42011030	Jeise Jona, Ninweh ke log ke khaatir ek saain raha, wahi rakam Manush ke laṛka bhi i jamaana ke log ke waaste saain hoi.
42011031	Jab nyaay ke roj aai, tab saauth ke raani, Sheeba, i jamaana ke log ke beech meñ khaṛi hoy ke ulog pe dos lagaai, kaahe ke u bahut duur se Soloman ke gyaan ke baat sune aais hei, lekin hiañ to u hei jon Soloman se bhi baṛa hei.
42011032	Ninweh ke log bhi tumhaar sañghe khaṛa hoy ke tum pe dos lagaai, kaahe ke ulog Jona ke updes sun ke apne aap ke badlin, lekin hiañ to u hei jon Jona se bhi baṛa hei.”
42011033	“Koi bhi batti jaraay ke pyaala ke nichche ya kahiñ aur chhipaay ke nai rakkhe hei, lekin uske aur uppar ke jagha pe rakkhe hei ki jisse jon koi bhi ghar meñ aai u laaiṭ dekhi.
42011034	Tumhaar aañkhi tumhaar deñhi ke roshni hei. Jab tumhaar aañkhi ṭheek hei, tab tumhaar deñhi roshni se bhara hei. Lekin agar tumhaar aañkhi achchha nai hei, tab tumhaar deñhi meñ bhi añdhera bhar jaay hei.
42011035	To shua rahna ki tumhaar jon roshni hei, u añdhera nai hoy jaay.
42011036	Jab tumhaar deñhi meñ roshni hei, tab koi bhi bhaag añdhera nai rahi, sab bagal khali añjora hee añjora rahi, wahi rakam jeise jab batti bara rahe hei, tab sab bagal añjora rahe hei”
42011037	Jab Yeeshu sab bol lees, tab ek Farisi uske aapan ghare khaana pe bolaais. Yeeshu jaay ke khaana khaay beiṭhis.
42011038	U Farisi hairaan rahe gais, jab dekhis ki khaana khaay se pahile Yeeshu aapan haath nai dhois.
42011039	Lekin Prabhu Yeeshu usse bolis, “E Farisi log, tum to bartan aur pyaala bahire se dhoy deta hei, lekin bhittar se to tum laalchi, aur dushṭ hei.
42011040	Tum muurakh log! Kaa Parmeshwar duuno bahire aur bhittar nai banaais?
42011041	Lekin, jon bhi kuchh tumhaar lage hei, agar gareeb meñ baaṭ dega, to jon bhi kuchh tum karega usse Parmeshwar khusi rahi.
42011042	“Lekin E Farisi log! Tum pe haay! Tum pudeena, sudaab aur sab rakam ke masaala ke daswa bhaag to de deta hei, lekin tum log dhoka deta hei aur Parmeshwar se pyaar nai karta. Tum sab ke ek rakam dekho aur sab pe daya karo, aur aapan daswa hissa bhi deo.”
42011043	“E Farisi log! Afsos hei tumpe! Chech meñ tum sab se aage waala kursi mañgta hei, aur mañgta hei ki bajaar meñ sab koi tumme haath joṛ ke namaste kare.
42011044	Tumhaar waaste i ketna kharaab hei! Tum sab to ulog ke rakam hei, jon bina jaane kabar ke uppar se chal de hei.”
42011045	Ek Maozas ke kaanuun pe chale waala bolis, “E guru, eise baat bol ke to tum hamaar apmaan karta hei!”
42011046	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum kaanuun maane waala log pe bhi bahut afsos hei! Kaahe ke tum, sab pe khuub bojha laad deta hei, aur madat kare ke waaste ek uñgri bhi nai uṭhaata.
42011047	Tum sach much museebat meñ hei. Kaahe ke tum u nabi log ke waaste kabar banaaya hei, jon ke tumhaar baap daada log hatya kar deen raha.
42011048	Tum sab sochta hei ki tum raaiṭ kaam karta hei, nai to tum ulog ke waaste kabar nai banaata jon ke tumhaar baap daada maar ḍaaris raha.”
42011049	Yahi sab tumhaar kharaab kaam ke kaaran, Parmeshwar ke buddhi bolis, “Ham tumhaar lage nabi aur chela log ke bhejega. Aur tum usman se kuchh ke to hatya kar dega aur baaki ke sataayga.
42011050	Yahi kaaran abhi tak jetna nabi ke khuun, dunia ke suru hoy se bhais hei, uske saja ab sab log ke mili.
42011051	Isman Aibal se le ke Zekraaya ke khuun tak ke saja mila hei, jon ke hatya Parmeshwar ke ghar meñ bedi ke beech meñ bhais raha. Tum sab to jaruur iske saja bhuktega.”
42011052	“Tum kaanuun ke guru log ke khaatir ketna dukh ke baat hei! Tum to gyaan ke chaabhi apnaay lia hei, lekin bhittar khud nai jaata hei aur jon jaay maañge hei, uske bhi rokta hei.”
42011053	Jab Yeeshu huañ se jaay waala raha, tab Farisi aur ṭeecha log uske saja de ke soche lagin. Ulog Yeeshu se bahut cheej ke sawaal jawaab karin,
42011054	ki jisse ulog uske fasaay sake aur ulṭa baat pe pakaṛ le.
42012001	Jab ki hajaar meñ log Yeeshu ke agal bagal jama hoy gain, hiañ tak ki dhakkam dhukka aur ek dusra ke uppar girat paṛat rahin, tab Yeeshu sab se pahile aapan chela log se bolis, “Farisi log ke jhuuṭa parchaar se bach ke rahna. Ulog to yahi rakam ke log ke beokuuf banaay hei.
42012002	Jon kuchh bhi lukaan hei u saamne aai, aur sab seekraṭ bhi saamne aai.
42012003	Jon kuchh bhi tum añdhera meñ bolega u sab ujaala meñ sunaai dei, aur jon bhi tum band ruum meñ fusfusaayga, u chhat pe se parchaar kara jaai.”
42012004	“E dost, ham tum sab se bataata hei, log se nai ḍarna. Ulog tumme maar dei, lekin uske baad, ulog aur kuchh nai kare sake hei.
42012005	Khali Parmeshwar hei jisse, tumme ḍare ke hei. U khali tumhaar jaan nai lei, lekin u tumme narak meñ bhi feke sake hei. Yahi khaatir khali Parmeshwar hei jisse tum ḍaro!”
42012006	“Kaa paañch chiṛia khali dui peisa meñ nai bikaay hei? Lekin Parmeshwar usman se ek ke bhi nai bhulaay hei.
42012007	Hiañ tak ki tumhaar muuṛ ke ek ek baar bhi gina gais hei. Yahi khaatir, nai ḍaro! Tum to bahut chiṛia se bhi jaada keemti hei!”
42012008	“Agar tum sab ke bataayga ki tum hamaar hei, tab Manush ke laṛka, Parmeshwar ke ainjals se bataai ki tum sab hamaar pichchhe chalta hei.
42012009	Lekin agar tum log manush ke saamne hamme nai apnaayga, tab tum log bhi Parmeshwar ke ainjal ke saamne nai apnaawa jaayga.
42012010	Agar tum Manush ke laṛka ke agaiñsṭ baat karega, tab tum maaf kar dewa jaayga, lekin agar tum Pawitr Aatma ke agaiñsṭ baat karega, tab tum maaf nai kara jaayga.”
42012011	“Jab tumme ofisa log ke saamne laawa jaai, tab tum chinta nai karna ki tum aapan bachaao meñ kaa bolega.
42012012	Kaahe ke Pawitr Aatma tumme wahi ṭaaim bataai ki tumme kon cheej bole ke hei.”
42012013	Bheeṛ meñ se ek admi Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru, hamaar bhaiya se bolo ki u hamaar sheya, jon hamaar bappa ham log ke khaatir chhoṛ gais raha, hamme de de.”
42012014	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamme kon u adhikaar dees hei ki ham tum log ke jaj bani aur sheya baaṭi?”
42012015	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Saaodhaan raho, aur laalach se apne aap ke bachaao, kaahe ke koi ke jeewan uske dhan daulat se baṛa nai hoy hei.”
42012016	Aur Tab Yeeshu i kahaani sunaais, Ek dhani admi ke khet meñ khuub fasal bhais,
42012017	aur u aapan man meñ sochis, “Ham kon cheej kari? Hamaar lage to i sab rakkhe ke etna baṛa jagha nai hei.”
42012018	Baad meñ u bolis, “Ham janta hei ki hamme kon cheej kare ke hei. Ham aapan i godaam tuuṛ ke aur baṛa godaam wahiñ pe banaayga, aur wahi meñ ham aapan sab anaaj aur baaki cheej bhi rakkhega.
42012019	Aur tab ham apne aap se bolega, ‘Tum aapan waaste bahut saal ke khaatir cheej baṭor lia hei. Ab jio! Khaao, pio, aur mauj masti karo!’
42012020	Lekin Parmeshwar usse bolis, ‘Beokuuf! Tum aaj raat ke mar jaayga. Tab jon sab cheej tum baṭora hei u kiske hoi?”’
42012021	“Eisane u admi hei jon aapan waaste peisa baṭore hei, lekin Parmeshwar ke najar meñ dhani nai hei.”
42012022	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham tum log se bataata hei ki aapan jeewan ke waaste wari nai karo! I nai socho ki tum kon cheej khaayga aur kon cheej pahinega.
42012023	Khaana aur kapṛa se kahiñ jaada baṛh ke jeewan hei.
42012024	Kaua ke dekho! Ulog naa to kuchh bowe hei aur naa to kaaṭe hei, aur ulog ke lage rakkhe ke waaste jagha bhi nai hei. Lekin Parmeshwar u sab ke dekh bhaal kare hei! Aur tum to i chiṛia se jaada keemti hei!
42012025	Tum log meñ se kon hei jon wari kare se aapan jeewan lamba kare lei?.
42012026	Agar tum chhoṭa chhoṭa kaam nai kare sakta tab aur baat ke wari kaahe karta?
42012027	Dekho keise jañgli fuul fulaay hei! Ulog mehnat kar ke aapan kapṛa nai banaay hei. Aur i bhi sun lo, Soloman bhi aapan sab peisa se, i fuul ke rakam kapṛa nai pahine sakis.
42012028	Parmeshwar to jañgli graas ke bhi jon aaj hei aur kal aagi meñ feñk dewa jaai, u sab ke sundar sundar kapṛa pahinaay hei, to tumme kaahe nai pahinaai? Tumhaar biswaas ketna chhoṭa hei!
42012029	Wari nai karo ki kaa khaay ke hei aur kaa piye ke hei.
42012030	Khali wahi log jon Parmeshwar ke nai jaane hei, i sab cheej ke khaatir wari kari. Tumhaar Pita jaane hei ki tumme kaa chaahi.
42012031	Khali Parmeshwar ke raaj ke khojte raho, aur baaki sab kuchh tumme mil jaai.
42012032	“E hamaar chhoṭa chela log ke jhunḍ, ḍaro nai! Tumhaar Pita tumme raaj de maañge hei.
42012033	Jon kuchh bhi tumhaar lage hei, u sab bech ke aur gareeb meñ baaṭ deo. Aapan waaste eisan pes banaao jon kabhi faṭi nai, iske matlab hei ki swarag meñ eisan dhan baṭoro, jahañ naa to koi choraay sake hei aur naa to usman koi kirwa paṛe sake hei.
42012034	Tumhaar dil wahiñ laga rahi jahañ tumhaar khajaana hei.”
42012035	“Hardam taiyaar raho aur aapan batti baare raho,
42012036	ṭheek u naukar log ke rakam jon aapan maalik ke saadi meñ se lauṭe tak waiṭ kara kare hei. Jeise u aay ke nok kare hei, naukar wahi lage palla khol de hei.
42012037	U naukar log ketna khush naseeb hei, jon ke maalik lauṭe pe ulog ke jagte aur taiyaar paay hei! Ham tum se bataata hei ki u maalik aapan koṭ utaar ke aur aapan naukar ke beiṭhaay ke khaana khawaai aur sewa kari.
42012038	U naukar log khush naseeb hei jon ke maalik ulog ke taiyaar paay hei, chaahe u aadha raat ke aay ya dusra roj sabere!
42012039	I yaad rakhna ki agar ghar ke maalik janta ki kab chor aai, tab u aapan ghar meñ chori nai hoy deta.
42012040	Yahi kaaran hardam taiyaar raho, kaahe ke koi nai jaane hei ki Manush ke laṛka kab aai.”
42012041	Tab Peeṭa bolis, “E Prabhu, i kahaani khali tum ham se bataata hei, ki sab log se?”
42012042	Prabhu jawaab dees, “Eisan laayk aur samajhdaar naukar kon hei? I wahi hei jon ke maalik aapan sab naukar ke uppar ke leeḍa banaay hei ki u sab log ke ṭaaim se bhojan paani dei.
42012043	Khush naseeb hei u naukar jiske maalik jab lauṭe to uske weisaiyeñ karte paay!
42012044	Ham tum se bataata hei ki maalik eisan naukar ke aapan puura kaarbaar sambhaale ke de dei.
42012045	Lekin agar u naukar aapan man meñ i baat soche, ki uske maalik ke lauṭe meñ deri hei, aur baaki naukar ke maare peeṭe, aur apne khaay piye meñ laga rahe aur nasa meñ hoy jaay.
42012046	Aur eise hoi ki maalik wahi roj lauṭi jon roj uske koi waiṭ nai karat hoi, aur tab kaa hoi, uske maalik uske kaṛa se kaṛa saja deke bahire ulog ke sañghe chhoṛ dei jon pe bharosa nai kara jaay sake hei.
42012047	Agar naukar log u kaam kare ke taiyaar nai rahe hei, jon ulog ke maalik chaahe hei, tab ulog ke bahut maar lagi.
42012048	Lekin u naukar jon nai jaane ki ulog ke maalik kon cheej maañge hei, aur maar khaay ke kaam kare hei, to ulog ke kamti maar paṛi. Jon ke sab se jaada dewa gais hei, usse jaada maañga jaai, aur jon ke bahut jaada dewa gais hei, usse to aur jaada maañga jaai.”
42012049	“Ham dharti pe aagi lagaay aaya hei, aur yahi mañgta hei ki u jaldi se sulag jaay!
42012050	Hamme to abhi ek baptisma lewe ke hei, aur jab tak u hoy nai jaai, hamme bahut dukh sahe ke paṛi!
42012051	Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ham hiañ mel karaay aaya hei? Nai, ham to alag kare aaya hei.
42012052	Kaahe ki ab se jon ghar meñ paañch log hei, ulog meñ aksar jhagṛa hote rahi, teen ke agaiñsṭ dui, aur dui ke agaiñsṭ teen.
42012053	Sab ek dusra ke agaiñsṭ rahiyeñ, baap, beṭa ke aur beṭa, baap ke. Maañ, beṭi ke aur beṭi, maañ ke. Saas, bahu ke aur bahu, saas ke.”
42012054	Yeeshu bheeṛ se bolis, “Jab tum wesṭ se baadar aate dekhta hei, tab tum bolta hei, ‘Paani barsi,’ aur barse bhi hei.
42012055	Jab saauth se hawa chale hei, tab tum bolta hei, ‘Bahut jaada garam paṛi,’ aur weisaiyeñ hoy hei.
42012056	E muurakh log! Tum dharti aur asmaan dekh ke bataay sakta hei ki kaa hoy waala hei, lekin tum i nai janta ki abhi kaa hoy waala hei?”
42012057	“Kaahe nai tum apne aap samajh jaata hei ki kon raaiṭ cheej kare ke hei?
42012058	Jab koi tum pe dos lagaay hei, koṭ jaay se pahile uske hal kar leo. Agar tum eise nai kara to jaj ke aage ghaseeṭa jaayga. Aur tab jaj tumme jel ke adhikaari ke de dei, huañ tumme jel meñ band kar dewa jaai.
42012059	Tum huañ se nai chhuuṭ paayga jab tak ek ek senṭ nai chukaay dega.”
42013001	Wahi ṭaaim Yeeshu ke bataawa gais ki Paaylaṭ kuchh Galeeli log ke marwaais raha jab ulog balidaan chaṛhaay gain raha.
42013002	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ilog jon maara gain raha, u baaki Galeeli log se jaada paapi rahin, aur yahi kaaran u sab ke i dasa bhais raha?
42013003	Hargiz nai! Lekin tumme ham bataata hei ki agar tum nai pastaayga, to tum sab bhi maara jaayga.
42013004	U aṭhaara (18) log ke sañghe kon cheej bhais raha, jon log ke uppar Shiloh ke ṭaawa (tower) gira aur u sab dab ke mar gain. Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ulog Yarushalam meñ rahe waala log se jaada kharaab log rahin?
42013005	Hargiz nai! Lekin jab tak tum nai pastaayga, tum sab bhi yahi rakam naas hoy jaayga.”
42013006	Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais, “Ek admi ke ek añguur ke khet raha aur usman ek anjeer ke peṛ bhi bois raha. Ek roj u admi usman se anjeer khoje gais, lekin uske ek bhi nai mila.
42013007	Tab u gaaḍna ke bolaay ke bolis, ‘Ham teen saal se i anjeer ke peṛ meñ fal khojte raha, lekin ek bhi nai mila. Iske kaaṭ ḍaaro! Khaahe ke jhuuṭṭe ke i jagha ghere hei?’
42013008	Gaaḍna jawaab dees, ‘Maalik, i saal iske aur rahe deo, ham iske chaaro taraf khod ke khaad ḍaarega.
42013009	Aay waala saal agar isman fal nai lagi to jaruur ham iske kaaṭ dega.’ ”
42013010	Ek sabat ke roj Yeeshu ek Yahuudi ke parchaar kare waala jagha pe parchaar karat raha.
42013011	Wahiñ pe ek aurat rahi jon ke aṭhaara saal se dushṭ aatma bimaar rakkhis raha, uske kamar ṭehṛa hoy gais raha aur u koi rakam se seedha nai hoy sakat rahi.
42013012	Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis, tab aapan lage bolaay ke usse bolis, “E aurat, tum ab aapan bimaari se achchhi hoy gayi hei.”
42013013	U aurat ke uppar haath rakkhis, aur wahi lage u seedha khaṛi hoy gais aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagis.
42013014	Huañ ke jon dekh bhaal karat raha, u Yeeshu pe bahut gussa bhais, kaahe ke u sabat ke roj koi ke achchha karis raha. Aur tab u sab log se bolis, “Ek hapta meñ chhe roj hoy hei jab hamme kaam kare ke rahe hei. Aur wahi ṭaaim aay ke aapan bimaari dekhaao, sabat ke roj nai.”
42013015	Prabhu tab jawaab dees, “Tum log kon ke bahkaay mañgta hei? Kaa tum meñ se koi aapan beil ya gadha ke khol ke sabat ke roj paani piaay nai le jaata hei?
42013016	I aurat jon Abraham ke gharaane ke hei, saitaan iske aṭhaara saal tak jakaṛ ke rakkhe raha. Kaa sabat ke roj iske bañdhan se mukti nai mile sake?”
42013017	Yeeshu ke jawaab se sab dusman log sarmaay gain. Lekin aur jon log huañ rahin, u sab khusi bhain i dekh ke ki Yeeshu keisan keisan kaam kare hei.
42013018	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj keisan hei? Uske ham kis se tulna kari?
42013019	U eisan hei ki jab koi ek raai ke daana le jaay ke gaaḍan meñ boy de hei. Daana jame hei aur ek baṛa peṛ hoy jaay hei, aur chiṛia usman aapan ghosla banaay hei.”
42013020	Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj ke tulna ham kisse kari?
42013021	I eisan hei ki jab ek aurat aaṭa ke tisra hissa meñ yeesṭ milaay hei. Aur thoṛa deri meñ sab aaṭa fuul ke ḍher hoy jaay hei.”
42013022	Yeeshu, nagar nagar, gaaoñ gaaoñ parchaar karte karte, Yarushalam ke bagal chala jaat raha.
42013023	Tab koi usse puuchhis, “E Prabhu, kaa khali thoṛa log hee bache saki?” Yeeshu jawaab dees,
42013024	“Patra palla se bhittar jaay ke kosis karo! Ham tum log se bataata hei ki bahut log patra palla se bhittar jaay ke kosis kari lekin jaay nai paai.
42013025	Jab ghar ke maalik uṭh ke ghar ke palla band kar de hei aur tum bahire khaṛa hoy ke palla nok karta hei, ‘E Swaami, hamaar waaste palla khol deo!’ Tab u boli, 'Ham tumme nai janta! tum kahañ se aaya hei.’
42013026	Tab tum bolega, ‘Ham to tumhaar sañghe khaaya pia, aur tum to hamaar ṭaaun meñ parchaar kara!”
42013027	Lekin u boli, ‘Ham to tumme sachche ke nai janta hei! E dushṭ log! Ham se duur hoy jaao!’
42013028	Tab tum daañt peesega aur royga kaahe ke tum Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ Abraham, Aayzak, Jaykab aur sab nabi ke dekhega, jab tum log ke bahire feka jaai.
42013029	Aur tab log eesṭ aur wesṭ, noth aur saauth se aay ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ bhojan kari.
42013030	Aur dekhna, jon pichchhe hei, u aage hoy jaai, aur jon koi aage hei u sab pichchhe rahe jaai.”
42013031	Ṭheek wahi ṭaaim kuchh Farisi aay ke Yeeshu se bolin, “Hiañ se chala jaao, kaahe ke Heraḍ tumme maare maañge hei.”
42013032	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “U lomṛi se jaay ke bolo, ‘Ham aaj aur kal dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei aur bimaar log ke achchha karta hei aur tisra roj hamaar kaam khalaas hoy jaai.’
42013033	Lekin hamme aaj, kal aur parso jaruur jaay ke hei. Kaahe ke i hoy nai sake ki koi nabi Yarushalam ke bahire maara jaai.”
42013034	“E Yarushalam! E Yarushalam! Tumhaar log to nabi log ke maar deen hei aur jon jon tumhaar lage bheja gain hei, ulog ke patthar se maarin hei! Ketna dafe ham mañgta raha ki jeise murgi aapan bachcha ke aapan pañkha ke nichche lukaay le hei, wahi rakam tumhaar bachchan ke saathe ham bhi kari.
42013035	Dekho, ab tumhaar Mandir ujaaṛa jaai, aur tum hamme u ṭaaim tak nai dekhega jab tak i nai bolega, ‘Ki dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei!”
42014001	Ek sabat ke roj, jab Yeeshu ek khaas Farisi ke ghare khaana khaay gais raha, tab uske bagal sab log dhyaan se dekhat rahin.
42014002	Aur achaanak huañ pe ek admi aais jiske haath aur goṛ fuula raha.
42014003	Yeeshu, Farisi log aur ruuls banaay waala baṛkua log se puuchhis, “Kaa i ṭheek hei ki sabat ke roj koi ke changa kara jaay?”
42014004	Lekin ulog chuppe rahin aur kuchh nai bolin. Yeeshu u bimaar admi ke haath pakṛis aur uske ṭheek kar ke ghare bhej dees.
42014005	Tab Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Agar tum meñ se koi ke bul ya laṛka kuaañ meñ gir jaay tab kaa tum uske wahiñ chhoṛ dega kaahe ki u sabat ke roj hei, aur uske wahi lage bahire nai nikaarega?”
42014006	Ulog ke paas koi jawaab nai raha.
42014007	Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki kon rakam pahuna log aapan aapan waaste achchha achchha jagha khoje hei, tab u ulog se bataais,
42014008	“Jab tumme koi saadi meñ bulaay hei, tab sab se achchha jagha pe nai beiṭhna, kaahe ke ulog shaayd tum se bhi baṛa koi aur ke bhi bulaain hoi.
42014009	Aur fir ghar waala tum se aay ke boli, “Aapan jagha iske de deo, kaahe ki i tum se baṛa hei.” Tab tumme sarmaay ke dusra jagha beiṭhe ke paṛi.
42014010	Lekin agar tumme saadi meñ bulaawa jaay aur tum jaay ke pichchhe jagha khoj ke beiṭha, aur gharwaala aay ke tum se boli, “Dost, hiañ nai lekin i aage waala kursi pe beiṭho.” Tab tumhaar aadar sab ke saamne hoi.
42014011	Kaahe ki agar koi samjhe ki u sab se baṛa hei, tab uske nichche kara jaai, aur jon apne aap ke chhoṭa samjhe hei, uske baṛa kara jaai.”
42014012	Tab Yeeshu, jon uske bulaais raha, usse bolis, “Agar tum koi ke khaana pe bolaata hei, to aapan dost, bhaiya, saga palwaar, ya dhani log ke nai bolaana, kahiñ eise nai hoy jaay ki ulog bhi tumme badle meñ bolaay le aur jon cheej tum ulog ke sañghe kara hei u tumme lauṭaay de.
42014013	Lekin jab tumme koi ke khaana pe bolaay ke hei, to gareeb, langṛa luula, aur añdha log ke bolaao.
42014014	Tumme aasheesh mili kaahe ki ulog tumme lauṭaay ke nai bolaai, lekin uske badle meñ jab uske log jinda hoy jaai, tab uske fal tumme mili.”
42014015	Tab uske sañghe khaana khaaywaala ek mehmaan usse bolis, “Ulog ketna khush kismat hei jon Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ khaana khaai!”
42014016	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ek dafe ek admi ek baṛa paaṭi rakkhis, aur usman bahut log ke bolaais.
42014017	Jab sab khaana taiyaar hoy gais, tab aapan naukar ke bolaay ke u bolis ki sab pahuna log se jaay ke bolo, ‘Aao, khaana taiyaar hei.’ ”
42014018	Lekin sab ke sab bahaana banaay lagin. Ek to bolis, 'Ham ek khet khareeda hei, hamme jaay ke uske dekhe ke hei. Hamme maaf kar deo, ham nai aay paayga.’
42014019	Dusra bolis, ‘Ham aaj paañch joṛi bul khareeda hei, hamme u sab ke traay ke hei. Hamme maaf kar dena, ham nai aay paayga.’
42014020	Ek aur bolis, “Ham aaj saadi kara, yahi kaaran ham nai aay sakta.”
42014021	Naukar aay ke aapan maalik se sab baat bataais. Aur tab ghar ke maalik gussaay ke naukar se bolis, “Ṭaaun ke kona kona meñ jaay ke jetna langṛa luula, añdha aur gareeb log mile, u sab ke jaldi se hiañ le aao.”
42014022	Aur jab naukar lauṭis, tab maalik se bolis, ‘Maalik, jeise tum ham se bola raha, weisaiyeñ ham kara, lekin abhi bhi aur log ke waaste bahut jagha hei.’
42014023	Tab maalik bolis, “Jaao aur rasta rasta, kona kona chhaan leo, jon koi bhi mile, ulog ke jabran le aao, ki jisse hamaar ghar puura ke puura bhar jaay.
42014024	Ham tum se bolta hei ki jiske ham pahile bolaaya raha, usman se koi ek bhi hamaar khaana nai cheekhi!’ ”
42014025	Aur jab, ek baṛa bheeṛ Yeeshu ke sañghe chalat raha to u ghuum ke ulog se bolis,
42014026	“Agar koi hamaar pichchhe aay maañge hei, lekin aapan amma bappa, aurat aur laṛkan, bhaiya-bahini aur hiañ tak ki aapan jaan se bahut prem kare hei, to u hamaar chela nai bane sake hei.
42014027	Agar koi aapan kros uṭhaay ke hamaar pichchhe nai chali, to hamaar chela nai bane saki.
42014028	Maan leo, tum ek mahal banaay mañgta hei. To sab se pahile tum kaa karega? Kaa tum beiṭh ke hisaab kitaab nai karega ki ketna kharcha beiṭhi?
42014029	Nai to jab tum faaunḍeishan ḍaar dega aur fir uske puura nai kar paayga, to sab log tum pe hasi.
42014030	Ulog boli, ‘I admi mahal banaay ke suru to karis, lekin puura nai kare paais.’
42014031	Kaa koi eisan raaja hei jon laṛaai kare jaai aur pahile beiṭh ke sallaah nai kari ki uske lage khali das hajaar saulja hei, aur uske dusman ke lage bees hajaar, tab hamla keise kara jaai?
42014032	Agar uske hamla kare ke taagat nai hei to u duur khaṛa hoy ke aapan duut bheji, aur saanti aur mel ke baat cheet kari.
42014033	Yahi rakam, tum meñ se koi hamaar chela nai bane sake hei jab tak tum aapan sab kuchh chhoṛ nai deo.’ ”
42014034	“Neemak to achchha hei, lekin agar uske sawaad chala jaay, to kon cheej se sawaad kara jaai?
42014035	Ab to u naa to khaad ke kaam aay sake aur naa to maṭṭi ke, khali uske bahire feka jaay hei. Agar tumhaar lage kaan hei aur tum sune sakta hei, to suno!”
42015001	Ek roj ṭeks baṭore waala aur paapi log Yeeshu Maseeh ke lage uske sune ke waaste aain.
42015002	Farisi aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke ṭeecha log bhunbhunaay lagin aur bolin, “I admi to paapi log ke sañghe mile hei aur wahi log ke sañghe khaay piye hei!”
42015003	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais,
42015004	“Agar tumhaar lage ek sao bheṛa rahta aur usman se ek heraay jaay, to tum kaa karta? Kaa tum u naainṭinaain ke khula meidaan meñ chhoṛ ke u ek jon heraay gais hei, uske jab tak mil nai jaay, nai khojta?
42015005	Aur jab u mil jaay to uske tum aapan kañdha pe uṭhaay ke khusi se,
42015006	ghare laay ke aapan dost aur paṛosi ke bolaay ke bolta hei, ‘Khusi manaao! Kaahe ke hamaar jon bheṛa heraay gais raha, u mil gais hei.’
42015007	Ham tumme bataata hei ki yahi rakam ek man firaay waala paapi ke waaste swarag meñ bhi bahut khusi manaawa jaai, jab ek paapi u sao meñ se Parmeshwar ke bagal ghuumi aur naainṭinaain achchha log ke ghuume ke nai jaruurat hei.”
