42015008	Aur tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek aur kahaani sunaais, “U aurat kon cheej kari jis ke lage das chaañdi ke sikka hei, aur usman se ek heraay jaay. Kaa u batti baar ke aur jhaaṛu lagaay ke tab tak nai khoji jab tak uske u mil nai jaai?
42015009	Aur jab mil jaai tab aapan dost ke bolaay ke boli, 'Aao hamaar sañghe khusi manaao, kaahe ke ham jon sikka heraay dia raha, u ab mil gais hei.’
42015010	Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Yahi rakam Parmeshwar ke ainjals bhi khusi manaai, jab ek paapi aapan paap se pastaai.”
42015011	Yeeshu ulog se ek aur kahaani bataais, “Ek admi ke dui laṛka rahin.
42015012	Usman se jon chhoṭa raha, u aapan bappa ke lage aay ke bolis, “E bappa, jon hamaar hissa ke peisa hei, u hamme de deo.” Aur uske bappa weisaiyeñ karis. Jetna peisa raha, duuno meñ aadha aadha baaṭ dees.
42015013	Aur tab thoṛa roj meñ chhoṭa laṛka aapan hissa leke pardes chala gais, aur huañ puura peisa bekaar kaam meñ luṭaay dees.
42015014	U aapan puura peisa khalaas kar dees, aur wahi ṭaaim u des meñ akaal paṛ gais, aur u kangaal hoy gay.
42015015	Aur tab u jaay ke wahiñ ek admi ke ghare kaam kare laga, u admi uske khet meñ suar charaay ke waaste bhejis.
42015016	U bahut bhuuka raha, aur suar ke khaana khaay maañgat raha, uske koi khaana dewe ke taiyaar nai raha.
42015017	Aakhiri meñ u aapan hosh meñ aais aur bolis, ‘Hamaar bappa ke ketna naukar hei aur ulog ke peṭ bhar ke khaana mile hei, aur ham hiañ bhukke marta hei!
42015018	Ham aapan bappa ke lage jaayga aur usse bolega, ‘E bappa, hamme maaf kar deo. Ham tumhaar aur Parmeshwar ke agaiñsṭ paap kara hei.
42015019	Ab ham tumhaar laṛka bolaay ke kaabil nai hei, hamme ab ek naukar samajh ke rakh leo.’ ”
42015020	Aur wahi lage u uṭh ke aapan bappa ke ghare jaay laga. Lekin jab u ghar se kuchh duur pe raha ki uske bappa uske aate dekh lees aur uske uspe taras aay gais, aur dauṛ ke aapan laṛka ke gale lagaais aur chumma le lees.
42015021	U laṛka bolis, “E bappa, ham to tumhaar aur Parmeshwar ke agaiñsṭ paap kara hei, aur ab ham tumhaar laṛka bolaay laayk nai hei.”
42015022	Lekin uske bappa aapan naukar se bolis, “Jaldi se achchha achchha kapṛa laao, aur iske pahinaao. Iske haath meñ chhalla aur goṛ meñ juuta pahinaao,
42015023	aur jaldi se ek moṭa waala bachhṛa maaro aur pakaao, aur ham sab khaay ke khusi manaayga!
42015024	Kaahe ke i jon hamaar laṛka mar gais raha, ab jinda hoy gais hei aur heraay gais raha, ab mil gais hei.” Aur sab khusi manaay lagin.
42015025	Etne meñ uske baṛa laṛka, jon khet meñ kaam karat raha, ghare lauṭis, aur gaana bajaana aur naache ke awaaj sunis.
42015026	U ek naukar ke bolaay ke puuchhis, “I kaa hoy hei?”
42015027	Naukar bolis, “Tumhaar chhoṭa bhaiya lauṭ aais hei, aur yahi khaatir jab tumhaar bappa uske bhala changa dekhis, to khusi hoy ke sab se moṭa bachhṛa kaṭwaais hei.”
42015028	Aur tab u baṛa bhaiya gussaay gais aur ghar ke bhittar nai jaay maañgis. Ispe uske bappa bahire aay ke baṛa laṛka ke bhittar chale ke chirauri kare laga.
42015029	Lekin u aapan bappa se bolis, “Ham etna saal se tumhaar sewa karte raha, aur tumhaar ek baat bhi nai ṭaala, lekin tum aaj tak hamme ek bakri ke bachcha bhi nai dia ki ham aapan yaar dost ke bolaay ke paaṭi kari.
42015030	Aur tumhaar i laṛka jon tumhaar sab peisa veshya pe luṭaay dees, aur ab tum uske khaatir ek moṭa bachhṛa kaṭwaaya!”
42015031	Uske bappa bolis, “Hamaar beṭa, tum to hardam hamaar sañghe hei, aur jon kuchh hamaar hei u tumhaar to hei.
42015032	Lekin hamme khusi manaay ke chaahi kaahe ke i jon tumhaar bhaiya hei, i mar gais raha, aur ab jinda hoy gais hei, heraay gais raha, ab mil gais hei.”
42016001	Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, Ek dhani admi ke ek meneja raha, jon uske kaam ke dekh bhaal karat raha. Lekin koi aay ke dhani admi ke bataais ki meneja uske peisa khuub uṛaay hei.
42016002	Dhani admi uske bolaay ke bolis, “I ham tumhaar baare meñ kaa sunta hei? Hamme bataao ki tum kon cheej kara hei! Ab tum hamaar meneja nai rahe sakta.”
42016003	Ab u meneja aapan man meñ sochis, “Ab ham kon cheej karega, hamaar maalik to hamme kaam se nikaare hei. Ham to mohṛhi bhi nai khode sakta, aur bheek maañge ke saram lage hei.
42016004	Ham samajh gaya ki hamme kaa kare ke chaahi ki jisse hamaar kaam bhi nai chhuuṭi aur sab koi aapan ghar meñ hamme ijjat se bolaai.”
42016005	Aur tab u ek ek karke aapan maalik ke sab karajdaar ke bolaais aur sab se pahila admi se puuchhis, “Tum hamaar maalik ke ketna karja hei?”
42016006	U admi bolis, “Ek sao leeṭa tel.” Meneja usse bolis, “I aapan bil leo aur beiṭh ke jaldi se isman ‘pachaas (50) ’ likho.”
42016007	Tab u dusra admi se puuchhis, “Tumhaar ketna karja hei?” U bolis, “Ek hajaar basta geñhu,” “I tumhaar hisaab hei, isman ‘aaṭh sao’ likho.”
42016008	Aur tab uske maalik u dhokebaaj meneja ke khuub baṛaai karis, kaahe ke u chalaaki se kaam nikaar lees raha, kaahe ke i ṭaaim ke log eisan bartaao kare hei ki jon roshni meñ kaam kare hei, ulog se bhi jaada chalaak rahe hei.
42016009	Ham tum se bolta hei, “Chalaaki ke peisa se aapan dost to banaay lega. Lekin jab u khalaas hoy jaai, tab tum anant jeewan meñ bulaay lia jaayga.
42016010	Jon koi ke chhoṭa chhoṭa baat pe biswaas kara jaay sake hei, u baṛa baat pe biswaas ke laayk hei. Aur jon pe chhoṭa baat ke biswaas nai kara jaay sake hei, tab u baṛa baat pe bhi biswaas kare laayk nai hoi.
42016011	Agar tumme paap ke dhan pe biswaas nai kara jaay sake hei to tumme kon sachcha dhan saupi?
42016012	Agar tum dusra ke dhan pe biswaas kare ke laayk nai hei, to jon tumhaar hei u tumme kaahe ke koi dei?”
42016013	“Tum dui maalik ke naukar nai hoy sakta hei. Tum ek ke dusra se jaada chaahega ya ek ke nai laaik karega aur dusra se jaada prem karega. Tum Parmeshwar aur peisa ke ek sañghe nai sewa kare sakta.”
42016014	Farisi log bahut jaada peisa se pyaar karat rahin. Aur jab ulog sunin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei, to uske khilli uṛaay lagin.
42016015	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tumahi log hei jon apne aap ke bahut achchha samajhta hei, lekin Parmeshwar tum sab ke dil ke baare meñ jaane hei. U sab jon admi ke khaatir bahut mahañga hei, Parmeshwar ke saamne bahut sasta hei.”
42016016	“Yuhanna baptisma de waala ke ṭaaim tak, Maozas ke kaanuun aur nabi log Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ susamaachaar parchaar karin raha aur, sab koi jabarjasti usman ghuse maañge hei.
42016017	Asmaan aur jameen heraay jaay sake hei, lekin Maozas ke kaanuun se ek chhoṭa baat bhi nai heraay sake hei.
42016018	Jon admi aapan aurat ke chhoṛ ke dusra aurat se saadi kar le hei, u byabhichaar kare hei. Aur jon u aurat se saadi kare hei jon ke admi uske chhoṛ dees hei, u bhi byabhichaar (aḍalṭri) kare hei.”
42016019	Ek dhani admi raha jon hardam mahañga kapṛa pahinat raha, aur hardam chamak dhamak aur bahut sukh se rahat raha.
42016020	Dusra bagal Laazras naam ke ek bahut gareeb admi, jon ghaao se bhara raha, aur u dhani admi ke faaṭak pe hardam chhoṛa jaat raha,
42016021	ki jisse u aapan peṭ, jon u dhani admi ke ṭaibal se tukṛa gire, wahi se bhar le. Aur khali yahi nai, kutta bhi uske ghaao ke chaaṭa karat rahin.
42016022	Eisan bhais ki jon kangaal admi raha, u mar gais aur ainjals aay ke uske Abraham ke godi meñ pahuñchaay dees. U dhani admi bhi mara aur uske maṭṭi de dewa gais.
42016023	U dhani admi narak gais, aur bahut peeṛa sahis, aur aapan aañkhi uṭhaais to dekhis ki u kangaal Laazras Abraham ke godi meñ hei.
42016024	Tab u dhani admi jor se Abraham se bolis, “Ham pe daya karo! Laazras ke bhejo ki u aapan uñgri paani meñ bhijaay ke hamaar jeebh ke ṭhañḍa kare, kaahe ke ham to i aagi meñ taṛapta hei!”
42016025	Lekin Abraham bolis, “Yaad karo beṭa, tum aapan laaif meñ bahut sukh uṭhaaya, tumhaar lage sab achchha cheej raha aur Laazras ke lage sab kharaab cheej raha, lekin ab i to saanti paais hei aur tum taṛapta hei.
42016026	Iske chhoṛ ke tumhaar aur hamaar beech meñ ek gahira gaḍḍha hei, agar hiañ se koi u paar jaay maañge to nai jaay sake hei, aur huañ se koi hiañ aay maañge to nai aay sake.”
42016027	Tab u dhani admi bolis, “E Abraham, hamaar pita, ham binti karta hei ki Laazras ke hamaar bappa ke ghare bhejo,
42016028	kaahe ke hamaar lage paañch bhaiya hei, ulog ke chetaaoni de ke hei, kahiñ eise nai hoy ki ulog bhi i narak meñ aay jaai.”
42016029	Abraham bolis, “Tumhaar bhaiya log ke lage Maozas aur baaki nabi ke buks hei, ulog uske suni.”
42016030	Dhani admi bolis, “E Pita Abraham, etna bas nai hei. Agar murda se lauṭ ke koi ulog ke lage jaay, tabahi ulog badli.”
42016031	Lekin Abraham bolis, “Agar ulog Maozas aur nabi ke nai suni, to jon murda se lauṭ ke jaai, uske bhi nai maani.”
42017001	Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Hardam kuchh naa kuchh rahi jon log ke paap kare ke kaaran hoy sake hei, aur jon i karaay hei, uspe afsos hei!
42017002	Yahi achchha hota agar uske gaṭai meñ ek baṛa patthar baañdh ke aur uske samundar meñ giraay dewa jaay, ki jisse u chhoṭa log se paap nai karwaay.
42017003	Yahi kaaran saaodhaan raho. “Agar tumhaar bhaiya paap kare hei to uske ḍaaṭo, aur agar u pastaay hei to uske maaf kar deo.
42017004	Agar u ek roj meñ saat dafe tumhaar agaiñsṭ paap kare aur fir aay ke saato dafe tum se maafi maañge aur bole, ‘Ham pastaata hei,’ to tum uske maaf kar deo.”
42017005	Tab chela log Yeeshu se bolis, “Ham log ke biswaas majbuut banaao!”
42017006	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tumhaar biswaas sarso ke daana ke baraabar hota, aur tum malbari ke peṛ se bolta, ‘Jaṛ se ukhaṛ ke jaao aur samundar meñ lag jaao,’ to u tumhaar baat maan leta.
42017007	Tum meñ se kon hei ki jab tumhaar naukar jon khet jote hei aur bheṛa charaay hei, aur jab u khet se lauṭ ke aay, to u usse boli, ‘Jaao jaldi se khaana khaay leo?’
42017008	Nai, tum i nai bolega. Tum bolega ‘Hamaar khaana banaao, aur jab tak ham khaai pee, tab tak tum hamaar sewa karo, tab tum khaay pee lena.’
42017009	Kaa ek naukar ke uske maalik uske sewa kare ke khaatir dhanbaad nai de sake hei?
42017010	Aur yahi rakam tum bhi jab u sab kaam kar leta hei, jon tumme dewa gais hei tab bolo, ‘Ham to wahi maamuli kaam kara jon hamme kare ke raha.’ ”
42017011	Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam ke taraf jaat raha, tab Saamria aur Galeel ke beech se hoy ke nikris.
42017012	Aur ek gaaoñ meñ gais, to thoṛa duur pe khaṛa das koṛhi uske milin.
42017013	Ulog chillaay ke bolin, “E Yeeshu, E Swaami, ham pe daya karo!”
42017014	Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Jaao aur apne aap ke paadri ke dekhaao.” Aur eise bhais ki rasta meñ jaate jaate ulog ṭheek hoy gain.
42017015	Aur jab usman se ek dekhis ki u achchha hoy gais hei, tab bahut jor se chillaay ke Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte lauṭ aais.
42017016	U muh ke bal Yeeshu ke goṛ pe gir paṛis aur uske bahut dhanbaad dees. U admi ek Saamri raha.
42017017	Is pe Yeeshu puuchhis, “Kaa das admi achchha nai bhain raha? To u nao admi kahañ hei?
42017018	Kaahe ke khali ekke pardesi Parmeshwar ke dhanbaad de ke waaste lauṭ ke aais hei?”
42017019	Tab Yeeshu u admi se bolis, “Uṭho aur jaao, tumhaar biswaas tumme achchha kar dees hei.”
42017020	Kuchh Farisi Yeeshu se puuchhin ki Parmeshwar ke raaj kab aai. Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Jab Parmeshwar ke raaj aai tab dekhaai nai dei.
42017021	Koi nai boli, ‘Dekho u hiañ hei! Ya huañ hei!’ Kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar beech meñ hei.”
42017022	Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “U ṭaaim aai jab tum Manush ke laṛka ke roj dekhe ke maañgega, lekin dekhe nai paayga.
42017023	Log tum se boli, ‘Huañ dekho!’ ‘Hiañ dekho!’ U ṭaaim tum chala nai jaana aur ulog ke pichchhe bhi nai bhagna.
42017024	Manush ke laṛka ke roj, u rakam rahi jeise asmaan meñ ek bagal se dusra bagal tak bijli chamke hei.
42017025	Lekin pahile to, uske bahut dukh uṭhaay ke hei, aur i jamaana ke sab log uske rijekṭ kar dei.
42017026	Jab Manush ke laṛka aai, tab jeise Noa ke roj raha, weisaiyeñ rahi.
42017027	Log u roj tak khaat piyat rahin, saadi byaah karat rahin, jon roj tak Noa jahaaj meñ nai gais. Tab ek baṛa baaṛh aais aur sab kuchh naas hoy gais.
42017028	Loṭ ke ṭaaim meñ bhi eisehiyeñ bhais raha. Sab koi khaawat piyat, len den karat, peṛ paudha lagaawat aur ghar baar banaawat rahin.
42017029	Lekin jon roj Loṭ, Sadom se nikar gais, wahi roj asmaan se aagi aur flaims giris aur sab ke naas kar dees.
42017030	Jon roj Manush ke laṛka saamne aai, u roj bhi ṭheek eisehiyeñ hoi.”
42017031	“U roj jon chhat pe rahi aur ulog ke cheej ghar ke bhittar rahe jaai, to uske lewe ke waaste nichche nai utarna, aur yahi rakam jon khet meñ rahi, ulog ke ghar nai lauṭe ke chaahi.
42017032	Loṭ ke aurat ke yaad karna.
42017033	Jon koi bhi aapan jaan bachaay ke kosis kari, u uske khoy dei, aur jon aapan jaan suru meñ khoi, u uske bachaay lei.
42017034	Ham tum se bataata hei u raat ke dui jane ek chaṭaai pe rahi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusra ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
42017035	Dui aurat ekke jagha pe chakki peesat hoi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusri ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
42017036	Dui admi khet meñ hoi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusra ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.”
42017037	Tab chela log Yeeshu se puuchhis, “E Prabhu, i sab kahañ hoi?” Yeeshu bolis, “Jon jagha laash rahi huañ geedaṛ to jaruur rahi.”
42018001	Yeeshu aapan chela log ke ek kahaani bataais ki keise ulog hardam bina niraas hoy, preya karte rahin,
42018002	“Ek ṭaaun meñ ek jaj raha, jon Parmeshwar se bhi nai ḍarat raha aur naa to koi admi ke parwaah karat raha.
42018003	Wahi ṭaaun meñ ek bidhwa bhi rahat rahi jon uske lage roj roj aay ke bolat rahi, “Hamaar nyaay karo aur hamaar dusman se hamme bachaao!”
42018004	Kuchh ṭaaim tak to u jaj uske nai sunis. Lekin aakhri meñ haar maan ke aapan man meñ sochis, ‘Ham to Parmeshwar se nai ḍarta hei aur naa to koi ke parwaah karta hei.
42018005	Fir bhi bhale i bidhwa hamme roj roj tang kare hei, ham iske nyaay jaruur karega, nai to i hamaar naak meñ dam kar dei.’”
42018006	Prabhu bolis, “U kruk jaj kaa bolis, suno!
42018007	To fir Parmeshwar jiske u apne chunis hei, kaa uske nyaay nai kari jon raat din uske bolaate rahe hei? Kaa u ulog ke khaatir deri lagaai?
42018008	U jaruur jaldi kari aur ulog ke madat kari. Lekin jab Manush ke laṛka aai to kaa u dharti pe koi biswaasi ke paai?”
42018009	Yeeshu kuchh log ke kahaani sunaais, jon sochat rahin ki ulog dusra se achchha hei aur baaki log ulog se nichche hei.
42018010	“Ek dafe dui admi Mandir meñ preya kare gain, usman se ek Farisi aur dusra ṭeks baṭore waala raha.
42018011	Farisi khaṛa hoy ke aapan man meñ preya kare laga, “E Parmeshwar, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei ki ham dusra log ke rakam ṭhaggu, ya peṭṭu aur byabhichaar kare waala nai hei, aur naa to i ṭeks baṭore waala ke rakam hei.
42018012	Ham to ek hapta meñ dui dafe upwaas rakhta hei aur jon kuchh hamme mile hei uske daswa hissa tumme de deta hei.’
42018013	Lekin ṭeks baṭorewaala duur khaṛa hoy ke asmaan ke taraf bhi nai dekhis, aur aapan chhaati peeṭ peeṭ ke bolis, ‘E Parmeshwar, ham paapi pe daya karo!’
42018014	Tab Yeeshu bolis, ‘Jab duuno admi ghare gain, tab ṭeks baṭorewaala naa ki Farisi, Parmeshwar ke najar meñ achchha admi maana gais. Kaahe ke jon koi apne aap ke baṛa banaay hei, wahi chhoṭa kara jaai, aur jon koi apne aap ke chhoṭa kare hei, uske baṛa banaawa jaai.’ ”
42018015	Kuchh log to aapan laṛkan ke bhi Yeeshu ke lage laay lagin ki jisse u laṛkan pe aapan haath rakkhe, lekin jab chela log i dekhin to sab ke ḍaaṭe lagin!
42018016	Lekin Yeeshu u bachcha log ke aapan lage bolaay ke bolis, “Bachcha log ke hamaar lage aay deo, aur ulog ke roko nai, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj eisane log ke hei.
42018017	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei! Jon koi Parmeshwar ke raaj bachcha log ke rakam nai apnaay hei, ulog uske raaj meñ kabhi nai jaay saki.”
42018018	Ek khaas admi Yeeshu se puuchhis, “E achchha guru, ham kaa kari ki hamme anant jeewan mili?”
42018019	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Tum hamme kaahe ke achchha bolta hei? Khali Parmeshwar achchha hei.
42018020	Tum kaanuun to janta hei, ‘Byabhichaar nai karna. Hatya nai karna. Chori nai karna. Dusra ke waaste jhuuṭa gawaahi nai dena. Aapan maiya aur bappa ke aadar karna.”
42018021	U admi tab bolis, “Ham to chhoṭa se i sab kaanuun maanta hei.”
42018022	Jab Yeeshu i sunis, tab bolis, “Abhi bhi tumme ek cheej kare ke bacha hei. Sab kuchh jon tumhaar lage hei, u sab bech ke gareeb meñ baaṭ deo, aur tab tumhaar khaatir swarag meñ bahut dhan hoi. Aur fir aay ke hamaar pichchhe chalo.”
42018023	Lekin i sab sun ke u bahut soch meñ paṛ gais, kaahe ke u bahut dhani admi raha.
42018024	Yeeshu jab dekhis ki u ketna udaas hoy gay hei, tab bolis, “Dhani log ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ aay ke waaste bahut kaṛa baat hei!
42018025	Usse sahaj to i hei ki ek uuñṭ, ek sui ke naake meñ se eezi se nikar jaai, lekin i nai hoy sake hei ki ek dhani admi Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay saki.”
42018026	Jab bheeṛ i baat sunin, ulog puuchhin, “Tab keise koi bache saki?”
42018027	Yeeshu bolis, “Jon cheej admi log nai kare sake, u Parmeshwar kare sake hei.”
42018028	Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Dekho, ham bhi to sab kuchh chhoṛ ke tumhaar pichchhe chal paṛa.”
42018029	Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tumme sachche bataata hei eisan koi nai hei, jon aapan ghar, aurat, bhaiya-bahini, maiya-bappa aur laṛkan bachchan Parmeshwar ke khaatir chhoṛe hei, i ṭaaim uske laaif meñ bahut kuchh mili. Lekin aage chal ke wahi log ke anant jeewan bhi mili.”
42018031	Tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke alge le jaay ke bolis, “Suno! Ham log ab Yarushalam jaata hei. Jon bhi kuchh Manush ke laṛka ke baare meñ nabi log likhin raha, u sab ab puura hoi.
42018032	U ab geir Yahuudi ke haath meñ de dewa jaai aur uske bahut apmaan hoi. Uske sañghe log kharaab kharaab harkat kari aur uspe thuuki bhi.
42018033	Uske bahut jaada peeṭe ke baad uske maar dei, lekin tisra roj u jinda hoy jaai.”
42018034	Lekin i sab baat u chela log nai samajhe sakin, ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei. U jon bhi kuchh bolis raha, u gupt ruup meñ raha, aur ilog ke samajh meñ nai aais.
42018035	Jab Yeeshu Jeriko ke nagichche pahuñchis, tab wahiñ pe ek añdha, rasta ke kinaare beiṭha bheek maañgat raha.
42018036	Jab u añdha bheeṛ ke chale ke awaaj sunis, tab puuchhe lagis, “I sab kaa hoy hei?”
42018037	Log uske bataais, “Naasrat ke Yeeshu jaay hei.”
42018038	Tab u añdha jor se chillaay ke bolis, “E Yeeshu, Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
42018039	Jon log rasta pe aage aage jaat rahin, ulog añdha ke ḍaaṭin aur bolin ki u chuppe hoy jaay. Lekin u añdha kaahe ke chuppe rahe, u aur jor se chillaais, “Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
42018040	Yeeshu ruk gais aur hukum dees ki u admi uske lage laawa jaay, aur jab u nagichche aay gais, tab puuchhis,
42018041	“Tumhaar waaste ham kon cheej kare sakta hei?” Añdha bolis, “E Prabhu, yahi ki ham fir se dekhe lagi.”
42018042	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Tab dekho! Tumhaar biswaas tumme ṭheek kar dees hei.”
42018043	Aur wahi lage u añdha dekhe laga aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe chal paṛis. Aur jab sab log dekhis to Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagin.
42019001	Jeriko se hoy ke Yeeshu jaat raha.
42019002	Huañ pe Zekias naam ke ek ṭeks baṭore waala log ke leeḍa raha, aur u bahut dhani admi raha.
42019003	U Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha, lekin bheeṛ bahut raha aur u bauna raha. Yahi kaaran u Yeeshu ke nai dekhe paat raha.
42019004	U jaldi se dauṛ ke ek gular ke peṛ pe chaṛh gais, kaahe ke Yeeshu wahi rasta se jaata.
42019005	Jab Yeeshu u jagha pe pahuñchis, tab uppar dekh ke bolis, “Zekias, jaldi nichche aao, kaahe ke hamme aaj tumhaar ghare rahe ke hei.”
42019006	Khusi khusi, Zekias wahi lage nichche aay gais aur Yeeshu ke aapan sañghe aapan ghare le gais.
42019007	Jon log i sab dekhis, to baṛbaṛaay lagin aur bolin, “I admi to ek paapi hei aur Yeeshu yahi ke ghare jaay hei!”
42019008	Tab Zekias khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, dekho ham aapan aadha propaṭi gareeb meñ baaṭ dega aur agar ham koi se bhi anyaay kar ke kuchh lia hoyga, to ham ulog ke chaar guna lauṭaay dega.”
42019009	Tab Yeeshu Zekias se bolis, “Aaj i ghar meñ mukti aais hei, kaahe ke i admi bhi Abraham ke laṛka hei.
42019010	Lekin Manush ke laṛka to eisan log ke khoj ke mukti dewaay ke waaste aais hei.”
42019011	Jab bheeṛ Yeeshu ke baat sunat rahin, to Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaani bataais kaahe ki u sab Yarushalam ke nagichche pahuñch gain raha, aur log soche lagin ki Parmeshwar ke raaj aay ke ṭaaim hoy gay hei.
42019012	Yeeshu tab bolis, Ek raaj kumaar raha aur ek dafe u ek duur des gais ki raaja ban ke fir lauṭe.
42019013	Jaay se pahile u aapan das naukar ke bolaais aur ek ek ke kuchh peisa dees aur bolis, “Hamaar lauṭe tak is se kamaai karna.”
42019014	Lekin huañ ke log uske haiṭ karat rahin, aur ulog ek duut ke uske pichchhe bhejis aur bataain ki jaay ke sab log ke bataao ki, “Ham sab nai mañgta ki i admi ham pe raaj kare.”
42019015	Aur jab u raaja ban ke lauṭis tab u aapan das naukar ke bolaais, jiske u peisa dees raha, ki jisse u pata lagaay sake ki uske peisa se ketna kamaais hei.
42019016	Sab se pahila naukar aay ke bolis, “E swaami, tumhaar peisa se ham das guna aur jaada kamaay lia hei.”
42019017	Raaja bolis, “Saabaas, hamaar achchha naukar, tum to chhoṭa chhoṭa kaam meñ bharosa ke laayk hei. Ham tumme das ṭaaun ke bos banaayga.”
42019018	Fir dusra naukar aay ke bataais, “E swaami, tumhaar peisa se ham paañch guna aur kamaaya.”
42019019	Raaja bolis, “Tum paañch ṭaaun ke bos bano.”
42019020	Ek aur naukar aay ke bolis, “Swaami, dekho i tumhaar peisa hei, ham iske rumaal meñ baañdh ke sambhaal ke rakkha raha.
42019021	Ham to tum se bahut ḍarta hei, kaahe ke tum bahut kaṛa admi hei. Jon cheej tum nai rakhta hei, uske uṭhaay leta hei, aur jon tum nai boya, wahi jaay ke kaaṭ leta hei.”
42019022	Raaja bolis, “E bekaar naukar! Tum jon sab hamme bola wahi tum pe laagu hei! Tum to janta hei ki ham kaṛa admi hei, aur jon ham nai rakhta, uske uṭhaay leta hei aur jon nai boya, wahi kaaṭ leta hei.
42019023	Tum hamaar peisa kaahe nai benk meñ rakkha ki ham aapan peisa byaaj sahit le leta?”
42019024	Jon log huañ khaṛa raha usse bolis, “Isse u sab peisa le leo aur uske de deo jiske lage das guna hei.”
42019025	Lekin ulog usse bolin, “Swaami, uske lage to das guna hei!”
42019026	Raaja jawaab dees, “Jiske lage hei uske aur mili. Lekin jiske lage nai hei, usse u bhi le lewa jaai jon uske lage hei.
42019027	Ab hamaar dusman log ke leke aao, jon hamme nai maañgat rahin ki ham u sab ke raaja bani. Hamaar saamne ulog ke jaan se maar ḍaaro!”
42019028	Jab Yeeshu sab baat bol dees, tab sab ke aage aage Yarushalam ke bagal chalis.
42019029	Jab u Beitfage aur Bethani meñ u pahaaṛ jis ke naam ‘Jaituun’ raha, uske lage aais, tab aapan chela log meñ se dui ke aage i bol ke bhej dees.
42019030	“Saamne waala gaaoñ meñ jaao. Huañ pahuñchte tumme ek gadhi ke bachcha bañdha mili, u bachcha pe abhi tak koi bhi sawaar nai karis. Uske khol ke hamaar lage le aao.
42019031	Agar koi tum se puuchhi, ‘Iske kaahe kholta?’ to bolna, ‘Prabhu ke iske jaruurat hei.”‘
42019032	Uske chela log jaay ke weisaiyeñ paain jeise Yeeshu bataais raha,
42019033	Jab ulog gadhi ke bachcha ke kholat rahin, tab uske maalik aay gais aur puuchhis, “Tum log i bachcha ke kaahe ke kholta hei?”
42019034	Ulog jawaab deen, “Prabhu ke iske jaruurat hei.”
42019035	Aur tab u bachcha ke Yeeshu ke lage le gain, aur uske uppar aapan kapṛa bichhaay ke Yeeshu ke us pe beiṭhaay deen.
42019036	Aur jab u jaay laga, tab huañ ke log aapan aapan kapṛa rasta pe bichhaay lagin.
42019037	Jab Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ se nichche utre laga to huañ pe jon chela log ke bheeṛ raha ek sañghe jor se chillaay ke Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagin, kaahe ke ulog sab chamatkaari kaam dekhin raha jon Yeeshu karis raha.
42019038	“Dhann hei u raaja jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei. Swarag meñ saanti hoy aur asmaan meñ. Prabhu ke mahima hoy.”
42019039	Bheeṛ meñ se kuchh Farisi Yeeshu se bolin, “E guru, aapan chela log ke ḍaaṭo!”
42019040	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Agar ilog chup hoy jaai to patthar chillaay lagi.”
42019041	Aur jab Yeeshu Yarushalam ke nagichche pahuñch gais, tab u jagha dekh ke roy dees,
42019042	aur u bolis, “Kaa achchha hota ki tum, khali tum, aaj ke roj saanti ke baat janta. Lekin ab u tumhaar aañkhi se sab chhipaan hei.
42019043	Lekin, ṭaaim aai ki jab tumhaar dusman tumme chaaro bagal se gher lei aur tumme dabaay dei.
42019044	Aur tab ulog tumme aur tumhaar laṛkan ke maṭṭi meñ milaay dei. Ek patthar pe patthar khaṛa nai rahe saki. I eise hoi kaahe ke tum u ṭaaim ke nai pahichaana jab tum pe daya kara jaat raha.”
42019045	Tab Yeeshu Mandir meñ gais aur biznes kare waalan ke bahire nikaare laga, aur bolis,
42019046	“Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Hamaar ghar preya ke ghar rahi,’ lekin tum log to iske ḍaaku ke aḍḍa banaay dia!”
42019047	Sab roj Yeeshu Mandir meñ parchaar karat raha, lekin huañ ke baṛa paadri aur paṛha likha log ke mukhia uske maare ke waaste kosis kare lagin.
42019048	Lekin ulog ke koi bhi mauka nai milat raha ki Yeeshu ke naas kare, kaahe ke sab log uske baat dhyaan se sunat rahin.
42020001	Ek roj Yeeshu Maseeh Mandir meñ susamaachaar ke baare meñ bataat raha aur parchaar karat raha, tab huañ ke baṛa paadri aur paṛha likha log aapan sañghe des ke jaana maana admi ke sañghe aay ke,
42020002	Yeeshu se sawaal kare lagin, “Kiske hukum se tum i kaam karta hei? Aur u kon hei jon tumme hukum dees hei?”
42020003	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tum se ek sawaal puuchhega. Tum hamme bataao,
42020004	Yuhanna ke kon baptisma dees raha? Kaa swarag se hukum mila raha ki admi log ke bagal se?”
42020005	Is ke baare meñ u sab apne meñ baat cheet kare lagin, “Agar ham bolega ‘Swarag se’, to u boli, tab tum sab uspe biswaas kaahe nai kara.
42020006	Lekin agar ham bolega, ki ‘Admi log ke bagal se’ to sab koi ham log ke patthar se maari, kaahe ke sab jaane hei ki Yuhanna ek nabi hei.”
42020007	Tab ulog jawaab dees, “Ham nai janta ki kiske bagal se u hukum mila raha.”
42020008	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham bhi tumme nai bataay sakta ki i kaam kare ke hamme kon hukum dees hei.”
42020009	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaani sunaais, “Ek dafe ek admi añguur ke khet boy ke, kisaan ke kiraaya pe de dees aur apne duur des ghuume chala gay.
42020010	Jab fasal kaaṭe ke ṭaaim aais, tab u admi aapan ek naukar kisaan ke lage bhejis ki kuchh añguur leke aay jaay. Lekin kisaan log uske maar peeṭ ke khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
42020011	Ab maalik ek dusra naukar ke bhejis, lekin kisaan log wahi kaam karin, naukar ke maar peeṭ ke beijjati kar ke khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
42020012	Tisra roj wahi rakam maalik tisra naukar ke bhejis, aur kisaan uske bhi maar peeṭ ke nikaar deen.
42020013	Tab khet ke maalik bolis, 'Ab ham kaa kari? Ham aapan dulaara laṛka ke bhejega. Ham janta hei ki ulog iske aadar kari!’
42020014	Lekin jeise kisaan log u laṛka ke dekhin, aapas meñ baat kare lagin, 'Ek roj yahi khet ke maalik ban jaai. Aao ham log iske maar ḍaari aur i khet ham log ke hoy jaai!’
42020015	Ulog u laṛka ke khet se bahire nikaar ke maar ḍaarin. Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tab u khet ke maalik u sab ke kaa kari?
42020016	U aay ke sab kisaan ke maar ḍaari aur aapan khet ke dusra kisaan ke de dei.” I baat sun ke sab log bole lagin, “Eise kabhi nai hoy paay!”
42020017	Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Tab is ke matlab kaa hei jon vachan meñ likha hei, ‘Jon patthar ke kaapenṭa log ṭhukraay deen raha, ab wahi kona ke khaas patthar ban gais hei.’
42020018	Jon bhi koi i patthar se ṭakraai, uske ṭukṛa ṭukṛa hoy jaai, aur jon ispe giri u pisaay jaai”
42020019	Baṛa paadri log aur paṛha likha log samajh gain ki Yeeshu i kahaani wahi log ke baare meñ bole hei. Ulog to Yeeshu ke wahi lage pakṛaay maañgat rahin lekin huañ jon bheeṛ raha usse ulog ḍarat rahin.
42020020	Ab Yeeshu ke dusman mauka khojat rahin. Ulog kuchh jaasuus, jon dharam ke naam pe chalat rahin, huañ bhejin ki Yeeshu ke chhoṭa se galti pe pakaṛ ke aur Romi adhikaari ke haath meñ de de.
42020021	Jaasuus log Yeeshu se puuchhin, “E guru, ham sab to janta hei ki tum hardam sachche bolta hei aur raaiṭ baat bataata hei, aur i bhi ki tum kabhi koi ke saaiḍ bhi nai leta, iske sañghe Parmeshwar ke rasta sachchaai se bataata hei.
42020022	Hamme bataao, ‘Raaja ke ṭeks dewa jaay ya nai?’ ”
42020023	Yeeshu to jaanat raha ki ulog uske fasaay maañge hei.
42020024	Tab u bolis, “Hamme ek chaañdi ke sikka dekhaao. Ispe kis ke chhaapa aur naam hei?” “Raaja ke,” ulog bolin.
42020025	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tab jon bhi Raaja ke hei, u uske deo. Aur jon Parmeshwar ke hei, u Parmeshwar ke deo.”
42020026	Ab to Yeeshu ke dusman bhi uske koi galti nai pakaṛ paain, lekin uske jawaab sun ke hairaan hoy gain aur chuppe rahe gain.
42020027	Saduuki log, jon log murda meñ se jinda hoy pe biswaas nai karat rahin, ulog Yeeshu ke lage aain. Aur puuchhin,
42020028	“E guru, Maozas to hamaar khaatir likhis hei, ‘Agar ek admi saadi kare aur uske ekko bachcha nai hoy, aur u mar jaay, to u admi ke bhaiya aapan bhaiya ke aurat se saadi kar le ki u aapan bhaiya ke waaste aulaad peida kare.’
42020029	Ek dafe saat bhaiya rahin. Pahila bhaiya saadi karis, lekin bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
42020030	Dusra bhaiya aapan bidhwa bhauji ke sañghe saadi karis, aur u bhi bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
42020031	Tisra ke sañghe bhi yahi bhais. Yahi rakam saato bhaiya bina aulaad ke mar gais.
42020032	Aakhri meñ u aurat bhi mar gais.
42020033	Aur jab u sab bhaiya fir se jinda hoi, tab u aurat kon ke patni hoi? Kaahe ke saato to uske sañghe saadi karin raha.”
42020034	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I janam ke log saadi byaah kare hei.
42020035	Lekin aay waala ṭaaim meñ pichhla janam meñ jon maris raha aur fir se jinda hoy ke laayk hei, ulog meñ saadi byaah nai hoi.
42020036	Ulog to ainjals ke rakam rahi jon kabhi nai mare saki. Ulog to Parmeshwar ke santaan hei, kaahe ke ulog mar ke jinda hoy gain hei.
42020037	Maozas bhi to i baat ke jare waala jhaaṛi ke kahaani meñ dekhaais raha, hiañ pe u Prabhu ke ‘Abraham ke Parmeshwar, Aayzak ke Parmeshwar aur Jaykab ke Parmeshwar’ bole hei.
42020038	U mara log ke nai, lekin jon jinda hei, ulog ke Parmeshwar hei, kaahe ke sab log uske khaatir jinda hei.”
42020039	Kuchh log jon Maozas ke kaanuun pe chalat rahin, ulog jawaab deen, “E guru, tum ṭheek bola hei!”
42020040	Aur fir iske baad Yeeshu se koi baat puuchhe ke himmat nai karis.
42020041	Yeeshu puuchhis, “Log kaahe ke bole hei ki Maseeha, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke santaan ke hoi?
42020042	Ḍeiviḍ to apne aapan Psalms meñ bole hei, ‘Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis, hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho,
42020043	jab tak tumhaar dusman ke tumhaar goṛ tak nai kar dei.
42020044	Ḍeiviḍ to khud uske ‘Prabhu’ bole hei. Tab u uske laṛka keise hoy sake hei?”
42020045	Jab sab koi sunat rahin aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis,
42020046	“Kaanuun ke guru log se saaodhaan rahna, khaas karke ulog se jon lamba lamba kapṛa pahine aur idhar udhar ghuume hei, aur jab ulog maakeṭ aay hei to sab log jhuk ke ulog se namaste kare hei, aur chech meñ ulog ke khaas jagha mile hei, aur paaṭi ke ṭaaim ulog achchha achchha jagha maañge hei.
42020047	Wahi log bidhwa ke ghar haṛap le hei aur dekhaawe ke khaatir lamba lamba preya kare hei. Ulog ke to bahut jaada saja mili.”
42021001	Yeeshu fir aapan aañkhi uṭhaay ke dekhis ki keise dhani log aapan aapan daan beg meñ chhoṛe hei.
42021002	Aur u i bhi dekhis ki ek gareeb bidhwa dui sikka usman chhoṛis hei.
42021003	Aur tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum log se sachche bataata hei ki i gareeb bidhwa sab se jaada daan chhoṛis hei.
42021004	Kaahe ki sab log aapan bachat meñ se daan dees, lekin i to jon kuchh bhi iske kamaai raha, u sab daan kar dees.”
42021005	Jab kuchh log Mandir ke baare meñ baat karat rahin, ki keise u sundar sundar patthar se bana hei, tab Yeeshu bolis,
42021006	“Kaa tum i sab patthar ke dekhta hei? Ek ṭaaim aai jab ek bhi aapan jagha pe nai bacha rahi. Sab giraay dewa jaai.”
42021007	Kuchh log puuchhin, “Guru ji, i sab baat kab hoi? Aur jab hoi tab hamme keise pata lagi?”
42021008	Yeeshu bolis, “Saaodhaan raho, kahiñ tumme koi bahkaay nai de, kaahe ke bahut log hamaar naam se aay ke boli, ‘Ham wahi hei’ aur ‘Ṭaaim aay gais hei’ lekin tum sab saaodhaan rahna, uske pichchhe pichchhe nai chala jaana.”
42021009	Jab tum laṛaai aur hañgaama ke charcha sunega, tab ḍar nai jaana, kaahe ke i sab ke hoy ke jaruuri hei, lekin ant wahi ṭaaim nai hoi jaai.”
42021010	Tab u bolis, “Ek jaati dusra jaati se, aur ek raaj dusra raaj pe hamla kari.
42021011	Bhayaanak erthquaik aai, jagha jagha pe kharaab kharaab bimaari aur akaal paṛi, asmaan pe bhayankar cheej aur baṛa baṛa saain dekhaai.
42021012	Lekin i sab baat hoy se pahile hamaar naam ke kaaran tum pakṛaayga aur museebat sahega. Tum sab ke chech meñ le jaay ke tumhaar uppar koṭ kachahri karke tumme saja mili aur jel meñ ḍaara jaai. Aur hamaar kaaran tum log raaja aur hakeem ke saamne laawa jaayga.
42021013	Tab yahi ṭaaim tumhaar gawaahi aur dewe ke ṭaaim hoi.
42021014	Chinta nai karna ki tum aapan bachaao meñ kaa bolega.
42021015	Kaahe ke ham tumme eisan buddhi aur boli de dega ki tumhaar dusman bhi tumhaar saamne tumhaar apmaan nai kare paai.
42021016	Aur tumhaar maiya bappa, bhaiya, palwaar, aur dost bhi tumme dhoka deke pakaṛwaai aur tum meñ se ketna log ke marwaay bhi ḍaari.
42021017	Hamaar naam ke kaaran tumme kaafi log nai laaik kari.
42021018	Fir bhi tumhaar muuṛ ke ek bhi baar naas nai hoi.
42021019	Aapan majbuuti se tum bacha rahega.”
42021020	Jab tum dekhega ki Yarushalam ke chaaro bagal saulja hei, tab jaan lena ki iske naas hoy waala ṭaaim aay gay hei.
42021021	Agar tum Juḍia meñ rahta hei, to pahaaṛ pe bhaag jaao, aur jon ṭaaun ke bhittar rahe hei, ulog bahire nikar jaao, aur jon log gaaoñ meñ rahe hei, ulog ṭaaun meñ nai aana.
42021022	I jon saja ke ṭaaim hei yahi sab baat likhaan raha aur ab puura bhi hoi.
42021023	I ṭaaim maañ bane waali aurat ke khaatir bahut kharaab rahi, aur jon duudh piaay hei uske khaatir bhi kharaab hoi. Kaahe ke des meñ bahut museebat aai aur bahut log ke Parmeshwar ke saja bhi mili.
42021024	Bahut log talwaar se bhi maara jaai aur kaafi log to dusra des bandi banaay ke le jaawa jaai. Yarushalam pe bhi dusra des ke raaj chali, jab tak ki ulog ke ṭaaim puura nai hoy jaai.
42021025	“Suuraj, chaañd aur taara meñ rakam rakam ke saain dekhaay lagi. Aur dunia meñ sab jaati ke log meñ sankaṭ aay lagi. Samundar garji aur baṛa baṛa halkora uṭhi, tab sab log ghabraay jaai.
42021026	Log i dekh ke ḍar jaai ki dunia meñ kaa hoy hei aur behosh hoy jaai. Asmaan ke sab sakti hilaawa jaai.
42021027	Tab Manush ke laṛka dekhaai dei, u baadar meñ se bahut baṛa mahima ke sañghe aai.
42021028	Aur jab i sab hoy lagi, tab ḍarna nai, seedha muuṛ uṭhaay ke khaṛa hoy jaana, kaahe ke tab tumhaar mukti nagichche rahi.
42021029	Tab Yeeshu ek kahaani sunaais, “Tum anjeer ke peṛ aur dusra peṛ ke dekhega,
42021030	jab usman nawa patti nikre lagi, tab tum samajh jaata ki garmi ke mausam aay waala hei.
42021031	Aur yahi rakam, jab tum i sab hote dekhega to samajh jaana ki Parmeshwar ke raaj nagichche hei.”
42021032	“Yaad rakhna, jab tak i sab baat nai hoi, tab tak i peeṛhi ke ant nai hoi.
42021033	Asmaan aur jameen nai rahi, lekin hamaar vachan hardam rahi.”
42021034	“Saaodhaan rahna, eise nai hoy ki tum khali khaay piye meñ mast raho, aur jindagi ke chinta meñ daba raho, aur achaanak u roj fanda ke rakam tumhaar uppar aay jaai.
42021035	Yahi rakam u roj dunia ke sab log pe bina bataay aay jaai.
42021036	Sab ṭaaim saaodhaan rahna, aur preya karte rahna, ki jisse i sab baat se tum bache sako aur Manush ke laṛka ke saamne khaṛa hoy ke tumme himmat rahi.”
42021037	Din meñ Yeeshu Maseeh Mandir meñ jaay ke parchaar karat raha, lekin raat meñ u jaay ke Jaituun pahaaṛ pe rahat raha.
42021038	Aur sab log sabere uṭh ke uske lage Mandir meñ uske achchha achchha baat sune ke waaste aat rahin.
42022001	Ab Akhmeeri (bina yeesṭ ke) roṭi ke teohaar, jon ke fasah bhi bole hei, aay waala raha.
42022002	Baṛa paadri aur agua log i taak meñ rahin ki keise Yeeshu ke maara jaay, kaahe ke ulog usse ḍare lagin raha.
42022003	Aur tab saitaan Juḍas Iskariyoti meñ ghus gais, jon baarah chela log meñ se ek raha.
42022004	Juḍas jaay ke baṛa paadri aur Mandir ke pulis se baatcheet karis ki keise u Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay sake hei.
42022005	Ulog bahut khusi bhain aur Juḍas ke peisa deke khaatir raaji hoy gain.
42022006	Juḍas ulog ke baat maan ke achchha mauka khoje laga ki keise u bina koi ke janwaay uske pakaṛwaai.
42022007	Akhmeeri roṭi waala teohaar aay gais, aur isman fasah ke bheṛa ke bachcha ke bali chaṛhaay ke raha.
42022008	To Yeeshu, Peeṭa aur Yuhanna se bol ke bhejis, “Jaao aur hamaar khaatir fasah ke teohaar ke khaana ke taiyaari karo ki ham sab usman bhaag lei.”
42022009	Lekin ulog puuchhin, “Ham kahañ tumhaar khaatir iske taiyaari kari?”
42022010	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jeise tum ṭaaun meñ ghusega, tumme ek admi mili jon paani ke ghaṛa liye hoi, uske pichchhe pichchhe tum bhi u ghar meñ chala jaana jisman u jaai.
42022011	U ghar ke maalik se bolna, ‘Hamaar guru puuchhe hei ki u aapan chela log ke sañghe kahañ fasah ke khaana khaai?’
42022012	Ghar ke maalik tumme uppar le jaai aur baṛa ruum dekhaai jon kaam meñ laay ke waaste taiyaar hei. Wahiñ taiyaari karo.”
42022013	Peeṭa aur Yuhanna chala gain. Ulog wahi sab paain jeise Yeeshu bataais raha, aur ulog huañ pe fasah ke bhojan taiyaar karin.
42022014	Jab ṭaaim bhais ki Yeeshu aur uske chela log bhojan kare,
42022015	tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Hamaar etna dil karat raha ki dukh uṭhaay se pahile ham tum log ke sañghe i fasah ke bhojan kari.
42022016	Ham tum se bataata hei ki ham tum log ke sañghe dusra fasah ke bhojan nai karega jab tak Parmeshwar ke raaj puura nai hoy jaai.”
42022017	Tab Yeeshu ek pyaala añguur ke ras aapan haath meñ leke, dhanbaad deke bolis, “Iske leo aur aapas meñ baaṭ leo.
42022018	Ham tumme bataata hei ki jab tak Parmeshwar ke raaj nai aai, ham waain nai piega.”
42022019	Tab u aapan haath meñ roṭi leke, dhanbaad dees, aur uske tuuṛ ke aapan chela log ke dees. Tab u bolis, “I hamaar deñhi hei jon tumhaar waaste dewa jaay hei, iske khaao aur hamme eisehiyeñ yaad karna!”
42022020	Jab ulog khaay leen, tab Yeeshu ek dusra pyaala aapan haath meñ lees, aur bolis, “I khuun jon tumhaar waaste bahaaya jaay hei, ek nawa vaacha hei.
42022021	Lekin, dekho! Jon hamme dhoka dei, u yahiñ hamaar sañghe ṭaibal pe hei!
42022022	Manush ke laṛka to weisaiyeñ mari jeise uske khaatir Parmeshwar maañgat raha, lekin jon uske dhoka se pakaṛwaai, uske khaatir bahut kharaab hei!”
42022023	Tab ulog aapas meñ puuchhe lagin ki kon i kaam kari.
42022024	Chela log jhagṛa kare lagin ki ulog meñ se kon sab se baṛa hei.
42022025	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke bataais, Aur raaja log aapan log pe hukum chalaawe hei, aur shaktishaali neta apne aap ke sab ke dost bataay hei.
42022026	Lekin tum eise nai rahna. U jon tum meñ sab se baṛa hei, u sab se chhoṭa bani, aur jon neta hei, u naukar ke rakam rahi.
42022027	Baṛa kon hei? Jon khaana khaay hei ki jon khaana baaṭe hei? Kaa wahi jon khaana khaay hei? Lekin ham to tumhaar beech meñ khaana baaṭewaala hei.
42022028	Tum sab hamaar sañghe sab museebat meñ raha.
42022029	Aur jeise hamaar Pita hamme raaj dees hei, weisaiyeñ ham bhi tumme wahi hak deta hei.
42022030	Tum hamaar raaj meñ hamaar sañghe beiṭh ke khaayga aur piega, aur raaj gaddi pe beiṭh ke Israayel ke baarah ṭraaib pe nyaay karega.
42022031	Yeeshu bolis, “Saayman, hamaar baat suno! Saitaan i hak maañg lees hei ki tumhaar ṭesṭ le, tum sab ke geñhu ke rakam faṭak ke, aur achchha ke kharaab se alag kar dei.”
42022032	Lekin Saayman, ham tumhaar khaatir preya kara hei ki tumhaar biswaas bana rahe. Aur jab tum hamaar lage lauṭ ke aayga, tab aapan bhaiya log ke madat karega.”
42022033	Peeṭa bolis, “E Prabhu, ham to tumhaar sañghe jel meñ jaay ke aur mare ke waaste bhi taiyaar hei!”
42022034	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Peeṭa ham tumme bataata hei ki murga ke bole se pahile teen dafe tum bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
42022035	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se puuchhis, “Jab ham tumme bina pes, bina beg aur bina juuta ke bheja raha, tab kaa tumme koi cheej kamti bhais raha?” Ulog bolin, “Nai to, koi cheej kamti nai bhais!”
42022036	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Lekin ab jiske paas pes hei, u uske leke jaay, wahi rakam beg bhi leke jaay, aur jiske paas talwaar nai hei, u aapan kapṛa bech ke talwaar khareed le.
42022037	Kaahe ke Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘U apraadhi ke sañghe gina jaai.’ Yahi hamaar baare meñ likhaan raha, aur bahut jaldi puura bhi hoi.”
42022038	Chela log bolin, “Prabhu hiañ dui talwaar hei!” “Etna bas hei!” Yeeshu bolis.
42022039	Jeise u hardam karat raha, Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe gais, aur uske chela log bhi uske sañghe gain.
42022040	Aur jab ulog huañ pahuñchin tab u aapan chela log se bolis, “Preya karo ki tumhaar ṭesṭ nai lewa jaay.”
42022041	Tab Yeeshu thoṛa aage jaay ke ghuṭna ṭek ke preya karis,
42022042	“E Pita, agar tum maañgo, to i dukh ke pyaala hamme piye nai dega. Fir bhi hamaar ichchha nai, lekin tumhaar ichchha puura hoi”
42022043	Tab ek ainjal uske madat ke khaatir aais.
42022044	Yeeshu gahira peeṛa meñ raha aur dukhi hoy ke dil se preya karis, ki uske paseena khuun ban ke jameen pe gir paṛis.
42022045	Preya kar ke Yeeshu uṭhis, aur aapan chela log ke lage gais. Ulog dukh ke kaaran thak ke soy gay rahin.
42022046	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke sota hei? Uṭho aur preya karo ki tum log ke ṭesṭ nai lewa jaai.”
42022047	Jab Yeeshu baat karat raha, tab ek baṛa bheeṛ aay gais. Usman sab se aage Juḍas raha, jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha. U seedha aay ke Yeeshu ke chumma lees.
42022048	Yeeshu, Juḍas se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Manush ke laṛka ke chumma leke, dhoka se pakaṛwaay mañgta hei?”
42022049	Jab Yeeshu ke chela log dekhis ki kaa hoy waala hei, tab ulog Yeeshu se puuchhis, “He Prabhu, bolo to ham talwaar chalaai?”
42022050	Etna bhi nai, usman se ek to baṛa paadri ke naukar pe talwaar chalaay dees aur uske lefṭ kaan kaaṭ dees.
42022051	“Bas karo!” Yeeshu bolis. Tab u naukar ke kaan chhuis aur uske achchha kar dees.
42022052	Tab Yeeshu baṛa paadri aur Mandir ke pulis aur agua log, jon uske pakṛe aain raha usse bolis, “Kaa tum log ḍanḍa aur talwaar leke koi chor ke pakṛe aaya hei?
42022053	Ham to tumhaar sañghe raat din Mandir meñ raha, aur tum hamme tab nai pakṛa. Lekin i ṭaaim tumhaar hei aur añdhera ke taagat bhi hei.”
42022054	Yeeshu pakṛaay gais aur ulog uske baṛa paadri ke ghare le gain, aur Peeṭa duur se ulog ke peechha karat raha.
42022055	Kuchh log añgna meñ aagi baar ke uske bagal meñ beiṭhe rahin, aur Peeṭa bhi wahi log ke lage jaay ke beiṭh gais.
42022056	Tab ek naukraani uske dekhis, aur dhyaan se uske bagal dekh ke bolis, “I bhi to Yeeshu ke sañghe raha!”
42022057	Peeṭa bolis, “E aurat, ham i admi ke nai janta!”
42022058	Kuchh deri ke baad koi aur uske bagal dekhis aur bolis, “Tum bhi to ulog meñ se ek hei!” “Nai, bilkul nai!” Peeṭa jawaab dees.
42022059	Aur ek ghañṭa ke baad ek dusra admi jor deke bolis, “Ham daawa se bolta hei ki i admi ulog ke sañghe raha, kaahe ki i bhi to Galilee hei!”
42022060	Lekin Peeṭa bolis, “E bhaai, ham nai janta ki tum kaa bakta hei!” Aur jab, Peeṭa bolte raha, tab murga bolis.
42022061	Aur tab Prabhu Yeeshu ghuum ke Peeṭa ke bagal dekhis. Aur Peeṭa ke yaad aais ki Prabhu usse kon cheej bolis raha, “Bihaan sabere murga bole se pahile tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
42022062	Aur Peeṭa bahire jaay ke fuuṭ fuuṭ ke roy lagis.
42022063	Jon log Yeeshu ke pakṛin raha, uske bahut beijjati karin aur khuub maarin aur peeṭin.
42022064	Ulog Yeeshu ke aañkhi pe paṭṭi baañdh ke bolin, “Bataao, tumme kon maaris?”
42022065	Ulog uske khilli uṛaat rahin aur jhuuṭ jhuuṭ baat bolat rahin.
42022066	Sabere sabere, des ke neta log, baṛa paadri log, aur paṛha likha Maozas ke kaanuun jaane waala baṛkuan, ek sañghe milin aur Yeeshu ke ulog ke aage laawa gais.
42022067	Ulog bolin, “Hamme bataao! Kaa tum Maseeh hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham tumme bataayga to tum sab biswaas nai karega.
42022068	Aur agar ham ek sawaal karega, to tum sab jawaab nai dega.
42022069	Lekin abhi se, Manush ke laṛka, Mahaan Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭhi.”
42022070	Tab sab koi puuchhin, “Kaa tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei?” Yeeshu bolis, “Tumahi to bolta hei ki ham hei!”
42022071	Ulog bolin, “Ab hamme gawaahi ke kaa jaruurat hei! I to aapan muh se khud ugal dees hei aur ham sab sun lia hei.”
42023001	Sabha se sab koi uṭh ke, Yeeshu ke Paaylaṭ ke saamne le gay.
42023002	Huañ ulog Yeeshu pe dos lagaay lagin, “Ham log i admi ke aur log ke bahkaate aur ham log ke raaja ke ṭeks de se rokte pakṛa hei. Aur i bole hei ki yahi hamaar raaja Maseeha hei.”
42023003	Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei?” “I to tum khud bolta hei,” Yeeshu jawaab dees.
42023004	Tab Paaylaṭ, baṛa paadri aur bheeṛ se bolis, “Ham i admi meñ kuchh dos nai paaya.”
42023005	Lekin ulog jor deke bolin, “I Galeel se leke sab Juḍia meñ parchaar kar ke sab ke bahkaay hei, aur etna hee nai, hiañ bhi i aay gais hei.”
42023006	Jab Paaylaṭ i sunis tab puuchhis, “Kaa i admi Galeel ke hei?”
42023007	Jab Paaylaṭ jaanis ki Yeeshu, Heraḍ ke raaj se aais hei, tab u Yeeshu ke Heraḍ ke paas bhej dees. Heraḍ u ṭaaim Yarushalam meñ raha.
42023008	Jab Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke dekhis to bahut khusi hoy gais, kaahe ki u bahut roj se Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha. Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke baare meñ bahut kuchh sunis raha, aur aasra karat raha ki u uske chamatkaar karte dekhi.
42023009	Heraḍ, Yeeshu se bahut sawaal karis, lekin Yeeshu ek bhi jawaab nai dees.
42023010	Baṛa paadri aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log bhi huañ khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ kharaab kharaab cheej ke dos lagaay lagin.
42023011	Heraḍ aur uske saulja log Yeeshu pe hase lagin aur uske sañghe kharaab saluuk kare ke baad uske chamke waala kapṛa pahinaay ke Heraḍ ke paas lauṭaay deen.
42023012	Wahi roj se Heraḍ aur Paaylaṭ dost ban gain, isse pahile u duuno dusman rahin.
42023013	Paaylaṭ tab baṛa paadri, aur agua log aur baaki log ke bolaais.
42023014	U sab se bolis, “Tum Yeeshu ke hamaar paas laaya hei ki u samasya peida kare hei. Lekin ham tum sab ke saamne usse sawaal kara, aur ham to usman koi dos nai paaya, jon tum sab bolta hei ki i karis hei.
42023015	Heraḍ bhi isman galti nai paais hei yahi khaatir iske hamaar lage lauṭaay dees hei. I admi ke maut ke saja nai mile ke chaahi!
42023016	Yahi khaatir ham iske khali chaabuk lagwaay ke chhoṛ dega.” Paaylaṭ i kaaran eise bolis raha ki fasah ke teohaar meñ uske ek keidi ke chhoṛe ke raha.
42023018	Lekin bheeṛ chillaay uṭhis, “Yeeshu ke maar deo! Hamme Barabba ke deo!”
42023019	Barabba wahi admi raha jon ṭaaun meñ hañgaama karaais raha aur hatya ke jurum meñ jel meñ rakkha gais raha.
42023020	Paaylaṭ to maañgat raha ki u Yeeshu ke chhoṛ de, yahi kaaran u bheeṛ se ek dafe fir se baat karis.
42023021	Lekin ulog chillaate rahin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaao! Kros pe chaṛhaao!”
42023022	Paaylaṭ fir tisra dafe ulog se bolis, “I admi kaa galti karis hei? Ham to isman koi kharaabi nai dekha ki jisse iske maut ke saja mile. Ham iske chaabuk lagwaay ke chhoṛ dega.”
42023023	Sab log jor jor se chillaate rahin aur uske pichchhe paṛ gain ki Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaawa jaay.
42023024	Aakhri meñ, Paaylaṭ u sab ke baat maan lees.
42023025	Tab u Barabba ke, jon hatya aur hañgaama karaat raha, ulog ke maañg pe, chhoṛ dees. Aur fir Paaylaṭ, Yeeshu ke ulog ke hawaale kar dees, ki jisse ulog jon cheej maañge uske sañghe kare.
42023026	Jeise saulja log Yeeshu ke le jaat rahin, ulog gaaoñ se ṭaaun ke taraf aate Saayman naam ke ek Kureni ke pakṛin aur kros ke uske kañdha pe rakkhin, ki jisse u Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe le chale.
42023027	Yeeshu ke pichchhe ek bahut baṛa bheeṛ aat raha, aur bheeṛ meñ aurat log bhi rahin jon Yeeshu ke waaste rowat aur chillaat rahin.
42023028	Yeeshu aurat log ke taraf ghuum ke bolis, “Yarushalam ke sab beṭi. Hamaar khaatir nai ro! Aapan aur aapan laṛkan ke waaste ro.
42023029	Ek roj log boli, ‘U aurat jis ke paas aulaad nai hei ulog khush kismat hei!’
42023030	U ṭaaim sab log pahaaṛ se boli, ‘Hamaar uppar giro!’ aur chhoṭa chhoṭa pahaaṛ se boli, ‘hamme lukaay leo!’
42023031	Kaahe ki agar i hariyar peṛ ke sañghe hoy sake hei to suukha peṛ ke sañghe kaa hoi?”
42023032	Dui aur admi jon apraadhi rahin, ulog ke bhi Yeeshu ke sañghe maut ke saja hoy gais.
42023033	Jab saulja log u jagha pe pahuñchin, jiske naam “Khopṛi” raha, tab huañ pe Yeeshu ke sañghe dui aur apraadhi ke kros pe chaṛhaain, ek ke Yeeshu ke i bagal aur dusra ke uske u bagal.
42023034	Yeeshu bolis, “E Pita, ilog ke maaf karo, kaahe ke ilog nai jaane hei ki ilog kaa kare hei.” Saulja log daaoñ lagaay ke Yeeshu ke kapṛa ke apne meñ baaṭ leen.
42023035	Sab log huañ khaṛa khaṛa sab dekhat rahin, hiañ tak ki agua log bhi Yeeshu ke taana maarat rahin, “I to ketna log ke bachaais. Agar i Parmeshwar ke chuna Maseeh hei, to kaahe nai apne aap ke bachaay!”
42023036	Kuchh saulja Yeeshu ke khilli uṛaay ke uske khaatir sasta waain leke aain.
42023037	Aur ulog bolin, “Agar tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei to apne aap ke bachaay leo!”
42023038	Uske uppar ek saain lagaay deen raha, jisman likha raha, “I Yahuudi ke raaja hei.”
42023039	Jon dui Yeeshu ke sañghe laṭkaan rahin, usman se ek apraadhi i bol ke uske ninda karis, “Kaa tum Maseeh nai hei? Agar hei to apne aap ke aur hamme bhi bachaao!”
42023040	Lekin dusra apraadhi uske ḍaaṭis aur bolis, “Kaa tum Parmeshwar se bhi nai ḍarta hei? Tumme bhi to wahi saja mila jon iske mila hei?
42023041	Hamme to wahi saja mila jon hamme mile ke chaahi, lekin i to koi kharaab kaam nai karis hei.”
42023042	Tab u Yeeshu se bolis, “E Yeeshu, jab tum aapan raaj meñ aana, tab hamme yaad karna!”
42023043	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum se promis karta hei ki aaj tum hamaar sañghe swarag lok meñ rahega.”
42023044	Baarah baje ke ṭaaim, suuraj chhip gais aur asmaan kariya hoy gay, aur teen baje tak puura des meñ añdhiyaar chhaais raha, Mandir ke parda bhi beech meñ se faṭ gais.
42023046	Yeeshu jor se chillaay ke bolis, “Pita ji, ham aapan jaan tumhaar haath meñ deta hei!” Yahi bol ke Yeeshu mar gais.
42023047	Jab Romi saulja i dekhis to Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare laga aur bolis, “Sachche ke i admi ke koi dos nai raha!”
42023048	Ek baṛa bheeṛ i bhayaanak seen dekhe ke waaste huañ rahin. Ulog jab i sab dekhin, tab ulog ke dil ṭuuṭ gais aur ulog ghare chale gain.
42023049	Jon sab Yeeshu ke kareeb dost aur aurat log jon Galeel se uske sañghe aain rahin, ulog kuchh duur pe khaṛa hoy ke i sab dekhat rahin.
42023050	Huañ pe ek admi raha jiske naam Josaf raha, u Armathia ke rahe waala raha aur huañ ke maha sabha ke memba bhi raha. Josaf ek achchha aur dharam pe chale waala admi raha. Lekin u sabha ke kaam se raaji nai raha aur u Prabhu ke raaj ke khoj meñ hardam laga rahat raha.
42023052	Josaf jaay ke Paaylaṭ se Yeeshu ke boḍi maañgis.
42023053	U boḍi ke kros se nichche utaaris, aur malmal ke kapṛa meñ uske lapeṭ ke kabar meñ rakkhis, jon chaṭṭaan kaaṭ ke banaawa gais raha, aur jisman koi aur boḍi abhi tak nai rakkha gais raha.
42023054	Suk ke roj raha, aur sabat suru hoy waala raha.
42023055	U aurat log jon Galeel se Yeeshu ke sañghe aain raha, pichchhe pichchhe jaay ke kabar ke dekhin aur i bhi dekhin ki laash keise rakkha gais hei.
42023056	Tab ulog jaay ke achchha mahke waala masaala aur senṭ taiyaar karin aur, sabat ke roj ulog araam karin kahe ke yahi Maozas ke kaanuun raha.
42024001	Hapta ke pahile roj suuraj jeise nikra, weise u sab aurat mahke waala masaala, jon ulog taiyaar kare rahin, leke kabar pe gain.
42024002	Ulog jab dekhin ki kabar se patthar haṭa hei.
42024003	Tab bhittar gain. Lekin Prabhu Yeeshu ke laash nai paain.
42024004	Ulog ekdam hairaan hoy ke wahiñ khaṛe ke khaṛe rahe gain, tab dui admi ujjar chamke waala kapṛa pahin ke ulog ke lage khaṛa hoy gain.
42024005	U aurat log ekdam ḍar ke maare aapan muuṛ jameen tak jhukaay leen, tab usman se ek admi bolis, “Tum jinda ke murda meñ kaahe ke khojta hei?
42024006	Yeeshu hiañ nai hei, kaahe ke u jinda hoy gais hei. Yaad karo jab u Galeel meñ raha tab u tum se bolis raha, ‘Manush ke laṛka ke jaruuri hei ki uske admi ke haath meñ saupa jaai aur u tisra roj jinda hoy jaai.’ ”
42024008	Tab ulog ke yaad aais ki Yeeshu kaa bolis raha.
42024009	Meri Magdalini, Joanna aur Jeims ke amma, Meri aur ulog ke sañghe aur jon aurat rahin, jon kabar pe gain raha, aay ke huañ jon sab baat bhais raha, u gyaara chela log ke bataain.
42024011	Chela log sochin ki i sab baat bekaar hei, aur ulog biswaas nai karin.
42024012	Lekin Peeṭa uṭhis aur dauṛ ke kabar pe gais, aur jab u jhuk ke bhittar dekhis to khali malmal ke kafan ke kapṛa dekhaai dees, aur sab baat pe hairaan hoy ke ghar lauṭ aais.
42024013	Wahi roj usman se dui admi Immaaus naam ke gaaoñ jaat rahin, jon Yarushalam se lagbhag saat meel ke duuri pe raha.
42024014	Jeise ulog baat karat rahin ki i sab keise bhais raha,
42024015	Yeeshu apne aap aay ke ulog ke bagal meñ chale laga.
42024016	Ulog uske dekhis lekin nai pahichaanin.
42024017	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum sab log chalte chalte kon baat karat raha?” Aur u duuno udaas hoy ke khaṛa hoy gain.
42024018	Usman se ek ke naam Kliyopaas raha, aur u jawaab dees, “Kaa tumahi ekke admi Yarushalam se aaya hei jon nai janta ki pichhle kuchh din huañ kon baat bhais hei?”
42024019	Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “I kon baat hoy hei?” Ulog jawaab dees, “Wahi sab baat jon Naasrat ke Yeeshu ke sañghe bhais raha.” Aur aage bhi kahin, “I admi Parmeshwar aur sab log ke najar meñ, aapan kaam aur boli meñ ek taagat waala nabi raha.
42024020	Hamaar sab se baṛa paadri log aur kaam kare waala log uske pakṛaay ke maut ke saja dewaay deen aur uske kros pe bhi chaṛhwaay deen.
42024021	Lekin ham log to yahi aas lagaay raha ki wahi Israayel ke chhoṛaay waala admi hoi. Lekin i baat ke hoy aaj teen roj hoy gais hei.
42024022	Hamaar sañghe ke kuchh aurat ham log ke hairaan kar deen hei.
42024023	Jab ulog sabere sabere kabar pe gain raha, tab huañ pe ulog ke laash nai mila, aur ham log ke aay ke bataain ki ulog ke huañ ainjal dekhaan raha, jon ulog ke bataais ki Yeeshu jinda hei.
42024024	Hamaar sañghe aur jon log rahin, usman se bhi kuchh kabar pe gain raha aur jeise u aurat log bataais raha, weisaiyeñ ulog bhi paain aur Yeeshu ke nai dekhe paain.”
42024025	Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum murakh hei, jon baat nabi log bolin, uske biswaas kare meñ kaahe etna deri lagaata hei!
42024026	Kaa Maseeh ke khaatir i jaruuri nai raha ki u dukh uṭhaay aur mahima paay?”
42024027	Tab Yeeshu Maozas se suru kar ke aur sab nabi ke aur jetna Baaibal meñ likhaan raha, usman se aapan baare meñ baat ke matlab ulog ke samjhaais.
42024028	Jab ulog gaaoñ ke nagichche pahuñch gain jahañ ulog ke jaay ke raha, tab Yeeshu bahaana karis ki uske aage jaay ke hei.
42024029	Tab u admi log usse binti karin, “Aaj hamaar sañghe rahe jaao, sanjha hoy gais hei aur bahut deri bhi hoy gais hei.” Aur tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe raat ruke ke waaste bhittar chala gais.
42024030	Jab Yeeshu khaana khaay beiṭhis, tab u roṭi lees aur dhanbaad deke, aur usman se tuuṛ ke sab ke dees.
42024031	Tab ulog ke aañkhi khul gais aur jaan gain ki u kon hei, lekin tab tak u ulog ke saamne se chala gais.
42024032	Aur ulog ek dusra se bole lagin, “Jab u rasta meñ ham se baat karat raha aur hamme Baaibal ke matlab samjhaat raha, to kaa hamaar man meñ jaran nai hot raha?”
42024033	Wahi lage ulog uṭhin aur Yarushalam lauṭ gain, aur jaay ke u gyaara chela log aur uske aur saathi jon ek sañghe rahin u sab se bataain, “Prabhu sachche ke jinda hoy gais hei aur Saayman ke dekhaay bhi dees hei!”
42024035	Aur fir ulog rasta waala baat aur roṭi tuuṛe waala baat aur keise ulog uske cheenh gain raha, sab baat bataay lagin.
42024036	Jab u duuno baat bataat rahin, tab Yeeshu aay ke ulog ke beech meñ khaṛa hoy gais, aur fir u bolis, “Tum sab ke saanti mile.”
42024037	Ulog to ḍar gain, yahi sochin ki u bhuut hei.
42024038	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke ghabraata hei? Tumhaar man meñ kaahe ke dubidha hei?
42024039	Hamaar haath aur goṛ dekho, ham wahi hei. Hamme chhui ke dekho aur apne aap pata lagaao. Bhuut ke paas haḍḍi aur maas nai rahe hei jeise tum hamme dekhta hei.”
42024040	I bole ke baad Yeeshu aapan haath aur goṛ ulog ke dekhaais.
42024041	Lekin khusi ke maare ulog ab bhi biswaas nai kare sakin aur hairaan hoy gain. Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Kaa tumhaar lage hiañ kuchh khaay ke hei?”
42024042	Ulog uske bhujaan machhri ke ek ṭukṛa deen, aur u uske leke ulog ke saamne khaay lees.
42024044	Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Jab ham tumhaar sañghe raha, ham tumme u sab bataay raha jon kuchh Maozas ke kaanuun meñ likhaan hei, aur sab nabi ke buk aur Bhajan Sañhita meñ hamaar baare meñ jon kuchh bhi likhaan hei, u sab ke puura hoy ke hei.”
42024045	Tab Yeeshu ulog ke madat karis ki ulog samajh le ki Baaibal meñ kaa likhaan hei.
42024046	Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Yahi likhaan hei ki Maseeh dukh uṭhaai aur tisra roj murda meñ se jinda hoy jaai.
42024047	Ulog i bhi bolin ki Yarushalam se leke sab jaati ke log meñ uske naam se paap ke maafi aur pastaawa ke parchaar kara jaai.
42024048	Tum log i baat ke gawaah hei.
42024049	Jis ke promis hamaar bappa tum se karis raha, ham uske bhejega, lekin tumme yahi jagha rahe ke paṛi, jab tak tumme swarag se sakti nai mil jaay.”
42024050	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke ṭaaun se bahire le gais aur aapan haath uppar uṭhaay ke ulog ke aashirbaad dees.
42024051	Jeise u ulog ke aashirbaad det raha, weisaiyeñ Yeeshu ulog se alag hoy gay aur swarag meñ uṭhaay lia gais.
42024052	Tab uske chela log uske bhajan gaain, aur bahut khusi se Yarushalam lauṭ gain.
42024053	Ulog jaada ṭaaim Mandir meñ uske baṛaai karte bitaain.
43001001	Dunia ke bane se pahile vachan raha, u Ishwar ke sañghe rahis, aur u sachche meñ Ishwar raha.
43001002	Sab se pahile u vachan Ishwar ke sañghe raha.
43001003	Aur wahi vachan ke sahaare, Ishwar sab cheej banaais. U shabd ke bina ek bhi cheej nai banis. Aur jon cheej bhi banis
43001004	uske jeewan ke sota wahi vachan raha, aur yahi jeewan ham log ke khaatir roshni laais.
43001005	Wahi roshni añdhiyaar meñ chamkat raha aur u añdhera bhi u roshni ke butaay nai sakis.
43001006	Ishwar aapan ek duut bhejis, uske naam Yuhanna raha,
43001007	u roshni ke baare meñ bataay aais raha aur sab log ke rasta dekhaais ki log biswaas kare.
43001008	Yuhanna u roshni nai raha. U to khali u roshni ke baare meñ bataay aais raha.
43001009	Jon sachcha roshni sab ke uppar chamke hei u dunia meñ aais hei.
43001010	Vachan dunia meñ raha, lekin uske koi nai pahichaanis, jab ki Parmeshwar aapan vachan se dunia banaais.
43001011	U to aapan log meñ bhi gais, lekin aapan log bhi uske nai apnaais.
43001012	Jon jon bhi uske apnaais aur uske naam pe biswaas karis. U sab log ke u hak dees ki u sab Parmeshwar ke laṛkan bane.
43001013	U sab Ishwar ke laṛkan weisaiyeñ to nai ban gais aur admi ke maañge se bhi nai banis Parmeshwar khud apne u sab ke aapan laṛkan banaais.
43001014	Vachan admi ke ruup dhar lees, aur hamaar beech meñ rahe lagis. Ham uske sachcha mahima dekha, u mahima uske mila kaahe ki u aapan baap ke ekke laṛka raha Usman se Prabhu ke sachchaai aur daya hamaar lage aay gais hei.
43001015	Yuhanna uske baare meñ chillaay ke bolis, “Yahi ke baare meñ to ham bataata raha, jab ham bola raha, ‘U hamaar pichchhe aay hei, lekin u ham se bahut baṛa hei, kaahe ki u hamaar peida hoy se bahut pahile se raha.”‘
43001016	Uske baṛappan raha ki u ham pe daya dekhaais, aur aasheesh pe aasheesh dete gais.
43001017	Maozas ke bagal se to Ishwar hame kaanuun dees, lekin sachchaai aur baṛappan to Yeeshu Maseeh ke bagal se aais.
43001018	Koi bhi Ishwar ke nai dekhis, khali wahi laṛka jon Ishwar ke godi meñ hei, hame dekhaais ki Ishwar keisan hei.
43001019	Yahuudi agua log, Yarushalam ke kuchh paadri aur madat kare waala log ke, Yuhanna ke lage puuchhe bhejis ki u kon hei.
43001020	Yuhanna khula aam bataais, “Ham Maseeha nai hei.”
43001021	“Tab tum kon hei?” ulog puuchhis, “Kaa tum Ilaayja hei?” “Nai, ham to u bhi nai,” Yuhanna bolis. “Tab kaa tum nabi hei?”, u sab puuchhin. “nai”, u jawaab dees.
43001022	“Tum hame bataao, tum kon hei?” u sab bolin. “Uske lage hamme jawaab le jaay ke hei, jon hamme bhejis hei.”
43001023	Tab Yuhanna, Aayzaaya nabi ke vachan meñ bolis, “Ham khali wahi hei jon akele jagha pe chillaay ke bole hei, ‘Prabhu ke waaste seedha rasta banaao!”’
43001024	Kuchh log ke bhi Yuhanna ke lage bheja gais raha.
43001025	U log us se puuchhis, “Tum Maseeh bhi nai hei, nabi bhi nai hei, aur Ilaayja bhi nai hei, to tum kaahe ke baptisma deta hei?”
43001026	Yuhanna jawaab dees, “Ham to khali paani se baptisma deta hei, lekin tumhaar beech meñ ek admi aais hei jiske tum sab nai janta hei.
43001027	Jon hamaar pichchhe aaywaala hei uske to ham juuta ke bandhan tak khole laayk nai hei.”
43001028	Yuhanna i sab baat tab bolis jab u Bethni gaaoñ meñ Joḍan nadi ke kinaare baptisma det raha.
43001029	Dusra roj Yuhanna dekhis ki Yeeshu uske lage chala aay hei aur u bolis, “Yahi hei Parmeshwar ke memna, jon dunia ke sab paap ke aapan uppar uṭhaay le jaai!”
43001030	Yahi hei jiske baare meñ ham bataata raha jab ham bola, “Ek admi hamaar pichchhe aay hei, aur u ham se bahut baṛa hei, kaahe ki u hamaar peida hoy se pahile raha.”
43001031	Ham nai janta raha ki u kon hei. Ham to khali paani se baptisma dewe aay raha, ki jisse Israayel ke sab log uske dekhe saki.
43001032	Yuhanna aapan gawaahi dees, “Ham dekha ki ek Aatma kabuttar ke rakam, asmaan se utar ke Yeeshu pe ruk gais.”
43001033	Tab bhi ham nai jaan paaya ki i wahi hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis raha ki ham paani se baptisma dei, ham se bataais, “Tum dekhega ek Aatma aay ke koi pe ruki. Tab tum jaanega ki i wahi hei jon Pawitr Aatma se baptisma dei.”
43001034	Ham dekh lia hei aur tumme bataata hei ki yahi Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.
43001035	Dusra roj Yuhanna fir aapan chela log ke sañghe wahiñ khaṛa raha,
43001036	jab u dekhis ki Yeeshu bagal se jaay hei, tab u bolis, “Yahi Ishwar ke memna hei.”
43001037	Yuhanna ke dui chela i baat sunke Yeeshu ke lage gain.
43001038	Jab Yeeshu ghuum ke u duuno ke dekhis to puuchhis, “Tumme kaa chaahi?” U duuno jawaab deen, “Guru ji, tum kahañ rahta hei?”
43001039	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Aao aur dekho!” U ṭaaim sanjha ke lagbhag chaar baja raha aur u sab chela jaay ke dekhin ki Yeeshu kahañ rahe hei. Aur baaki ṭaaim wahi ke sañghe bitaain.
43001040	Usman se ek admi, jon Yuhanna ke sun ke Yeeshu ke lage gais raha, uske naam Enḍru raha aur u Saayman Peeṭa ke bhaiya raha.
43001041	Sab se pahile u aapan bhaiya Saayman se milis aur bataais, “Ham Maseeha ke khoj lia hei.”
43001042	Enḍru aapan bhaiya ke Yeeshu ke lage le aais. Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis to bolis, ‘Tumhaar naam Saayman hei aur tum Yuhanna ke laṛka hei. Tum "Kaifa" yaane ki "chaṭṭaan" ke naam se jaana jaayga. (U Peeṭa ke rakam hei jiske matlab ‘ek patthar’ hei.)
43001043	Dusra roj Yeeshu Galeel jaay ke waaste plen banaais. Huañ u Filip se milis aur bolis, “Hamaar sañghe aao!”
43001044	Filip, Beitseida ṭaaun ke rahe waala raha, wahiñ pe jahañ Peeṭa aur Enḍru rahat rahin.
43001045	Filip, Natanyel se milis aur usse bataais, “Hamme u mil gais hei jiske baare meñ Maozas kaanuun ke buk meñ likhis raha, aur yahi ke baare meñ nabi bhi likhis raha. Uske naam Yeeshu hei, u Josaf ke laṛka hei aur Naasrat meñ rahe hei.”
43001046	Natanyel puuchhis, “Kaa Naasrat meñ se kuchh achchha nikre sake hei?” “Aao aur dekho,” Filip bolis.
43001047	Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki Natanyel uske lage aay hei, tab u uske baare meñ bolis, “I to sachcha Israayeli hei, isman kuchh bhi jhuuṭ nai hei!”
43001048	Natanyel usse puuchhis, “Tum hamme keise janta hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Filip ke bolaay se pahile ham tumme anjeer ke peṛ ke nichche dekh lia raha.”
43001049	Natanyel tab bolis, “Guru ji, tum Ishwar ke laṛka hei aur Israayel ke raaja hei!”
43001050	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Kaa tum i kaaran ham pe biswaas karta hei ki ham tumme bataaya ki ham tumme anjeer (fig) ke peṛ ke nichche dekh lia raha? Tum isse bhi bahut baṛa kaam dekhega.
43001051	Ham tum se sachche sachche bataata hei, tum dekhega ki asmaan khuli aur ainjals uppar jaay ke fir Manush ke laṛka pe utri.”
43002001	Teen din ke baad Kaana ṭaaun jon Galeel meñ hei, huañ ek saadi raha. Yeeshu ke amma bhi huañ rahi.
43002002	Yeeshu aur uske chela log ke bhi u saadi ke neota milis raha.
43002003	Jab sab waain khalaas hoy gais, tab Yeeshu ke amma usse bolis, “Uske lage aur waain nai hei.”
43002004	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamme nai bataao ki hamme kaa kare ke hei. Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei.”
43002005	Meri tab naukar se bolis, “Wahi karo jon i bataay hei.”
43002006	Neota meñ chhe (6) baṛa baṛa patthar ke bartan raha, huañ ke log usman se paani nikaar ke apne aap ke safa karat rahin. I huañ ke reeti riwaaj raha. Ek ek bartan meñ lagbhag ek sao leeṭa paani bhara jaay sakat raha.
43002007	Tab Yeeshu ek naukar se bolis, “I sab bartan meñ paani bharo.” U sab usman muh tak paani bhar deen.
43002008	Tab Yeeshu fir bolis, “Ab isman se kuchh paani nikaar ke u admi ke lage le jaao, jon i sab ke dekh bhaal kare hei.” Naukar wahi karis jon Yeeshu usse bolis raha.
43002009	Jab dekhbhaal karewaala admi uske cheekhis tab u paani waain meñ badal gais raha. U nai jaanat raha ki u waain kahañ se aais hei. Lekin u naukar, to jaanat raha.
43002010	Tab u dulha ke bolaay ke bolis, “Sab koi pahile achchha waain de hei, aur jab pahuna log jaada pee le hei tab uske saadhaaran waain dewa jaay hei. Lekin tum to abhi tak achchha waain rakha hei!”
43002011	Yahi Yeeshu ke pahila chamatkaar raha jon Galeel ke Kaana ṭaaun meñ suru karis raha, aur aapan mahima dekhaais aur uske chela log uspe biswaas karin.
43002012	Iske baad, Yeeshu aur uske amma, aur bhaiya aur chela log Kafarnahuum ṭaaun chala gais aur huañ kuchh din rahin.
43002013	Yahuudi log ke fasah ke teohaar aay waala raha, aur Yeeshu Yarushalam chala gais.
43002014	Huañ u dekhis ki chech meñ kuchh log chaua aur kabuttar beche hei, aur ṭaibal pe peisa badli kare waala log bhi beiṭhin hei.
43002015	Tab Yeeshu ek rassi ke chaabuk banaais aur sab log ke bheṛa aur beil ke sañghe chech ke bahire kar dees. Aur jon peisa badli kare waala log rahin uske bhi ṭaibal ulṭaay dees aur sab peisa idhar udhar chhitraay dees.
43002016	Tab Yeeshu jon kabuttar bechat rahin, usse bolis, “I sab ke hiañ se le jaao! Hamaar Pita ke ghar ke khareed been ke jagha nai banaao.”
43002017	Tab uske chela log ke yaad aais ki Baaibal meñ likha raha, “Hamaar bhakti aur prem tumhaar ghar ke waaste, He Prabhu, ham meñ aagi ke rakam bare hei.”
43002018	Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu se ek sawaal karin, “Kon se chamatkaar tum hamme dekhaayga, ki ham biswaas kari ki tumme i kaam kare ke hak hei?”
43002019	“I chech ke ujaaṛ deo, aur ham teen roj meñ iske fir se banaay dega.”
43002020	Agua log jawaab deen, “Kaa tum iske teen roj meñ banaay dega? Hamme to i chech ke banaay meñ forṭi siks (46) saal laga raha.”
43002021	Lekin jon chech ke baat Yeeshu karat raha, u uske deñhi raha.
43002022	Aur jab Yeeshu mar ke jinda hoy gais, tab uske chela log ke yaad aais ki u kaa bolat raha. Aur tab u sab Baaibal aur usman kaa likha hei, uspe biswaas karin.
43002023	Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam meñ fasah ke teohaar ke ṭaaim raha tab bahut se log uspe biswaas karin, kaahe ki ulog dekhin ki Yeeshu ketna chamatkaar karis raha.
43002024	Lekin Yeeshu jaanat raha ki u sab ke dil meñ kaa hei, aur u sab pe bharosa nai karis.
43002025	I jaruurat nai raha ki koi Yeeshu ke u sab ke baare meñ bataay, kaahe ki u apne aap sab ke dil ke baat jaanat raha.
43003001	Huañ ek Yahuudi ke sardaar Nikoḍimas naam ke admi raha, aur u Farisi dal ke raha.
43003002	Ek raat u Yeeshu ke lage aais aur usse bolis, “Guru, ham janta hei ki Ishwar tumme bhejis hei ki tum aay ke hamme sikhaao. Agar Ishwar tumhaar sañghe nai rahta to jon chamatkaar tum hamme dekhaaya hei, nai dekhaay sakta.”
43003003	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak koi admi nawa janam nai le le, tab tak u Parmeshwar ke raaj nai dekhe saki!”
43003004	Nikoḍimas fir se puuchhis, “Keise ek baṛa admi fir se peida hoy sake hei? Kaa u aapan amma ke peṭ meñ fir se jaay ke dusra dafe peida hoy sake hei?”
43003005	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak ek admi paani aur Aatma se janam nai le, tab tak u Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ nai jaay sake.
43003006	Ek admi aapan amma bappa ke deñhi se laaif paay hei, lekin aatmik jeewan to khali Aatma se paay hei.
43003007	Ghabraana nai jab ham tumme bataayga ki tumme fir se janam le ke hei.
43003008	Khali Parmeshwar ke Aatma nawa jeewan de sake hei. Aatma u hawa ke rakam hei jon jab maañge chale hei. Tum khali hawa ke awaaj sune sakta hei, lekin tum nai janta ki u kahañ se aay hei, aur kahañ jaay hei.”
43003009	“I keise hoy sake hei?” Nikoḍimas puuchhis.
43003010	Tab fir Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Keise tum Israayeli log ke guru hoy ke bhi i baat nai samjha?
43003011	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ham sab wahi bolega jon ham dekha hei aur janta hei. Lekin jon ham bolta hei, tum hamaar u baat nai maanega.
43003012	Jab ham tum se dunia ke baat karta hei to tum ham pe biswaas nai karta, to agar ham swarag ke baat karega to kaa tum ham pe biswaas karega?
43003013	Khali manush ke laṛka ke chhoṛ ke koi bhi admi swarag pe nai gais, jon fir se huañ se nichche utar aais hei.
43003014	Jeise Maozas jañgal meñ ek nakli saañp ke uppar chaṛhaais raha, weisaiyeñ i bhi jaruuri hei ki Manush ke laṛka ke bhi uppar chaṛhaawa jaay,
43003015	ki jisse jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kari u anant jeewan paai.
43003016	Parmeshwar dunia ke log se etna pyaar karis ki aapan eklauta laṛka ke dunia meñ bhejis, ki jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kari, u naas nai hoi lekin anant jeewan paai.
43003017	Ishwar aapan beṭa ke dunia meñ i kaaran nai bhejis ki u dunia ke saja de. Uske bhejis hei ki u dunia ke bachaay!
43003018	Jon koi bhi Ishwar ke beṭa pe biswaas kare hei, u naas nai hoi, lekin jon uspe biswaas nai kare hei to uske satyanaas hoy jaai, kaahe ki ulog Ishwar ke eklauta beṭa pe biswaas nai karin.
43003019	Roshni dunia meñ aay gais hei, aur jon koi bhi kharaab kaam kari uske saja mili, kaahe ki ulog añjora se jaada añdhera se pyaar kare hei.
43003020	Jon bhi koi kharaab kaam kare hei, u añjora se haiṭ kare hei, aur roshni ke lage nai aay hei, kaahe ki añjora meñ u sab ke kharaab kaam dekhaay jaay.
43003021	Lekin jon seedha rasta pe chale hei, u jyoti ke saamne aay hei ki jisse sab log i dekhe saki ki Ishwar ke marji ke mutaabik kaam kare hei.
43003022	Iske baad Yeeshu aur uske chela log Juḍia meñ aais, aur huañ uske sañghe kuchh din rahe ke, log ke baptisma det raha.
43003023	Yuhanna bhi Salim ke nagichche Aenon meñ baptisma det raha, kaahe ki huañ ḍher paani raha, aur log aay ke usse baptisma let rahin.
43003024	Yuhanna ke abhi tak jel meñ nai rakha gay raha.
43003025	Wahiñ pe Yuhanna ke chela log se aur ek Yahuudi se sudh hoy ke baare meñ jhagṛa bhais.
43003026	U log Yuhanna ke lage jaay ke bolin, “He Guru, u jon admi Joḍan nadi ke eesṭ meñ tumhaar sañghe raha, aur uske baare meñ tum ham se bola raha, u ab baptisma dewe hei, aur sab log wahi ke paas jaay hei.”
43003027	Yuhanna jawaab dees,
43003028	“Tumme yaad hoi ham bataay raha ki ham Maseeha nai hei. Ham to khali usse pahile bheja gaya hei.
43003029	Saadi meñ dulha hei jiske saadi hoy hei. Dulha ke dost to uske awaaj sunke khusi hoy hei. Yahi kaaran ham bhi bahut khusi hei.
43003030	Ab bahut jaruuri hei ki Yeeshu baṛa hoy aur ham chhoṭa bani.”
43003031	Jon swarag se aay hei u bahut mahaan hoy hei. Aur jon koi bhi dunia se aay hei, dharti ke hee rahe hei, aur khali duniadaari ke baat kare hei. Lekin jon swarag se aay hei u sab se achchha hei.
43003032	Jon kuchh bhi u dekhis aur sunis hei, wahi bataais hei, lekin fir bhi koi uspe biswaas nai karin.
43003033	Lekin jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kare hei, u jaane hei ki Ishwar sachcha hei.
43003034	Ishwar aapan beṭa bhejis ki u uske sandesa sab ke sunaay, aur u uske Pawitr Aatma se bhar dees hei.
43003035	Pita aapan beṭa se bahut pyaar kare hei, aur sab hak uske haath meñ de dees hei.
43003036	Jon koi beṭa pe biswaas kare hei, anant jeewan uske mile hei. Lekin jon beṭa ke nai maane hei, u anant jeewan nai paai aur Parmeshwar usse hardam gussa meñ rahi.”
43004001	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki Farisi log sun leen hei ki u Yuhanna se jaada log ke jeet ke baptisma de hei, aur ulog uske pichchhe chale lagin hei.
43004002	Yeeshu apne aap baptisma nai det raha, lekin uske chela log det rahin.
43004003	Yeeshu Juḍia chhoṛ ke Galeel ke bagal jaay laga.
43004004	I dafe uske Samaaria se hoy ke jaay ke raha.
43004005	Rasta meñ uske Sukhaar ṭaaun mila. Uske nagichche meñ u jameen raha, jon Jaykab bahut din pahile aapan laṛka Josaf ke dees raha.
43004006	Jaykab ke kuaañ bhi wahiñ raha. Chalte chalte lagbhag baarah baje ke ṭaaim jab Yeeshu thak gais raha, to u wahi kuaañ ke bagal meñ beiṭh gais. Aur Yeeshu ke chela log ṭaaun khaana khareede chala gain.
43004007	Wahi ṭaaim ek Saamri aurat kuaañ pe paani bhare aais.
43004008	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Kaa tum hamme paani piyaay sakti hei?”
43004009	Saamri aurat Yeeshu se bolis, “Tum ek Yahuudi hei aur ham ek Saamri aurat. Tum keise ham se paani mañgta hei jab ki Yahuudi aur Saamri ek dusra se kuchh sambandh nai rakkhe hei?”
43004010	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum nai jaanti ki Ishwar tumme kaa de maañge hei, aur tum i bhi nai jaanti ki tum se kon paani maañge hei. Agar tum jaanti, to ham se jeewan jal maañgti.”
43004011	“E guru,” u aurat bolis, “Tumhaar paas to paani bhare ke waaste kuchh bhi nai hei, aur kuaañ bhi bahut gahira hei. Tum kahañ se jeewan jal laayga?
43004012	Tum hamaar bappa Jaykab se to baṛa nai hei, jon hamaar waaste i kuaañ khodis raha ki jisse uske palwaar aur jaanwar isman se paani piye saki?”
43004013	Tab Yeeshu uske jawaab dees, “Jon koi i paani pee u fir se pyaasa hoy jaai.
43004014	Lekin jon koi bhi i paani pee jon ham deta hei, u kabhi pyaasa nai hoi. Jon paani ham dega u ek sota ke rakam hei jon anant jeewan ke waaste hardam nikarte rahi.”
43004015	U aurat fir se bolis, “E Prabhu, hamme u paani deo ki jisse ham kabhi pyaasa nai rahi aur hiañ kabhi paani bhare ke waaste nai aai.”
43004016	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Jaao, aapan admi ke le aao.”
43004017	“Hamaar lage admi nai hei,” u aurat bolis. “Tum sachche bolti hei,” Yeeshu bolis, “tumhaar admi nai hei.
43004018	Abhi tak tum paañch ke sañghe saadi kari, aur abhi jon tumhaar sañghe hei u tumhaar admi nai hei.”
43004019	U aurat bolis, “Ab ham samajh gaya ki tum koi nabi hei
43004020	Hamaar baap daada yahi pahaaṛ pe Parmeshwar ke weship karin, lekin tum bolta hei ki Yarushalam hee u jagha hei jahañ weship kare ke chaahi.”
43004021	Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “E aurat, ham pe biswaas karo, ṭaaim aay hei jab tum log naa to i pahaaṛ pe aur naa to Yarushalam meñ Pita ke weship karega.
43004022	Tum Saamri log nai janta ki tum sab kiske weship karta hei. Aur ham Yahuudi u Parmeshwar ke janta hei jiske ham weship karta hei, kaahe ki Parmeshwar ham Yahuudi ke jariye dunia ke bachaai.
43004023	Lekin u ṭaaim aay waala hei, yaane ki aay gais hei jab sachcha weship kare waala log Pita ke weship, aatma aur sachchaai se kari, kaahe ki Pita aapan weship ke khaatir eisane log ke khojis hei.
43004024	Parmeshwar Aatma hei, aur i jaruuri hei ki u sab weship kare waala Aatma aur sachchaai se weship kare.”
43004025	U aurat tab bolis, “Ham sab janta hei ki Maseeha aay waala hei. Wahi hei jiske ham Krisṭ bolega. Jab u aai tab hamme sab samjhaai.”
43004026	“Ham wahi hei,” Yeeshu bolis, “aur ham abhi tum se baat karta hei.”
43004027	Wahi ṭaaim sab chela log lauṭ aain, aur i dekh ke achambha kare lagin ki Yeeshu u aurat se baat kare hei. Lekin koi bhi i nai puuchhis ki, “Tum usse kaahe ke baat karta hei?”
43004028	Tab u aurat aapan bartan wahiñ chhoṛ ke ṭaaun ke bagal bhaagis, aur sab log se bataay lagi,
43004029	“Aao aur dekho, u admi ke dekho, u sab jaane hei jon ham abhi tak kara hei, aur hamme sab bataay dees hei! Kahiñ yahi Maseeh to nai?”
43004030	Ṭaaun ke sab log Yeeshu ke dekhe ke waaste uske lage chal deen.
43004031	Jab tak i sab hot raha, Yeeshu ke chela log usse binti karat rahin, “Guru ji, kuchh khaay leo.”
43004032	Lekin Yeeshu u sab se bataais, “Hamaar lage eisan khaana hei jiske baare meñ tum sab nai janta.”
43004033	Tab sab chela log aapas meñ baat kare lagin, “Kaa koi iske khaay ke waaste kuchh laais hei?”
43004034	Yeeshu tab fir se bolis, “Hamaar khaana yahi hei jon Parmeshwar chaahe hei! Wahi hamme bhejis hei, aur hamme u kaam puura kare ke hei jon u hamme kare ke bhejis hei.
43004035	Tum saait bolega ki kaṭni ke abhi chaar mahina aur baaki hei. Lekin ham tum se bataata hei, aañkhi uṭhaay ke dekho ki sab khet meñ anaaj kaṭe ke khaatir taiyaar hei.
43004036	Aur jon log kaaṭe hei uske majduuri mile hei, aur anant jeewan ke khaatir fal baṭore hei. Tab jon koi bhi bowe hei aur jon koi kaaṭe hei duuno milke khusi manaai.
43004037	Iske waaste i kahaawat achchha hei. “Bowe koi aur kaaṭe koi aur.”
43004038	Ham tumme u khet meñ kaaṭe ke waaste bhejta hei, jahañ dusra sab mehnat karin.
43004039	U ṭaaun ke bahut Saamri log Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin, kaahe ki u aurat bole rahi, “I admi hamme sab bataay dees jon kaam ham kare raha.”
43004040	U log aay ke Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki u uske sañghe ruke, aur u uske sañghe dui roj aur rukis.
43004041	Yeeshu ke parchaar sunke bahut se Saamri Yeeshu pe biswaas karin.
43004042	U log u Saamri aurat se bolin, “Ab ham log khali tumhaar bole pe Yeeshu pe biswaas nai karta hei. Ab to ham khud sun lia hei, aur samajh lia hei ki wahi dunia ke bachaay aais hei!”
43004043	Yeeshu bolis raha, “Aapan des meñ nabi ke aadar nai hoy hei.” Fir dui roj huañ rahe ke baad u Galeel chala gais.
43004045	Huañ ke log uske welkam karin, kaahe ki ulog teohaar meñ dekh leen raha ki Yeeshu kon kon kaam huañ karis raha.
43004046	Jab Yeeshu Galeel meñ raha, to u Kaana ṭaaun gais jahañ u paani ke waain meñ badlis raha. Huañ ek sarkaari naukar mila jiske laṛka Kafarnahuum meñ bimaar raha.
43004047	Aur jab u admi sunis ki Yeeshu, Juḍia meñ hei, to uske lage jaay ke chirauri karis ki u jaay ke uske laṛka ke mare se bachaay.
43004048	Yeeshu, u kaam kare waala se bolis, “Jab tak tum achambha ke kaam aur chamatkaar nai dekhega, tab tak tum biswaas nai karega!”
43004049	U admi fir se bolis, “Prabhu ji, aay ke hamaar laṛka ke mare se bachaay lo!”
43004050	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Tumhaar laṛka nai mari. Jaao, ghare jaao, uske lage.” Yeeshu pe biswaas karke u admi ghare jaay laga.
43004051	Rasta meñ uske naukar usse milin aur bataain, “Tumhaar laṛka ab bilkul ṭheek hei!”
43004052	U usse puuchhis ki kon ṭaaim laṛka achchha bhais? U log bolin, “Lagbhag ek baje uske bukhaar utar gais raha.”
43004053	Laṛka ke bappa ke yaad aais ki wahi ṭaaim Yeeshu bolis raha, “Tumhaar laṛka jee!” Aur tab se u admi aur uske palwaar Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin.
43004054	Yahi dusra chamatkaar raha jon Yeeshu, Juḍia se lauṭ ke Galeel meñ karis raha.
43005001	Iske baad Yahuudi ke ek aur teohaar aais aur Yeeshu Yarushalam chala gais.
43005002	Yarushalam meñ ek sheep gaiṭ hei, jiske bagal meñ ek kunḍ hei jon Beitseida ke naam se jaana jaay hei. Usman paañch poch hei.
43005003	U poch meñ bahut se bimaar log, añdha, langṛa, luula aur lunj log paṛa rahat rahin. U log paani ke hile ke waiṭ karat rahin.
43005004	Is ke kaaran i raha ki kabhi kabhi ek ainjal kunḍ meñ utar ke paani hilaawat raha. Jeise paani hile to jon sab se pahile kunḍ meñ utar jaay hei u wahi ṭaaim achchha hoy jaay hei, chaahe uske koi bhi bimaari hoy.
43005005	Kunḍ ke bagal meñ ek admi beiṭha raha, jon 38 saal se bimaar raha.
43005006	Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis to jaan gais ki u bahut roj se bimaar hei, tab u usse jaay ke puuchhis, “Kaa tum achchha hoy mañgta hei?”
43005007	U admi jawaab dees, “He Prabhu, hamaar lage koi admi nai ki jab paani hile to hamme jaldi se kunḍ meñ utaar de. Aur hamaar huañ pahuñchte pahuñchte dusra admi ham se pahile kunḍ meñ utar paṛe hei.”
43005008	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Uṭho, aapan chaṭaai uṭhaao aur chalo!”
43005009	Wahi ṭaaim u admi achchha hoy gais. U aapan chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale lagis. Jon roj i baat bhais, u sabat ke roj raha.
43005010	Jab Yahuudi agua log dekhis ki u admi jon achchha bhais raha, aapan chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale fire hei to usse bolin “Aaj sabat ke din hei. Tumhaar chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chalna firna kaanuun ke agaiñsṭ hei.”
43005011	Lekin u jawaab dees, “Jon hamme achchha karis hei, u hamme bataais ki chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chalo.”
43005012	U sab fir puuchhin, “Kon hei u admi jon tumme chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale ke bataais hei?”
43005013	Lekin u to nai jaanat raha ki Yeeshu kon raha, aur Yeeshu to bheeṛ ke kaaran huañ se chala gais raha.
43005014	Baad meñ Yeeshu u admi se chech meñ mila, aur usse bolis, “Tum ab achchha hoy gaya hei. Ab aur paap nai karna nai to aur kaṛa saja tumme mili.”
