43005015	Tab u admi jaay ke Yahuudi log se bataais ki jon uske achchha karis raha u Yeeshu hei.
43005016	Ab Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke sataay lagin, kaahe ki u sabat ke roj changaai ke kaam karat raha.
43005017	Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Hamaar Pita to sab roj kaam kare hei, wahi kaaran ham bhi kaam karte rahta hei.”
43005018	Ab to agua log dui kaaran se Yeeshu ke maare ke kosis kare lagin. Ek to u sabat ke kaanuun tuuṛis aur dusra is se bhi kharaab, jab u bolis ki Parmeshwar uske Pita hei, ab to u Ishwar ke baraabar hoy gais.
43005019	Yeeshu sab log se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, beṭa apne aap kuchh nai kare sake hei. U wahi kare sake hei jon aapan baap ke karte dekhe hei. Jeise baap kare hei weisaiyeñ beṭa bhi kare hei.
43005020	Pita aapan laṛka ke bahut pyaar kare hei, aur Pita jon kuchh bhi kare hei aapan laṛka ke dekhaay de hei. Aur Pita isse bhi baṛa kaam uske dekhaai ki tum sab ke achambha hoi.
43005021	Jeise Pita jon mar gais hei uske jeewan de hei, wahi rakam laṛka jiske maañge jeewan de sake hei.
43005022	Pita koi ke nyaay nai kare hei. Lekin u aapan laṛka ke sab ke uppar nyaay kare ke adhikaar de dees hei.
43005023	Pita maañge hei ki jeise sab uske aadar kare hei wahi rakam uske laṛka ke bhi aadar kare. Jon koi laṛka ke aadar nai kare hei u Pita jon uske bhejis hei uske bhi aadar nai kare hei.
43005024	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon hamaar sandesa sune hei, aur jon hamme bhejis hei uspe biswaas kare hei, anant jeewan wahi ke mili. Uske saja kabhi nai mili. Ulog maut ke paar karke anant jeewan meñ aay gain hei.
43005025	Ham tumme bataata hei ki u ṭaaim aai, aur u aay gais hei, jab sab mara log Parmeshwar ke laṛka ke awaaj suni, aur khali yahi nai, jon sune hei, uske anant jeewan mili!
43005026	Pita ke lage sakti hei ki u jeewan dei, aur u wahi sakti aapan laṛka ke de dees hei.
43005027	Aur uske i bhi adhikaar dees hei ki u sab ke nyaay kare saki, kaahe ki u Manush ke laṛka hei.
43005028	Achambha nai karna! Ṭaaim aai ki jon sab mara log hei u sab Manush ke laṛka ke awaaj suni,
43005029	aur u sab aapan aapan kabar se nikar ke aai. Jon bhi koi jeewan meñ achchha kaam karis hei uske jeewan mili, lekin jon kharaab kaam karis hei uske saja mili.
43005030	Ham apne aap kuchh nai kare sakta. Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, wahi hamme bataay hei ki ham nyaay keise kari. Ham ṭheek se nyaay karta hei kaahe ki ham aapan nai lekin uske ichchha puura karta hei aur wahi ke sunta hei.
43005031	Agar ham aapan gawaahi khud dei, to u gawaahi sachcha nai hoi.
43005032	Lekin ek aur hei jon hamaar gawaahi dewe hei, aur ham janta hei ki u jon kuchh bhi bole hei wahi sachche hei.
43005033	Tum Yuhanna ke lage duut bheja, aur u sachchaai se gawaahi dees.
43005034	I nai ki log hamaar gawaahi dewe, lekin i sab ham i kaaran tum se bataata hei ki tum sab bache sako.
43005035	Yuhanna u batti raha jon bahut jaada añjora det raha, aur kuchh ṭaaim ke khaatir tum bhi u añjora meñ khusi manaaya.
43005036	Lekin hamaar lage jon gawaahi hei u Yuhanna ke gawaahi se bahut khaas hei. Kaahe ki jon kaam Pita hamme kare ke waaste dees hei jeise ki i kaam jon ham abhi karta hei, wahi hamaar gawaahi hei, ki Pita hamme bhejis hei.
43005037	Wahi Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, hamaar gawaahi de hei, lekin tum uske awaaj kabhi nai suna aur uske chehra bhi nai dekha.
43005038	Aur uske vachan bhi tum dil se nai maanta, kaahe ki jon uske bhejis hei, uspe tum biswaas nai karta.
43005039	Baaibal meñ tum khojta hei, kaahe ki tum sochta hei ki usman se tumme anant jeewan mili. Wahi Baaibal hei jon hamaar gawaahi de hei.
43005040	Fir bhi tum hamaar lage nai aata ki tumme anant jeewan mile.
43005041	Ham manush ke baṛaai nai mañgta.
43005042	Aur ham i bhi janta hei ki tum meñ se koi bhi Prabhu se prem nai kare hei.
43005043	Ham aapan Pita ke adhikaar se hiañ aaya hei, aur tum hamme nai apnaaya. Lekin agar koi aur naam se aai, to tum uske apnaayga.
43005044	Tum keise biswaas kare sakta hei? Tum wahi ke mañgta hei jon tumhaar baṛaai kare, aur tum uske parwaah nai karta jon khali Parmeshwar tumme de sake hei!
43005045	I nai sochna ki Pita se ham tumhaar chugli karega. Tum aapan bharosa Maozas pe rakha, aur wahi tumme jhuuṭa saabit kari.
43005046	Maozas hamaar baare meñ likhis hei, aur agar tum Maozas pe biswaas karta hei, to hamme bhi biswaas karta.
43005047	Jab tum Maozas ke likhaai pe biswaas nai karta, tab hamaar baat pe keise biswaas karega?
43006001	Iske baad Yeeshu, Galeel ke kunḍ jon Tabariyaas ke kunḍ ke naam se jaana jaay hei, uske u paar chala gais.
43006002	Ek baṛa bheeṛ jon dekhis raha ki chamatkaar se keise u bimaar ke achchha kare hei, uske pichchhe hoy leen.
43006003	Pahaaṛ pe chaṛh ke Yeeshu aapan chela log ke saathe beiṭh gais.
43006004	Yahuudi log ke fasah ke teohaar nagichche raha.
43006005	Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki ek baṛa bheeṛ uske lage aay hei, tab u Filip se bolis, “Hamme kahañ se etna khaana mili ki ham i sab log ke khawaay sakega?”
43006006	Yeeshu khali uske ajmaay ke waaste eise bolis raha, kaahe ke u to jaanat raha ki uske kaa kare ke hei.
43006007	Filip tab jawaab dees, “Sab ke khaatir thoṛa thoṛa baaṭe ke waaste, dui sao ḍola se kahiñ jaada ke to khali roṭi khareede ke paṛi.”
43006008	Yeeshu ke ek chela, Enḍru jon Saayman Peeṭa ke bhaiya raha, bolis,
43006009	“Hiañ ek laṛka hei jiske lage paañch roṭi aur dui machhri hei, lekin isse etna log ke waaste kaa hoi?”
43006010	“Sab ke laain meñ beiṭhaao,” Yeeshu usse bolis. Huañ pe bahut graas raha. Kul milaay ke kuchh paañch hajaar log rahin. U sab laain meñ graas pe beiṭh gain.
43006011	Tab Yeeshu aapan haath meñ roṭi le ke, Ishwar ke dhanbaad de ke jon sab laain meñ beiṭha rahin uske baaṭ dees. Wahi rakam machhri ke bhi karis, aur jetna ulog maañgat rahin, otna sab ke dees.
43006012	Sab log jetna khaay sakat rahin, otna khaain, aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Jetna ṭukṛa hei, sab baṭor leo, ki jisse kuchh barbaad nai hoy.”
43006013	Chela log baarah baaskeṭ meñ, u paañch roṭi ke bacha ṭukṛa se bhar leen.
43006014	Yeeshu ke i chakit kaam dekh ke sab log bole lagin, “Yahi to u nabi hei, jon ke dunia meñ aay ke raha!”
43006015	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki yahi log uske pakaṛ ke raaja banaai. Tab u pahaaṛ pe chala gais jahañ u akele rahe saki.
43006016	Sanjha ke ṭaaim, Yeeshu ke chela log kunḍ ke kinaare gain.
43006017	U sab bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke kunḍ ke dusra paar Kafarnahuum ṭaaun ke taraf chal paṛin. Raat bhi hoy gais aur Yeeshu abhi tak ulog ke lage nai aais raha.
43006018	Aur jor hawa chale lagis jisse baṛa baṛa halkora uṭhe lagis.
43006019	Jab ulog kareeban teen ya chaar kilomeeṭa bauṭ chalaay leen, tab dekhin ki Yeeshu paani pe chal ke ulog ke lage aay hei. Jeise jeise u nagichche aate gais, chela log ḍar gain.
43006020	Lekin Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham Yeeshu hei! Ḍaro nai!”
43006021	Chela log Yeeshu ke bauṭ meñ beiṭhaay waala rahin ki kinaara aay gais.
43006022	Jon log kunḍ ke eesṭ ke bagal rahe gain raha i jaanat rahin ki huañ khali ekke bauṭ raha. Aur ulog i bhi jaanat rahin ki Yeeshu aapan chela log ke saathe nai gais raha.
43006023	Tabriyaas se kuchh bauṭ huañ aais jahañ Prabhu, dhanbaad de ke baad paañch hajaar log ke khaana khawaais raha.
43006024	U log dekhin ki Yeeshu aur uske chela huañ se chala gain hei. Tab ulog bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke Yeeshu ke khoje ke waaste Kafarnahuum gain.
43006025	U log Yeeshu ke kunḍ ke wesṭ meñ paain aur puuchhin, “Guru ji, tum hiañ kab aaya?”
43006026	Yeeshu bolis, “Ham sachche bolta hei, tum hamme i kaaran nai khojta hei ki tum hamme chakit kaam karte dekha hei, lekin i kaaran khojta hei ki tum jetna mañgta raha otna khaaya.
43006027	Kharaab hoy waala khaana ke khaatir mehnat nai karo, lekin weisan khaana ke khaatir mehnat karo jon hardam rahe, aur u tumme khali Manush ke laṛka dei, kaahe ke Pita yaane Parmeshwar uspe aapan adhikaar dees hei.”
43006028	U log puuchhis, “Parmeshwar kaa maañge hei ki ham uske khaatir kari?”
43006029	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Parmeshwar maañge hei ki tum uspe biswaas karo jiske u bhejis hei.”
43006030	U sab jawaab deen, “Tab tum kaa chakit kaam karega ki ham biswaas kari? Tum kaa karega?
43006031	Jeise ki hamaar baap daada to jañgal meñ mana khaais raha, aur Baaibal meñ likha hei ki ulog ke swarag se roṭi khaay ke khaatir mila raha.”
43006032	Tab Yeeshu u sab ke bataais, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tumme swarag ke roṭi Maozas nai dees raha. Hamaar Pita jon swarag meñ hei wahi tumme sachcha swarag ke roṭi de hei.
43006033	U Parmeshwar ke roṭi hei jon swarag se utar ke nichche dunia meñ aay ke jeewan de hei.”
43006034	Ulog tab bolin, “Prabhu, hamme hardam wahi roṭi dena!”
43006035	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Jeewan ke roṭi ham hei! Jon koi bhi hamaar lage aay hei, u kabhi bhuuka nai rahi. Jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kare hei, u pyaasa nai rahi.
43006036	Ham tum se bol dia hei ki tum dekh ke bhi ham pe biswaas nai karta.
43006037	Jon koi ke bhi aur jon bhi cheej hamaar Pita hamme dees hei, u hamaar lage aai, aur ham uske kabhi duur nai karega.
43006038	Kaahe ke ham aapan waaste nai lekin jon hamme bhejis hei uske ichchha puura kare ke waaste swarag se aaya hei.
43006039	Aur jon hamme bhejis hei u maañge hei ki jiske u bhejis hei u sab kabhi heraay nai. Uske badle meñ u maañge hei ki aakhri roj ham u sab ke fir se jinda kar dei.
43006040	Hamaar Pita ke i ichchha hei ki jon koi bhi laṛka ke dekh ke aur uspe biswaas kari, u anant jeewan paai aur ham uske aakhri roj jinda kar dega.
43006041	Sab log bhunbhunaay lagin kaahe ke Yeeshu bolis raha ki wahi u roṭi hei jon swarag se aais hei.
43006042	Ulog ek dusra se puuchhe lagin, “Kaa i Josaf ke laṛka Yeeshu nai hei? Kaa ham iske amma bappa ke nai janta? I keise bole hei ki i swarag se aais hei?”
43006043	Yeeshu tab u sab se bolis, “Bhunbhunaao nai!
43006044	Koi bhi hamaar paas nai aay sake, jab tak hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, nai maañgi. Agar ulog aai, to ham ulog ke aakhri roj jinda karega.
43006045	Ek nabi likhis raha, 'Prabhu sab ke sikhaai.’ Yahi khaatir jon koi Pita ke sune hei aur usse seekhe hei aur wahi log hamaar lage aai.
43006046	Pita ke bagal se jon aais hei khali wahi Pita ke dekhis hei. Uske chhoṛ ke koi aur Pita ke nai dekhis hei.
43006047	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki jon koi ham pe biswaas kare hei wahi ke anant jeewan mili.
43006048	Ham jeewan ke roṭi hei!
43006049	Tumhaar baap daada jañgal meñ mana khaay ke mar gain.
43006050	Lekin i u roṭi hei jon swarag se utris hei, ki jisse jon koi bhi khaai u kabhi nai mari.
43006051	Hamahi u jeewan ke roṭi hei jon swarag se utris hei! Jon koi bhi i roṭi khaai u sab roj jinda rahi. Aur jon roṭi jeewan ke khaatir ham dunia ke log ke dega, u hamaar deñhi hei.”
43006052	Ispe Yahuudi log aapas meñ baad biwaad karin aur puuchhin, “I keise aapan deñhi hamme khaay ke waaste dei?”
43006053	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak tum Manush ke laṛka ke deñhi nai khaayga aur uske khuun nai piyega, tum nai jiyega.
43006054	Agar tum hamaar deñhi khaayga aur hamaar khuun piyega, to tumme anant jeewan mili, aur ham tumme aakhri roj jiyaay dega.
43006055	Hamaar deñhi asli khaana hei, aur hamaar khuun asli piye ke cheej hei.
43006056	Agar tum hamaar deñhi khaayga aur hamaar khuun piyega, tum ham meñ rahega aur ham tum meñ rahega.
43006057	Jeise jeewit Pita hamme bhejis hei, aur ham Pita ke kaaran jinda hei, weisaiyeñ jon hamaar deñhi khaay hei, u hamaar kaaran jinda rahi.
43006058	Jon roṭi swarag se utris hei weisan nai hei jon tumhaar baap daada khaain hei. Ulog to mar gain hei, lekin jon koi i roṭi khaai u hardam jinda rahi.”
43006059	I sab baat Yeeshu Kafarnahuum ke ek chech meñ updes dete ṭaaim bolis raha.
43006060	Uske kaafi chela log i baat sunin aur usse puuchhin, “I to bahut kaṛa baat hei, iske kon suni?”
43006061	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki uske chela log bhunbhunaay hei. Tab u puuchhis, “Etna chhoṭa baat ke kaaran tumhaar biswaas hil gais hei?
43006062	U ṭaaim kaa hoi jab tum sab dekhega ki Manush ke laṛka uppar swarag jaay hei jahañ se u aais hei?
43006063	Aatma hee jeewan dees hei! Manush ke taakat kuchh nai kare sake. Jon baat ham tum se bataaya hei, u jeewan de waala Aatma se aais hei.
43006064	Fir bhi tum meñ se ketna ham pe biswaas nai kare maañge hei.” Yeeshu i sab baat bolis kaahe ke u suru se jaanat raha ki kon kon uspe biswaas kare hei. U i bhi jaanat raha ki uske kon pakaṛwaai.
43006065	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamaar lage nai aay sakta, jab tak Pita nai chaahi. Yahi khaatir ham i sab baat tum sab se bataaya hei.”
43006066	Yahi sab baat ke kaaran bahut se chela log uske saath chhoṛ deen.
43006067	Tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log se puuchhis, “Aur tum sab? Kaa tum bhi hamme chhoṛe mañgta hei?”
43006068	Saayman Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Prabhu, ham kiske lage jaai? Anant jeewan ke baat to khali tumhaar lage hei.
43006069	Ham tum pe biswaas karta hei, aur i bhi jaan lia hei ki tumahi Parmeshwar ke pawitr jan hei.”
43006070	Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham, tum baarah log ke chuna, lekin tum meñ se ek saitaan hei!”
43006071	Yeeshu to Saayman Iskariyoti ke putr Juḍas ke baare meñ bolis raha jon u baarah chela meñ se ek raha. Wahi aage chal ke Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai.
43007001	Iske baad Yeeshu Galeel gais. U Juḍia nai jaay maañgat raha, kaahe ke huañ pe Yahuudi agua log uske maare ke waaste rasta khojat rahin.
43007002	U ṭaaim Yahuudi log ke poch banaay waala teohaar nagichche raha.
43007003	Aur Yeeshu ke bhaiya log usse bolin, “Tum kaahe nai Juḍia chala jaata hei? Tab tumhaar chela log bhi dekhe saki ki tum kaa karta hei.
43007004	Kaahe ki jon koi bhi naami bane maañge hei, to u luk ke kaam nai kari. Yahi khaatir dunia ke janaao ki tum kaa karta hei!”
43007005	Abhi tak Yeeshu ke bhaiya bhi uspe biswaas nai karat rahin.
43007006	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei, lekin tumhaar ṭaaim to hardam ek rakam rahe hei.
43007007	Sansaar ke log tumme haiṭ nai kari. Lekin wahi log ham se dusmani rakkhe hei kaahe ke ham uske bataay deta hei ki ulog kharaab kaam kare hei.
43007008	Tum sab teohaar meñ jaao. Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei, aur ham nai jaayga.”
43007009	I sab bol ke Yeeshu wahiñ Galeel meñ ruk gais.
43007010	Jab Yeeshu ke sab bhaiya teohaar meñ chala gais, tab u bhi chuppe se huañ gais.
43007011	Teohaar ke ṭaaim Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu ke khojat rahin, aur sab se puuchhat rahin, “U kahañ hei?”
43007012	Aur sab koi chuppe chuppe Yeeshu ke baare meñ baat kare lagin, kuchh to bolat rahin, “Yeeshu achchha admi hei,” aur kuchh bolat rahin, “U sab ke kharaab rasta dekhaay hei.”
43007013	Lekin Yahuudi agua ke ḍar ke maare koi Yeeshu ke baare meñ khul ke nai bolat rahin.
43007014	Jab teohaar aadha khalaas hoy gais raha, tab Yeeshu chech meñ gais aur updes de laga.
43007015	Uske updes sunke Yahuudi agua log chakit hoy gain, aur bolin, “Iske gyaan kahañ se mila? I to kabhi skuul bhi nai gais hei!”
43007016	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Jon updes ham deta hei, u hamaar bagal se nai hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis hei uske bagal se hei.
43007017	Agar koi sachche ke uske ichchha puura kare maañge hei to u jaan lei ki ham jon kuchh bhi sikhaata hei u Parmeshwar ke bagal se aay hei, hamaar bagal se nai.
43007018	Agar ham aapan baṛaai mañgta, to ham aapan bagal se bolta. Lekin ham aapan bheje waala ke baṛaai mañgta hei, yahi khaatir ham sachche bolta hei jhuuṭ nai.
43007019	Kaa Maozas Parmeshwar ke kaanuun tumme nai dees? Fir bhi tum sab uske nai maanta hei! Tab kaahe ke tum sab hamme maare mañgta hei?”
43007020	Tab sab log jawaab deen, “Tum pagla hei! Tumme keise pata hei ki koi tumme maare maañge hei?”
43007021	Yeeshu bolis, “Jab ham ek chamatkaar dekhaaya, tab tum chakit hoy gaya.
43007022	Yahi kaaran Maozas khatna ke aagya dees raha. U Maozas ke bagal se nai raha lekin tumhaar baap daada se chala aais hei. Tum to sabat ke din bhi laṛka log ke khatna karta hei.
43007023	Jab sabat ke roj laṛka log ke khatna kare ke, Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik achchha hei to ham se kaahe ke gussa hei ki sabat ke roj ham ek admi ke achchha kara.
43007024	Muh dekh ke nyaay nai karo, lekin raaiṭ rakam se nyaay karo.”
43007025	I baat pe Yarushalam ke kuchh log bolin, “Kaa i wahi admi nai jiske sab log maare maañgat rahin?
43007026	Dekho i sab se baat kare hei, fir bhi iske koi kuchh nai bole hei. Kaa eise to nai ki hamaar agua log iske sachcha maan leen hei ki yahi Maseeh hei?
43007027	Lekin i keise hoy sake hei? Iske to ham janta hei ki i kahañ ke hei, lekin jab Maseeh aai to koi nai jaani ki u kahañ ke hei.”
43007028	Yeeshu chech meñ updes de ke ṭaaim chillaay ke bolis, “Kaa tum sachche ke janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei? Ham apne aap nai aaya! Jon hamme bhejis hei u sachcha hei, aur tum uske nai janta.
43007029	Lekin ham janta hei ki hamme kon bhejis hei, kaahe ke ham uske bagal se aaya hei.”
43007030	Ispe kuchh log Yeeshu ke wahi ṭaaim pakṛe maañgat rahin. Lekin koi bhi uspe haath nai lagaais, kaahe ke abhi uske ṭaaim nai aais raha.
43007031	Ulog meñ se bahut log rahin jon Yeeshu pe biswaas karat rahin, aur bolin, “Jab Maseeh aai, to kaa i admi se jaada chamatkaar dekhaai!”
43007032	Jab Farisi log sunin ki Yeeshu ke baare meñ log kaa bole hei, to u sab Baṛa Paadri ke sañghe milke chech ke pulis ke bhejis ki Yeeshu ke pakaṛ le.
43007033	Lekin Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ham to tumhaar sañghe thoṛa deri aur rahega, aur tab ham huañ chala jaayga jahañ hamaar bheje waala hei.
43007034	Tum hamme khojega lekin nai paayga. Tum huañ nai jaay sakta jahañ ham jaata hei.”
43007035	Yahuudi agua log ek dusra se puuchhe lagin, “I kahañ jaay hei jahañ ham iske nai paayga? Kaa i koi duur des jaay hei jahañ hamaar log rahe hei? Kaa i Greek log ke bhi updes dei?
43007036	I bole hei ki ham iske khojega, lekin khoj nai paayga, iske matlab kaa hei? Kaahe nai ham huañ jaay sakta hei jahañ i jaay hei?”
43007037	Teohaar ke aakhri aur khaas roj Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke chillaay ke bolis, “Agar tum pyaasa hei, to hamaar paas aao aur pio!
43007038	Jeise ki Baaibal meñ likha hei, jon ham pe biswaas kari, uske bhittar se jeewan ke paani bahi.”
43007039	I vachan u Pawitr Aatma ke baare meñ bolis, jon ki khali biswaas kare waala ke mili. Aatma abhi koi ke bhi nai mila, kaahe ke Yeeshu ke abhi puura mahima nai mila hei.
43007040	Jab bheeṛ sunis ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei, to usman se kuchh bolin, “I to nabi hoy sake hei!”
43007041	Dusra log bolin, “I to Maseeha hei!” Kuchh aur log bolin, “Kaa Maseeha Galeel se aay sake hei?”
43007042	Baaibal bole hei ki Maseeha, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar se aai. Kaa iske matlab i nai hoy hei ki uske janam Bethlaham gaaoñ meñ hoi jahañ Ḍeiviḍ rahe hei?”
43007043	Yeeshu ke kaaran huañ ke log meñ dusmani hoy gais.
43007044	Kuchh admi uske pakṛwaay maañgat rahin, lekin uske haath nai lagaay sakin.
43007045	Jab chech ke pulis, baṛa paadri aur Farisi log ke lage lauṭ aain, tab usse puuchha gais, “Tum kaahe Yeeshu ke nai laaya?”
43007046	Ulog bolin, “Koi bhi abhi tak u admi ke rakam baat nai karis!”
43007047	Farisi log usse bolin, “Kaa tum bhi pagla hoy gaya hei?
43007048	Koi bhi adhikaari ya Farisi uspe kabhi biswaas nai karis.
43007049	Aur ilog jon kaanuun nai jaane, uspe Parmeshwar ke saraap hei.”
43007050	Nikoḍimas bhi u ṭaaim huañ raha. U huañ ke ek adhikaari raha, aur ek dafe pahile Yeeshu ke lage aais raha.
43007051	U bolis, “Hamaar kaanuun ke mutaabik ham koi admi ke saja nai de sakta jab tak ham uske baat nai sun lei aur i jaan lei ki u kaa karis raha.”
43007052	Tab u sab bolin, “Nikoḍimas, saait tum Galeel se aaya hei! Baaibal paṛho, aur tumme pata lagi ki koi bhi nabi Galeel se nai aais hei.”
43007053	Aur sab aapan aapan ghare chala gain.
43008001	Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe chala gais.
43008002	Dusra din sabere u chech gais. Sab log uske lage aain, Yeeshu beiṭh ke u sab ke sikhaay laga.
43008003	Tab kaanuun ke guru aur Farisi log ek aurat ke le ke aain, u aurat aḍalṭri meñ pakṛi gay rahi. U log uske sab ke beech meñ khaṛa kar deen.
43008004	Tab u sab bolin, “Guru ji, i aurat ek dusra admi jon iske admi nai raha, ke sañghe sote pakṛi gais.
43008005	Maozas ke kaanuun hamme bataay hei ki eisan aurat ke patthar se maar deke chaahi! Tum kaa bolta hei?”
43008006	I sawaal ulog Yeeshu se i kaaran karin raha, kaahe ke ulog uske fasaay maañgat rahin aur dos lagaay maañgat rahin. Lekin Yeeshu nichche jhuk ke uñgri se maṭṭi pe likhe lagis.
43008007	Ulog Yeeshu se sawaal puuchhte rahin. Aakhri meñ Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke bolis, “Agar tum meñ se koi kabhi paap nai kara hei to, pahila patthar se iske maaro!”
43008008	Fir se u jhuk ke maṭṭi pe likhe laga.
43008009	I baat sun ke baṛa se leke chhoṭa tak ek ek kar ke sab chal deen. Aakhri meñ, Yeeshu aur u aurat akele rahe gais.
43008010	Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke puuchhis, “Sab kahañ hei? Kaa koi nai bacha jon tumme saja dei?”
43008011	U aurat bolis, “Prabhu, koi nai.” Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ham bhi tumme saja nai dega. Tum ab jaao, lekin ab se paap nai karna.”
43008012	Ek dafe fir Yeeshu bheeṛ se baat karis. I dafe u bolis, “Ham dunia ke jyoti hei! Hamaar pichchhe aao, aur tum kabhi añdhera meñ nai chalega. Tumhaar lage u roshni rahi jon jeewan de hei.”
43008013	Farisi log nai maanin aur bolin, “Tumahi ek hei jon aapan baare meñ bolta hei, aur jon tum bolta hei, u sachche nai hei!”
43008014	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham aapan baare meñ bolta hei, to i sab baat sachcha hei! Kaahe ke ham janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei aur kahañ jaayga. Lekin tum sab nai janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei aur kahañ jaata hei.
43008015	Tum sab i dunia ke log ke ekke rakam feisla karta hei, lekin ham koi ke feisla nai karta.
43008016	Agar ham feisla kari, to ham insaaf ke saath feisla karega, kaahe ke ham akele feisla nai sunaata. Hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei hamaar sañghe rahe hei.
43008017	Tumhaar kaanuun maañge hei ki aur koi cheej ke maana jaay ke khaatir dui gawaah ke jaruurat hei
43008018	Ham aapan gawaahi khud deta hei, aur hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, u bhi hamaar gawaahi de hei.
43008019	Tab ulog puuchhin, “Tumhaar Pita kahañ hei?” “Tum hamme aur hamaar Pita ke nai janta!” Yeeshu bolis, “Agar tum hamme janta to hamaar Pita ke bhi janta.”
43008020	Yeeshu i sab baat tab bolis raha, jab u jahañ daan waala ḍibba rakha jaay hei, huañ updes dewat raha. Fir bhi koi uske nai pakṛis, kaahe ke uske ṭaaim abhi nai aais raha.
43008021	Yeeshu fir aur log se bolis, “Ham jaata hei, aur tum sab hamme khojega. Lekin tum sab huañ nai jaay sakta hei jahañ ham jaata hei, tum sab aapan paap meñ marega.”
43008022	Tab Yahuudi guru log puuchhin, “Kaa i apne aap ke maare maañge hei? Iske matlab kaa hei jab i bole hei ki ham huañ nai jaay sakta jahañ i jaai?”
43008023	Yeeshu bolis, “Tum nichche ke hei, lekin ham uppar ke hei. Tum i dunia ke hei lekin ham i dunia ke nai hei.
43008024	Yahi kaaran ham bola ki tum sab aapan aapan paap meñ marega. Agar tum biswaas nai karta ki ham “Ham hei” to tum aapan paap meñ marega.
43008025	Sab log puuchhis, “Tum kon hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Wahi jon ham suru se bataate aaya hei.
43008026	Tumhaar baare meñ hamme aur bahut bole ke hei aur feisla kare ke hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis hei, u sachcha hei, jon bhi kuchh ham usse suna hei, wahi dunia ke bataata hei.”
43008027	Koi nai samjhis ki Yeeshu aapan Pita ke baare meñ baat kare hei.
43008028	Yeeshu aur aage bolis, “Jab tum Manush ke laṛka ke uppar uṭhaayga, tab jaanega ki, ‘Ham wahi hei’ aur ham apne aap se kuchh nai karta, lekin ham wahi bolta hei jon Pita Parmeshwar hamme bataais hei.
43008029	Jon hamme bhejis hei, u hamaar sañghe hei. Ham hardam wahi karta jon u maañge hei, aur u hamme kabhi nai chhoṛi.”
43008030	Jab Yeeshu i sab bol dees, to kaafi log uspe biswaas karin.
43008031	Jon log Yeeshu pe biswaas karin, usse Yeeshu bolis, “Agar tum hamaar baat pe chalo to sachche ke hamaar chela hei.
43008032	Tum sachchaai jaanega, aur wahi sachchaai tumme chhuṭkaara dewaai.”
43008033	U sab jawaab deen, “Ham sab Abraham ke khaandaan ke hei! Ham kabhi kisi ke gulaami nai kara. Kon rakam se ham aajaad hoyga?”
43008034	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham sachche bolta hei ki jon koi bhi paap kare hei, u paap ke gulaam hei!
43008035	Aur gulaam, hardam ekke ghar meñ nai rahe hei, lekin laṛka sada ekke palwaar ke sañghe rahe hei.
43008036	Agar laṛka tumme ajaadi de hei to tum ajaad hei!
43008037	Ham janta hei ki tum Abraham ke khaandaan ke hei. Fir bhi tum hamme maare mañgta hei, kaahe ke hamaar sandes tumme achchha nai lage hei.
43008038	Ham wahi bolta hei jon ham aapan Pita ke hiañ dekha hei, wahi rakam jeise tum wahi karta hei jon tum aapan Pita (Abraham) se suna hei.”
43008039	Tab sab log Yeeshu se bolin, “Hamaar Pita Abraham hei!” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tum sachche ke Abraham ke laṛkan hota to wahi karta jon Abraham karis raha.
43008040	Fir bhi tum hamme maare mañgta hei, kaahe ke ham wahi sachcha baat bataata hei jon hamaar Pita hamme dees hei. Abraham to kabhi eise nai karis raha.
43008041	Lekin tum wahi karta hei jon tumhaar Pita karis raha.” Ulog tab bolin, “Ham log pe dos nai lagaao ki ham log ke bappa koi aur hei. Parmeshwar hamaar Pita hei, aur ham sab uske laṛkan hei.”
43008042	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Agar Parmeshwar tumhaar Pita hota, to tum sab ham se prem karta, kaahe ke ham khali Parmeshwar ke bagal se aaya hei. U hamme bhejis hei. Ham apne aap nai aaya hei.
43008043	Tum kaahe nai samajhta hei ki ham kaa bolta hei? Kaa tum hamaar baat sunke sahe nai sakta hei?
43008044	Tumhaar Pita to saitaan hei, aur tum wahi karta hei jon u maañge hei. U suru se hatyaara aur jhuuṭa raha. Usman kuchh sach nai hei. U aapan bhaasha bole hei, aur jon kuchh bhi bole hei, u sab jhuuṭ hei. U khali jhuuṭa nai hei lekin u sab jhuuṭ ke baap hei.
43008045	Jon kuchh bhi ham bola hei, u sab sach hei, aur tum abhi bhi ham pe biswaas nai karta.
43008046	Tum meñ se kon i saabit kare sake hei ki ham paapi hei? Agar koi nai to kaahe ke hampe biswaas nai karta? Aakhir, ham sachche bolta hei.
43008047	Jon koi bhi Parmeshwar ke hei, u uske sandes suni. Lekin tum Parmeshwar ke nai hei, yahi kaaran tum uske baat nai sunta.”
43008048	Log Yeeshu se bolis, “Ham sab sachche bolat raha ki tum Saamri hei, tum meñ saitaan hei!”
43008049	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham meñ saitaan nai hei. Ham aapan Pita ke aadar karta hei, lekin tum hamme aadar nai karta.
43008050	Ham aapan baṛaai nai mañgta. Lekin ek hei jon maañge hei ki hamaar aadar hoy, aur u wahi hei jon hamaar waaste nyaay kare hei.
43008051	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki agar koi hamaar baat maan ke uspe chale hei to kabhi nai mare hei.”
43008052	Tab fir Yahuudi log bolin, “Ab hamme biswaas hoy gais hei ki tum meñ saitaan hei. Abraham to mar gais hei, aur sab nabi bhi. Keise tum bole sakta hei ki jon tum pe biswaas kari u kabhi nai mari?
43008053	Kaa tum Abraham se bhi baṛa hei? U to mar gais hei, aur sab nabi bhi mar gais hei. Tum apne aap ke kaa samajhta hei?”
43008054	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham apne aap aapan baṛaai kari to kaa faayda. Hamaar Pita hei jon hamaar baṛaai kare hei. Tum bhi to bolta hei ki u tumhaar Parmeshwar hei.
43008055	Tum to uske nai janta hei. Agar ham boli ki ham uske nai janta hei, to ham tum sab ke rakam jhuuṭa hoy jaayga. Lekin ham uske janta hei, aur i bhi janta hei ki u kaa bole hei.
43008056	Tumhaar Pita Abraham hamme dekh ke bahut khusi bhais raha.”
43008057	Tab Yahuudi log usse bolis, “Abhi to tum pachaas ke bhi nai hei! Keise tum bole sakta hei ki tum Abraham ke dekha hei?
43008058	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, Abraham ke peida hoy se pahile se ham hei.”
43008059	Tab sab log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste patthar uṭhaain, lekin u chuppe se chech se chala gais.
43009001	Rasta meñ Yeeshu ek admi ke dekhis, jon janam se añdha raha.
43009002	Yeeshu ke chela log usse puuchhis, “Guru ji, i admi kaahe ke añdha peida bhais hei? Kon paap karis raha, i admi, ki iske amma bappa?”
43009003	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Nai, i kaaran nai raha! Lekin iske añdha hoy ke kaaran, tum sab dekhega, keise Parmeshwar iske khaatir chamatkaar kari.
43009004	Jab tak din rahi, hamme u kaam kare ke hei, jiske waaste u hamme bhejis hei. Jab raat hoy jaai, koi kaam nai kare saki.
43009005	Jab tak ham dunia meñ hei, ham i dunia ke jyoti hei.”
43009006	I baat bol ke Yeeshu maṭṭi pe thuukis, thuuk se maṭṭi ke saan ke u añdha ke aañkhi pe lagaay dees.
43009007	Tab u bolis, “Silom ke kunḍ meñ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy leo.” U admi huañ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy lees aur dekhe laga. Silom ke matlab hei, jon bheja gais hei
43009008	Uske paṛosi aur ulog jon uske bheek maañgat dekhat rahin, bolin, “Kaa i u admi nai jon huañ beiṭh ke bheek maañgat raha?”
43009009	Kuchh admi bolin ki u wahi bhikhaari hei, baaki log bolin ki i u admi nai hei lekin uske rakam lage hei. Lekin u sab se bataais, “Ham wahi admi hei.”
43009010	“Tab tum keise dekhe sakta hei?” ulog puuchhin.
43009011	U jawaab dees, “Yeeshu naam ke admi maṭṭi saan ke hamaar aañkhi pe lagaais aur bolis ki Silom ke kunḍ meñ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy leo. Ham huañ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy lia aur dekhe laga.”
43009012	“Ab u kahañ hei?” ulog puuchhin. “Ham nai janta,” u bolis.
43009013	Tab ulog u admi ke jon añdha raha aur dekhe laga raha, Farisi ke paas le gais.
43009014	Jon din Yeeshu uske aañkhi kholis raha, u sabat ke din raha.
43009015	Farisi log usse fir se puuchhin, ki u keise dekhe lagis hei, aur u fir jawaab dees, “Yeeshu maṭṭi saan ke hamaar aañkhi pe lagaais. Aur jab ham dhoy lia tab dekhe laga.”
43009016	Kuchh Farisi tab bolin, “I admi Parmeshwar ke bagal se nai aais hei. Agar aata to sabat ke kaanuun ke nai tuuṛta.” Dusra log bolin, “I bataao ki keise ek paapi eisan chamatkaari kaam kare sake hei?” Aur u sab dui bhaag meñ baṭ gain.
43009017	Farisi log ek dafe fir se u admi se puuchhin, “U admi ke baare meñ tum kaa bolta hei, jon tumhaar aañkhi achchha karis raha?” “U nabi hei.” u bolis.
43009018	Lekin Yahuudi agua log biswaas nai kare maañgat rahin, ki u admi añdha raha. U log uske amma-bappa ke bulaain,
43009019	aur puuchhin, “Kaa i tumhaar u laṛka hei jon añdha peida bhais raha? Ab u keise dekhe sake hei?”
43009020	U admi ke maiya-bappa bolin, “Ham janta hei ki i hamaar laṛka hei, aur i bhi janta hei ki i añdha peida bhais raha.
43009021	Lekin ham i nai janta ki ab i keise dekhe sake hei, aur kon iske aañkhi kholis. Wahi se puuchho! U ab baṛa hoy gais hei aur aapan baare meñ apne bataay sake hei.”
43009022	Uske maiya-bappa i baat i kaaran bolin raha ki u Yahuudi log se ḍarat rahin. Kaahe ke agua log bol deen raha ki jon koi bhi Yeeshu Maseeh se kuchh sambandh rakkhi uske chech se nikaar dewa jaai.
43009023	Yahi kaaran ulog bolin raha, “U baṛa hoy gais hei, wahi se puuchho.”
43009024	Fir se ek dafe Yahuudi agua log u admi ke bolaay ke bolin, “Parmeshwar ke aage sachche bolo! Ham sab janta hei ki u admi ek paapi hei.”
43009025	U admi bolis, “Ham nai janta ki u paapi hei ki nai. Ham to bas etna janta ki ham añdha raha aur ab dekhe sakta hei!”
43009026	“U tumhaar sañghe kaa karis?” Yahuudi agua log bolin. “Keise tumhaar aañkhi achchha karis?”
43009027	U admi jawaab dees, “Ham to tum se ek dafe bataay dia hei. Tum to sune nai mañgta hei. Kaahe ke tum mañgta hei ki ham fir se bataai? Kaa tum bhi uske chela bane mañgta hei?”
43009028	Ispe Yahuudi agua log uspe gussaay ke bolin, “Tum uske chela hoyga! Ham to Maozas ke chela hei!
43009029	Ham sab janta hei ki Parmeshwar Maozas se baat karis raha, lekin ham i nai janta ki Yeeshu kahañ se aais hei.”
43009030	U admi jawaab dees, “Ham chakit hei! U hamaar aañkhi achchha karis, fir bhi tum nai janta ki u kahañ se aais hei?
43009031	Ham janta hei ki Parmeshwar khali wahi ke sune hei, jon usse prem kare hei aur uske baat maane hei. Parmeshwar paapi ke nai sune hei.
43009032	Hisṭri meñ i pahila dafe dekha gais hei ki koi janam ke añdha ke aañkhi kholis hei.
43009033	Yeeshu i nai kare sakta agar u Parmeshwar ke lage se nai aata.”
43009034	Agua log u admi se bolin, “Tum jab se janam lia tab se paapi raha! Kaa tum hamme kuchh sikhaay sakta hei?” Fir ulog bolin, “Tum ab hamaar chech meñ kabhi nai aana!”
43009035	Jab Yeeshu sunis ki kaa bhais hei, tab u admi ke lage gais, aur puuchhis, “Kaa Manush ke laṛka meñ tum biswaas karta hei?”
43009036	U jawaab dees, “He Prabhu, agar tum bataayga ki u kon hei, tab ham uspe biswaas karega.”
43009037	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum to uske dekh lia hei aur u wahi hei jon se tum baat karta hei.”
43009038	U admi bolis, “Prabhu, ham puura biswaas karta hei!” aur Yeeshu ke aage ghuṭna ṭek lees.
43009039	Yeeshu tab usse bolis, “Ham dunia meñ nyaay ke waaste aaya hei, ki jon nai dekhe hei, u dekhe lage aur jon dekhe hei u añdha hoy jaay.”
43009040	Jab Farisi log i baat sunin to bolin, “Kaa ham añdha hei?”
43009041	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tum añdha hota to paapi nai hota, lekin tum bolta hei ki tumme dekhaay hei, aur yahi kaaran tum paapi bhaya.”
43010001	Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon duaari se nai lekin dusra rasta se bheṛa ke gaiṭ ke bhittar jaay hei, u chor aur ḍaaku hei.
43010002	Lekin jon duaari se bhittar jaay hei u bheṛa log ke shepaḍ rahe hei.
43010003	Uske khaatir gaiṭkeepa gaiṭ khol dewe hei, aur u bhittar chala jaay hei. Bheṛa log bhi uske awaaj jaan le hei. U ek ek ke naam leke bolaay hei aur bahire le jaay hei.
43010004	Jab u aapan sab bheṛa ke nikaar le hei tab u aage aage chale hei, aur uske bheṛa uske pichchhe pichchhe chale hei, kaahe ki u sab uske awaaj jaane hei.
43010005	Bheṛa koi aur admi ke pichchhe nai chali. U sab uske awaaj nai jaani aur duur bhaag jaai.”
43010006	Yeeshu i kahaani u sab ke sunaais, lekin ulog samajh nai paain ki u kaa bole hei.
43010007	Yahi kaaran Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki sab bheṛa ke duaari hamahi hei.
43010008	Jon sab ham se aage aay rahin, u sab chor aur ḍaaku rahin aur bheṛa usman se koi ke nai sunin.
43010009	Ham gaiṭ hei. Jon koi ham se bhittar aai uske uddhaar hoi, u bahire aur bhittar aay jaay saki aur chaara paai.
43010010	Chor to khali chori kare, jaan se maare aur nuksaan kare aay hei. Ham to aaya hei ki u sab ke jeewan mile, aur puura jeewan mile.
43010011	Hamahi achchha shepaḍ hei, jon aapan bheṛa ke waaste jaan bhi de sake hei.
43010012	Ek majduur, jon maalik bhi nai hei aur shepaḍ bhi nai hei, bheṛiya ke aate dekh ke bhaag jaay hei, tab bheṛiya bheṛa ke pakaṛ le hei aur baaki ke idhar udhar bhagaay de hei.
43010013	Majduur bhaag jaay hei kaahe ki u to khali ek majduur hei aur uske kuchh parwaah nai rahe hei.
43010014	Ham achchha shepaḍ hei. Ham aapan bheṛa ke janta hei aur u sab hamme jaane hei.
43010015	Wahi rakam jeise hamaar Pita hamme jaane hei aur ham aapan Pita ke janta hei, ham aapan bheṛa ke khaatir jaan bhi de sakta hei.
43010016	Hamaar paas aur bhi bheṛa hei jon i gaiṭ meñ nai hei. Jab u hamaar awaaj suni tab hamme uske bhi jaay ke laay ke hei. Tab khali ekke gaiṭ rahi aur ekke shepaḍ rahi.
43010017	Pita ham se prem kare hei, kaahe ki ham aapan jaan dewe ke khaatir taiyaar hei, ki jisse ham uske fir se paay lei.
43010018	Hamaar laaif ke ham se koi nai chheene sake hei, lekin ham apne uske khusi se deta hei. Hamme aapan laaif dewe ke adhikaar hei, i bhi adhikaar hei ki uske fir se lauṭaay lei. Aur yahi hei jon hamaar Pita hamme hukum dees hei.”
43010019	Yahi baat ke kaaran admi log meñ dui bhaag hoy gais.
43010020	Bahut log bolin, “Isman saitaan hei aur i to pagla hei! Tab iske kaahe ke suno?”
43010021	Lekin kuchh aur log bolat rahin, “Jon admi meñ saitaan rahe hei, u eisan baat nai kare sake hei! Keise ek saitaan ek añdha ke aañkhi achchha kare sake hei?”
43010022	Ṭhanḍa ke mausam raha. Yarushalam meñ chech ke teohaar manaawa jaat raha.
43010023	Yeeshu chech ke Soloman duaari ke baranḍa pe ghuumat raha.
43010024	Yahuudi log uske chaaro taraf se gher leen aur puuchhin, “Tum kab tak hamme ḍaauṭ meñ rakkhega? Agar tum Maseeh hei to hamme sachche bataay deo.”
43010025	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tumme bataay dia, lekin tum hamaar biswaas nai karta. Jon kaam ham Pita ke naam se karta hei usse to tum samajh jaao.
43010026	Lekin tum biswaas nai karega kaahe ki tum hamaar bheṛa nai hei.
43010027	Hamaar bheṛa to hamaar awaaj sune hei, ham ulog ke janta hei aur ulog hamaar pichchhe aay hei.
43010028	Ham u sab ke anant jeewan deta hei, aur u kabhi nai mari aur u sab ke ham se koi nai chheene saki.
43010029	Jon hamaar Pita hamme dees hei wahi sab se mahaan hei aur uske koi bhi hamaar Pita se nai chheene saki.
43010030	Pita aur ham ek hei.”
43010031	Fir se Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste patthar uṭhaain.
43010032	Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Tumhaar saamne ham ketna achchha kaam jon Pita hamme dees raha, kara, isman se kon kaam ke waaste tum sab hamme patthar se maare mañgta hei?”
43010033	U log bolin, “Achchha kaam ke waaste ham tumme nai maarta hei, lekin jon tum Parmeshwar ke ninda karta hei uske khaatir! Tum to khali ek manush hei, lekin tum apne aap ke Ishwar banaay mañgta hei!”
43010034	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tumhaar vachan meñ kaa i nai likha ki Parmeshwar bolis raha, ‘Tum sab Ishwar hei?’
43010035	Tum vachan ke jhuuṭa nai bole sakta, aur Parmeshwar wahi log se baat karis aur ulog ke Ishwar bolis.
43010036	Parmeshwar hamme chunke dunia meñ bhejis, tab tum keise bolta hei ki ham Ishwar ke ninda karta hei? Ham to i bola ki ham Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.”
43010037	Agar ham u kaam nai karta jon hamaar Pita maañge hei to ham pe biswaas nai karo.
43010038	Aur agar ham u kaam kari jon hamaar Pita kare hei, to tum ham pe biswaas karo, chaahe tumme ham pe bharosa hei ya nai. Aur tab tum samajh lega ki wahi Pita hamaar sañghe hei, aur ham wahi hei jon Pita ke sañghe hei.
43010039	Ek dafe fir Yeeshu ke ulog pakṛe ke kosis karin, lekin u sab ke haath se nikar gais.
43010040	Aur Joḍan nadi ke paar u jagha pe chala gais, jahañ Yuhanna pahile baptisma det raha.
43010041	Jab Yeeshu huañ raha to bahut se log uske paas aain aur bolin, “Yuhanna baptisma dewe waala koi chamatkaar nai karis raha, u jon kuchh Yeeshu ke baare meñ bolis raha, u sab sachche raha.”
43010042	Aur huañ bahut se log Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin.
43011001	Laazras naam ke ek admi bimaar raha. U Meri aur uske bahini Maatha ke gaaoñ Bethni meñ rahat raha.
43011002	I wahi Meri rahi jon Prabhu ke goṛ pe mahke waala pefeum chhoṛ ke aapan baar se pochhis raha. Yahi ke bhaiya Laazras bimaar raha.
43011003	Duuno bahini Yeeshu ke lage khabar bhejin, “Prabhu tumhaar ek pyaara dost Laazras bimaar hei.”
43011004	Jab Yeeshu i sunis to bolis, “Uske bimaari ke ant maut nai hei. I to Pita aur uske laṛka ke mahima ke ṭaaim hei.”
43011005	Yeeshu, Meri, Maatha aur uske bhaiya Laazras se bahut prem karat raha.
43011006	Lekin fir bhi u wahiñ pe dui aur roj ruk gais.
43011007	Tab u aapan chela log se bolis, “Aao ham ab fir se Juḍia chali.”
43011008	Chela log bolin, “Thoṛa din pahile wahiñ pe kuchh log tumme patthar se maare maañgat rahin, fir bhi tum wahiñ jaay mañgta hei?”
43011009	Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa din meñ baarah ghanṭa nai hei? Agar tum din meñ chalega to suuraj ke roshni meñ dhakka nai khaayga.
43011010	Lekin agar tum raat meñ chalega, to dhakka jaruur lagi, kaahe ki u ṭaaim añdhiyaar rahi.”
43011011	Yeeshu i baat bol ke fir se bolis, “Hamaar dost Laazras soy gais hei, aur ham jaay ke uske jagaayga.”
43011012	Chela log jawaab deen, “Prabhu, agar u sowe hei, to iske matlab hei ki u achchha hoy jaai.”
43011013	Yeeshu to Laazras ke maut ke baare meñ bolat raha, lekin chela log sochin ki u khali uske neeñd meñ soy ke baare meñ bole hei.
43011014	Tab Yeeshu u sab se safa safa bol dees, “Laazras mar gais hei!
43011015	Ham khusi hei ki ham huañ pe nai raha, kaahe ki ab tumme mauka mili ki tum ab ham pe biswaas karega. Aao uske paas chalo.”
43011016	Thomas, jon ke Didumas naam se bolaay jaat raha, u aapan saathi log se bolis, “Aao. Chalo, ki jisse ham bhi uske sañghe mare saki.”
43011017	Jab Yeeshu Bethni meñ pahuñchis, to pata laga ki chaar roj pahile Laazras ke dafnaay dewa gais raha.
43011018	Bethni, Yarushalam se lagbhag teen kilomeeṭa ke duuri pe raha.
43011019	Aur bahut se Yahuudi log Maatha aur Meri ke ghare jaay ke uske bhaiya ke mare pe shok manaat rahin.
43011020	Jab Maatha sunis ki Yeeshu aay hei, to usse mile ke waaste u gais. Lekin Meri ghar pe hee rahe gais raha.
43011021	Maatha Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, agar tum hiañ rahta, to hamaar bhaiya nai marta.
43011022	Ab bhi ham janta hei ki, Parmeshwar wahi kari jon tum maañgega.”
43011023	Ispe Yeeshu bolis, “Tumhaar bhaiya fir se jinda hoy jaai.”
43011024	Maatha fir se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki aakhri roj u fir se jinda hoy jaai.”
43011025	Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamahi to hei jon mara ke fir se jinda karta hei! Jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kari, u mar ke bhi fir se jinda hoy jaai.
43011026	Aur jon jinda hei aur ham pe biswaas kari, u kabhi nai mari. Kaa tum biswaas karti hei?”
43011027	Tab u bolis, “Haañ Prabhu, ham biswaas karta hei ki tumahi Maseeh hei aur Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei jon dunia meñ aay waala raha.”
43011028	Etna bol ke u aapan bahini Meri ke lage chali gais aur uske kaan meñ dheere se bolis, “Guru ji aay gais hei, aur tumme dekhe maañge hei.”
43011029	Jab Meri i sunis, to jaldi se uṭh ke Yeeshu se mile chali gais.
43011030	Yeeshu abhi gaaoñ tak nai pahuñchis raha, lekin abhi wahi jagha raha jahañ Maatha ke bheñṭ usse bhais raha.
43011031	Bahut Yahuudi log Meri ke ghar meñ uske dheeraj dewe ke khaatir aay rahin, aur jab u sab dekhin ki Meri uṭh ke jaldi jaldi jaay hei to sochin ki u kabar pe roy ke khaatir jaay hei. U sab uske pichchhe hoy leen.
43011032	Meri huañ pahuñchis jahañ Yeeshu raha. Aur jeisehiyeñ u uske dekhis uske goṛ pe gir paṛis aur bolis, “Prabhu, agar tum hiañ rahta to hamaar bhaiya nai marta.”
43011033	Jab Yeeshu uske aur Yahuudi log ke rote dekhis to uske dil bhar aais, aur u bahut dukhi hoy gais.
43011034	Tab u puuchhis, “Tum log uske kahañ dafnaaya hei?” “Aao aur dekho, Prabhu.” ulog bolin.
43011035	Yeeshu roy laga.
43011036	Tab sab log bolin, “Dekho u Laazras se ketna prem karat raha”
43011037	Kuchh to i bhi bolin, “I to añdha ke aañkhi dees raha, to kaahe ke i Laazras ke mare se nai bachaais?”
43011038	Yeeshu bahut udaas raha aur ek gahira saas lees aur kabar ke taraf chala gais, jon ek gufa raha, aur jiske muh pe ek patthar rakha raha.
43011039	Yeeshu bolis, “Patthar haṭaao!” Laazras ke bahini Maatha bolis, “Prabhu, ab tak to usman se kharaab gandh nikre laga hoi. U to chaar roj se gaaṛa gais hei!”
43011040	Yeeshu usse bolis, “Kaa ham tum se i nai bola ki agar tum biswaas karegi to Parmeshwar ke mahima dekhegi?”
43011041	Log patthar haṭaay deen. Yeeshu uppar dekhis aur bolis, “He Pita, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei, ki tum hamaar sunta hei.
43011042	Ham janta hei ki tum hamme hardam sunta hei, lekin ham ilog ke khaatir fir se bolta hei, ki jisse ilog biswaas kari ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.”
43011043	I baat bol ke Yeeshu jor se bolis, “Laazras, bahire nikro!”
43011044	Laazras bahire aais, uske haath aur goṛ abhi bhi kafan ke kapṛa se bañdha raha, aur muh pe bhi kafan ke kapṛa lapṭaan raha. Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Iske khol deo aur jaay deo.”
43011045	Bahut Yahuudi log, jon Meri ke lage khaṛa rahin dekhin ki Yeeshu kaa karis raha, aur uspe biswaas karin.
43011046	Lekin kuchh kuchh lauṭ ke Farisi aur agua log se jaay ke bataain ki Yeeshu kaa karis raha.
43011047	Ispe Baṛa Paadri aur Farisi log ek sabha bulaain aur bolin, “Ham kaa kari? I to bahut se chamatkaar kare hei!
43011048	Agar ham iske eise chhoṛ dega to sab log ispe biswaas kar lei aur Romi adhikaari hamaar agaiñsṭ kaam kari aur hamaar Mandir aur hamaar des ke barbaad kar dei!”
43011049	Usman se ek jiske naam Kaaifa raha, aur jon u saal ek Baṛa Paadri ban gais raha, bolis, “Tum sab pagla hei!
43011050	Kaa tum i nai samajhta ki tumhaar bhalaai yahi meñ hei ki ham sab ke khaatir ek ke maar deo ki jis se ham sab bach jaai?”
43011051	I baat u aapan bagal se nai bolis raha, lekin u saal ke Baṛa Paadri hoy ke naate bolis raha, u i profasi karis raha, ki Yeeshu Yahuudi jaat ke waaste mari.
43011052	Aur khali ulog ke waaste nai lekin Parmeshwar ke log jon idhar udhar chhitraay gais hei, u sab ke ek sañghe laay ke waaste.
43011053	Aur wahi roj se Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste kosis kare lagin.
43011054	Yahi kaaran Yeeshu Juḍia meñ sab ke saamne ghuume nai sakis, aur u aapan chela log ke sañghe Efraim meñ chala gais aur huañ rahe lagis, jahañ aur koi nai raha.
43011055	Fasah ke teohaar ke ṭaaim aay waala raha, aur yahi kaaran gaaoñ ke bahut log Yarushalam meñ aain ki jisse u apne aap ke fasah ke teohaar se pahile safa kar le.
43011056	U sab Yeeshu ke khojat rahin, aur chech meñ khaṛa hoy ke aapas meñ baat kare lagin, “Tum kaa sochta hei? Kaa u teohaar meñ aai?”
43011057	Udhar Baṛa Paadri aur agua log bataain raha ki agar koi Yeeshu ke pata jaane hei to usse aay ke bataay ki jisse ulog uske pakṛe saki.
43012001	Fasah ke chhe din pahile Yeeshu Bethni gaaoñ meñ aais jahañ Laazras rahat raha aur jiske Yeeshu jinda karis raha.
43012002	Huañ pe Yeeshu ke welkam ke khaatir khaana taiyaar kara gais. Maatha khaana parosat rahi aur Laazras ulog ke sañghe beiṭhis raha.
43012003	Tab Meri lagbhag aadha leeṭa bahut mahañga aur mahke waala pefeum laay ke Yeeshu ke goṛ pe ḍaar ke aur aapan baar se uske goṛ pochhis. Uske mahak se puura ghar mahke laga.
43012004	Yeeshu ke ek chela jiske naam Juḍas Iskariyoti raha, aur baad meñ jon Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai, bolis,
43012005	“Kaahe nai i pefeum jaada peisa meñ bech ke aur gareeb meñ baaṭ dewa jaay hei?”
43012006	U i baat bolis raha, iske waaste nai ki u gareeb ke baare meñ sochat raha, lekin i kaaran ki u ek chor raha.
43012007	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Uske akele chhoṛ deo! U hamme dafnaay ke roj ke waaste i pefeum rakkhis hei.
43012008	Gareeb to tumhaar sañghe hardam rahi, lekin ham to tumhaar sañghe hardam nai rahega.”
43012009	Bahut log ke pata laga ki Yeeshu huañ hei, tab u sab huañ aain, i kaaran nai ki ulog Yeeshu ke dekhi, lekin u sab Laazras ke dekhe maañgat rahin jiske Yeeshu mara meñ se jinda karis raha.
43012010	Tab Baṛa Paadri log Laazras ke bhi maare ke waaste kosis karin.
43012011	Iske kaaran i raha ki bahut se Yahuudi log dharam guru ke saath chhoṛ ke Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin raha.
43012012	Dusra roj jon sab log fasah ke teohaar manaay ke waaste aain raha, sunin ki Yeeshu Yarushalam aais hei.
43012013	Tab u sab log khajuur ke ḍaari leke Yeeshu se mile ke khaatir chal deen, aur chillaay ke bole lagin, “Parmeshwar ke jay ho! Prabhu ke bagal se jon aay hei, uspe Prabhu ke aasheesh hoy! Prabhu ke aasheesh Israayel ke raaja pe bhi rahe!”
43012014	Yeeshu ke ek gadha mila aur uspe beiṭh ke u chal paṛis, jeise Baaibal meñ likhaan raha.
43012015	“Yarushalam ke log, ghabraana nai! Dekho ek gadha pe sawaar hoy ke tumhaar Raaja aay hei.”
43012016	Uske chela log u ṭaaim i sab samajh nai paain raha, lekin Yeeshu ke mahima hoy ke baad ulog ke yaad aais ki Yeeshu ke baare meñ Baaibal meñ kaa likha raha aur log uske sañghe wahi sab karin.
43012017	Jon log Yeeshu ke sañghe rahin jab u Laazras ke kabar meñ se bolaay ke mara se jinda karis raha, i baat ke gawaahi deen.
43012018	Wahi kaaran bheeṛ Yeeshu se mile rahin, kaahe ki u sab sune rahin ki Yeeshu i chamatkaar karis raha.
43012019	Farisi log tab ek dusra se bolin, “Dekho, ham to kuchh nai kar paata hei! Sab koi to Yeeshu ke pichchhe bhaage hei!”
43012020	Kuchh Greek log huañ rahin jon teohaar ke ṭaaim Yarushalam preya ke khaatir aay rahin.
43012021	Ulog Filip ke lage gain, jon Galeel ke Beithseida ke rahe waala raha. U sab usse binti karin, “Bhaiya ham Yeeshu se mile mañgta hei.”
43012022	Filip tab Enḍru ke lage gais aur duuno jaay ke Yeeshu se baat cheet karin.
43012023	Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “U ṭaaim aay gais hei jab Manush ke laṛka ke mahima mili.
43012024	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak geñhu ke ek daana maṭṭi meñ gir ke mar nai jaay hei, tab tak u akele rahe hei, aur jeisehiyeñ u daana mar jaay hei, u bahut fare hei.
43012025	Jon aapan laaif se pyaar kare hei, uske khoy dei, aur jon aapan laaif se prem nai kare hei aur dusra ke khaatir jie hei, uske anant jeewan mili.
43012026	Agar koi hamaar sewa kare maañge hei to hamaar pichchhe hoy le, ki jisse jahañ ham hei huañ hamaar sewa kare waala bhi rahi. Aur hamaar Pita uske aadar kari jon hamaar sewa kare hei.
43012027	“Ab hamaar dil bahut dukhi hei, aur ham kaa bole sakta hei? Kaa ham i boli, ‘He Pita, hamme i ṭaaim se bachaay leo’? Nai, yahi kaaran to ham aaya hei, to hamme i dukh ke ṭaaim ke saamna kare ke paṛi.
43012028	He Pita, aapan naam ke mahima karaao!” Tab asmaan se awaaj aais, “Ham wahi naam ke mahima kara hei aur aage bhi karte rahega!”
43012029	Jon log huañ bagal meñ khaṛa rahin, u sunin aur bolin, ki baadar garjis hei, lekin aur log bolin, “Ek ainjal usse bolis hei!”
43012030	Ispe Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “I awaaj hamaar khaatir nai raha, lekin tum sab ke waaste raha.
43012031	Ab sansaar ke nyaay kare ke ṭaaim aay gais hei, aur i dunia pe raaj kare waala saitaan ke nikaara jaai.
43012032	Aur jab ham jameen se uppar uṭhaawa jaayga tab ham sab ke aapan bagal kheechega.”
43012033	Yeeshu i baat bol ke ishaara kar dees raha ki uske maut keise hoi.
43012034	Bheeṛ Yeeshu se bolis, “Hamaar niyam ke buk i bataay hei ki Maseeha janam janam jee to tum keise bolta hei ki Manush ke laṛka ke uucha uṭhaawa jaai? I Manush ke laṛka kon hei?”
43012035	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ujera thoṛa deri aur tumhaar sañghe rahi. Jab tak ujera hei, tab tak chalte raho, eise nai ki añdhera tumme aay ke gher le. Jon añdhera meñ chale hei, u nai jaane ki u kahañ jaay hei.
43012036	Jab tak añjora tumhaar sañghe hei u añjora pe biswaas karo ki jisse tum añjora ke laṛkan bana raho.” I baat bole ke baad Yeeshu akele meñ jaay ke chhip gais.
43012037	Yeeshu ulog ke saamne bahut se chamatkaar karis raha, fir bhi ulog uspe biswaas nai karin.
43012038	Yahi kaaran ki jisse Aayzaaya nabi ke u sab baat puura hoi, “Prabhu, hamaar vachan pe kon biswaas karis? Prabhu ke sakti ke kon pahichaanis?”
43012039	Aur u sab Yeeshu pe biswaas nai kare sakin, kaahe ki Aayzaaya i bhi bolis raha,
43012040	“Parmeshwar uske aañkhi añdha kar dees raha aur u sab ke dil kaṛa kar dees raha, ki jisse u sab ke aañkhi dekhe nai sake, aur u sab ke dimaag samajhe nai sake, aur ulog Parmeshwar ke lage bhi nai aai, ki ulog ke achchha kare.”
43012041	Aayzaaya i sab bolis, kaahe ki u apne aap Yeeshu ke mahima ke dekhis raha aur uske baare meñ bataais raha.
43012042	I bhi bhais ki bahut se Yahuudi adhikaari Yeeshu pe biswaas karin, lekin Farisi log ke kaaran ulog sab ke saamne uske apnaay nai sakin, kaahe ki kahiñ eise nai hoy ki u sab ke chech se nikaar dewa jaay.
43012043	Iske alaawa u agua log Parmeshwar ke aadar se jaada aapan baṛaai jaada pasand karat rahin.
43012044	Ek jordaar awaaj meñ Yeeshu bolis, “Jon ham pe biswaas kare hei, u khali ham pe nai, lekin uspe bhi biswaas kare hei jon hamme bhejis hei.
43012045	Aur jon bhi koi hamme dekhi, u uske bhi dekhi jon hamme bhejis hei.
43012046	Ham dunia meñ añjora ban ke aaya hei ki jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kari, u añdhera meñ nai rahi.
43012047	Agar koi hamaar sandesa sune aur uske mutaabik nai chale to ham uske dos nai dega kaahe ki ham sansaar ke dos lagaay ke khaatir nai, lekin uske bachaay ke khaatir aaya hei.
43012048	Jon hamaar apmaan kare hei, aur hamaar vachan nai sune hei, uspe dos lagaay waala khali ek hei, jon vachan ham bola hei u aakhri roj uske dosi ṭhaharaai. ?
43012049	I sachchaai hei, kaahe ki ham aapan bagal se kuchh nai bola hei, lekin hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, hamme bataais hei ki ham kaa boli.
43012050	Aur ham i janta hei ki Pita ke hukum anant jeewan laay hei. Yahi kaaran jon bhi ham bolta hei uske jeise Pita ham se bolis hei, weisaiyeñ ham bolta hei.
43013001	Fasah ke teohaar se ek din pahile ke baat hei. Yeeshu jaanat raha ki u ṭaaim aay gais hei jab uske i dunia ke chhoṛ ke Pita ke lage jaay ke hei. U aakhri ṭaaim tak i dunia meñ, jon uspe biswaas kare hei, ulog se prem karis raha.
43013002	Yeeshu aur uske chela log khaana khaat rahin. Wahi ṭaaim saitaan, Saayman ke laṛka Juḍas Iskariyoti ke man meñ i bichaar bhar dees raha ki wahi Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai.
43013003	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki Pita sab kuchh uske haath meñ de dees hei, aur i bhi ki u Parmeshwar ke bagal se aais hei aur Parmeshwar ke lage jaai.
43013004	Yeeshu khaana pe se uṭha aur aapan uppar ke kapṛa sab utaar dees, aur aapan kamar meñ taul baañdh lees.
43013005	Tab u ek thariya meñ paani leke aapan chela log ke goṛ dhoy laga aur jon taul uske kamar meñ bañdha raha, usse pochhis.
43013006	Jab Yeeshu Saayman Peeṭa ke lage aais tab Peeṭa bolis, “Prabhu, kaa tum hamaar goṛ dhoyga?”
43013007	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Tum abhi nai samjhega ki ham kaa karta hei, lekin baad meñ jaruur samajh jaayga.”
43013008	“Tum hamaar goṛ kabhi nai dhoyga!” Peeṭa bolis. “Agar ham tumhaar goṛ nai dhoyga,” Yeeshu bolis, “tab tum hamaar chela nai rahe paayga.”
43013009	Tab Saayman Peeṭa bolis, “Prabhu, tab to tum hamaar goṛ khali nai lekin hamaar haath aur muuṛ bhi dhoy deo.”
43013010	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Jon nahaay lees hei, u puura safa hoy gais hei. Uske goṛ ke alaawa aur kuchh dhoy ke jaruuri nai hei. Hiañ ek ke chhoṛ ke sab safa hei.”
43013011	Yeeshu jaanat raha ki uske kon pakaṛwaai, tabbe u bolis, “Ek ke chhoṛ ke sab safa hei.”
43013012	Jab Yeeshu sab ke goṛ dhoy lees aur aapan kapṛa pahin ke beiṭh gais, tab u bolis, “Kaa tum sab samajh gaya ki ham tumhaar sañghe kaa kara?
43013013	Tum sab hamme ‘Guru’ aur ‘Prabhu’ bolaata hei, aur i achchha bhi hei ki tum sab eise hee bolo, kaahe ki ham wahi hei.
43013014	Ham, tumhaar Guru aur Prabhu, tumhaar goṛ dhoya. Ab tumme ek dusra ke goṛ dhoy ke chaahi.
43013015	Ham tumme ek rasta dekhaaya ki jeise ham kara hei, weisaiyeñ tum bhi karo.
43013016	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki ek naukar aapan maalik se baṛa nai hei, aur u bhi jon sandes ke sañghe bheja gais hei, u bhi uske bheje waala se baṛa nai hei.
43013017	Ab jab tum sab, i sab jaan gaya hei, aur yahi ke mutaabik chalta hei, to Parmeshwar tumme bahut saara aasheesh dei.”
43013018	“Ham tum sab ke baare meñ nai bolta hei, khali wahi ke baare meñ bolta hei jiske ham chuna hei. Lekin Baaibal ke i baat puura hoy ke hei, ‘Jon hamaar roṭi khaay hei, wahi ham pe laat uṭhaai.’
43013019	I ghaṭna hoy se pahile ham tumme sab bataata hei, ki jab i baat hoi, to tum sab biswaas karega ki ham wahi hei jon hamme hoy ke chaahi.’
43013020	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki jon koi jiske ham bheja hei, uske apnaay hei, to wahi hamaar bhejewaala ke bhi apnaay hei.
43013021	I sab baat bole ke baad Yeeshu dukhi hoy ke aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tum meñ se ek hei jon hamme pakaṛwaai.”
43013022	Ispe chela log ghabraay ke ek dusra ke dekhe lagis ki usman se kon hei jiske baare meñ i baat bola gais hei.
43013023	Ek chela jisse Yeeshu bahut prem karat raha, Yeeshu ke bagal meñ beiṭha raha.
43013024	Saayman Peeṭa uske sankaay ke bolis, “Usse puuchho, u kis ke baare meñ bole hei?”
43013025	Wahi rakam Yeeshu ke taraf jhuke jhuke u puuchhis, “Prabhu u kon hei?”
43013026	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham roṭi ke ṭukṛa sos meñ ḍubaay ke jiske dega, wahi admi hei.” Aur u ek roṭi ke ṭukṛa lees, sos meñ ḍubaay ke Saayman ke laṛka Juḍas Iskariyoti ke dees.
43013027	Jeisehiyeñ Juḍas roṭi ke ṭukṛa lees, saitaan usman ghus gais. Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jon bhi kuchh tumme kare ke hei jaldi se karo!”
43013028	Jon sab khaana khaat rahin, usman se koi bhi nai samajh sakin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei.
43013029	Koi koi to samjhin ki Juḍas ke lage peisa ke theili hei, aur Yeeshu usse bole hei ki teohaar ke khaatir jon kuchh bhi jaruuri hei uske khareed ke, ya gareeb meñ bhi kuchh baaṭ de.
43013030	Juḍas roṭi ke ṭukṛa leke wahi lage bahire chala gais. U ṭaaim raat hoy gais raha.
43013031	Jab Juḍas Iskariyoti bahire chala gais tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ab Manush ke laṛka ke mahima saamne aai, aur yahi se Parmeshwar ke mahima bhi hoi.
43013032	Agar Parmeshwar ke mahima Yeeshu ke kaaran saamne aay hei to Parmeshwar bhi Manush ke laṛka ke mahima khud saamne dekhaai aur u bhi bahut jaldi hoi.
43013033	Hamaar bachcha log, ham tumhaar sañghe bahut deri tak nai rahega. Tum sab hamme khojega lekin jeise ham Yahuudi log se bola hei, weisaiyeñ ab ham tum sab se bolta hei, jahañ ham jaata hei huañ tum sab nai aay sakta hei.
43013034	Aur ab ham tumme ek nawa hukum deta hei, ek dusra se prem karna. Jeise ham tum sab se prem kara wahi rakam tum ek dusra se prem karo.
43013035	Agar tum ek dusra se prem karega to eisehiyeñ sab log jaani ki tum sab hamaar chela hei.”
43013036	Saayman Peeṭa tab puuchhis, “Prabhu tum kahañ jaata hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham abhi jahañ jaata hei, tum hamaar pichchhe nai aay sakta hei, lekin baad meñ aay sakega.”
43013037	“Prabhu, kaahe ke ham tumhaar pichchhe nai aay sakta hei?” Peeṭa puuchhis. “Ham tumhaar khaatir mare ke bhi taiyaar hei.”
43013038	Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Kaa tum sachche ke hamaar khaatir jaan de dega? Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki murga ke bole se pahile tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta.”
43014001	Yeeshu tab aapan sab chela log se bolis, “Dukhi nai ho aur ghabraao bhi nai. Parmeshwar pe bharosa rakkho aur ham pe bhi.”
43014002	Hamaar Pita ke ghare bahut se rahe ke jagha hei. Agar nai hota to ham tum se bol deta. Ham tumhaar khaatir jagha taiyaar kare jaata hei.
43014003	Jab ham huañ jaay ke tumhaar waaste jagha taiyaar kar lega, tab fir lauṭ ke aayga aur tum sab ke hiañ se aapan sañghe le jaayga, ki jisse jahañ ham rahega wahiñ tum bhi rahega.
43014004	Tum u rasta janta hei jahañ ham jaata hei.”
43014005	Tab Thomas Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, ham to i bhi nai janta ki tum kahañ jaata hei! To ham rasta keise jaanega?”
43014006	Yeeshu tab bolis, “Rasta, jeewan aur sachchaai hamahi hei! Hamaar bina koi bhi Pita ke lage nai jaay sake.
43014007	Agar tum sab hamme janta hei, to hamaar Pita ke bhi janta. Lekin ab se tum sab Pita ke jaan lia hei kaahe ki tum sab uske dekha hei.”
43014008	Filip tab bolis, “Prabhu, hamme Pita ke dekhaao, ham to khali yahi mañgta hei.”
43014009	Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Filip, ham ketna ṭaaim se tumhaar sañghe raha, fir bhi tum hamme nai janta? Jon bhi koi hamme dekhis hei, u Pita ke bhi dekhis hei, fir tum kaahe ke bolta hei, ‘Hamme Pita ke dekhaao’?
43014010	Kaa tum sab biswaas nai karta ki ham Pita meñ hei aur Pita ham meñ hei? Tab u sab chela log se bolis, “Jon bhi kuchh ham tum se bolta hei u aapan bagal se nai bolta hei, lekin ham meñ rahe waala Pita, aapan sab kaam kare hei.
43014011	Hamaar biswaas karo ki ham Pita meñ hei aur Pita ham meñ. Agar nai to jon sab kaam ham karta hei wahi ke dekh ke tab biswaas karo.
43014012	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, hamaar biswaas kare waala u sab kaam kare saki jon ham karta hei, aur usse bhi baṛa kaam kare saki kaahe ki ham Pita ke lage jaata hei.
43014013	Aur tum hamaar naam se jon kuchh bhi maañgega, ham uske puura karega, ki jisse laṛka ke bagal se Pita ke mahima hoi.
43014014	Ham wahi karega, jon tum ham se kare ke bolega.”
43014015	“Agar tum ham se prem karta hei, to jon ham bolta hei, u karo.
43014016	Ham Pita se maañgega ki u tumhaar khaatir ek dusra madadgaar bheje, jon tumhaar sañghe hardam rahe saki.
43014017	U Aatma hei, jon Parmeshwar ke baare meñ sachchaai bataay hei. Dunia uske nai apnaai kaahe ki u naa to uske dekhi, aur naa to uske jaani. Lekin tum to uske janta hei, kaahe ki u tumhaar sañghe rahe hei, aur tumhaar sañghe hee hardam rahi.”
43014018	“Ham tumme anaath nai chhoṛega, ham tumhaar lage lauṭ aayga.
43014019	Thoṛa deri meñ dunia hamme nai dekhi, lekin tum hamme dekhega, kaahe ki ham jinda hei aur tum bhi jinda rahega.
43014020	U din jab aai, tab tum jaanega ki ham aapan Pita meñ hei aur tum ham meñ hei, jeise ham tum meñ hei.”
43014021	“Jon hamaar baat maane hei aur uspe chale hei, wahi ham se prem kare hei. Hamaar Pita wahi se prem kari, jon ham se prem kare hei, ham bhi wahi log se prem karega aur uske saamne aayga.”
43014022	Juḍas Iskariyoti nai lekin dusra Juḍas tab puuchhis, “Prabhu, i keise hei ki tum khali hamme dekhaayga lekin puura dunia ke nai dekhaayga?”
43014023	Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Jon koi ham se prem kare hei wahi hamaar baat pe chali. Hamaar Pita uske pyaar kari, aur ham aur hamaar Pita ulog ke lage aayga aur ulog ke sañghe rahega.
43014024	Jon ham se prem nai kare hei, u hamaar kaha nai maani. I sab baat jon tum sunta hei, hamaar nai hei lekin hamaar Pita ke hei jon hamme bhejis hei.
43014025	“Jab tak ham tumhaar sañghe hei, ham tum se i sab baat bolta hei.
43014026	Lekin jon madat kare waala Pawitr Aatma jiske hamaar Pita, hamaar naam se bheji, u tumme sab baat sikhaay dei, aur jon baat ham tumme bataaya hei, uske hardam yaad karaai.”
43014027	“Ham tumme saanti deta hei, aur i hamaar aapan saanti hei jon ham tumme deta hei. Ham u rakam ke saanti nai deta jon dunia tumme dei. Yahi kaaran ghabraao nai aur wari nai karo, aur ḍaro bhi nai.
43014028	Tum to sun lia hei ki ham tum se kaa bola hei, ‘Ham jaata hei, aur fir tumhaar lage aayga.’ Agar tum ham se prem karta hei, to khusi hoyga kaahe ki ham aapan Pita ke lage jaata hei, aur Pita ham se bahut baṛa hei.
43014029	I sab hoy se pahile ham tum se sab kuchh bataay dia hei, ki jisse jab i sab hoi, tab tum biswaas karega.
43014030	Ab ham bahut deri tak tum se baat nai kare sakta, kaahe ki dunia ke raaja, saitaan aay waala hei. U to hamaar kuchh nai bigaaṛe sake hei.
43014031	Lekin dunia ke log ke jaane ke hei ki ham aapan Pita se prem karta hei, wahi kaaran ham wahi karta hei jon u hamme bataay hei. Aao, i jagha se chalo.”
43015001	Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Sachcha ḍaar ham hei, aur hamaar Pita uske gaaḍna hei.
43015002	Wahi hamaar u sab ḍaar ke kaaṭe hei jon fare nai hei, aur jon ḍaar fare hei uske chhaañṭ ke rakkhe hei, ki jisse usman aur far lage.
43015003	Hamaar vachan se tum sab safa hoy gaya hei.
43015004	Hamaar sañghe raho, aur ham tumhaar sañghe rahega. Ek ḍaar akele meñ nai fare hei, lekin jab u dusra ḍaari meñ juṛ jaay hei to fare hei. Yahi rakam jab tak tum hamaar meñ nai rahega, tab tak tum bhi nai fal laay sakega.”
43015005	“Ham peṛ hei, aur tum sab uske ḍaar hei. Jon ham meñ rahe hei, aur ham usman, wahi jaada fari, kaahe ki tum hamaar bina kuchh nai kare sakta hei.
43015006	Agar koi ham meñ nai rahe to u kaṭa ḍaar ke rakam feñk dewa jaai, aur suukhaay jaai, log u sab ke baṭor ke aagi meñ jhok de hei aur sab jar jaay hei.
43015007	Agar tum ham se juṛa rahega aur hamaar vachan tum meñ bana rahi, tab tum jon kuchh bhi maañgega, u tumme mil jaai.
43015008	Hamaar Pita ke mahima yahi meñ hei ki tum bahut se fal laao, tabahi tum hamaar chela bana rahega.
43015009	Ham tumme weisaiyeñ pyaar karta hei jeise hamaar Pita ham se kare hei, hamaar prem meñ bañdha raho.
43015010	Agar tum hamaar sab baat maanega, to hamaar prem meñ bana rahega, jeise ham aapan Pita ke sab baat ke maanta hei aur uske prem meñ bana rahta hei.”
43015011	“I sab baat ham tum se i kaaran bola hei ki hamaar khusi meñ tum bhi mila raho, aur tumhaar khusi puura hoy jaai.”
43015012	Ab ham tumme bataata hei ki jeise ham tum se prem kara hei, weisaiyeñ tum bhi ek dusra se prem karo.
43015013	Pyaar ke sab se baṛa sabuut wahi hei jon aapan dost ke waaste aapan jaan de de hei.
43015014	Tum sab hamaar dost rahega, agar tum hamaar sab baat sunega aur uske maanega.
43015015	Ham tumme naukar nai maanta kaahe ki ek naukar nai jaane hei ki uske maalik kaa kare hei. Ham tumme dost bolaata hei kaahe ki ham tumme u sab bataay dia jon ham aapan Pita se suna raha.
43015016	Tum hamme nai chuna, lekin ham tumme chuna aur dunia meñ bheja ki jisse tum sab fal laao, eisan fal jon hardam rahe. Hamaar Pita tumme u sab dei jon tum hamaar naam se maañgega.
43015017	Yahi hei jon ham tum se mañgta hei. Sab se prem karo.”
43015018	“Agar dunia tum se jaran kare hei, to yaad rakkho u tum se pahile ham se jaran karis.
43015019	Agar tum dunia ke hota, tab dunia tum se aapan rakam prem rakhta. Lekin ham tumme i dunia se chuna hei, yahi kaaran dunia tum se jaran kare hei.
43015020	Yaad rakhna ham tumme kaa bataaya hei, ‘Naukar aapan maalik se baṛa nai hei.’ Agar log hamme sataais hei, tab u tumme bhi sataai, agar u hamaar vachan maani to u tumhaar baat bhi maani.
43015021	Ilog tumhaar sañghe wahi kari jon ilog hamaar sañghe karis hei kaahe ki tum sab hamaar hei, aur ulog hamaar bheje waala ke nai jaane hei.
43015022	Agar ham aay ke ulog se baat nai kara hota, to ulog ke paap nai lagta, lekin ab to ulog ke paap se bache ke koi rasta nai.
43015023	Jon koi ham se jaran kare hei u hamaar Pita se bhi jaran kare hei.
43015024	U sab paapi nai hota agar ham u sab ke beech meñ u kaam nai karta jon aur koi nai kare sakat raha, lekin ab to u sab dekh leen hei ki ham kaa kara raha, fir bhi ulog ham se aur hamaar Pita se jaran kare hei.
43015025	I sab i kaaran bhais ki uske niyam ke buk meñ likha hei ki i baat puura hoi, ‘Ulog ham se bekaar meñ jaran rakkhis.”’
43015026	“Ham tumhaar lage ek madadgaar bhejega, jon Pita ke bagal se hoi, aur u tumme hamaar bagal se gawaahi dei.
43015027	Aur tum bhi hamaar baare meñ sab se bataayga, kaahe ki suru se tum hamaar sañghe raha hei.”
43016001	“Ham tum se i sab bataata hei ki tumhaar biswaas kamti nai hoi.
43016002	U log tumme aapan sabha meñ se nikaar dei, aur eisan ṭaaim bhi aai jab ulog tumme maar dei aur sochi ki eise kare se ulog Parmeshwar ke sewa kare hei.
43016003	U log tumhaar sañghe i sab kari kaahe ke ulog naa to hamme jaane hei aur naa to Pita ke jaane hei.
43016004	Lekin ham tumme i sab baat abhi bataata hei ki jab ṭaaim aai, ulog i sab kaam kari, tab tumme yaad aai ki ham kaa bola raha.
43016005	Lekin ab ham lauṭ ke uske lage jaata hei jon hamme bhejis hei, aur tum meñ se koi bhi nai i puuchhis ki ham kahañ jaata hei.
43016006	I baat sun ke tum bahut dukhi hei.
43016007	Lekin ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki i tumhaar khaatir achchha hoi ki ham chala jaai, kaahe ki agar ham nai jaayga to madadgaar tumhaar lage nai aai. Aur jeise ham jaayga, weise madadgaar tumhaar lage bhej dega.
43016008	Aatma aay ke, dunia ke log ke paap, dharam, achchha, bura aur nyaay ke baare meñ samjhaai.
43016009	Paap ke baare meñ dunia ke log nai jaane hei, kaahe ki ulog ham pe biswaas nai kare hei.
43016010	I log i bhi nai jaane hei ki kaa sach hei aur kaa jhuuṭ, kaahe ki ham Pita ke lage jaata hei, aur tum fir hamme nai dekhega.
43016011	Nyaay ke baare meñ bhi ilog nai jaane hei, kaahe ki dunia ke agua ke nyaay mil gais hei.”
43016012	“Hamme tum se aur bahut kuchh bataay ke hei, lekin tum uske abhi sahe nai sakega.
43016013	Lekin jab Pawitr Aatma aai aur Parmeshwar ke baare meñ sachcha baat bataai, tab u sachchaai ke bagal sab ke le chali. U aapan bagal se kuchh nai boli, lekin wahi boli jon u sunis hei aur aage chal ke hoy waala hei.
43016014	U hamme mahima dei, kaahe ki u hamaar sandesa tumme bataai.
43016015	Jon bhi kuchh Pita ke hei u sab hamaar hei, yahi khaatir ham bola ki u hamaar baat tumme bataai.”
43016016	“Thoṛa deri meñ tum hamme nai dekhega, lekin thoṛa deri ke baad fir se hamme dekhe sakega.”
43016017	Uske kuchh chela log aapas meñ bole lagin, “Iske matlab kaa hei? U bole hei ki thoṛa deri ke baad ham uske nai dekhe sakega, aur fir thoṛa deri ke baad ham uske dekhe sakega, aur u i bhi bole hei, ki u Pita ke lage jaay hei.”
43016018	‘I thoṛa deri’ ke matlab kaa hei? Ham nai samajhe sakta ki u kaa bole hei!”
43016019	Yeeshu jaan gais ki ulog usse kuchh puuchhe maañge hei aur tab u bolis, “Ham bola raha, ‘Thoṛa deri meñ tum hamme nai dekhega, aur fir thoṛa deri ke baad tum hamme dekhe sakega.’ Kaa yahi tum aapas meñ puuchh taachh karta hei?
43016020	Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, tum sab royga aur soch karega lekin sab dunia khusi manaai, tum dukhi hoyga, lekin tumhaar dukh, sukh meñ badal jaai.
43016021	Jab ek aurat bachcha ke janam dewe ke ṭaaim rahe hei, tab u bahut dukhi rahe hei, kaahe ke u peeṛa sahe ke ṭaaim hoy hei, lekin jab bachcha ke janam de de hei tab u sab dukh bhuul jaay hei, aur bachcha ke dunia meñ aay ke waaste khusi manaay hei.
43016022	Yahi abhi tumhaar sañghe hoy hei, tum abhi udaas hei, lekin ham tumme fir dekhega, to tumhaar man khusi se bhar jaai, eisan khusi jiske tum se koi chheene nai saki.”
43016023	“Jab u roj aai, tab tum ham se kuchh nai maañgega. Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, agar tum Pita se hamaar naam pe kuchh bhi maañgega, u tumme hamaar naam se de dei.
43016024	Abhi tak to tum hamaar naam se kuchh nai maañga, lekin ab maañgo to tumme mili, tab tumhaar khusi puura hoy jaai.”
43016025	“Ham tum se i sab bañdha baat meñ bola hei. Lekin jab ṭaaim aai tab ham sab khula baat meñ Pita ke baare meñ baat karega.
43016026	U roj jab aai, tum hamaar naam se usse maañgega, ham i nai bolta ki ham tumhaar khaatir maañgega.
43016027	Pita to apne tum se prem kare hei, kaahe ki tum ham se prem karta hei, aur i biswaas kara ki ham Parmeshwar ke bagal se aaya hei.
43016028	Ham Pita ke taraf se dunia meñ aay raha aur fir i dunia ke chhoṛ ke Pita ke lage jaata hei.”
43016029	Tab chela log Yeeshu se bolin, “Ab tum chhupa baat meñ nai lekin safa safa bolta hei.
43016030	Ham sab ab jaan gaya hei ki tum sab janta hei, ab i jaruurat nai ki koi tum se sawaal kare. Yahi hamme biswaas karaais hei ki tum Parmeshwar ke taraf se aaya hei.”
43016031	Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Kaa ab tum ham pe biswaas karta hei?
43016032	Ṭaaim aay hei, nai! nai! aay gais hei, jab tum sab chhitraay jaayga, aur tum sab ek ek karke aapan aapan ghare bhaag jaayga, aur ham akele rahe jaayga. Fir bhi ham akele nai hei, kaahe ki Pita hamaar sañghe hei.
43016033	Ham tumme i sab bataaya, ki jisse tum ham se saanti paao, kaahe ki tum ham se juṭa hei. Dunia tumme sataai. Lekin himmat rakkho! Ham dunia ke jeet lia hei!”
43017001	I sab baat bole ke baad, Yeeshu asmaan ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “He Pita, u ṭaaim aay gais hei. Aapan laṛka ke mahima deo, ki jisse tumhaar laṛka tumhaar mahima dekhaay saki.
43017002	Tumahi to uske sab ke uppar adhikaar dia hei, ki jisse u sab log ke anant jeewan dei, jon ke tum uske dia hei.
43017003	Anant jeewan ke matlab hei ki ulog tumme, ek sachcha Parmeshwar jaani, aur Yeeshu Maseeh ke bhi jaani jon ke tum bheja hei.
43017004	Jon kaam tum hamme kare ke waaste dia raha, uske ham puura karke i dharti pe tumhaar mahima kara hei.
43017005	Aur ab, He Pita, tum aapan saamne hamaar mahima karaao, wahi mahima jon hamme tumhaar sañghe, dunia ke bane se pahile raha.”
43017006	“Ham tumme u sab ke dekhaaya ki tum keisan hei, jon ke tum hamme i dunia meñ dia hei. U sab tumhaar rahin, aur tum ulog ke hamme dia. U log tumhaar vachan maanin.
43017007	Aur ab ulog jaan gain hei ki jon sab tum hamme dia hei, sab tumhaar taraf se aais hei.
43017008	Ham ulog ke wahi sandesa dia jon tum hamme dia raha, aur ulog sab maan ke biswaas bhi kar leen, ulog jaane hei ki yahi sachaai hei ki ham tumhaar taraf se aaya hei, aur i bhi biswaas kare hei ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
43017009	Ham dunia ke waaste nai lekin uske waaste jiske ham tumme dia hei, binti karta hei, kaahe ki u sab tumhaar hei.
43017010	Aur jon kuchh bhi hamaar hei, u sab tumhaar bhi hei, aur jon tumhaar hei, u hamaar hei, aur yahi se hamaar mahima karis hei.
43017011	Ham i dunia ke chhoṛ ke tumhaar lage aata hei, aur aapan chela log ke yahi dunia meñ chhoṛta hei. He Pawitr Pita, tum jon naam dia hei wahi ke sakti se i sab ke dekh bhaal karna ki jisse i sab ek hoy ke rahe jeise ki tum aur ham ek hei.
43017012	Jab tak ham uske sañghe raha, tumhaar naam ke sakti se ham i sab ke gaaḍ kara. Khali ek ke chhoṛ ke koi aur naas nai bhais ki jisse Baaibal meñ likha baat puura hoi.
43017013	Ab ham tumhaar lage aata hei. Ham dunia meñ i sab baat bataata hei ki u sab hamaar khusi ke aapan man meñ puura bhar le aur samajh bhi le.
43017014	Ham u sab ke tumhaar vachan sunaay dia hei, lekin dunia ke log usse jaran kare hei, kaahe ki u i dunia ke nai hei jeise ki ham i dunia ke nai hei.
43017015	Ham i preya i khaatir nai karta ki tum u sab ke dunia se uṭhaay lo, lekin i kaaran ki tum ulog ke saitaan se bachaay ke rakhna.
43017016	Jeise ham i dunia ke nai hei, weisaiyeñ u sab bhi i dunia ke nai hei.
43017017	Sachchaai se u sab ke pawitr karo kaahe ki tumhaar vachan sachcha hei.
43017018	Jeise tum hamme dunia meñ bheja wahi rakam ham bhi u sab ke dunia meñ bheja hei.
43017019	Ham apne aap ke uske khaatir puura rakam se de dia hei, ki jisse u sab sachchaai se pawitr hoy jaay.
43017020	Ham khali u sab ke khaatir nai, lekin ulog ke khaatir preya karta hei jon sab uske vachan se ham pe biswaas kari.
43017021	Hamaar binti hei, He Pita, u sab ek hoy jeise ham tum meñ hei aur tum ham meñ hei, wahi rakam u sab ham meñ bhi rahi, jisse dunia boli ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
43017022	Jon mahima tum hamme dia hei, wahi ham u sab ke dia hei ki jisse jeise ham ek hei, u sab bhi ek hoy jaay.
43017023	Ham u sab meñ aur tum ham meñ hei ki jisse u sab puura rakam se ek hoy jaay, aur dunia jaane ki tum hamme bheja hei, aur jeise tum ham se prem kara hei, weise u sab se bhi prem kara hei.
43017024	He Pita, ham i mañgta hei ki jon ke tum hamme dia hei, u sab hamaar sañghe rahe ki jisse jahañ ham rahi wahiñ u sab bhi rahe, aur u mahima ke dekhe jon ke tum dunia ke bane se pahile hamme dia raha.
43017025	He Pawitr Pita, dunia to tumme nai jaanis, lekin ham to tumme jaana hei, aur ilog to i jaan gain hei ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
43017026	Ham to tumhaar naam se i sab se bataay dia hei, aur bataate rahega ki jon pyaar tum hamme dia hei, u sab meñ hoi, aur ham bhi u sab meñ rahega.”
43018001	Yeeshu preya kare ke baad aapan chela log ke sañghe Kidron valley ke paar gais. Huañ ek gaaḍan raha aur Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe huañ gais.
43018002	Uske pakaṛwaay waala Juḍas u jagha jaanat raha kaahe ke Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe huañ hardam jaat raha.
43018003	Juḍas bhi u gaaḍan meñ gais, aur uske sañghe Romi saulja, Baṛa Paadri aur Farisi log ke bagal se chech ke sardaar bhi gais. U log aapan sañghe batti, mashaal aur laṛe ke hatiaar bhi leke aain raha.
43018004	Yeeshu to sab kuchh jaanat raha, ki kaa hoy waala hei. U aage baṛh ke puuchhis, “Tum kiske khojta hei?”
43018005	U log jawaab deen, “Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke.” Tab Yeeshu bolis, “U hamahi hei.” Uske pakaṛwaay waala Juḍas wahiñ sab ke sañghe khaṛa raha.
43018006	Jeise Yeeshu bolis, “U hamahi hei”, sab log pichchhe haṭin aur maṭṭi pe gir paṛin.
43018007	Yeeshu fir se puuchhis, “Tum log kis ke khojta hei?” U log fir jawaab deen, “Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke.”
43018008	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham to tum se bol dia hei ki hamahi u hei. Aur agar tum sab hamme khojta hei to ilog ke jaay deo.”
43018009	“Jisse uske bole waala vachan puura hoi. Tum jon ke hamme saupa hei ham usman se koi ke bhi naas nai hoy dega.”
43018010	Saayman Peeṭa ke lage ek talwaar raha. U aapan talwaar nikaar ke Baṛa Paadri ke ek naukar ke raaiṭ kaan kaaṭ dees. U naukar ke naam Malkus raha.
43018011	Yeeshu, Peeṭa ke ḍaaṭis, “Talwaar bhittar rakkho. Kaa tum sochta hei ki ham u dukh ke pyaala nai piyega jon Pita hamme dees hei?”
43018012	Tab Romi saulja aur uske admi Yeeshu ke pakaṛ ke baañdh deen.
43018013	Aur u sab Yeeshu ke pakaṛ ke pahile to Annas ke lage le gain, jon u saal Baṛa Paadri Kaaifa ke sasur raha.
43018014	I wahi Kaaifa raha jon Yahuudi log ke bataais raha ki sab ke bhalaai yahi meñ hei ki khali ekke admi maara jaay.
43018015	Saayman Peeṭa aur ek aur chela Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe gain. I chela Baṛa Paadri ke jaana pahichaana raha, aur u Yeeshu ke sañghe Baṛa Paadri ke añgna meñ gais.
43018016	Peeṭa bahire duaari pe khaṛa hoy gais. U dusra chela jon Baṛa Paadri ke jaanat raha, bahire aay ke duaari pe khaṛi aurat se puuchh ke Peeṭa ke bhittar le gais.
43018017	Duaari pe khaṛi aurat Peeṭa se puuchhis, “Kaa tum u admi ke chela to nai?” Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Nai. Ham nai hei.”
43018018	Huañ bahut ṭhanḍa raha aur sab naukar aur sipaahi koyla ke aagi jaraay rakkhin raha, aur us ke chaaro bagal khaṛa hoy ke aagi taapat rahin. Peeṭa bhi u sab ke sañghe khaṛa hoy ke aagi taape laga.
43018019	Tab Baṛa Paadri log Yeeshu se uske chela log aur uske updes ke baare meñ puuchhin.
43018020	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham sab log se khula ruup meñ baat kara hei. Ham hardam sabha meñ aur chech meñ jahañ log baṭurat rahin huañ updes deta raha aur chhupaay ke to kuchh nai kara.
43018021	Tab tum ham se kaahe ke puuchhta hei? Jon log hamaar baat sunin hei, wahi log se puuchho ki ham kaa bola hei. U sab jaane hei ki ulog se kon kon baat bola.
43018022	Yeeshu ke i baat pe, ek saulja jon uske bagal meñ khaṛa raha, Yeeshu ke ek thappaṛ maaris, aur bolis, “Tum purohit se i rakam baat karta hei?”
43018023	Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Agar ham kuchh ulṭa baat bola hei, to sab ke bataao ham kaa bola hei. Aur agar ham ṭheek bola hei to hamme fir kaahe ke maarta hei?”
43018024	Tab Annas, Yeeshu ke weisaiyeñ bañdha, Kaaifa Baṛa Paadri ke lage bhej dees.
43018025	Saayman Peeṭa khaṛa hoy ke aagi taapat raha, tab huañ ke log usse puuchhin, “Kahiñ tum bhi uske chela meñ se ek to nai hei?” Peeṭa muuṛ hilaay ke naa kar dees, “Ham nai hei.”
43018026	Baṛa Paadri ke naukar meñ se ek naukar jon u admi ke palwaar raha, jiske kaan Peeṭa kaaṭis raha, usse puuchhis, “Kaa ham gaaḍan meñ tumme uske sañghe nai dekha raha?”
43018027	Peeṭa ek dafe fir nai kar dees, aur wahi ṭaaim murga bolis.
43018028	Sabere hoy waala raha, aur Yeeshu ke Kaaifa ke lage se gavna ke jagha laawa gais. U log u jagha nai gain, kaahe ke u sab apne aap ke safa rakkhe maañgat rahin, ki jisse u sab fasah ke teohaar ke khaana khaay sake.
43018029	Paaylaṭ bahire nikar ke uske lage aais aur puuchhis, “I admi pe kaa dos hei?”
43018030	U log jawaab deen, “Agar i admi kharaab kaam nai kare hota, to ham iske aap ke haath meñ nai deta.”
43018031	Tab Paaylaṭ ulog se bolis, “Tum log iske le jaao aur aapan kaanuun ke mutaabik iske saja deo.” Tab Yahuudi log usse bolis, “Koi ke maare ke hamaar lage hak nai hei.”
43018032	Ab eise bhais ki Yeeshu jon baat bolis raha, puura hoi. Aur i ek saain raha ki keise uske maut hoi.
43018033	Paaylaṭ fir bhittar chala gais. U Yeeshu ke bhittar bolaay ke bolis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei?”
43018034	Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tum i baat apne aap bolta hei, ki aur sab log bhi hamaar baare meñ yahi bole hei?”
43018035	Paaylaṭ jawaab dees, “Kaa ham Yahuudi hei? Khud tumhaar admi log aur Baṛa Paadri log tumme hamaar haath meñ deen hei. Tum kaa galti kara raha?”
43018036	Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Hamaar raaj i dunia ke nai hei. Agar hamaar raaj i dunia ke rahta, to hamaar naukar hamaar bagal se laṛta aur ham Yahuudi agua log ke haath meñ nai paṛta, lekin hamaar raaj hiañ ke nai hei.”
43018037	Tab Paaylaṭ bolis, “To kaa tum raaja hei?” Ispe Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tumahi to bolta hei ki ham raaja hei. Ham to yahi kaaran janam lia raha aur yahi kaaran dunia meñ aaya hei ki sachchaai ke baare meñ sab se bataai. Jon bhi koi sachchaai ke apnaay hei u hamaar baat sune hei.”
43018038	Tab Paaylaṭ puuchhis, “Sachchaai kaa hei?” Fir Paaylaṭ sab log ke lage jaay ke bolis, “Ham koi kaaran nai paata ki iske ham saja dei.”
43018039	“Lekin reeti riwaaj ke kaaran ham hardam fasah ke teohaar pe, ek keidi ke chhoṛ deta hei. Kaa tum sab i maañgo hei ki ham Yahuudi ke raaja ke chhoṛ dei?”
43018040	Sab log chillaay ke bolin, “Nai, uske nai! Ham Baarabba ke mañgta hei.” (Baarabba ek chor raha.)
43019001	Tab Paaylaṭ hukum dees ki Yeeshu ke chaabuk lagaawa jaay.
43019002	Saulja log kaaṭa ke ek taaj banaain, aur Yeeshu ke muuṛ pe rakh deen, aur tab uske pepal rang ke kapṛa pahinaain.
43019003	Tab saulja aay ke Yeeshu se bolin, “Yahuudi ke raaja, jeete raho!” Aur aage jaay ke uske thappaṛ maarin.
43019004	Ek dafe fir Paaylaṭ bahire aay ke bolis, “Dekho ham iske bahire laata hei aur tum apne dekhna ki ham isman koi dos nai paaya hei, ki iske saja dei.”
43019005	Tab Yeeshu bahire aais, u kaaṭa ke taaj aur pepal rang ke kapṛa pahine raha. Tab Paaylaṭ ulog se bolis, “Dekho! yahi hei u admi!”
43019006	Jab Baṛa Paadri aur chech ke saulja Yeeshu ke dekhin to chillaay uṭhin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaao! Kros pe chaṛhaao!” Paaylaṭ fir se bolis, “Tumahi iske le jaao aur kros pe chaṛhaao. Ham isman kuchh dos nai dekha.”
43019007	Tab bheeṛ jawaab dees, “Ham log ke kaanuun bataay hei ki iske maare ke chaahi, kaahe ki i apne aap ke Parmeshwar ke laṛka bataay hei.”
43019008	Jab Paaylaṭ i baat sunis to aur ghabraay gais.
43019009	U bhittar lauṭ ke gay aur Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Tum kahañ ke rahe waala hei?” Lekin Yeeshu jawaab nai dees.
43019010	Tab Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se bolis, “Tum ham se kaahe nai baat karta hei? Kaa tum i nai janta ki ham tumme chhoṛ de sakta hei? Aur kros pe bhi chaṛhwaay sakta hei?”
43019011	Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Agar Parmeshwar tumme hak nai deta, to tum hamme kuchh nai kare sakta. Lekin jon hamme tumhaar haath saupis hei u to aur bhi baṛa paap karis hei.”
